host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Spectacular, the host was so kind and his apartment is beautiful, I enjoyed be there, the bed is so comfortable and the apartment is really clean...

Vict's apartment is very nice and the supermarket just next to it! It is very convenient for us to buy anything that we need. The only problem is the apartment is little far from midtown, so if we take Uber to go home, it usually costs a lot.

L.appartement de Vick est très (Website hidden by Airbnb) décoration symphonie et très bien entretenu. Il ne manquait rien pour nous 4 et nous avons passé un agréable séjour et appartement bien situé pour visiter New York.
Vick was very friendly, flexible and welcoming. The apartment has very good connection to the city center (bus, subway) and a shopping mall is in close neighborhood. We enjoyed our stay in NY!

Vick was a great host very understanding and helpful. The place certainly took some getting used as it is quite narrow but the space was big enough for 9 of us. The place had a fully stocked kitchen, bathroom with shower and bath, a mac and a tv with apple tv. The neighborhood was good it was a 10 minute walk to the nearest subway station and a short walk to central park.
The apartment was very nice, clean and near to the metro. It was really great to stay at this place.

Vick was an excellent host. he was very flexible with my last minute changes and made sure I had everything I needed. he's pretty laid back so everything went smoothly. 
The appartment was nice, very close to grocery stores and transportation.  
I spent an excellent time in NYC and loved Vick's place. 
Thank you man. 
Joad
Overall great location and experience for what we were looking for. Surrounding area is slightly questionable late at night. No complaints about the space.

Vick was easy to contact.  We aligned on a time to arrive and leave and there was a lot of flexibility.  Great host, apartment was described well and really quiet inside despite being in a city.  Thanks

Vick was very easy to communicate and has been honest from the first contact to the last. His house was clean and had enough space for 7 people. He was also very flexible with our last minute changes. He was kind to check-in with us throughout our visit. His house is great for large groups with good service and affordable price in NYC. Overall, he made our first Airbnb experience great. I'd love to stay again.

Our stay at Vicks apartment was amazing. Vick always responded quickly to any questions I had and was very helpful with everything. His apartment looks exactly how it does in pictures but even nicer in person. He was also very flexible with check-in and check-out times. I would definitely stay here again.
Vick's place is really nice and spacious. Vick is really a nice person and he has a flexible check in and out time.
Was a great host. Got everything we needed!

Vick's place was just as described in the pictures. We were so happy that the space was clean and in a decent neighborhood. I traveled with three other guest and we all had plenty of room to sretch out. The two living areas were used as additional sleeping place which we ended up using. Rooms in the house were on separate ends making for more privacy. 
My flight had been delayed multiple times, Vick was nice enough to allow my guest to check in without me. He and his sister, Maria were very fast in responding to our needs and even checking on us to make sure we were okay. 
Due to late flight departure, both Vick and Maria allowed later check out times to accommodate us. I would recommend this spot for small groups and I would love to stay here again! 
Thanks so much! Trip successful!

Great Location with supermarkets close by and only 5-10 minutes walk to the subway station. Two bedrooms with comfy beds and towels. Good shower and a living room. Old building with little light but that was no problem for us. We enjoyed our stay very much.
A great apartment for groups and wonderful communication from the hosts.
Vick was a great host.  Extremely easy to get a hold of and immediately responded to any questions.

We loved this place! Very clean and slept 3 very comfortably. There’s a shopping center across the street with a Costco, Marshall’s, Old Navy which was great. Will definitely try to stay again next time I’m in the area.
整体来说一般,地段位置还算不错,距离市中心和景点二十多分钟车程｡房子本身感觉不好,房屋格局就像走廊一样的,长条形,只有两端两个房间有门,私密性一般｡只有一个很小的浴室,非常不方便,不适合大家庭入住｡床单和毛巾显得老旧,而且房屋没有洗衣机,对于多日入住的旅客,毛巾不能换洗很麻烦｡我们住的房间床单有黄色痕迹｡房东还算不错吧｡价格并不便宜,性价比很低,个人觉得酒店会好很多｡要求不高的可以尝试｡

Vick was an AMAZING host. He checked in frequently, quickly responded to any questions, and was super nice. The air bnb is very cozy & has plenty of bed space. I would definitely stay at this air bnb again.

On the first day we got lost and arrived at the apartment pretty late. However, the host was really nice that he waited for us until we finally got there!!! The house was also very good and the heaters worked quite well! The kitchens basically had everything we need and the wifi was also very fast!

Vick's apartment was very cozy and pretty. We just had a problem with the check in but it all went well ! I recommend this apartment and you have Target just next to the house which is very cool. Thanks Vick.

host.host_about: Welcoming host who wants you to enjoy the beautiful surrounds at Coogee Beach

reviews.comments: My stay at David's Coggee Beach house was excellent. It's a big house with 10 large bedrooms, and common livingroom and large kitchen, deck (super nice) and bathrooms (3 bathroom area with individual shower (nice one), sink and toilet). I met nice people who gave me good advices to get around Sydney. David, the host, is very responsible and responded on the post to my emails while I was there. Being large, the house is very quiet and no one really bother anyone else. A cleaner shows up everyday, they were two ladies when I was there. They do an amazing job keeping the place spotless, and they are also very sweet. Now, Coggee is an amazing place. The house is up the street from the beach- there is also a large green park next to the beach. It's really nice. I went swimming at the ladies bath (sometype of sea water swimming pool on the beach) the first morning despite being Winter: amazing! I find that the picture showing Coggee beach do not make justice. It is so much more beautiful. I can't wait to go back there. (details: bus are down the street, Sydney downtown is 25min away, the airport is 20 min away (35$ for a cab), Bondi beach is 2 beaches away :p (20min), and peroquees are all around:)

David introduced himself almost immediately on arrival and made me feel welcome. Place was exactly as posted. Other guests were interesting, courteous and helpful. Room was comfortable as was the bed. Large, easy share kitchen well organized and clean. The only negative (for me with recent hip replacement surgery) was all hand washing sinks except kitchen sink were one flight of stairs down. Immediate neighborhood pretty residential. Commerce and Coogee Beach just a short walk.
David was a very nice and hepful host, we loved it to stay in his Apartment :) it was always clean and tidy.
The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

When I arrived at Sydney, I received David's message about our arrival time, and let us know the room is ready. The house of David is very easy to find. The house is big. The manager helped us to check in and introduced the use of the house in detail.The room is very big. The bed and storage space are large, The room is tidy and have a TV, even though our English is not very good, Johnny patiently explain for us.There are a lot of rooms. The kitchen has adequate facilities.The tenant from Brazil and France, and all people are very friendly, liking to chat. You can know many friends here, in addition to go out a few steps to reach the beach. The scenery is very beautiful.There are a lot of lines, bus station to attractions which is very convenient.Johnny is very keen to send us to the destination when we leave. The people are very good and here is a very worth to stay.David and Johnny are nice, and I hope I can come here again next time.

The house is a big house shared by usually long term tenants (months to years). All of them have been lovely and made me feel very welcome even if I was there for a short amount of time. 
The room was immense and everything was super clean. 
The location is perfect for access to Coogee beach and multiple food options. Many buses options also to go to CBD.
All in all probably one of the best air BnB I've been to.
great experience!

David’s place is full of really nice guests and very close to bars, cafes, shops, transport and beaches. We loved staying here, the place is well equipped with cooking and cleaning facilities. Only downside is the slow Wi-Fi but I believe David is already on the case! Would definitely recommend to anyone who wants to visit Sydney but wants to stay near the coast!

name: Cozy Nest, heart of the Plateau
summary: Come spend a few days (or weeks) in our beautiful and cozy apartment situated in the heart of Montreal's most happening neighborhood! You will share the space with me as, maybe another guest and probably a cute cat or kitten (I sometimes foster cute little furry balls). LGBTQ friendly :) Looking forward to meeting you!
space: The spacious double room comes fully furnished with a double bed, closet space as well as a desk + High speed internet + heating + sheets and towels + direct access to a washer/dryer. Our apartment is a ground floor with a cute backyard and is situated right between two of Montreal's most happening neighborhoods (The Plateau and Mile End) as well as two main streets: Saint-Laurent and Mont-Royal.  5 minute walking distance from the beautiful Mont-Royal 10 minutes direct bus ride from downtown Steps away from bixi stands (Local bicycle sharing program). Our neighborhood is bustling with grocery shops, cafés, bars, restaurants and parks, all in walking distance!
description: Come spend a few days (or weeks) in our beautiful and cozy apartment situated in the heart of Montreal's most happening neighborhood! You will share the space with me as, maybe another guest and probably a cute cat or kitten (I sometimes foster cute little furry balls). LGBTQ friendly :) Looking forward to meeting you! Our apartment is a ground floor with a cute backyard and is situated right between two of Montreal's most happening neighborhoods (The Plateau and Mile End) as well as two main streets: Saint-Laurent and Mont-Royal.  5 minute walking distance from the beautiful Mont-Royal 10 minutes direct bus ride from downtown Steps away from bixi stands (Local bicycle sharing program). Our neighborhood is bustling with grocery shops, cafés, bars, restaurants and parks, all in walking distance! Please fee
neighborhood_overview: We live right between two of Montreal's most happening neighborhoods. At the foot of the Mont-Royal and right next to Saint-Laurent, Mont-Royal and St-Denis streets. Our street is however quiet and peaceful.
notes: Since we are on the ground floor, access in and out of the house is possible for folks who may have a limited mobility, however there is 1 step to get through the front door and the bathroom is unfortunately a bit too narrow to accomodate a wheelchair. Let me know if you have questions regarding specifics and I'll be able to assist!
transit: 5 minute walking distance from the beautiful Mont-Royal 10 minutes direct bus ride from downtown Steps away from bixi stands (Local bicycle sharing program). Our neighborhood is bustling with grocery shops, cafés, bars, restaurants and parks, all in walking distance from our place!
access: Please feel free to make yourself at home. You have access to the common rooms in the apartment, as well as the courtyard and the basement (where you will find the washer/dryer).
interaction: I am discreet and respectful yet enjoy sharing out stories at the end of the day or advising guests on places to go or things to see!
house_rules: Hi Guest! Hope you will have an awesome stay at our place. Aside from keeping things clean and not screaming after midnight, we don't have many rules. Here are however the things you should pay attention to: 1 - Whenever you leave the house, please make sure the windows and back door are closed and locked. 2 - The front door can be a bit hard to shut so make sure to give it the extra push or pull so that it locks properly. 3 - There is a washer and dryer downstairs in the basement, which you can access through the living room. The basement light switches are on the pillar, situated at the bottom of the stairs on the left.  Our linen closet is filled with extra blankets and bed sheets. it is in the beige closet at the bottom of the basement stairs. 4 - If you use the microwave at the same time as the toaster or electric kettle, it will blow a fuse so try to remember not to do it. If it happens, no big deal, it can be switched back on through the electric panel in the basement. Voilà ! i

host.host_about:
Hello,
My name is Laura, I am a young and active professional living in Montreal and working for a concert promoter.
I've been living in this apartment for over 12 years now. It holds a very special place in my heart and I am glad to be opening the doors of my cosy nest to new guests!
You will also be sharing the common space with a cat or two as well as maybe another traveling guest.
Looking forward to meeting you and helping make your stay in our lovely city as comfortable as possible.
À bientôt !

reviews.comments: my stay in the comfy private double room was indeed comfy!   it´s not just conveniently in the middle of a great neighborhood, walkig distance from the mont royal and a bunch of nice cafes and bars but the hosts were very easy going, helpful and fun. i´d totally do it again!
An amazing and enormous room and a total bargain at the price. Nice backyard. Great neighbourhood. Friendly and accommodating host. I hereby have nothing bad to say!

I had a FABULOUS stay! The room was enormous and just as pictured. You really cannot beat the neighborhood - walking distance to a ton of great local bars/restaurants/parks and easy access to the bus and the subway. The hosts were so gracious and helpful. I'd stay here again in a heartbeat.
We had a wonderful stay! The host was very friendly and helpful, the room was exactly like the picture, and the location was perfect.
Lilou was a lovely host - communication was super smooth and she made me nice herbal tea before bed. The room is spacious, and you really couldn't ask for a better location in Montreal!
The reservation was canceled 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

L'accueil proposé par Laura et Lulu est chaleureux et très agréable. Le quartier est un des meilleurs de Montréal et l'appartement est idéalement située. La chambre est très grande et calme. 
Laura est une hôte remarquable, et très arrangeante ! Merci encore pour ce premier séjour a Montréal !

J'ai passé 5 jours chez Laura, l'appartement est grand et ressemble bien a ce que l'on peut voir sur les photos. La chambre est elle aussi très grande, et le lit très confortable. 
Pour ce qui est de Laura et de Anne, elles sont toutes les deux très sympas et mettent à l'aise tout de suite. En bref on se sent comme chez soit. 
Au final, un super début de séjour à Montréal, encore merci à Laura et Anne.

If I had to describe my stay at Laura's in one word it would be 'AMAZING'! Luckily, I have more space. 

The room is just as the pictures display: huge, clean, and comfy! There's a 2persons bed, a build-in closet, another closet with drawers, a book case, a big desk, and a comfy sofa to relax on. Although the room offers more space than you probably need, you can also just hang out in the cozy living room. But the best place has to be the back yard, which Laura turned in a little green oasis. It's the ideal spot to relax after a long day, enjoy the sun, or have a home dinner. And no need to feel lonely as Lulu - a.k.a. the most adorable cat ever - and his buddies from the block are always around somewhere (especially if you give them some of your ham sandwich or sushi). 

I've stayed at Laura's for several months and I've never felt so at home in another person's house. Laura went above and beyond to make my stay as pleasant as possible. I was new to Montreal (actually I was new to Canada) and didn't know any people other than a few colleagues. Laura embraced me as a friend and made sure I never had to feel alone or get bored, while also giving me all the privacy I wanted. 

The neighbourhood has everything you need. The house is near  shops, supermarkets, cafe's, restaurants, parks (including the Mont Royal), several busstops, 2 metro stations (Laurier & Mont Royal; both 10 min walking distance), and there's and there's always some fun - often free - festival around the corner in the summer. Despite all this the street is actually really quiet and is very safe!

Laura was a brilliant host. The key pick up was well-organized and I felt immediately welcomed into the home. Essentials/amenities were provided for which made it much easier.

She also gave us great advice on where to go and eat. Overall Laura was just an awesome host.

I stayed here for a week during one of the many festivals in Montreal. Communication before arrival was great and when I checked in there was a lovely hand written welcome letter with instructions as the host was at work.

The room was as pictured in the listing, clean and bright and the double bed was super comfy ( i slept really well). Location was also great right next to St.Laurent with cafes and restaurants near by and a large supermarket. 

Laura and her housemates made me feel super welcome in their home and would stay here again.
Super cute apartment, with a great room! Laura was super welcoming and made my stay very enjoyable. I would definitely recommend this place! I had a great time!

Our stay with Laura was wonderful! The room was clean and homey and the location was very central and interesting. Lilou was great at communicating with us about arrival and departure and very friendly - providing us with some tips about what to do in the city. She really went above and beyond to accommodate us... I'd definitely recommend staying here!

Laura was awesome to stay with! Her place is in the BEST location, in the artistic area of Montrèal, very close to a bus station, grocery store, coffee shops, music bars and very good restaurants. The bedroom was so beautiful, clean, cosy and comfortable! I went to Montrèal on my own and I couldn't choose a better flat/area in the city. As a woman you can walk wherver you want feeling so confident and safe!!! 

The whole apartment is so clean and beautiful! I got there just in time for good weather, and Laura was so nice to me, ready to answer to any question of myne, every time I needed, by phone and in person. We also had a lovely chat together in her fantastic courtyard and she invited me to her tasty birthday party introducing me all her friends. She has been great to me!
If you want to go to Montrèal, you absolutely have to go in her place!
Die Lage ist super, die Gastgeberin sehr herzlich und nett. Absolute Empfehlung! :)

The room was spacious and clean. Lucy was very welcoming and great to have a chat with! Our stay was only 3 days so Lucy suggested some great places to eat and things to do. Close to some great places to eat and shops.

Laura est une hôte très chaleureuse, accueillante et communicative.
Le logement est dans un quartier très agréable, la chambre est spacieuse et conforme aux photos. 
Son chat Lulu est mignon tout plein et très calme. 
Nous recommandons fortement après les deux belles journées passées à Montréal.

Such a lovely space and host! Arrival was very easy, and the apartment and room I was staying in (the front room) were clean and well decorated. The backyard was an great place to chill out - very relaxing and private. 

The host, Laura, was very friendly and laid-back. The resident kitty was possibly even more friendly than Laura, and will monopolize your whole stay with her adorableness if you let her. 

The area is very close to bus routes, as well as some small coffee shops and restaurants, and of course the beautiful Mont Royale. The Mile-End neighborhood is eclectic and cute, with lots to see even if you're just wandering. 

I would absolutely stay here again and recommend it to friends headed to Montreal.

Fantastic experience. Laura was incredibly friendly and accommodating. The room was comfortable and everything we needed for our week in Montreal. It was perfectly located to easily get anywhere we wanted to go into the city easily. Would highly recommend and would definitely stay again next time I come to Montreal.

I loved the neighbourhood - pretty houses and cool cafes and lots of young people on bikes. I really appreciate the simple but tasteful way that Laura has furnished her house. 
Laura is super warm and lovely, helpful, kind and also gives you space you need. 

The bed is very comfortable with lovely fluffy pillows. The room is really big and lovely.

I just can't fault this accommodation. It's a fabulous inexpensive option.

Le logement correspond totalement au descriptif , avec une chambre spacieuse . L'emplacement est idéal avec restaurants , boutiques et épiceries à 5 minutes à pieds .Laura est très sympathique et souriante  ; mais malheureusement elle n'a pas pu être très présente lors de mon séjour . Juste vue en coup de vent 4 ou 5 fois . Le chat Lulu est un vieux pépère adorable . Pour mon premier airbnb cela à été très positif , avec en plus d'avoir eu une colocataire française adorable pendant mon séjour  .
André
My stay was great! Laura was so nice and everything was as described! Lovely location!
Lovely room, great area, fantastic host!

After living in Montreal for 3 years, I spent my last 4 months at Laura's place and I could have not  hoped for a better way to enjoy this ending experience in Quebec. Laura made me feel home since day one. Living with her made my days happier and funnier, she's caring, full of energy, curious and interesting. She's very open minded and used to meeting different people all the time. There's no way you could be bored having her around. 
If you're only visiting for a few days, she will definitely be a good adviser, she knows her city by heart. If you're staying longer like I did, the only risk is that you might have a heavy heart when it will be time to leave.

The place was amazing and was located in a nice neighbourhood full of cool vintage stores, restaurants and bars. Laura was super nice and friendly. She made me feel so welcome and my room was clean, also the bed was comfy. Everything was just so great! I would definitely stay at Laura's again for my next trip to Montréal! :)

Hôtesse charmante et serviable, grande chambre confortable et bien située.
Un vrai nid douillet!

I stayed at Laura's place for 3 weeks and wouldn't hesitate to recommend it to anyone visiting Montréal! Laura was a fantastic host, so lovely and helpful, making sure my arrival was easy even though she was at work. The room was as pictured and very spacious, with plenty of space for luggage and a super comfy bed. The entire apartment is clean and spacious, and it was great having access to a washer and dryer. The apartment is in a safe neighbourhood, located within a couple of minutes walking distance of the bustling Blvd St-Laurent. There are so many great restaurants, cafés and shops nearby (including a large supermarket a few minutes away) you are spoiled for choice. Mont-Royal metro station is only a 10 minute walk away to so you can be downtown in 25 minutes!

Tout d'abord la chambre est conforme aux photos et l'appartement est très bien situé au cœur du Plateau. Il se situe entre le métro Mont-Royal et Laurier sans parler des nombreux bus à proximité qui vous emmèneront directement en centre-ville. 
Laura est vraiment une super hôte, vous pouvez réserver les yeux fermés!

Je me suis senti très bien accueilli par Lilou et ses adorables chat et chatons. Lilou a su avec beaucoup de respect et sociabilité, préserver mon intimité dont j'avais besoin à ce moment là. 
De plus, j'ai beaucoup apprécié son appartement qui est propre, très calme et très bien situé. La chambre étant grande et justement aménagée . Je recommande vivement cette place :-)
Great location, very comfortable room, very friendly hosts.

Laura was absolutely the best. Check-in instructions were clear and the place was absolutely fantastic. The place was exactly the right spot for shopping and cool cafés to check out in the morning, as well as lunch and supper locales in the evenings. Literally one block from a bus that took me straight downtown if I didn't want to walk, which, when I wanted to, was straight down Boul. St. Laurent! The room was big and clean and quiet. I would have loved to stay longer!

My stay at Laura's place was amazing! The house is spacious, clean, and cosy, and nestled in the heart of the lively, funky, and beautiful Plateau-Mont-Royal. Laura has an amazing way of making her place feel relaxed and friendly, and her guests feel welcome! Merci Laura, this was one of my best Airbnb experiences yet :)

La chambre , la hôte et l emplacement sont magnifiques !
Et les chats aussi !
Merci
Top :) Emplacement et accueil supers !
A lovely spacious room with the convenience of cooking facilities and close to excellent restaurants and a Bixi bike stop.
My stay was wonderful, it was a great start and place to explore Montreal. I was made to feel right at home!

I loved staying at Laura's apartment! Her place is spacious and clean and she is super friendly and easy to coordinate with. I was arriving earlier than the check-in time and Laura made arrangements so that I could come in earlier and leave my bags in the room. The location of her place is ideal, surrounded by stores, cafes and restaurants and walking distance from other cool neighborhoods. There is close access to public transportation (metro and bus) and I was able to get to all the areas I wanted to visit very easily. The room is huge with a comfy bed, closet space, a big desk and a corner sofa. The rest of the apartment was clean and orderly and I felt really comfortable throughout my stay. I would definitely recommend staying at Laura's and I will certainly do so whenever I visit Montreal again!

airbnb au top! Laura est super cool, la chambre est grande, pratique il y a tout ce qu'il faut. L'emplacement est génial à une rue de Saint Laurent, 5min des transports en commun...  Allez-y sans hésiter

Lilou's place is situated in a very lively neighborhood and not far away from downtown (10min by bus and 30 min walking). She is a very hospitable host and I felt at home during my 2 weeks stay. Milton (the cat) is super friendly but not annoying. Try to visit few of her local restaurants' recommendations, there are some great tips. Overall, this is one of the best airbnb accommodations in Mtl.

1. 위치
- 디자이너샵(소품, 의류). 빈티지샵 들이 주변에 있어 구경하기 좋음
- 분위기 좋은 커피숍들이 있음
- 유명맛집들이 가까움 (베이글.샌드위치.라멘 등)
- 몽로얄과 장딸롱마켓이 가까움
- 대중교통으로 어디든지 쉽게 갈 수 있음
- 조용하고 깨끗한 동네

2. 숙소
- 방이 엄청 넓고 깨끗함
- 모던하고 예쁜 인테리어. 
- 3마리의 귀여운 고양이
- 작은 뒷마당 있음

3. 편의시설
- 수건 제공
- 세탁기 사용 가능
- 부엌. 냉장고 사용 가능

4. 결론
엄청 친근한 호스트 덕에 잘 쉬다 감. 
집이 무지 예뻐서 그냥 보기만 해도 기분 좋아짐. 
여름-가을에 가면 몽로얄도 가깝고, 뒷마당도 있어서 더 좋을 것 같음. 
다운타운에서 가깝진 않지만, 몬트리올은 작고 대중교통이 잘 되어 있어서 이동이 불편하지 않음. 오히려 동네가 조용하고 근처에 쉴 수 있는 카페가 많아서 좋았음. 
추천해요!!!!
It’s been a long time since I travelled alone as a single woman in a new city and laura was really wonderful and accommodating! It’s a great stay, great location and wonderful city.
A very quiet and relaxed place to stay. Laura is very helpful in all kind of issues. The location is perfect for all activities in downtown.
Un logement très bien, une bonne ambiance et le quartier est très sympa.

La chambre est spacieuse, confortable, propre.  Lilou est une hôte réactive, accueillante, elle n'hésite pas à échanger, donner des bons conseils. On se sent très vite à l'aise, l'appartement est bien situé proche des transports, commerces , restaurants. L'emplacement est idéal!
Un accueil chaleureux et généreux, il y a de la vie et de la bonne humeur, on s’y sent rapidement comme chez soi, merci Laura!

Mi sono fermata tre settimane a casa di Lilou e mi sono sentita subito a casa.La casa è molto accogliente oltre a essere bella e funzionale. Lilou ha senza dubbio stile. La casa è posizionta tra i miei due quartieri in assoluto preferiti della città: Plateu e Mile End e bastano pochissimi giorni per sentirsi subito integrati nel quartiere come un vero Montrealese!! Meno di 10 minuti a piedi e si raggiunge la stazione della metropolitana Laurier e in meno di 15 minuti quella di Mont-Royal. Inoltre l'autobus 55 passa a un minuto a piedi da casa e ti porta in Downtown - old port in 20 minuti e in little italy in 15. Il quartiere è pieno di cafè, gallerie d'arte, negozi vintage e bistro dove cenare o fare un brunch! E' davvero un luogo autentico.
Lilou è un host fantastica.. e la sua gatta Milton è molto dolce e simpatica.
La casa ha tutto ciò che (Website hidden by Airbnb) cucina è ben fornita e in taverna c'è la lavatrice e l'asciugatrice che si può utilizzare liberamente.

The location of Lilou's place in the heart of the Plateau couldn't be better: really good restaurants just a block away (try Robin Du Bois!), a superb massage and bodywork business just around the corner (Place Nomade), a few blocks to the supermarket in one direction, a few more blocks to the natural food store in another direction, great ethnic restaurants in every direction, even an excellent hardware store in walking distance, not to mention big public parks (especially Mont Royal), about a 15-minute walk to the Laurier metro stop, Portuguese, Greek and Hassidic communities nearby, trendy bars, vintage bagel shops...etc., etc. A very fun area to be in. To stay in this airbnb, you definitely need to be OK with cats, since the very friendly black cat who lives there considers herself the true owner. The bed was excellent, the kitchen very practical, the laundry machines in the basement easy to use, and Lilou herself is very friendly and welcoming and helpful.

I spent a perfect 7 nights at Laura’s. The location was awesome, as it was one street off of St. Laurent (a street with many neat shops and restos) and a 10 minute walk to the metro. It was also a short walk to the Mile End where the delicious bagels are. Although it was crazy hot outside, the apartment and bedroom were still very cool. The bedroom was large and the bed was super comfy. 10/10 would recommend and stay again!
This was a great neighborhood and a beautiful, big, quiet space. Can’t recommend it enough for anyone who wants to enjoy Le Plateau and have a refuge to rest and relax at night.

I absolutely loved staying here. Laura is super friendly and helpful, her apartment is somewhere you'd want to hang out in your real life, and the neighborhood is very walkable and has lots of interesting restaurants, parks, and shops.

One of the most wonderful hosts I've had the chance to meet through Airbnb. I wasn't there for very many days, but the room was very spacious and I was very thankful for the laundry facilities! I even lost my purse with the house key and the host was super nice about it. The location is fantastic and I would highly recommend this place for anyone visiting Montreal!

Laura is a lovely host. We were both busy during my time in Montreal but when ever I did see her she was generous and caring. The house is beautiful and in a great location. The guide book suggestions were very helpful.
Laura est très accueillante , la maison est très agréable avec une grande chambre et une jolie petite cour . J y ai passé un très bon séjour  .

What a gem. Although I’m not highly familiar with Montreal and its various neighborhoods, this wonderful home is close to everything I wanted/needed. Super hip neighborhood, a beautiful park not too far away and so many lovely shops/cafes, if that’s what you’re into. There was a grocery store across the street and lots of bus stops nearby. The metro was only a 7-10 minute walk away. It’s ground level, so it makes traveling with large luggage bags pretty easy. Milton, the cat, was friendly and gentle. Laura made excellent company as well. About as close to a perfect host you could get; never too overbearing and yet great to make conversation with. The room was bigger than I thought it was going to be! Even though Montreal is hot and humid it was never uncomfortable, the fan provided in the room did the trick for me. There were a couple instances where the door was locked from the inside, but it was never a huge problem. Laura was easy to get in contact with and surprisingly quick to reply, no matter what time of day it was. It didn’t make my stay any less incredible. The price is right and I cannot recommend this place enough!

Merci Lilou!
I spent super nice days at Lilou's home. The room is big, bright and super comfortable. The house is big, has a super nice backyard and is very well located!
It was a happy stay :) I recommend <3 


Obrigada Lilou! Passei dias super lindos. O quarto é bem grande e comfortavel. O apartamento esta super bem localizado! Esta num primeiro andar e tem um quintal interno super gostoso! super recomendo. <3

I found the room very comfortable and affordable, with good access to a wide variety of eateries and shops. Check in and check out was flexible and easy. The host is responsive and helpful. Great space for cat lovers!  :)

This wonderful place is located in a very nice neighbourhood and is very close to a beautiful park, lovely restaurants and shops. The Metro is only a 10 Minute walk away and lots of bus stops are nearby. If you like, you can easily walk to the city center or visit sights like the Mont-Royal. Laura is a very great host: super friendly and caring. She made it really easy for me to settle in Montreal and very fast it felt a bit like home :) The room is very nice and bigger than I have expected! The decoration of her place is very lovely as well! I cannot recommend this place enough!
Great host and great place. I recommend!
Merci Laura pour cette agréable semaine :) Logement conforme aux photos, confortable et très bien situé. L'ambiance y est chaleureuse, on se sent tout de suite à l'aise. Je recommande !
One of the friendliest and most considerate hosts I've ever had. The room was huge, the cats were lovely and I had an all round great stay. Would highly recommend.
A comfortable room, fun and lively neighborhood, amicable cats, and a top notch host to boot!  Thank you Laura for the wonderful stay!

Un petit coin parfait pour un séjour à Montréal, situé en plein coeur du Plateau et près des meilleurs restos, boulangeries, et cafés. Laura est une hôte charmante et on se sent chaleureusement accueilli. J'y retournerais sans hésiter. 
Bises, Marie

name: Ipanema: moderno apê 2BR + garagem
summary: Moderno apartamento de 2 quartos com garagem em bucólica rua de Ipanema, a poucos metros da Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas.
space: Moderno apartamento de 2 quartos com garagem, localizado em rua tranquila de Ipanema, a poucos metros da Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas. Acomoda de maneira confortável 4 pessoas. Ar condicionado split em todos os cômodos (quarto, suíte, sala e banheiro da suíte)
description: Moderno apartamento de 2 quartos com garagem em bucólica rua de Ipanema, a poucos metros da Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas. Moderno apartamento de 2 quartos com garagem, localizado em rua tranquila de Ipanema, a poucos metros da Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas. Acomoda de maneira confortável 4 pessoas. Ar condicionado split em todos os cômodos (quarto, suíte, sala e banheiro da suíte) Os hóspedes terão acesso às áreas comuns do prédio e a todo o apartamento. Recebemos pessoalmente os hóspedes no apartamento, entregamos as chaves, mostramos o espaço e damos informações e sugestões de passeios pela cidade.
access: Os hóspedes terão acesso às áreas comuns do prédio e a todo o apartamento.
interaction: Recebemos pessoalmente os hóspedes no apartamento, entregamos as chaves, mostramos o espaço e damos informações e sugestões de passeios pela cidade.
house_rules: * Não é permitido realizar festas e ou outros eventos no apartamento. * Ambiente familiar. Por favor, respeite os vizinhos e as horas de silêncio entre 22h e 10h.  * Desculpe, nós não aceitamos animais, domésticos e de pequeno porte; * Visitas não são permitidas sem identificação. A identificação consiste em enviar o documento com a fotografia às anfitriãs e ao porteiro;  * Os visitantes que pernoitarem serão contados como hóspedes adicionais e deve pagar o valor correspondente: + R $ 50 / pessoa / dia;  * Não é permitido o uso de drogas ilícitas. Por favor, evite constrangimentos e problemas com a polícia. * Por favor, retire o lixo e lave sua louça antes de sair;  * O lixo deve ser descartado de forma separada para reciclagem, em lixeiras localizadas na garagem do edifício; * Por favor, cuide do espaço com amor e respeito.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
My name is Barbara.
I'm an administrator and real state manager. I study photography.
I've always enjoyed showing Rio around and helping people take the most out of the city.
It has been seven years I share my love for Rio renting apartments for short period and helping my guests with hints on tourist spots.
I love cooking and It will be a pleasure to be able to help with information about restaurants, bars and gastronomy in general.
I love to make new friends and to know different cultures.
My husband Ricardo is  a chemical engeneer, a great companion, but not talkative as I'm.
Our daughter Alice is 8 years-old. She is into dancing classical ballet, jazz and loves to exchange experiences with people in general.
I look foward to having you at my place!

Seja bem vindo (a)! Meu nome é Bárbara, sou administradora de empresas e estudante de fotografia.
Há 7 anos eu compartilho o amor pela cidade do Rio de Janeiro alugando apartamentos por temporada e ajudando meus hóspedes com dicas sobre a cidade e pontos turísticos.
Uma das minhas paixões é cozinhar e será um prazer poder compartilhar dicas sobre restaurantes, bares e gastronomia em geral.
Adoro viajar, fazer novos amigos e conhecer diferentes culturas.
Se você ficar na minha casa também vai conhecer o meu marido Ricardo, que é engenheiro químico e meu grande parceiro na hospedagem, gente boa, mas não tão falante como eu. Nossa filha Alice tem 8 anos, dança ballet e jazz e  também adora conhecer novas pessoas e trocar experiências.
Também tenho apartamentos inteiros no Centro, Lapa e Zona Sul da cidade.
Seja bem vindo a um cantinho para chamar de seu. :)

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
O apartamento é perfeito! Tudo novinho, bonito. O local do apartamento também é excelente, vários restaurantes, barzinhos, farmácia, tudo o que precisamos, e também fica a uns 500 m da praia, super tranquilo! 
TV, geladeira, fogão, microondas e ar condicionado no  apartamento todo, inclusive, no banheiro rs.
Se o apartamento já é tudo de bom, a anfitriã o torna ainda melhor. Ela responde tudo mega rápido, nos esperou com uma cesta recheada de coisas deliciosas, é uma simpatia e, por fim, nos deu até uma carona até o (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza, voltaremos e nos hospedaremos no mesmo local. Só temos a agradecer. A nossa primeira experiência com o Airnbn foi surpreendente!

THE APARTMENT WAS GREAT EXCEPT FOR THE AIR CONDITIONING LEAK FROM THE ABOVE APT. AND I BELIEVE THAT THE HOST SHOULD NOT DEMONSTRATE HIS OR HER POLITICAL OPINION BECAUSE SOME PEOPLE MIGHT NOT AGREE WITH IT AND NEVER COME BACK BECAUSE OF IT. APART FROM THIS EVERYTHING WAS GREAT.

Eu já uso o Airbnb há algum tempo, mas essa é a primeira vez que vou deixar um comentário porque vale o tempo. 

Fui muito bem atendido, o apartamento é muito confortável e eu recomendo. :)

Un grand Merci a Barbara pour son acceuil et sa gentillesse.
Nous avons eu plusieurs conseils sur les visites a faire a Rio mais aussi sur les restaurants à proximité. 
L'appartement etait spacieux, moderne, charmant et tres coquet.
super bien situé a quelques rues de la plage, restaurants, cafés, supermarché et les boutiques.
Nous aurions aimé un meilleur équipement cuisine mais c'est réellement le seul petit hic tout le reste etait fantastique!
Merci aussi au portier Joao qui etait tres gentil et serviable.
Nous avons adore notre experience et louerons encore cet appartement a notres prochaine visite à Rio.
Merci encore mille et une fois.
katia
Apto incrível! Localização próximo a bares e restaurantes. A Bárbara é uma graça,  muito atenciosa.  Voltarei sempre.

Nice, modern flat. Situated in a brilliant location, perfect for the whole of Rio, close to the Metro, not far from lots of bars and restaurants in Ipanema / Leblon etc. Flat is spacious and modern and Barbara was helpful. Would stay again.

The apartment was amazing and Barbara was a great host!  It is perfectly located in Ipanema, a short walk to the beach with streets lined with restaurants, shops, and bars.  The apartment had a doorman 24/7 and the neighborhood felt quite safe.  Barbara was extremely responsive and provided many recommendations.  Overall this apartment and Barbara positively contributed to our wonderful stay in Rio, would definitely recommend!!
Barbara foi excelente anfitriã, muito atenciosa e prestativa. O apartamento é ótimo, novinho e excelente localização. Recomendo a estadia.

Der Empfang war gut organisiert. Ich konnte die Wohnung zur vereinbarten Zeit haben. Anderson, ein Mitarbeiter von Barbara, zeigte mir alles in der Wohnung und wie es funktioniert (Klimaanlage, Fernseher, Dusche, etc.) und er gab mir sehr gute Tips, wie ich am besten zu den Sehenswuerdigkeiten in Rio komme.
Das Appartement befindet sich in einer sicheren Gegend und man hat ca 400 - 500 m zum Strand Ipanema. Es gibt einige Gaststaetten und kleine Supermärkte in der Nähe.
Die Ausstattung des Appartements ist sehr gut - 1 Hauptbad und 1 kleines separates, komplette Küche, TV in Wohnzimmer und Schlafzimmer, etc. Es ist wie auf den Fotos bei Airbnb dargestellt. Die Fotos haben dabei infolge der Beleuchtung einen leichten Gelbton. Im Original ist alles etwas heller.
Mir hat es gefallen hier zu uebernachten, da ich im Urlaub keine Hotels möchte

Fomos muito bem recebidos e tivemos uma ótima estadia. Apartamento em perfeitas condições e em ótima localização. A Barbara, hostess, nos recebeu com dicas sobre as facilidades por perto do apartamento. Recomendamos fortemente.

Everything was fine. Nice position and beautiful flat.
Thanks Barbara!

Apartamento bem localizado e confortável! Ficamos surpresos apenas com o Futon do segundo quarto, uma cama seria um pouco mais confortável. A Barbara foi bem atenciosa em todos os momentos! Muito bom! Voltaria com certeza!
Very nice apartment! Perfectly situated between both the beach and the laguna. Communication with Barbara was easy.

We had a wonderful time in Ipanema, Barbara was very informative upon arrival. She gave us great tips on where to go, good places to eat. The neighborhood felt safe.  The apartment is exactly as described. It was an overall pleasent experience for us. Thank you Barbara.
Apartamento aconchegante e localização excelente.
Thank you Barbara we enjoyed our 2nd stay with you.  The apartment was great and the location perfect. Thanks for everything, we will let you know when we return to Rio.

Apartamento incrível e muito bem localizado no RJ (fica ao lado da Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas e muito próximo do metrô). Fomos muito bem recebidos pela Barbara e recomendamos o apartamento para todos que visitem a cidade. Esperamos voltar em breve!!!

Barbara was great and helpful with our staying.
The apartment was great and close to the beach and the Rodrigo de Freitas lagoon.
Great place to stay in Rio.
Excelente departamento , muy moderno y cómodo sin duda volvería , la atención de bárbara  fue excelente .recomendable 100% .
O apartamento é lindo, moderno, super bem localizado! Você está próximo a bares, restaurantes, e ao lado de ruas de comércio com excelentes lojas.

O apartamento é bastante agradável, bem moderno e claro. Tem uma boa infraestrutura e ótima localização! A garagem é bastante acessível e os porteiros muito educados. Fomos atendidos prontamente! Foi uma ótima estadia!!

Recommended place to stay. but I had a problem with the number of beds (Just 1 instead of the advertised  2). It was sorted out reasonably quickly but was still far from ideal. 

good location, good apartment.
Recomendable!!!
A apartamento está muito bem localizado, é bem aconchegante, mobiliário novo e profissionais muito gentis.

name: Friendly Apartment, 10m from Manly
summary: A friendly apartment block where everyone knows each other and there is a strong communal vibe. Property has a huge backyard with vege garden and skate ramp. 7min walk to the beach and 2min to buses.
space: Great bedroom with a queen bed and window with views facing out over Balgowlah area, with great views of sunset. Large cupboards and drawers available for storage space.
description: A friendly apartment block where everyone knows each other and there is a strong communal vibe. Property has a huge backyard with vege garden and skate ramp. 7min walk to the beach and 2min to buses. Great bedroom with a queen bed and window with views facing out over Balgowlah area, with great views of sunset. Large cupboards and drawers available for storage space. You will have access to kitchen, bathroom, lounge room, separate laundry and well as the large garden space. I will be contactable by phone, housemate is friendly man who love meeting new people. All other apartment tenants are also very helpful and welcoming. Fairlight is the suburb between Manly and Balgowlah. It is quiet, close to the water and no more than 10mins away from everything you could need. Balgowlah shops is a 10 min walk with many cafes and restaurants. Manly is a 15min walk away, a very nice walk along the water. 3 mins from Sydney Rd where you can get a bus to Manly or the City easily. 15 min walk to Manly
neighborhood_overview: Fairlight is the suburb between Manly and Balgowlah. It is quiet, close to the water and no more than 10mins away from everything you could need. Balgowlah shops is a 10 min walk with many cafes and restaurants. Manly is a 15min walk away, a very nice walk along the water.
notes: Everyone in the block of apartments know each other and will often hang out together in the backyard. Big mix of ages and professions- everyone loves surfing and skating. Also worth noting, there will be a party in the backyard on NYE which you'd be welcome to join.
transit: 3 mins from Sydney Rd where you can get a bus to Manly or the City easily. 15 min walk to Manly Wharf to catch the ferry.
access: You will have access to kitchen, bathroom, lounge room, separate laundry and well as the large garden space.
interaction: I will be contactable by phone, housemate is friendly man who love meeting new people. All other apartment tenants are also very helpful and welcoming.
house_rules: This would best suit a down-to-earth, friendly person or couple who want to be near the water over the summer.  Non-smoking, no pets. Please do not have extra guests without notice.

reviews.comments:
This stunning place is definately the best accommodation we've had in australia! They make one feel very at home and let you take part on the good vibes ! It's tidy and very comfi.. I really recomend this place for everyone who likes to be surrounded by good people! 
thanks

Isaac's house was as beautiful as can be, the room had sunlight and was cozy, clean and neat. 
cozy small kitchen comes with the room and a lively backyard with a lovely and very friendly dog that is not shy to say hello to you.

Definitely recommend staying at Isaac's, as he is also very nice and kind..
Staying here is like "going home". You feel part of the family and everyone is really chilled. Highly recommend for those seeking a relaxing time away. Clean and great location.
A very nice Apartment with a Great big garden and so many nice neighbours! Just awesome there! :)

name: Great studio opp. Narrabeen Lake
summary: Great studio apartment freshly painted and decorated.  Queen bed also with a pull-out sofa bed  Separate bathroom with fully equipped laundry.  Located across from Narrabeen Lake.  8km walk around lake - or borrow our bikes. Kayak/stand-up paddle boards available for hire. Short walk to Narrabeen beaches/Woollies/shops and main bus line to the city on Pittwater Road. 20 minutes to Manly and Manly wharf or take a stunning ferry ride to Sydney city or the new express B-line double-decker bus.
space: Private entrance + small private terrace. Has loads of parking available.  Woolworths and BWS are a short walk along the lake for any supplies needed. Cleaning fee included in nightly rate
description: Great studio apartment freshly painted and decorated.  Queen bed also with a pull-out sofa bed  Separate bathroom with fully equipped laundry.  Located across from Narrabeen Lake.  8km walk around lake - or borrow our bikes. Kayak/stand-up paddle boards available for hire. Short walk to Narrabeen beaches/Woollies/shops and main bus line to the city on Pittwater Road. 20 minutes to Manly and Manly wharf or take a stunning ferry ride to Sydney city or the new express B-line double-decker bus. Private entrance + small private terrace. Has loads of parking available.  Woolworths and BWS are a short walk along the lake for any supplies needed. Cleaning fee included in nightly rate Guests have access to backyard saltwater pool Happy to give any local tips that we can.  Plenty of good restaurants along the lake and beachfront within walking distance.  On Fridays there is a fantastic Growers markets nearby with great produce and crafts - worth a visit We are unique in the fact we are across th
neighborhood_overview: We are unique in the fact we are across the road from Narrabeen Lake with a beautiful 8.2km walking track.  This time of year you will be able to see a large number of black swans on the lake or take a kayak or stand-up paddle board to take a closer look. There are coffee shops on the beach side of the lake where there are plenty of restaurants and the bus stop to the city.  You have a selection of beaches that at very close by that are all patrolled
notes: Kayak/stand-up paddle boards and more  are available on the lake   Great choice of restaurants within walking distance.  And of course the choice of several of the beautiful patrolled Narrabeen beaches
transit: We are a 5-10 minute walk to the main bus line on Pittwater Rd. From there it is 20 minutes by bus to Manly. From Manly wharf you can take a stunning ferry ride to Sydney city or you can bus into the city from Narrabeen which will take you about 40 minutes. Alternatively, head 20 mins north to Newport, Avalon or Palm Beach, a favourite spot where 'Home and Away’ is filmed. Sydney Airport to Narrabeen by car is around 45 minutes (in good traffic - allow longer in peak times, for convenience there are shuttles or taxis and plenty of Uber’s available.
access: Guests have access to backyard saltwater pool
interaction: Happy to give any local tips that we can.  Plenty of good restaurants along the lake and beachfront within walking distance.  On Fridays there is a fantastic Growers markets nearby with great produce and crafts - worth a visit
house_rules: No smoking

reviews.comments: Very happy with my stay here. Tracy was really friendly and everything went smoothly. It's a great little place in a fantastic spot. The lake is sublime. Highly recommended.
Great welcome
This was a terrific studio, with every little detail considered. Beautiful location across from the lake and a very private studio. Made to feel very welcome by Tracey and would highly recommend!
Lovely place! Very friendly and accomodating

We enjoyed our stay at Tracy's house. It was spotlessly clean, and we loved swimming in her lovely pool.
It is located close to the beach, lakes and parks. So perfect for people who want to chill out and relax.
We also made a new friend with her Hungarian Vizsla dog.
Thank you for having us.

This is a fantastic situation. Located right across the street from the lake. Tracy offered us bicycles to use on the lake path. The apartment has everything you need and is very spacious. Short drive to the ocean beach for surfing and swimming. Kitchen well equipped. 
Tracy was very informative and engaging. 
We really enjoyed our stay!

This was my first time staying in an AirBnB, and it couldn't have been better. Lovely, clean and quiet accommodation, welcoming host and many little things that made the experience enjoyable. 

As an AirBnB newbie, I wasn't really sure on the protocols for communicating etc. However, Tracy made me feel relaxed and at home. She has a gorgeous, friendly dog and the place is immaculate - she had also left some fresh fruit, juice and water which was super-welcome after arriving on a fairly late flight. All the linens, towels etc were of high quality, and the shower is fantastic!  No air-con, but it's a shady spot and the fan was fine, even on two warm summer evenings.

If you are in Narrabeen to stay for any length of time, I can highly recommend this as your perfect home away from home.
Tracy and her husband were very welcoming and the room was very comfortable.

This was my first AirBnB experience and I am glad it was a good one. I couldn't have picked a better host and apartment.
Tracy and her family are great hosts. 
The space was as described - the bed was comfy and the pool area was very relaxing. Could have stayed by the pool all day! 
There was a lovely selection of teas and some Orange Juice and fruit. While I didn't use much of the kitchen utensils - looked like there was everything you needed to make a nice meal if you were staying longer or wanted to cook.
The location is beautiful - easy to walk by Narrabeen lake. Tracy was very flexible and welcoming and easy to communicate with. A very easy experience overall.

Perfect studio for a beachy getaway. Went away with the girlfriend and was well suited for a couple. The studio had everything you could need. Had foxtel with IQ which was was a supprise. Was close enough to walk to the beach or pub. Quick to respond to questions. Nothing to fault!

Thank you Tracy.  We had a most enjoyable stay. You live in a beautiful area with great access to the lake, the surf, public transport and all the wonderful facilities of Narrabeen.  The apartment is neat, clean and well appointed . We especially enjoyed eating our breakfast on the balcony while enjoying views of the lake and the beautiful tropical garden.  A great stay, thank you
Absolutely perfect! Great location opposite the lake, bikes to borrow and Tracy went out of her way to accommodate me! Thank-you, I loved it.
My in laws had a pleasant stay. The place was clean, well equipped, has really comfy bed. Thanks.

The place was gorgeous, Tracy was so helpful and brought me down a blanket when I was cold. The area was lovely and in a very safe suburb. Everything you need was there and the bed and couch were super comfy. Thanks Tracy!

Really enjoyed our stay- the place was lovely and close to the lake, which we went for a walk around following the track-8k walk in total.Couple of restaurants and cafes near by. We had a hire car so ideal Location for us to explore all the northern beaches and near by Dee why. Tracey was friendly and thoughtful sending through a wonderful recommendation to a place in Newport for dinner/drinks when we were passing through the area!
Great trip

Had another lovely and relaxing stay. Everything I needed was there and Tracy even thought to put an extra blanket in my bed before I came to make sure I was warm during the night. Had a lovely walk along the lake and was close to everything I needed. Thanks again Tracy!

Great Studio, perfect location, had everything we needed. Tracy was lovely, really welcoming. The directions were great, it was easy to find. Would certainly look to book if we ever needed to stay in the area again.

Fantastic apartment in beautiful Narrabeen. We stayed here while moving out of our nearby apartment and it was perfect. had everything you would need for a fantastic holiday stay just footsteps from the lake. Quiet spot and very private and inside was clean modern and well equipped. Tracy was really easy to communicate with and a great host :) we would definitely stay again.

Tracy and Rod were brilliant hosts and pre-trip and during my stay made sure I had everything I needed. The apartment was fantastic and had everything I needed. Wonderful location and completely private. Would stay there again!

Tracy is a great host, very accomodating and friendly! This place is amazing, your own one bedroom apartment, right across from Narrabeen lake and 10 minute walk to Narrabeen beach and shops. It has everything you need to stay in with a kitchenette, lounge area, heater and extra blankets, even wifi and foxtel! Thanks for having us, we really enjoyed your place. It's perfection :)
We had a great experience at Tracy's place in Narrabeen. The apartment was a great size and located just off of Narrabeen lake. We would definitely recommend staying here and would do so again!

A nice location near Narrabeen Lagoon. There is a lovely path through the forest along the lake to the Sydney Academy of Sport where I attended a few days of training as part of an aikido winter school.
Tracy made us (including wife and three-year-old daughter) feel right at home. She was also kind enough to lend me one of her bicycles for the time we spent there.
The facilities were all as expected, convenient and would consider staying again if in same location
We had another wonderful stay with Tracy at Narabeen. The well appointed apartment, the tranquil environment and the beautiful lake make it a perfect place to stay.

what a lovely space. Quiet location away from City hustle and bustle. Close to lake, beach and restaurants. Tracy , thank you. You have a delightful place. Nice getaway pad. Great bed, a TV that actually works. Tracy was wonderfully chatty and friendly, a great hostess. Love the gorgeous puppy Sari- very friendly.
Highly recommend !!
Very welcoming and super accommodating

Our stay at Tracy's studio in Narabeen was a delight. We were very comfortable and everything we needed was there. The balcony was a great place to sit and read and listen to the birds. Sari (the dog) was an added bonus. She is such a well behaved dog and I loved it when she appeared to say hello. 

All amenities are close by. Walk to cafes, restaurants and the beach. On my next visit to Sydney I hope Tracy's studio will be available. Tracy is a great host and very accommodating. We felt very "at home" staying there.
Louise and Patrick (Perth)
Great location by Narrabean lake, lovely walk through to local shops, Restaurants, and public transport. Tracy's place was lovely, compact, but everything we needed for a very comfortable stay.

This studio is in a fantastic location that's minutes walk from beautiful Narrabeen Lagoon, cafes, shops, and restaurants. Tracy is a very friendly and helpful host and, if you're a dog owner like me, the gorgeous (and very sweet) Sari was a bonus to have around while I was away from home.
Highly recommended

Tracy's studio is a great space for a single person or couple and is very well appointed with everything you might need for a stay in Narrabeen
Tracy was very accommodating and friendly
I would recommend this nicely decorated apartment for anyone needing somewhere to stay

Great bed, excellent cooking facilities, quiet, close to all amenities and transport, everything you need and then add a sociable dog, (if you like to take one for a walk) a lake, beach and the occasional chat and you have Tracy's place! A perfect spot for two

Tracy's place s in a lovely area , close to the lake and a couple of blocks from the beach .The unit was really comfortable and had everything needed for a quick getaway . Tracy and her husband were very accomodating and it was lovely to meet them both. 
Thanks for a great stay 
Jodie :)
The host canceled this reservation 150 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Tracy's wee unit was lovely & clean, Tracy is a fantastic host and went above and beyond to help us out!

Tracy's little apartment is a lovely place to stay if you're looking for some peace and relaxation but also not far away from the hustle and bustle. We enjoyed walking and riding around to explore the lake, coffee shops and speciality stores. If you're around on a Friday pop over to the markets - you won't be disappointed.
There's a beautiful lake for a nice walk, so peaceful and lovely.
Great spot. Recommended.
A great place to stay- highly recommended! Perfect location and beautifully presented.

A great location if you wish to stay on the Northern Beaches. Very comfortable accommodation and you can park off the street.  The unit was clean and comfortable. Access to cafes and the beach just down the road.

We really enjoyed our stay at Tracy's studio - it was very clean and comfortable, and we particularly appreciated having such a well equipped kitchen. Tracy's place is only a minute's walk to Narrabeen Lake, and also very close to local shops. A perfect place to stay to explore the northern beaches, or just to relax. Thanks again Tracy!

A lovely quiet/tranquil location, close to the lagoon/lake, sea, cafes, Narrabeen Lagoon park and walks.

Beautifully decorated, clean and spacious with every amenity needed.  Lots of extras added to make your stay easy.  Milk in the fridge, pantry items, umbrellas, torches, high quality toiletries, Foxtel, wifi etc.  Beautiful flowers and plants to make the area brighter, surrounded by greenery to make your stay feel private and like a retreat.  Lovely artwork and beach themed decor to make the place feel like home at the beach.

Lots of off road parking and a very safe area to go for walks and enjoy the lake.  Highly recommend.
Clean, cosy and easily accessible.   A very very well priced accommodation for 1-2 people on the northern beaches
Would highly recommend staying at Tracy's place. Such a great self contained spot. Only wish we couldve stayed longer!

This is a lovely little studio that is attractive, comfortable  and provides everything you could want. A great location, private, close to the lagoon, shops, cafes, beach and public transport.
Tracy is a helpful and friendly host.

Tracy’s place had everything we could ever need for a little getaway from the city. It’s surrounded by a beautiful lagoon and is literally 7 minutes away from the beach (by foot). The place is sparkling clean, cozy, and very private. The kitchen is so well equipped! We loved having Sari pop by (the lovely vizsla) from time to time. Tracy is such a great host. She is always willing to help out or let you know what’s happening in the area. It was so convenient to borrow the bikes and ride to the rock pool or any of the beaches along the coast. Tracy’s place is a gem. We will definitely come back some time.
Such a fabulous spot!  Wonderful host. Everything you could hope for. I highly recommend.
Beautiful tropical surrounds. Pretty and private space and very well appointed. Has everything you need for a great stay. Nice and quiet and close enough to walk to main centre.
Clean, private & great host - we recommend the ‘cubby’ for a stay
A lovely place to stay. Easy parking and Tracy has thought of everything.
Loved it. Such a great location. Highly recommended. Great host.
A really nice space! Very close to the beach too.
Great space and location. Great value. I will definitely stay again.
Great place. Would stay again. Lots of extras. Great communication
Amazing place, and even more amazing host. The place was ready earlier than expected. Great value
Wonderful host, lovely space, great location. This property has it all.
Perfect, exactly what you need. Great location, everything you could want.
Great space and host. Loved our greeting from Sari on arrival. Will definitely stay again
lovely place with everything you’d want for a short or longer stay
What a stunning studio. Tracy has thought of everything. I loved my stay and hope to return

host.host_about:
每次旅行都是一种到达别人家做客的体验｡自己有好几处单位,住不了那么多,多半出租,我是位非常好客的人,也是很喜欢旅行!不管你是商务出差还是旅游度假,来我家住吧,很高兴能和你成为好朋友!给你们的旅行一个安全干净舒适实惠的居住环境｡

reviews.comments: You pay for what yoy get. Pretty decent for the price you pay. The receptionist was really nice. Location is great and close to mtr but bathroom isnt as clean.
地方細細,但住得舒服,近旺角熱鬧地帶
首先地理位置真的很好,交通方便,楼下就是地铁,吃和购物方面也很方便就手;但是大厦人比较复杂,房东人还是很NICE的,容易沟通,可是,房间卫生真的比较差,地上和床上都有头发,还有气味,不知道床单有无换,噪音也大得很!以后我不会入住了｡
The place was a bit difficult to find but overall, it was a great location. Close to train and bus stations, as well as to commercial establishments. All in all, we had a great stay.

name: Cozy aptartment in Recreio (near Olympic Venues)
summary: Cozy and comfortable apartment. Ideal for families and vacations.  3 bedrooms, 2 of them suites.  Located 20-min walk to the beach and close to the Rio 2016 Olympics Venues. Situated in a modern and secure condominium, with many entertainment available options around.
space: Cozy space, furnished with TVs, wardrobes, stove, fridge, washing & dry machine and balcony with a hammock. All rooms have air conditioning, included the living room.
description: Cozy and comfortable apartment. Ideal for families and vacations.  3 bedrooms, 2 of them suites.  Located 20-min walk to the beach and close to the Rio 2016 Olympics Venues. Situated in a modern and secure condominium, with many entertainment available options around. Cozy space, furnished with TVs, wardrobes, stove, fridge, washing & dry machine and balcony with a hammock. All rooms have air conditioning, included the living room. The apartment has 4 rooms. 3 of them avaiable for booking, 2 of them suites. The condominium offers many entertainment options, as skate ramps, fitness area, gym, swimming pools (for adults and kids), sports court and others. Nearby you can find restaurants, bars, night clubs, markets and a shopping mall (Recreio Shopping). The neighborhood also has the beautiful Recreio beach. (Nearest point from the condominium: Posto 9). 1 avaiable parking lot in the condominium. If you are using public transport, there is a BRT Bus Station (Guignard station) 50m in front
neighborhood_overview: Nearby you can find restaurants, bars, night clubs, markets and a shopping mall (Recreio Shopping). The neighborhood also has the beautiful Recreio beach. (Nearest point from the condominium: Posto 9).
transit: 1 avaiable parking lot in the condominium. If you are using public transport, there is a BRT Bus Station (Guignard station) 50m in front of the building. It is connected to the Alvorada Station, the main bus station in Barra da Tijuca.

name: Kailua-Kona, Kona Coast II 2b condo
space: Kona Coast Resort's spacious, fully furnished villas are tastefully decorated with soothing Hawaiian accents, and include a full kitchen and all of the comforts of home. As you step out onto your private lanai, feel the tropical breezes and take in the wonder of it all. Amidst the panoramic backdrop of Hawaii's Kona Coast, the Kona Coast Resort has an inviting ocean view. From endless recreation to fascinating sights and spectacular natural beauty, the best of the “Big Island” is at your door. An oceanfront playground is just the beginning of all there is to do at the Kona Coast Resort. Hike in a tropical rainforest. Explore lava tubes formed thousands of years ago and witness the spectacular sight of fresh, fiery lava spilling into the ocean today. Hang with the “big fish” – Kona is one of the world’s best sport fishing centers. You don’t have to train for Kona’s Ironman Triathlon to enjoy the cycling along the coast. If exercise is your thing, head to the resort’s fitness center. Tak

Location can't be beat, beds were surprisingly comfortable by HK standards. The room had everything we needed. 

Only unusual thing to note is that the host asked for a 200 HKD cash safety deposit (I guess this is standard policy for the hotel they run).

Initial room given was not as advertised on either photo of the guesthouse. Rather it was a bunk bed with little to almost no room for luggage storage, when we asked for a room change we were told "That is not how business is done here. If we gave each guest the room pictured we would not make money." We were finally given a room change after voicing our concerns that room given was not a pictured and insisting for a change in rooms, but the second room was also not as advertised.
老板人很好,服务很周到,住的地方很干净,位置很优越,离地铁口很近,购物很方便!下次还会选择这家的!
优点是房间洗手间还蛮干净整洁无异味无不明昆虫,也不会很旧,另外一个是在弥敦道中心区域,购物饮食还有交通还是很方便的｡缺点是实在是小,有点压抑睡不踏实,因为预定得仓促而且没经验,实话说如果可以再选一次,同样价格(120美金)会选择提前两周预定远离旺区的正规酒店,既然是来玩的,还是更希望舒坦一些,其实过一晚的话其实行程也没这么紧迫的需要订在这么旺的区域里面的｡

name: Cozy double bed room 東涌鄉村雅緻雙人房
summary: A comfortable double bed room at G/F. Independent entrance. High privacy. The room size is around 100 sq.ft. with a 48"x72" double bed. The village house is close to the Hong Kong Airport, AsiaWorld-Expo, HongKong-Zhuhai-Macau Bridge, Disneyland, Citygate outlets, 360 Cable car, shopping centre, main tourist attractions......
space: We are "City Oasis Guest House" , which is a licensed guesthouse (holiday flat) in Hong Kong. Our license number is H5714. Our house is located at a small village in the outskirts of Tung Chung, 10 minutes from the Hong Kong Airport by taxi and 4 minutes from Tung Chung City by taxi. Our village is situated at the mountain foot and Tung Chung river mouth on Lantau Island, the green fort of Hong Kong.  Our property is a three-storey village house with a total of 2800 square feet. At the rooftop and balconies, you can oversee the unique scenery view with the combination of the airport, cable-car, Tung Chung Bay, wetland, Tung Chung City and mountain views. The master room, dining room and kitchen are on the ground floor while the guest rooms are on the first and second floors. Room are clean, tidy, comfortable and homey. Our guests can feel at home as if they were members of the family, but enjoy a high degree of privacy in the rooms upstairs.  Surrounded by woodlands, orchards and river

neighborhood_overview: 10-minute walk to the bus stop on Tung Chung Road. 10-minute walk to Indian and Thai Food restaurants. 15-minute walk to Yat Tung Estate (shopping centre, restaurants and bus terminus). 7-minute walk to Chung Mun Road (Mun Tung Estate Car Park Entrance). 10-minute to Airport / Asia Expo by taxi/car. 4-minute to Tung Chung MTR station by taxi/car.
notes: Bring your own toothbrush and toothpaste 7-minute walk to my village house from the main road. The room is on G/F. No lift is in the building. 請自備牙膏,牙刷及拖鞋｡ 屋子遠離馬路,客人需步行約七分鐘才能到達｡
transit: Accessibility  Bus stops on Tung Chung Road No.11 to Cheung Sha Beach and Tai O. No.23 to Cheung Sha Beach and The Big Buddha. No.3M to Pui O and Mui Wo. No.A35 to Hong Kong International Airport. Mun Tung Estate Bus Terminus No. 39M & B6 to Tung Chung MTR Station and 360 Cable car Station, Citygate shopping mall. No. B6 to Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge (Hong Kong Port).  Yat Tung Estate Bus Terminus No.37 & 38 to Tung Chung MTR Station and 360 Cable Car Station, Citygate shopping mall. No.S64 to Hong Kong International Airport. No.E21/E21A to Mei Fung, Sham Shui Po, Mong Kok. Tung Chung Bus Terminus No.S1 to Hong Kong International Airport and Asia Expo. Tung Chung MTR station Metro/MTR to Hong Kong Disneyland, Kowloon and Hong Kong Island. A bicycle trail is connected to Tung Chung City Centre.
access: Free wifi, board games, books, roof terrace upstairs, garden, outdoor coffee tables and chairs, beach chairs, living room and dining room on the ground floor.  Rentable bicycles, BBQ stove and clam digging tools. 客人可到地下客廳休息,閲讀及上網,亦可以租用自行車,燒烤爐及挖蜆工具｡ 天台有沙灘椅及戶外桌椅供使用｡
house_rules: • Check-in time is 2PM. Guests are not allowed to smoke and cook in the village house. Guests should not make noise at night. No extra guests are allowed, otherwise your booking will be cancelled without refund. Please ask us for details. 房間(包括洗手間)內禁止吸煙及煑食｡ 房子位於一條寧靜的小鄉村,請勿喧嘩吵鬧影響村民｡ 本民宿是持有牌照的合法民宿,每房都根據法例嚴格限制了入住人數(包括嬰兒或小孩),因此房客不可隨意增加入住人數,否則將會被取消及拒絕入住而不會退回房費｡若有需要增加房客人數,可先向我們查詢｡
