reviews.comments: 我们租用了两种房型一共五天,房子周边环境很淳朴,进出不是很方便但是ricky和terry都会接送,非常贴心的服务｡屋子性价比在香港来说不错,很干净,房东人很好,相处很融洽,我会推荐朋友过来选择这里,希望他们生意兴隆!
我与妹妹在Ricky和Terry那里住了3天,住了2个房型｡第一天在三楼有阳台,然后就是一楼的单床｡很舒适安逸,远离了城市的喧嚣｡妹妹写了很多真实的评价,我就不再多说了,总之很满意｡再来补充一点,Ricky本人比照片上镜多了,很绅士又阳光而且英俊哦!非常谢谢你们!

房東非常熱心!大半夜接待我們上山｡
非常用心､熱心的房東!

Ricky and Terry were easily the best Airbnb hosts I have ever had. They were super responsive, kind, helpful, and knew exactly what they were doing. The room is spotless and exact what we were looking for after our flight back home was canceled and we needed a place to stay. There is a wonderful market about 30 min walk and a shopping center as well.

Pobyt u Rickyho byl absolutně famózní. Nadherný moderní pokoj nám poskytl pohodlí po dlouhých výletech. Strejda Ryckyho nám ve všem pomohl, přesně napasal cesty na výlety, půjčil baterky, když jsem šli v noci, deštník, kola......Nic nebyl problém. Všechno bylo poblíž, ať už obchody či restaurace nebo nádherné pláže. Byl to nádherný pobyt a rozhodně doporučuji vyzkoušet jeho domácí chléb :))))
房间干净,环境优美,老板待人非常热情,还帮着接送我们,辛苦了｡以后有机会还回来｡

This a great space to stay. Ricky was great with communication and his cousin Terry checked us in and handled our stay. Terry was awesome! He told us all about the place and showed us where we could go for different things to see and experience. He helped us with our luggage both checking and checking out. The island is beautiful and is a nice change of pace from the busy city. I would highly recommend staying here!
밤늦게 갔는데도 너무 친절하게 마중나오셔서 너무 감사했어요! 왔다갔다 짐도 계속 들어주시고 너무 친절합니다ㅠㅠ 방도 깨끗하고 좋았어요! 다음에 홍콩가면 여기에 또 올거같아요~~

We had s great time at Ricky and Terry's Airbnb. Our flight was delayed, so we stayed right near the airport. Terry picked us up at the taxi stop, ordered us food, and helped us out in the Morning with transportation. Thanks for the great hospitality and the delicious papaya.

Tiny and quiet village far from the city chaos! I didn't know there was anything like this in Hong Kong. Terry was very helpful and told us a lot of facts about the area.  He recommended us to take a hiking trail to the ancient fishing village of Tai O and it was a great experience.
这次的香港之旅特别不错,特别房东非常热情,考虑周全,为这次旅行增色｡房间整洁干净,环境优美,周围全是绿色,空气清新,噪声少,非常适合考前复习｡离机场很近,10分钟车程,交通便利｡

很棒!距离东涌地铁站需要换乘巴士/taxi  15分钟左右,附近景点比较集中,房间在一楼,设备齐全,室内拖鞋,建议冬天自带袜履,玻璃门窗,花园很漂亮,还有自种的木瓜,晚上可以去天台坐躺椅看星星｡接待我们比较多的是房东Terry,香港退休老师,港式普通话讲起来比较费力,还是会很仔细介绍景点,画出景点指引,怕我们记不住,像教学生一样“考”问我们路线｡;-)来时正好被捎回来, 走前Terry还一直送上TAXI~PS:两只咪咪好乖,可惜Kitty住院了,希望早日康复!

Staying at Ricky's place was a great experience!

It was an absolute pleasure to stay with Ricky.  He was very responsive to our communication and helpful in providing direction once our flight landed.  He even provided us with the written directions in Cantonese in case our taxi driver didn’t speak English (which came in very handy!).

Ricky had his cousin meet us at a College which was 10 minutes from the airport.  His cousin was very friendly and helpful – he even arrived with a cart to carry our bags to the apartment.   As there are no vehicles that directly access Ricky’s neighbourhood, there was a lovely 5 minute walk on a beautiful path which weaved through the jungle.  

Upon arrival at Ricky’s building, it was clear that the place was very clean and well kept.  He provided us with some water bottles, offered us dinner, and his 2 friendly cats entertained us while he checked us in.  He proceeded to show us the rooftop terrace which is a great spot to hang out and enjoy the view of the mountains.  There is also an area to wash and hang dry your laundry up there.

The room appeared to be recently renovated.  It was small, but it was very clean and efficiently laid out.  There was good A/C to keep cool as well as a TV with some basic cable for some entertainment.

Overall, this was a perfect place nearby the airport to spend the night before continuing our travels.  The price was fair, and I would highly recommend staying here.

Location is 5 minutes nice walk away from main road, in the middle of the threes and bridges on a very small village. Very quite, clean, excellent Wi-Fi. Very close to the airport and good for one night stop over.

We were only here for a single night on a long layover between Australia and the US, but Ricky and Terry did everything to make sure our very short stay was stress free. The village is a bit off of the main road, but they were waiting for us when we arrived with a cart that we could load all of our luggage on to and they brought it to the residence for us. They did the same thing for us super early in the morning and had taken care of making sure a cab was waiting for us to take us to the airport. They also gave us a ride to the train station after we first arrived to make our night much easier. It was super short notice, and a super short trip but they went above and beyond to make sure we were taken care of.

The room is very clean and convenient. The location is in a quiet spot in the nature. I find it perfect for a weekend to get out of the city and enjoy nature! 
Ricky and Terry are great hosts! They were very helpful with the pick-up, check-out and suggestions for getting around. We took a hike to Tai O and really enjoyed it. 
I highly recommend this place if you like nature, hiking and to see another side of Hong Kong.
房东人很好 , Ricky 还是硕士, Terry 则是教师呢! 他们的房子收拾的很干净 离博览馆打车10分钟路程 比较适合去机场或者博览馆参展的朋友

Overall a great place. Very close to the airport so great if you're getting in late or leaving early. They live in a village that is surrounded by fruit trees and rain forest...very nice! Ricky and his cousin are most helpful. They even drove me to the MTR for breakfast! Will definitely stay again if I'm venturing back this way.

Excellent hosts!!! Ricky and Terry are super helpful. We have no difficulty locating their guest house because Ricky provided us with precise instruction and they even picked us up at the bus terminal. The guest house is very clean and tidy. Good wifi connectivity. It is located in a village far from city centre so the air is extremely fresh and environment is very quiet and serene. You can get a good nice sleep here.
Nice new building in a traditional village near the airport. You cross clear streams to get there. A different and nice experience.

I missed my flight at HK airport and needed somewhere to stay for the night for the next morning flight. Searched AirBnb since hotels were very expensive and found Ricky's place with late notice and booked it quickly. His place is about 10 minutes from the HK airport and his cousin met us where the taxi dropped us off. He was very nice and moved our suitcases for us on a trolley he brought. The place is a private room on the side like it's your own place. Has everything you need for a quick rest. He even woke up in the early morning 630am to help us trolley our luggage to the taxi area and called a taxi for us. Very friendly and a great host. Would stay again.
We really enjoyed our stay at Ricky's home. It was beautiful out there and well worth getting out of the city to see. A little slice of serenity after a week spent in the hub of Hong Kong.
房东非常的热情

I was late because of the delay of the plane, but they were so patient to wait for me and I felt so warm. Moreover the condition is pretty well, pretty comfortable. Also, there are two little cats playing around you

第一次使用airbnb,这是个很有趣的选择｡
1.地理位置:因为这次到香港计划并不是为了购物为主,所以第一站决定去大屿山住两天,爬爬山｡选择了Terry和Ricky的家｡晚上21:30出机场后,按Ricky的指引,在机场坐蓝色的士,15分钟内左右到下车的点,Terry和Ricky两位一起等我们｡建议问的士司机要小票,我都不记得他收到我多少钱了,下车看牌的时候HKD56.2,因为有行李费,然后钱都放一起就搞不清楚了｡就在大屿山松满路,从大马路上走进去需要大约10分钟左右,其实白天是非常舒服的,有山有溪水,景色很好,晚上没有太多路灯｡第一晚Terry和Ricky帮我们推行李,带我们走了一遍进去的路,还是挺好走的,第二晚我们就是自己走回｡配给我们手电｡路也不难记得,还是方便的｡村子安静,没有杂七杂八的外人,安全回到｡相比大屿山景区里其他酒店,性价格很高,值得推荐｡ 
2.家庭环境:被青山绿水包围的三层白色小楼,打理的很干净,院子里有Terry种的花花草草､果树｡屋顶有个大平台,视野开阔,可以坐在上面舒服看的看看风景｡我们这次选择住的是在1A,配有独立洗水间｡在一楼,推门后就是房间,床､电视､桌椅､洗手台､干湿分离的淋浴间,就是两人洗澡之间需要间隔20分钟以上,不然水不热｡虽然不大,地方足够,我们一个30寸的大箱子打开也可以走动｡房间是地砖,非常干净｡床品舒适,两晚都休息的很好｡第二天一早后我们出去爬山了,回来看到Terry也给整理过了,完全干净｡山里夜里稍有点冷,房间也多备了一条被子｡如果比较怕冷的人,可以在山里多带件衣服｡

3.房主印象:非常感谢Terry和Ricky都很热情的积极沟通,从预订前的咨询,就给了很多实在的建议,帮助我做行程规划｡到了之后,画了路线图,考虑我们的体力和之后的行程,推荐给我可以去的地方｡第二天一早还开车带我们去吃正宗本地早餐,要知道前一晚他们因为要去接夜归的其他客人,凌晨1点才休息｡但他们也尽可能帮助所有客人,可以放心的把你的大屿山之行放在这里｡一直使用 (Hidden by Airbnb) 保持联系,告诉我们怎么坐车,可以吃什么｡总之值得推荐｡

4.社区印象:房子锁在的牛凹村,步行15分钟内就到了逸东村,超市､便利店､餐饮店什么都有,有不懂路的时候问下路人都很热情的帮忙解答｡大屿山这个季节不冷也不太热,爬爬山特别适合,听说缆车马上要进入维修的阶段就不能使用了｡很适合放松之行,以后有机会我还会回来尝试自己去爬山,还有大东山,愉景湾都还没去成,谢谢你们的推荐,让我对香港的郊外有全新的认识｡

希望短暂的两天,没有过多的打扰你们｡最后祝Terry和Ricky以及你们的家庭,Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!!愿我们会再见面!写的比较多,因为我在预定之前也从很多评论里得到了关键信息,引导我选择合理的住宿｡希望我写的也能帮助大家获取信息｡
Rickys place was a perfect spot to rest our heads after a long day of travelling. He was very helpful in getting us to and from the airport with directions and assistance to and from his place!

We had a two day layover in Hong Kong and this place was located close to the airport. Ricky was able to pick us up for a small charge, which I would highly recommend since it otherwise would be difficult to find this property if you are not familiar with the area.

We woke up the first day and Ricky and his colleague provided us with maps and directions in both English and Cantonese. Furthermore, they gave us a walking tour around the property as well as highlighted all the main attractions in and around their area. 

I would also recommend this property to anyone who is interested in going to Hong Kong Disneyland as it has a close proximity to the Metro Station and local bus routes. 

All in all, Ricky and his friend were very friendly, professional, and informative. They spoke very clear English and were very helpful in both providing us with extremely personalized customer service. Again, I would highly recommend this property to anyone.
非常棒的地方,环境安静,房东人很好,早上4点起来赶飞机还特意帮我们叫车送我们｡两只小猫也很可爱

感受不一樣的香港｡東涌,一個遠離城市喧囂的村子,風景環境都超級好,晚上還能看到繁星,坐在天台十分愜意｡Ricky非常非常nice和熱情,我們訂的比較衝忙,晚上很晚入住,早上五點多要趕去機場,Ricky超級貼心地送我們出去馬路還幫我們叫了taxi,超級感謝!!下次一定會和朋友再住一次,好好遊玩周邊,給自己一個休閒充電的時光^ - ^進去房子要走一段村路,但蠻快的,晚上很黑需要電筒,但很安全,離鬧市比較遠,但打車出去也很快,房子很棒很乾淨,超愛天台,很有feel｡熱愛自然,想尋找一片寧靜,or一幫friend開趴的強推!!
The place is nice and super clean. Super friendly host. The location is a little far from the main road but still is a cool place to stay..
非常热心靠谱的房东,第一时间给答复,告诉过去的花费时间距离打的费用,确实跟房东讲的一样,机场过去非常方便,打车10分就到了,步行过去住宿地方7分钟左右,下车时候房东的表哥接去住宿地方,非常耐心一一解答我的问题,以后在香港赶早班飞机有落脚点了,会介绍朋友们这个好地方,谢谢房东的周到服务
环境很舒适,很干净,还会推荐朋友去住,房东很nice,terry很热情的给我们介绍周围值得玩的地方

首先,房东Ricky和Terry都很热情,他们会提供 (Hidden by Airbnb) ,并在 (Hidden by Airbnb) 上告诉你方便到达的路线,如果要坐巴士,千万要坐S64,如果坐S1的话,到了东涌巴士总站,打车过去还需要30块｡想在机场打车的话,坐大屿山的车,但是要等蛮长时间的,车少排队的人多｡
其次,实事求是的讲,民宿位于牛凹村内,从巴士到达地港青基信学校走路到民宿,大约需要15分钟,而且内部路线比较绕,在没有房东陪同的情况下很容易迷路,也不要指望导航,导航在这里是完全没用的, (Hidden by Airbnb) 地图和Apple手机里自带的地图我都试过了,完全找不到｡
第三,抱着来了之后去东涌地铁站坐地铁去尖沙咀或去东荟城的想法的同志们,建议你们打消这个想法,这里离东涌地铁站和巴士总站还是有一段距离的,而且因为村庄里差不多晚上六点天就黑了,进出虽然有路灯,但还是比较暗的也很容易迷路,且村民们都休息的比较早,还是早点回来睡觉比较现实｡
第四,民宿的隔音确实一般般,它位于两层小楼内,基本上楼里的马桶冲水声､洗漱声､隔壁说话的声音,村庄里的犬吠声,会伴随着你入睡｡
第五,赶早班飞机的同志们,可以跟Terry拿一下香港的士的联系电话,打车去机场需要 (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) 块,行李额外一件5块,差不多10-15分钟就能到机场,还是很方便的｡但早上出门村庄里会比较暗,请顺着路灯走会比较容易走出来｡

房东Terry和Ricky真的很好人,很热情,而且很健谈｡第一晚12·30am才回来,房东特地出来路口接我们｡

Check out 时我带着四个月大的婴儿出门,房东还特地载我们去搭车,让我省心和省了很多力气｡

这里住了两晚,房间里很干净和安静,女儿都睡得很熟(平时在家都不能睡得那么熟)｡外面的空气很清新,让我晚上可以安心地带女儿出来吹风｡

楼上有个大阳台,晚上可以上去看夜景｡这里是香港的“小”世外桃源｡
Ricky and Terry are some of the best Airbnb hosts I've ever had! Very kind and incredibly accommodating to our every need.
挺安静的一个地方,森林环绕,交通不是很方便!如果没有多收两个加床费,还是可以的

We used this for a 10 hour layover in Hong Kong so the proximity to the airport was great! It's an adventure to walk from the taxi drop off point to the property. The apartment is tiny - especially for two american size people. The listing is accurate i just think i forgot what a double sized bed means. If you are arriving late - eat dinner before you go. There didnt seem to be any dining in the village. The scenery was very quaint! The apartment was clean!

The edge of this place comes from the very accommodating hosts, Ricky and Terry. They know how to converse in English and answers to your every questions promptly. They hand out maps of tourist spots and gives complete directions to places, which is very helpful for first time travelers in Hong Kong. If you love the outdoors, you will enjoy the scenic walk from the main road to their home. But if you're not into long walks, this is not the listing for you.
很不错的房间,天台上喝杯葡萄酒很惬意,风景挺不错｡想要体验本地人生活和来香港低价度假的极力推荐
房东很好,房子很干净,纯休息目的的建议入住
转机休息一个晚上,离机场很近,房间干净整洁,房东人很好,晚上接早上送,适合转机｡

I had about a 10 hour layover in Hong Kong, so my boyfriend and I needed a clean, affordable place to crash. Our flight arrived at 11:45pm and left the next day at 10:15am. Ricky was great about communicating with me from beginning to end. He answered all my questions super fast! Even though I had a somewhat late arrival, his cousin Terry met us and had a dolly for our luggage. His place is like this hidden oasis. You take this cool walk through all these fruit trees. It looks like a forest! It's off the beaten path, but that's what adds to it's charm and appeal. When you get to his place, it's quiet and you feel like you're away from the hustle and bustle, but you're really not. 

The room that we stayed in had a separate entrance from the house, so it was like we had our own apartment,  minus the kitchen. My boyfriend and I each had a backpack and a carry on suitcase. The room was a bit tight for us and our stuff, but it was manageable. It was clean, cozy and comfortable. It had all the amenities you would need...towels, soap, shampoo, comfy and clean bed, heat or AC (which we didn't use), safe place, and privacy. The room was just what we needed. We had our own bed and restroom. It was clean and it was close to the airport. Plus, there's wifi! Since I arrived kind of late, I texted Ricky about the wifi and he got back to me right away! 

Then, on our departure day, Terry had arranged a taxi for us and saw us off. It was like VIP service without the VIP price.  Overall, you can't go wrong by booking with Ricky and Terry. These guys know what they're doing. Their place is just what you need...if it's for one night or more...you'll get great hosts with a great place to stay. Don't wait...just book with them!

Terry will make your trip to Hong Kong as enjoyable and easy as possible.  He drops everything to help you, he even picks you up after the airport, draws you maps, gives amazing details and trip ideas, and even took us to the market and got street food with us the first night.  I highly recommend ricky and terry as hosts!!!
位置有点偏.但是房东服务很好.来接我们.还一大早帮我们叫的士.很好!很不错的度假选择!

Ricky and Terry were wonderful with helping transport my luggage to and from the room with a trolley, giving me the best directions, explaining the subway and bus system, and hailing me a cab when I needed it. 

Pros: Very close to the airport, a cheap taxi fare, and easy to get to the MTR station via bus. 
That said, Walking to the MTR station without taking the bus is about 30 minutes and it's a very enjoyable and easy walk I would take daily just for some quiet time and fresh air. 

Cons: 
-The bed is incredibly firm (but I didn't mind it, though if you need a mattress with any sort of spring this is not the bed for you)
- A five minute walk from the road to your room (I also didn't mind this, in fact, I chose this room because of how scenic it was described and I was not disappointed)

Would stay again!
My brief stay was made so easy by Terry and Ricky's friendliness and helpfulness. Many thanks to you both. Highly recommended!
超级赞

The place is in a very peaceful area, close to the airport and it has its own bathroom and entrance. Ricky is really prompt to respond and is a great host. I would recommend this place to anyone needing a place to stay near the airport, or where they would like a peaceful place to stay.

I was only here for a short time, and unfortunately the weather didn't cooperate, but the guys were very helpful. They gave me a ride and a great deal of information. Short walk to the local shopping area and the bus up and down the island.
Good value, clean and well-equipped. Very kind and gracious hosts
Very nice hosts, and beautiful jungle around.

This was a great place to stay. A little off the beaten path, but the 10min walk is totally worth it. The village and scenery are beautiful. Ricky and his cousin worked everything out perfectly. From meeting us at the pickup point (with a rolling cart for outlet bags) to arranging a cab to pick us up for our departure, the communication was excellent. We were told all about the town and some great recommendations for close places to visit and eat. I would highly recommend staying here, either for a close place by the airport between flights or for a few days to explore. 

Thanks for everything, 
Abby & Jae

Our flight landed late night, we took a taxi to reach Ricky's place. He was promptly waiting for us at the predecided place. Ricky, Thanks a lot for your hospitality. We had a comfortable stay and Terry's tips also helped a lot :)
如果计划在迪士尼､海边及附近旅行1､2天非常适合居住这里!环境非常优美,尤其天台上,很难得在香港找到类似的居住环境,性价比也很高!两位房东都非常nice,提供详尽的路线,也会提供车接车送服务,省心不少!
屋主人很好,非常照顧客人

The place is great for relaxing, hiking and exploring Hong Kong without staying in the city.  Excellent location if the idea is to visit the Big Budday at Pin Lo monastery.  The hosts are very nice, warm, organized, helpful, dedicated to their guests.  I felt welcome and at home.
안그래도 새벽도착 비행기였는데, 연착으로 인해 예정시간보다 1시간은 더 늦게 연락하였는데도 village 입구까지 마중도 나와주고 친절하게 하나하나 다 설명해주어서 너무 좋았습니다. 숙소의 청결도 또한 너무 좋았습니다. 기회가 되어 다시 홍콩을 방문하게 된다면 그때 다시 또 투숙하고 싶네요.

우선 한국으로 돌아와서 생각해보니 여기보다 좋았던 곳은 없었다는 생각이 들어요. 첨에 숙소 근처에 도착한 날은 게스트하우스까지 들어가는 길도 험한것 같고 주변 마켓가는데도 오래 걸어야하는거 아닌가 해서 좀 막막했거든요. 저같은 경우에는 엑스포와 가까운 숙소를 원했기 때문에 이정도는 감수해야지라는 생각이었어요. 시간이 지나면서 지내다보니 움직이는 거리도 별로 길지 않고 조금만 움직이면 다 갈 수 있는 거리였어요! 엑스포나 공항은 두말할것 없이 가까웠구요. 메인로드랑 살짝 떨어져있다보니 밤낮할 것없이 조용하고 편안한 시간 보내기 딱이어서 너무 좋았어요. 숙소는 리키와 리키 사촌인 테리가 같이 운영하는데 주말에는 테리 혼자서 게스트하우스를 관리해요! 전 진짜 여행다니면서 테리같은 호스트는 첨봐요. 24시간 진짜 제가 필요할때 다 도와주고 처음 온날 비도 많이 오는데 택시 내리는 곳에 픽업와주고 짐도 다 들어주고 짐풀고 나니까 주변에 마켓까지 같이 데려다주면서 마을 소개도 해줬어요. 정말 천사가 따로 없었어요. 만약 침사추이 홍콩섬처럼 번화가가 아닌 좀 더 안락하고 편안하게 쉬면서 홍콩을 둘러보고 싶은 분들은 여기로 가셔야해요. 전 다음번에 홍콩 가게 되면 또 갈거에요.

因为SHINee要来香港博览馆开演唱会,在找住宿的地方的过程中看到了这里 把所有的评论和房间的照片都看了一遍之后决定在这里住下 抵港前一天 房东很贴心地告诉我们交通路线和我们沟通抵达的时间 我拿完托运的行李出关都已经凌晨一点多了 房东还出来接我们 因为民宿在村子里 好处就是附近真的很多树 大概是香港树最多的地方了 风景特别好 缺点就是交通有点小不方便 但是我跟我朋友都觉得可以接受 在博览馆晃了一整天再回到民宿的时候 真的是幸福地要哭出来了 极力推荐给要来看演唱会不想住酒店又想享受风景的朋友!
房东很热情哦去会来接你 也会送你出去坐车 很干净 环境也很美 空气很新鲜 下次来还会住
第二次来Ricky这边住了,环境依然很好,房东也很棒很热心｡两只猫似乎胖了一些,看来生活的很棒｡下次有机会再去那里住｡
I have spent a wonderful time in Ricky's house. They are warm-hearted and considerate. I will choose it again next time. It is the best choice to stay there and you will never regret.
房東人超級好,剛到的時候很貼心的拉了小車幫忙推行李,還問我們想去哪裡,教我們怎麼坐巴士,我們不認路去問也很熱情解答,房間雖然不大但很乾淨很舒服,房東送我們走的時候還提醒我們兩個女孩子要小心,還有貓很胖很可愛｡
環境清幽､房東好客
Ricky is soooo nice. And the house is soooo perfect. Strongly recommend!

Our host was extremely welcoming and his attention to detail was impeccable.  The location is extremely peaceful away from the hustle and bustle of city life.  The area at the top of the house had breathtaking views and it was lovely to be able to sit up there in the evenings enjoying the view and relaxing with drinks after doing all the touristic  sights,
It was an absolute pleasure for us to be guests at rickys place.

我很感謝能夠選中Ricky家的這個house,真的是非常好!我很後悔自己為什麼只book了1晚T.T首先這家是村子裡的一棟獨立的3層房子｡我們入住那天非常幸運地碰上Ricky和他的表哥Terry剛好在我們附近吃午飯,所以他們非常nice過來接我們｡Ricky和Terry人很好,很熱情,會很仔細跟你講解附近值得遊覽的地方還有非常小心叮囑,所以不用害怕會迷路~因為我從來沒有到過東涌,每次都是要去機場路過,這次因為想要到大澳看棚屋和海豚,所以就住了這裡｡要進房子,就要經過一段小村路,沿著小河走大概5-6分鐘,沿路一片植物,很多蝴蝶和小鳥,天很藍,空氣也很好｡整栋house非常雅致且装饰简洁有心思,房間非常整齊乾淨!配置也很充足,我一向出外都是自帶毛巾､牙刷､洗浴用品,所以這些都不成問題｡這裡去大澳､長沙海灘､大嶼山､昂坪360都很方便!而且附近還有一個很有特色的香港街市,还有周邊的保育做得很好!还有很多值得去的景点｡這裡讓我對香港有了一個很特別的認識｡晚上進村小路會有點黑,如果一個人可能會覺得有點害怕,但是很安全的｡晚上小路上還會有螢火蟲!而且可以上house的天台看星星!非常舒服｡還有這裡有2只很可愛的貓咪~之後我一定會再來的｡好好地在这里呆上两三天真的很舒服｡感谢Ricky和Terry!
房主到村口接我们,乡村小道还帮我拿行李,房间干净整洁,整栋民宿都很有意境,楼顶露台很浪漫｡总之,一切很美只因有Terry & Ricky
这间房帮朋友订的,她们很喜欢,环境好,价格也便宜｡房东人很好哦!
非常美好的住房体验｡Ricky和Terry非常用心地对待我们这些房客,进出都会接送我们,有时候我都觉得不好意思麻烦他们｡房间整洁干净,屋外是大片大片的果园,楼顶还有露台可以看夜景~附近有很棒的街市｡总之,非常好啦!
A rare find in HK. Worth the trek!
Ricky两兄弟人特别好 房子较偏僻但是来车站接了我们 给我们细心讲解旅游线路住宿环境也很舒适整洁 最后一天还送我们去了地铁站 真的特别棒 比市中心的房子条件好很多 这个地方交通也还算方便 不错
大哥人很热情,几个妹妹睡着了过了中午的退房时间也没有叫醒她们,非常的体贴

만나 본 호스트 중에 젤젤 친절해요 ㅠㅠㅠㅠ mtr에서 택시 타고 오면 큰 길까지 캐리어 끄는 거? 가지고 데리러 나오고 짐 옮겨 주고요 주변 약도랑 갈만한 곳, 가는 법까지 인쇄해서 다 줘용 오면 덥다고 차가운 물도 가져다 주고 ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ 거실에 고양이 두 마리 있는데 거기서 고양이랑 놀아도 된다고 하고 식당 1/2 돈으로 부탁하면 밥도 차려 줘요! 식당보다 맛있었음 ㅎㅎ,.. 저희는 태풍 때문에 수요일 오전 비행기가 목요일 새벽까지 미뤄지고 교통수단들도 다 운행 정지한 상태였는데 숙소 체크아웃은 수요일 오전이고 해서 하루 더 끊기도 아깝고 그렇다고 갈 곳은 없도 해서 어쩌지 하는 마당에 테리가 그냥 거실에서 저녁까지 기다리라고 ㅠㅠㅠㅠ 도 해 줬어여,,, 진짜 그거 아니었음 저희는,,,,,,, 엠티알까지 데려다 주기도 했고 짐도 들어 주시고 ㅠㅠ  테리랑 리키 같이 하는데 둘 다 엄청 친절해요!! 영어도 잘 해서 소통에 문제는 없고요 숙소 위치는 조금 안쪽? 이라서 주변이 한적하고 주변에 가게나 그런 게 별로 없긴 해요 저희는 쭉 침사추이 다른 숙소에 있다가  마지막 이틀을 여기서 보냈는데 디즈니랜드나 무이오 같은 란터우 섬 주변 여행할 땜 여기가 훨 좋은 것 같아요 또 침사추이는 보통 숙소 자체도 건물이나 그런 게 작고 음침한데다가 밤에 워낙 사람이 많고 붙잡고 홍보나 호객행위 하는 게 많아서 무서웠는데 여기는 그런 부분에서 마음 편해서 좋았어요! 암튼 다시 홍콩/마카오 여행 한다면 저는 또 여기로 올 것 같아요 ㅠㅠ 정말 친절... 좋아요!!
房东很热情友好实在｡
离机场很近,凌晨了还来接 非常不好意思了

Location it's good if you like trekking good options to get to the great Buddha, we were host by Ricky's cousin which was very nice! He was eager to help with any of our needs and to explain the things to do around the place. 
Definitely a nice stay!

I would thoroughly recommend this accommodation.  Compact but spotless and everything that you could need.  Beautiful spot out of the hustle bustle excellent links to public transport.  Excellent hosts who went out of the way to help.  Met us from the taxi drop off point early morning and took us back to the accommodation, lots of handy hints and information about the area and local transport and after initial check in always available if needed.
房子超干净
第二次來了,這裡是我累了就會想來躲一下的地方｡希望下次來可以去大東山睇芒草,希望下次來Tiger仔唔驚我,好似Kitty咁同我玩啦~haha
good
Terry好热情,我地好夜到都出来村口接我地,房间好干净,训得好舒服,系天台仲可以睇到星星,周边都好多地方可以玩^_^
不一樣的香港 靜謐的村落 環境風景優美 主人家熱情協助 房間乾淨整潔 是個想要遠離城市壓力的好地方
Ricky和Terry人超级nice!我和我老公第二天早上要搭飞机,结果迷路了,Terry还骑着自行车赶来找我们,帮助我们上了出租车,真的很感动!如果要搭飞机住他家没有错啦!而且他家空气环境都很好,附近好像还有山和海,有时间可以来这边玩住他家应该也超级棒,谢谢!
我们大约十一点到达,房东大晚上也出来接了我们,而且对待我们很热情,一路上告知我们路线以及登山的建议,十分热情,而且他对待每个客人应该都是这般,无论早晚都会接待,让人佩服｡房间在香港来说算很干净整洁,如果准备在东涌爬山的人推荐住在这里,如果主要打算在市区玩的可能在东涌过去还是有点远｡
除了需要走一小段路才能到住宿的地方外,建議不要太晚入住以外,是一個非常舒適的住宿經驗,有最棒的夜景可以看星星和飛機起降如果想要去大澳或是大佛的朋友可以來住這
Ricky as a host is very accommodating and very helpful. He is an angel sent by God. he takes care of my wife and daughter.
Friendly and helpful hosts, will definitely stay here again next time I'm in HK.

第二次去住了｡很喜欢｡
虽然远离市区,但交通还算快的,
加上性价比高,所以可以综合考虑｡

房东人很好.晚上12点还来村子外面接我们 真的非常感谢.
房间和文字描述十分匹配.所以要仔细阅读有话房间面积面积的部分.是我不好之前没有仔细进行阅读.抱歉给您造成了麻烦.
客观的来评价一下交通.真的不算很方便.需要步行一段时间.不过还好.不算很远.
另外关于图片.请您妥善处理一下关于厨房的照片.因为图片作为第一印象来源关乎到很多房客的选择.请勿造成一种房间内带有厨房.或者增添了房间面积的假象.
在我入住的时候.作为一个男生.床上会不时的出现一些长头发.也许您应该更仔细的清理一下.感谢.
最后请您在回复的时候至少用繁体中文回复.虽然英文也完全可以看懂但是没有必要呀哈哈.感谢您的招待.有机会再见｡(-^O^-).感谢您.
If you are a foreigne and you want to learn more thing about this house.You can contact this account and I will explain my comment.
A very friendly host and good hospitality. Room and common space are clean and tidy.
服务特别好,特别热情,而且居住环境特别优美,总之一切都比预想的要棒,离机场很近,值得住宿｡
This is a beautiful and tranquil place.  A perfect get-away from the busy and crowded city.  Love it even though i am from Hong Kong!

Didn't get to meet Ricky. Was hosted by Terry instead and everything was fantastic! Communication was prompt and clear. Check in was seamless. Terry also provided many suggestions on where we can go and where to find good food on Lantau Island. Maps were provided as well. Place was convenient to get to start of hiking trails which was a priority for us. Will love to stay here again when we go back!
环境真的超级好,房间超级感觉,是我住过最干净的民宿!一级棒,温馨,视野好!
房东很周到,回复讯息较为迅速,房间位置较偏,但收拾很整洁,房东布置很用心｡村落很安静,相应的缺点是便利设施不足,比如三餐问题不太方便解决､出行有一段乡村道路无法通车等,建议行李不多来香港机场转机的人入住｡
Rickys place was perfect and ideal when I needed a convenient, clean and well run place by the airport! They were great and I would return again!
We really enjoyed our stay. The help and directions we were given was really appreciated. This was one of the cleanest places we have ever stayed. The rooftop view was terrific!
Terry and Ricky were so kind and thoughtful, they introduced everything around in detail for us and make us feel at home for real!
Nice place. Awesome host. Cute CATS!!! I love it :)
离奥特莱斯很近,真的很方便｡环境也不错｡
위치빼고 다좋았어요 깔끔하고
Comfortable, within walking distance to shops and public transport. Friendly hosts who gave plenty of information about the local area.
Amazing place and location to visit Hong Kong, Disney and Lantau. Host is externally helpful and kind.

Absolute wonderful experience, from reading previous reviews I had high expectations and they were definitely exceeded. Unbelievable hospitality from Terry who walked us back to the apartment, showed us around, made sure we were comfortable and gave us tips on the best way to get to the airport in the morning. Not to forget about the place, very clean, updated, comfortable.. everything you need. And the rooftop hangout is beautiful, the girl and I had a romantic dinner and Terry even offered us a candle (I thought he was kidding haha so sweet) can't say enough about the place and the guys! Thanks again!

Had a good stay at Ricky's place. Our room was clean, tidy and had basic necessities we needed, including hairdryer, adapter etc. Terry was very kind and helpful, we got lots of local info/advice from him. P.S. loved their garden next to the house. :)

Had a pleasant stay at Ricky’s place during our layover in Hong Kong. Place is super convenient in terms of getting to the airport - just a 10 min taxi drive and then some 10 min walk. Ricky’s cousin Terry met us at the taxi drop off point, offered a cart for our bags and even pushed it himself to the apartments. In the morning Terry ordered a taxi for us and also carried our bags on a cart. 

The room is neat and cozy. Overall a lovely experience
孩子过去考试住在这里,她说风景非常好,很喜欢,房东很友好,细心体贴｡孩子有一段时间失去联系,只好联系房东,房东热心帮助寻找,联系上了通知我,很感谢
Stayed here whilst exploring Hong Kong, it is very convenient for big Buddha and to explore monastery. Ricky and his team were very welcoming and accommodating.

ricky是与众不同的房东,当初在英国念书,后来为了追求安静的生活选择了在大屿山经营民宿｡我们孩子为了sat考试住在他家,发现完全不用担心,他会详细告知机场过来的路线,会去路口迎接孩子,会帮孩子安排一个人的食宿,提醒孩子们早点起床,更会贴心帮他们安排去机场的拼车,两次考试我们孩子都是独自去的,ricky会在 (Hidden by Airbnb) 上不断告知孩子的情况,就像一位真诚细心的大哥哥｡很感谢他给予孩子的照顾和帮助,今后也会向其他同学推荐!另外,大屿山的风景很好,孩子还在当地做了生态调研,……总的来说,这是神奇而温暖的旅行!
The place is chilled and cosy in the village . Great escape from the city .Terry and Ricky being a helpful host as well . Definitely back for another stay.
为了看con就住在亚洲国际博览馆附近 打的十分钟以内能到 下车到住的屋子要走一段路因为在村子里 房东人很好 屋子挺干净整洁的 屋外很多花装饰得很好看 除了出行不太方便要提前叫车其他都挺好的✌
Nice location and clean place. Great for escaping the city!

This was a great, clean room but the hospitality was the best! The guesthouse is outside of the city, 30 minute walk from closest MTR. Terry picked me up from the street to show me the way to the guesthouse, which I would have never found alone for the first time, but not hard to find after that.  He also gave tips on where to visit around the area. I would recommend this to someone who wants to get away from the busy city for a while!

Our stay was wonderful. We had a flight from the US that arrived at 6pm and wanted to spend our first night in Hong Kong near the airport before we moved to central Hong Kong and this was PERFECT! The rooftop was so beautiful- so many plants and what a view. We could hear so much wildlife and it was relaxing. The room was sparkling clean and exactly what we needed. 

Ricky gave us so many wonderful recommendations. The place would be a bit challenging to find your first time so he had his cousin, terry, meet us. Terry was also incredibly friendly and told us where to go to eat. 

We loved Lantau Island and explored Tai O and Big Buddha the next day before heading to Hong Kong. I’m so glad we did this. 

Thanks!!!

It was a great experience. I arrived early few hours but Ricky and Terry already prepared , The pictures and texts that Ricky gave were very helpful and accurate, I can easily flow it and find the lovely place. The room is very new and clean, makes comfortable. And they free offer the guests the Charging converter and flash lights in case can use it. Terry help me book the taxi everyday even at early morning at 6 he walk me out and till I am get in the Taxi,that’s make me feel so warm and appreciate.also help me carry the heavy luggage. Give me advise about the restaurant and shopping place so I can eat and buy the (Website hidden by Airbnb) very happy and glad meet those nice person and stay at a fabulous place. I enjoyed the environment, the sunset and fresh air. This place as beautiful as a vacation, but also very human and sweet｡非常舒服非常热情很美的住宿,推荐
GOOD
Great place! It’s a little far from the subway station. But in Hong Kong, it’s not easy to find a nice and private room at this price. I like that it’s not in the city. It’s quite.
Ricky和他的表哥非常热情,住所干净,整洁,Ricky还帮我们预约了去机场的车,人非常好,需要赶飞机的游客可以考虑入住｡
房间干净舒服,去得是大晚上十一点多了出来带我们进去,房主ricky没见到,但是有什么问题都很耐心回答很nice,带我们进去房子的虽然不知道叫什么但是感觉也很好告诉我们路线和附近游玩攻略,感觉棒棒
十分满意~服务满分,环境优美,干净卫生

정말 좋습니다. 가까운거리에 쇼핑센터와 현지의 자연경관이 있습니다. 현지인들의 생활을 잠시나마 느껴볼 수 있었습니다. 서비스도 친절하고 청결도도 훌륭합니다. 다만 접근성이 다소 떨어지고 개발되지 않은 경로를 통과할 수밖에 없기 때문에 치안 면에서 어떨지 약간의 의구심은 있으나, 건장한 남성이나, 단체로 모여서 이동하시는 분들이라면 걱정하지 않아도 좋습니다.(밤에 이동하시는 것은 비추) 방 안은 완벽하게 정리되어 있었고, 코앞에 한국에서 볼 수 없는 자연경관이 펼쳐져있었습니다.(그럼에도 방에는 모기 한마리 없어 정말 관리를 잘 하시는구나 생각했습니다.) 새벽에도 빠른 응대를 해주시고, 간이한 지도를 제작하여 제공해주셔서 어디로든 쉽게 이동할 수 있었습니다.
Wonderful hospitality! Great communication from start to finish. Provided local places to eat, gave very efficient directions, met us at the designated spot, and the room was clean and refreshing!
Mr. Ricky and Mr. Terry really serve us like a King. He came to help us pick up our heavy luggage from check in and heavy rain when check out. His place really cozy and clean. Great !
房间很干净,房东很友好,还绘制了地图提供给房客以便出行｡很不错的一处闹中取静的住所｡
热情好客,祝一切顺利
房东人特别的好,我们七点半的飞机五点起来陪我们去打车,前一天晚上还是两点多睡得｡还帮我们一起看演唱会的拉了个群｡房间也很干净,两个大行李箱可以一起打开｡美中不足就是有一点偏,也有点难找,绝对不要跟着高德导航走!绝对不要!!跟着他给你发的地图就好｡要打电话的话要把区号去掉不然打不通｡总体来说还不错｡
雖然冇見到Ricky本人,但系他的表哥非常熱情｡雖然那天只有他一個人,也不忘介紹周邊的景點及玩樂設施給我們參考｡房間非常乾淨舒服,設施齊全也非常周到｡有機會還會繼續book這個民宿｡
因为时间来不及所以没有及时check in 准备入住的时候已经很晚了 加上那天下雨 要走一段不方便的山路 一开始没有找到还在很晚打电话给房东问询 幸好房东及时接了电话 房间里的东西很齐全 该有的都有 并且问房东要了另外的转换插头也在第二天送了过来 还为我们叫车 有问题找他们都能解决~非常感谢

路有一点偏僻,下车之后要走大概要走五六分钟的路才到达房源｡房间不大｡刚好可以摆下一张床和一个衣柜,旁边就是一个小小的洗手间｡
房东很贴心｡住的地方离机场近｡

Ricky’s place was a great respite from the airport terminals (we were in Hong Kong for. 23 hour layover).
Clean, and comfortable with a well functioning air conditioning unit, and a great shower! 
The orchard walk to the room was lovely. 
If arriving at night you might want to request Ricky or his cousin Terry meets you at the YMCA drop off. 
If Terry hadn’t met us, I’m not sure we could have navigated the walk to the guesthouse), 
Terry was also a great help in finding local food and attractions (the Indian place on Terry suggested was amazing) thank you Terry!

Being my first time in Hong Kong during a 17 hour layover, I was a bit nervous. However, after being so kindly greeted by Terry, my nerves instantly went away and I felt at home. The place is very clean and has all of the necessary amenities for a comfortable stay. Highly recommend going up to the rooftop terrace to catch the beautiful sunrise/sunset. Thank you again!!

Stayed in double room 1A.Nice and (Website hidden by Airbnb) shoes inside rooms and common areas-slippers are provided.Good room air-con,was switched on before our arrival.Very welcomed after a walk from the taxi drop of point.Terry was very nice and welcoming,he came to meet us,even though I didn’t ask him to.The  detailed map with the directions from the  taxi drop off point to the house was provided by (Website hidden by Airbnb) was very clearwith the pictures as well.The common areas consists of a small launge with kitchen (guests can  use the microwave) opened between 08:00-22:30.Also there is a nice terrace with sun laungers and tables  and (Website hidden by Airbnb) in the room and a botle of water was also provided.On the whole simple,clean accommodation located near the (Website hidden by Airbnb) and quiet.
Lovely hosts and super helpful about transportation and things to do on Lantau Island. This is quite remote in comparison to staying in Tung Chung, but it is worth getting out of the main areas.
Ricky真的非常热情,也很nice,照顾的很周到｡房子是在村子里,需要走一段小路才能到,唯一的不方便就是这点吧｡第一次住香港的村屋,一路上小溪､蝴蝶､沿路的果树,还有鸟儿,好像回到了小时候外婆家的感觉,晚上在天台躺椅上看星星真的是很美妙,如果不是要赶飞机真的很想多呆一会儿
环境雅致,乡村风情,房东热情,服务体贴周到,公寓环境很好,离机场很近,再次感谢房东的贴心招待

Ricky’s place is located in a small traditional village in a green belt on the edge of Tung Chung. However, it is within easy walking distance of transportation and amenities in the city. It’s quite different from the usual Hong Kong experience - calm and peaceful and relaxing. The rooms are small but very clean, comfortable and newly remodeled.  Ricky and Terry were both very helpful and accommodating and provided tips about getting around. One thing to keep in mind is that you cannot reach the location by automobile as there is no vehicular road to the site, so plan accordingly.
所处环境优美,干净整洁,非常好的体验

왜 5점만점인지... 10점 주고싶어요.
친절한 호스트를 만나서 첫날 공항에서 멘붕왔던게 겨우 회복되었네요! 홍콩 다시가면 꼭 여기올거에요. 재방문의사 2000%입니다. 
리키가 택시 내리는곳 까지 데리러왔고 짐도들어줬어요 (지금와서 생각해보면 팁이라도 드렸어야하는건데...) 친절한 호스트와 완벽하게 분리된 개인공간을 원한다면 무조건 추천이에요!!
房间里的卫生很干净,而且房东招呼得很周到,晚上10点到 都有人接我们进去 太贴心了!周围环境都很清新,非常建议大家选择这个民宿!
Very convenient & peaceful stopover between flights
Super clean,lovely place. Expensive for an air bnb but that's this area and it's more like a hotel room.
Clean,comfortable and quiet,  we like the place so much and had a great stay over there. Please be prepared that you have to walk 7-10min from the village entrance.
Wonderful quiet location with hospitality to match. Would highly recommend to all travellers.
Perfect place to stay on a layover or just traveling around locally! Super clean and helpful!
房东人很好!他有提前和我们联络,地址的指引也很详细!

Please please pick this place, it is a must if you want to travel in hongkong , and see an amazing view ! The host is very professional, they will help you if you have any questions ! Also please be respectful to their place, it is so beautiful. The roof top has one of the best sunset views. It is also extremely private ! Come and bring more people there ! Great family place !
我觉得房间同环境好好,门口有玫瑰,哈哈,估计早上睇会好靓,虽然我地过去系住一晚,但系terry好好人,交代路线入住等等都好详细,第二日我地好早去机场又帮我地call车,真系好好好好人,如果再去香港玩嘅话都会再考虑
房间位置很好,真是在一片树林中间,车不能到,非常安静,空气很好,房间非常干净,有个很棒的天台,徒步很方便,可以走去大佛,大澳,Ricky和Terry都很好沟通,乐于提供各种帮助信息,下次计划约几个朋友一起去｡
100% recommended for people who long for a temporary stay in Hong Kong particularly after a long time flight. Close to international airport, a bonus for fans of hills, mountains and creeks.
It’s a nice and cozy place for short stay.

Ricky provided great instructions and the place was very close to the airport. He also helped us get to and from the airport which was great and the room was very quiet at night. Very friendly, kind hosts! Thank you!

Ricky was very communicative and helpful. I appreciated the fact that he let me check-in much earlier than the official check-in time, because of my flight landing time in Hong Kong. The instructions to reach the guest house were very clear with both text and picture instructions. The transit map he provided was also a lot more accurate and helpful than (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps was.
the place was super clean and tidy, just what we needed for our long layover. the host was very helpful, which made our stay so easy.

房子特别好,比想象中大｡从机场打车过去70港币｡我们是去看演唱会的,当天11点才到,去房子的路上没有路灯很黑,我们有些害怕是房东来接的我们,人特别好｡
第二天天亮了真的是被周围景色吸引,很漂亮｡走的时候房东帮忙叫了车也送我们出去,一直等的士来了才走｡
房东人超级好,中文沟通没问题｡房子也特别好,干净还大｡
就是洗澡的时候没热水…
房东非常好,还专门到村口去接,下飞机后及时的联系,指路线,见面后告诉周边的游乐地方,天台可以看到星星,第二天早晨走还帮忙联系车,送到村口,下次来肯定还是这边
房東人超級好,行程前會提供公共交通到達路線,到達後會介紹周圍景點,不在繁華地段但是周圍環境真的很舒服｡房間也很好,遇到問題也會積極幫我們解決!
房东回复很及时,很有耐心,去机场很快,交通便利!
You can find the place with (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps, it is well defined, there is a parking lot to cross through, follow the exactly instructions
接待我们很热情,由于我们自身原因在晚上10.30后入住,需要自助入住,到达后十一点多,还特地出来告诉我们设施使用,并询问隔天航班,帮我们叫车好赶去机场,人很好,这次比较赶又是晚上没留意周围环境,下次有时间可以早点去好好感受下这边的气氛,很安静,适合休息｡
I was attending a conference nearby, and had an easy time travelling back and forth with the help of my hosts. Overall had a great stay and would recommend to friends.
房东兄弟都很热心,就是位置有一些绕

name: Your spot in Copacabana
summary: Having a large airy living room. The apartment is well divided. Fully furnished and cozy. The building has a 24h doorman and camera services in the corridors. It is very well located, close to the beach, restaurants, pubs and several shops and supermarkets. And it offers a good mobility being close to the subway.
space: The apartment is carefully prepared to receive up to 8 people very comfortably and airy and very well organized to offer you a great stay in Rio de Janeiro.
description: Having a large airy living room. The apartment is well divided. Fully furnished and cozy. The building has a 24h doorman and camera services in the corridors. It is very well located, close to the beach, restaurants, pubs and several shops and supermarkets. And it offers a good mobility being close to the subway. The apartment is carefully prepared to receive up to 8 people very comfortably and airy and very well organized to offer you a great stay in Rio de Janeiro. I am available to assist and answer questions regarding the use of the apartment and everything we can to make your stay a success! The location is perfect, close to the beach, the Lido Square and the Copacabana Palace, right next to subway station, and has many bars, restaurants, markets, shops and craft fair and trade in general in the surroundings. The apartment is three blocks from Cardinal Arcoverde subway station. Great transport variety. There is no parking in the building.
neighborhood_overview: The location is perfect, close to the beach, the Lido Square and the Copacabana Palace, right next to subway station, and has many bars, restaurants, markets, shops and craft fair and trade in general in the surroundings.
notes: There is no parking in the building.
transit: The apartment is three blocks from Cardinal Arcoverde subway station. Great transport variety.
access: Dois quartos com ar condicionado 12000 Btus, uma suíte com cama queen e um quarto com duas bicamas. Sala com um sofá cama, mesa de jantar, Tv a cabo e wifi. Cozinha planejada e equipada com todos os utensílios. Dois banheiros. Forneço lençóis, travesseiros e toalhas.
interaction: I am available to assist and answer questions regarding the use of the apartment and everything we can to make your stay a success!
house_rules: Espero que você sinta-se em casa, e cuide do meu apartamento como se fosse seu.  É proibido fumar, trazer animais de estimação, trazer pessoas não autorizadas( que não sejam os hóspedes previamente informados), fazer festinhas  e fazer barulho após as 22hs. Por motivo de segurança, desligue luz e ar condicionado sempre que sair do apartamento.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Tenho muito prazer em fazer novos amigos, com outras culturas, informações e vivências. Gosto de ser uma anfitriã atenciosa e disponível. O que estiver ao meu alcance tenha certeza que será feito, para tornar sua estadia no Rio inesquecível.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Fantastic apartment in a perfect location. Ana Lucia made us feel right at home with fresh fruit and snacks! The apt is blocks away from the beach, near tons of great food (Go to Amir and Galeto Sats, thank me later) and plenty of places to hang out with locals (Bip Bip). Highly recommend staying here for your visit to Copacabana.
Ana Lucia foi muito prestativa, nos recebeu super bem, apartamento bem equipado e bem localizado, próximo a praia, transporte público, restaurantes...superou todas as nossas expectativas!!
Ana Lúcia foi super atenciosa, rápida nas respostas e flexível com meus horários de check-in e check-out. O apartamento é ótimo e super bem localizado!
muito bom
Ana Lúcia nos atendeu muito bem e tirou todas as dúvidas da estadia, além de nos orientar em algumas questões. Parabéns pelo ótimo atendimento!
Adorei!
Ótimo apartamento, bem equipado e em ótima localização

Ótimo apartamento, bem equipado, limpo, confortável. Localização perfeita, muitos comércios na redondeza, perto da praia.
Fomos muito bem recebidos pela anfitriã que foi bem flexível com o horário de checkin.

name: Makaha Valley Paradise with OceanView
summary: A beautiful and comfortable 1 Bedroom Air Conditioned Condo in Makaha Valley - stunning Ocean & Mountain views All the amenities of home, suited for longer stays. Full kitchen & large bathroom.  Several gas BBQ's for all guests to use & a large heated pool surrounded by reclining chairs to sunbathe.  The Ocean you see in the pictures is not even a mile away, known as the famous Makaha Surfing Beach. Golfing, hiking,snorkeling  paddle boarding, surfing are all just minutes from the front door.
space: Spacious & Clean - Separate bedroom with a King Sized Bed. Comfy Sofa Bed in the living area that opens up to a Queen sized bed.   Balcony to enjoy the view! Beach Chairs, Towels, Cooler and Umbrella are also in the unit for our guests to enjoy. Hawaii State Tax & Transient Tax will be charged separately after your booking is confirmed, rate is 14.75 %
description: A beautiful and comfortable 1 Bedroom Air Conditioned Condo in Makaha Valley - stunning Ocean & Mountain views All the amenities of home, suited for longer stays. Full kitchen & large bathroom.  Several gas BBQ's for all guests to use & a large heated pool surrounded by reclining chairs to sunbathe.  The Ocean you see in the pictures is not even a mile away, known as the famous Makaha Surfing Beach. Golfing, hiking,snorkeling  paddle boarding, surfing are all just minutes from the front door. Spacious & Clean - Separate bedroom with a King Sized Bed. Comfy Sofa Bed in the living area that opens up to a Queen sized bed.   Balcony to enjoy the view! Beach Chairs, Towels, Cooler and Umbrella are also in the unit for our guests to enjoy. Hawaii State Tax & Transient Tax will be charged separately after your booking is confirmed, rate is (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) % Full access - Must go through 24 hour Security Gate - Lockstate door code access We are only a phone call, text or e-mail
neighborhood_overview: Makaha area is the quiet side of Oahu with surfing on Makaha Beach, one mile from the complex. A golf course is not even a half mile away. The best sunsets are the here on the West Side of the island !  With several local beaches to relax on, swim, snorkel, watch for turtles, monk seals and even whales!
notes: Hawaii State Tax & Transient Tax will be charged separately after your booking is confirmed, rate is (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) % Hawai`i Tax ID Number GE (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) This is a residential complex, no restaurant on site. Parking is available for $4 per day, with a $50 deposit - payable to the office in cash.
transit: A vehicle is highly recommended. Parking is onsite with 24 hour security. The Bus stop is out front of the condo. Transportation to and from airport is available through a taxi based at Makaha Valley Towers and costs about $120 one way. The airport is about 50 - 60 minutes from the complex, depending on traffic.
access: Full access - Must go through 24 hour Security Gate - Lockstate door code access
interaction: We are only a phone call, text or e-mail away to assist you.
house_rules: Hawaii State Tax must be paid via Air BnB Resolution Center before arriving. No Smoking in Condo, on Lanai's, Hallways or Parking Areas. Smoking area is by the entrance near the bicycle parking area and closes at 9 pm. After that you must leave property. Because of the tropical breeze, no hanging of towels or clothes on Lanai or anywhere outside. Check in is anytime after 4 pm  -  Check out is before 11 am Self check in with LockState Smart Lock

host.host_about: We are a semi retired couple who enjoy nature, travel & good food !

reviews.comments: Unit was as described - plus awesome views! Everything with check-in went smoothly. The apartment had everything we needed and more.

The apartement is very clean and comfortable. We just had to accept the very high security ....  We are not used with that. 
There's not so much to do in Wai'anae, but it is interested to see this part of the island. 
Thank you Ray.

We loved staying in this condo.  The host was friendly and even had chocolates available for us when we arrived.  Very lovely place and very comfortable stay.  We would use this place again.  Thanks for a great week in your condo!

The host made my guest and I feel very welcome. Their was a guidebook that recommemed beaches, hikes, and restaurants, that I found to be very helpful. Whatever questions I had about the listing, I always got a quick response. The place itself was beautiful, clean, and a nice spot to spend a vacation. Everything about the condo wad listed in the ad. From the beautiful waianae mountain view, the ocean view and the pool and bbq area. Not to mention that it was very peaceful and quiet area to spend a vacation. I would definately recommend friends and others to stay here!

Our stay was wonderful!  The condo had a beautiful view up on the hill and the space was perfect for 2.  The employees at the security gate were always very friendly and the property was very well kept.  Ray was always very quick to respond, especially when we were concerned about the 2 hurricanes that were headed toward the islands.  Luckily we were hardly affected on our side of the island.  Right at the bottom of the street from the condo was a beautiful beach for snorkeling.  All of the directions and instructions for the condo were easy to follow and it was very easy to find it's location. If you're looking to get away from the chaos of Honolulu and Waikiki, this place and part of the island is great.

Absolutely enjoyed staying at Ray's place last minute. It was very clean and just like the pictures. The views from the balcony were beautiful all day long. Very friendly people at the Towers. I definitely would recommend this as a place to stay!
I was here for work so this place was great for me. All of the residents are very friendly. Ray was incredibly accommodating and very responsive to any messages I sent. Would reccomend.

Ray & Lise have a lovely apartment in a peaceful, beautiful location. The apartment is clean, cozy, comfortable and very well equipped. The description is exactly as advertised. If you are looking for a place to relax and enjoy the beaches, this is a great location. Although public transportation runs  from just outside the condo's main gate, a car is recommended.
Loved my stay!  There were so many amazing accommodations!  Can't wait to go back!
Nice, clean, apartment near some beautiful beaches. Ray was very helpful and quick to respond to questions. Thanks for a great stay!

The mountain backdrop for this condo complex is breathtaking.  The grounds are beautifully landscaped and kept very nice.  The ocean views are beautiful.  The pool area is very nice.  It's only a mile to one of the nicest beaches on Oahu.    It's perfect if you are not inclined to want the nightlife and tourist attractions found on the more frequently visited parts of this island. The natural beauty of the area is wonderful.
The place was nice but they're far too many rules at the complex
Great place!

Ray's place in Makaha is perfect for travelers who want to experience the best that Hawaii has to offer.  His place is equipped with all of the amenities that a business traveler needs to get work done...but at the same time, allows you to partake in the paradise that is Waianae (peacocks included).  The beaches there are beyond compare and Ray's place is a perfect homebase for exploring them.

Great condo. Host was very good at communicating. Relevant information was sent via email prior to arrival, and host reached out a couple days before the trip to reiterate important information. Enjoyed the stay!
This home was amazing! Truly felt like a home away from home. My boyfriend and I would love to come back here some time in the future.

중심가에서 먼것빼고는 모든게 좋았습니다.
여기를 이용하기 위해서는 영어를 약간 할수있어야 합니다.
유아동반 어린이 두명 어른두명 가족다섯명이 생활하기에 좋았습니다.(약간 좁긴했지만요)
퀸사이즈 침대한개 소파베드침대한개가 있습니다. 
주차는 전면주차만 가능하고 하루 주차요금은 4불입니다.
전자렌지 및 커피포트등 요리에 필요한 모든것들이 있습니다. 후라이팬이 코팅이 안되어 있어 계란후라이는 만들기 힘들었습니다.
아이스박스, 비치체어도 두개가 있어 아이들과 스노클링다니기 좋았습니다.
만약 여기에 오신다면 코올리나 라군에 꼭 가세요. 유아동반가족이 놀기에 최적의 장소입니다.
가성비 최고의 숙소인듯 합니다.
Very clean , anything you would need they have to offer.  Responds to emails asap . Thanks for even offering us to stay longer and you would find other options ...above and beyond ...

It's perfect. They are the best hosts. Answer all questions quickly and kindly. It was a little way from the main street, but I loved Makaha very much, no matter what.I'd definitely like to visit again. My children and I stayed so happy!! And I was satisfied with the security system there.

Ray and Lise's comfy, roomy condo comes with the best views! They took great care keeping us informed during the reservation process and where the best places to eat are locally. It was raining when we arrived and the mountain behind the condo sported 7 waterfalls! Even when it rains it's beautiful.
Great place- but you must be a fan of the Westside! Ray and Lise are awesome hosts and make the experience easy and pleasurable.

This place is a little slice of heaven. It is everything their ad says and more. It really is about as far removed from the Honolulu tourist bustle as one can get. This is a huge bonus to experience Hawaii and a place to live and enjoy the people and untouched beaches along the Waianae Coast.  The Waianae Harbor is just down the road and is where many people from the Waikiki hotels get bused an hour to board the boats to go out for turtle and dolphin cruises.  But, you will be right there! The condo tower community is much more resort like than other condos (minus a restaurant on property), but with the many local restaurants nearby you will never get bored with the eating out options. The condo in modern with all the essential elements. The bathroom is large, the bed is comfy. This is one of the rare units with a screen front door so you can open it up to enjoy a cross breeze if desired and not get attacked by mosquitoes. The view is fantastic. Laundry is just down the hall. I highly recommend Ray and Lise's place!

A word about Handicap Access: If you are handicap and need to avoid stairs, be sure to bring your handicap placard from your car so they give you a special pass to park in the resident parking. I have a bum knee so stairs are not my friend. The standard visitor parking in on the lowest level and is a bit of a hike and many stairs which is no issue for most travelers. There are no handicap parking stalls; all are on a first come basis so if you get back late at night, parking can be a challenge, but you can still avoid stairs by walking in a different door/elevator and making your way to the condo. The pool is three flights of stairs down; no elevator options. But, if you drive your car around to the pool there is a ramp up to the BBQ area to eliminate most of the stairs but you will still have about 10 steps up yo the pool to deal with. Unfortunately there is no wheelchair access to the pool.

Ray and Lise's condo have stunning ocean view. It is a pleasure having breakfast facing the ocean and mountain view at morning. the king size bed is very comfortable, and the sofa can be use to sleep alternatively, making the condo be a real suite deluxe.They support abundant appliance for snorkeling and beach playing. The porperty have impressive security system, living there is safe and quiet. And  if you have car, the location is not the problem. Acturally,  I always think the location of the porperty, which is at the west side of Oahu,  is like the heaven at the end of the world. This is my first Airbnb experience, and it is very great and miraculous, even when my family leave the condo at the last day, we saw 6 beautiful peacocks standing beside the driving road seeing us off. Thank you, Ray and Lise, for your homelike accomodation and warm welcome. I wish to come back to your house in future.
Great place to stay. Away from the busy city. Close proximity to the beach.

Thank you for an incredible experience. You have designed a space that is inviting and feels like home. I appreciated the ongoing communication and willingness to accommodate my schedule. You provided detailed tips on how to best experience West Oahu, while caring for the land and community. I look forward to returning in the near future.

Lise was a phenomenal hostess and made my 10 day vacation in Hawaii wonderful. It was a comfortable condo with a beautiful view and homey touches. It was conveniently close to the beach and good, authentic Hawaiian food. During this time of year the area was dry. So unfortunately our last few days there were not ideal. But Lise was very helpful when it came to trying to find a place away from the smoke and refunded me the money for the one night I could not stay in the condo. I highly recommend picking this spot for your next vacation!
If you want a breathtaking view when you wake up this is the place. The beach that is a mile away is a nice quiet locals beach. Great stay

My wife and I travelled to Oahu recently and chose to stay on the Leeward Coast.  Ray and Lise’s condo is an excellent choice for travellers who are not afraid to get away from the tourist hotspots and are willing and able to drive back and forth to the sights that you want to see.  The beaches on this side of the island are unreal! You have to see them to believe them.  Specifically Ray and Lise’s condo is very comfortable, with all amenities and a comfy bed.  We spent a lot of our days either touring the island or at the beach so we were very glad to have a comfy condo with Cable Tv to come home to in the evening.  
The views are spectacular!  The kitchen is well appointed and we cooked almost all our meals at the condo, or down at the bbq area. The pool area is very well kept, clean and quiet.  The grounds on the property are very pretty.  We experienced no noise issues while we were there.  The staff at this facility are very very friendly and we had no issues with checking in and getting around the property.  
Ray and Lise have beach chairs, coolers and umbrellas, snorkelling gear and books for their guests to use as needed. This was very helpful for us when we spent time at the beaches!
Ray and Lise’s communication throughout the booking process and leading up to the trip was impeccable. They answered all questions i had and were very quick to offer advise for our stay.  We knew exactly what to expect and were not caught off guard by anything when we arrived at their condo.  
Overall this place is 5/5 for us and it was an experience we will never forget.

Great place to stay away from the touristy parts of the island. There are many hiking trails and beaches within a 45 min drive of their place. I would suggest renting a car when staying on that side of the island so you can get out and travel to the north shore.

My family had and then amazing time at Ray’s and Lize’s place! They were quick to answer all of the questions we had, the place was spotless clean, close to a beach and in a safe condominium complex. I loved every minute of our stay and will definitely recommend this condo to my friends and family! Thank you Ray and Lise!
Fantastic place!  Was perfect for our family of four. We will definitely stay here on our next visit

The view was just beautiful. We felt safe at all times and the staff at the place was super friendly. Ray and Lise were very responsive and their place is just lovely, especially for the price. The west side of the island might have a bad rep, but we never felt in danger or afraid. There are great beaches and hikes just up the road a bit and it is easy access to anywhere else on the island. What a beautiful place and great hosts!

name: IPANEMA LUXURY PENTHOUSE with MAID
summary: IPANEMA Penthouse is located in the most famous and trendy area of Rio de Janeiro. It has a unbreathtake view of the Lake, Redimer Christ, Pedra da Gavea and 2 Irmãos mountains. Great for 2 people! If 4 (we can put 2 inflate coushion at the floor)
space: DESCRIPTION:  Triplex Luxury Penthouse with a unbreathtaking fantastic view of the Lake and Redimer Christ! Absolutely comfortable! Including 4 hours daily of house maid assistance from monday to friday for cleaning the house and prepare a complete homemade breakfast!  Main first floor it situates a v. confortable and large resting room and dinning room v. well decorated by many renown dsigners, furnished in 50 years style, designed by Vladirmi Kagan, blowing technic christal art pieces signed by Elvira Schuartz, jacarandá rare brazilian wood signed by Leo Bueno / Maison Objet, brazilian renown artists paintings and wall sculptures. that gives a unique and exclusive atmosphere.  High glass windons that allows you a sensation of being amost inside the Lake. In this first floor you also find a dinning table for 6 people and split conditioned air. Second floor you find an astonishing lighting sculpture made with christal quartz and citrine precious raw stones signed by by Renat Andreu whe

neighborhood_overview: Sightseing  frontal view of the Lake and Redimer Christ, internationally elected  as one of SEVEN NEW MODERN WONDERS of the WORLD! Fantastic restaurants, pubs, nightlife in great style and a great beach for you, all by walking! Ipanema it looks like a tiny village where you can make everything by walking or rent public bikes and can feel the real carioca brazilian soul life style.
transit: All by foot! (best restaurants, pubs, nautic sports and walking lake, hikings and beaches). Metro also near.
interaction: I simply love receiving people and I use to host personally my guests and then leave them apreciate and relaxing with exclusivity their own private area of the apartment.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Eu sou Designer, adoro viajar e adoro os finais de tarde na praia em Ipanema. 
Sejam bem vindos ao Rio de Janeiro.

I am objects designer and plastic artist and love travelling. I simply love hosting people! Welcome in Rio!

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Cesar goes well above and beyond to make his guests feel comfortable. He personally greeted me, recommended some restaurants (I went to one and had amazing sushi) and showed patiently how the pool and refrigerator work. The apartment looks even better than on the pictures. I especially loved the rooftop with 360 view. I really had a good chance to relax and unwind in Cesars place. One thing to mention is that the apartment has a great energy all round, I would highly recommend it to anyone.

This is my second time staying at Cesars place, this time for about a week. The reason I came back is because besides marvelous view and the setup the place has this amazing energy which is especially rejuvenating after a stressful work period back in NYC. Wherever you are in the apartment your eyes are almost constantly facing the green if the trees, water and the Christo statue in the background which is very relaxing. 

During my starving was around 35C in Rio so I spend a good time in the pool which is very deep, clean and enjoyable. Tivesse so good I barely went to the gym which is literally minutes away. 

Cesar was super kind, he is definitely not your regular Airbnb host. As he knows I like to cook potatoes he showed me how to cook Mandioca Brazilian potatoes with shrimps. It was an unforgettable cooking and gastronomic experience. 

I will certainly come back again next time I am in Ipanema.

Excelente localização, seguro e tranquilo. O apto é maravilhoso. Excelente vista e as fotos correspondem fielmente ao local! O anfitrião é muito atencioso, pontual e tudo muito bem detalhado! Vale a pena mesmo!
Muito obrigado!

O apartamento do Cesar é um sonho carioca! Com o Corcovado, o morro dois irmãos, a mesa do imperador e a lagoa todos no seu campo de visão! A recepção foi primorosa, a Patricia é uma assistente que nos ajudou em tudo além de preparar um delicioso café da manhã! (Voltar da Sapucai cansado e ter um café fresquinho com um pão de queijo quentinho te esperando não tem preço!!!) Recomendo fortemente e iremos voltar com certeza! Simplesmente sem pontos negativos! Obrigado Cesar e Patrícia!

Cesar é super tranquilo, educado e simpático.  Fez de tudo para tornar a hospedagem agradável. O apartamento é incrível! Super de bom gosto e com uma das vistas mais lindas que já vi no Rio. Super recomendo!!!

O espaço do Cesar é incrível.
* Bem localizado, com facil acesso a Lagoa / praia / restaurantes.
* Seguro (rua sem saida).
* Tem uma vista vista da Lagoa / Cristo Redentor que é única
* Bem decorado
* Reservado (voce fecha a porta da cozinha e tem o apartamento todo pra voce)
* O café da manhã da Patricia torna a experiencia ainda mais exclusiva.
* O Cesar é super atencioso e disponível, possui diversas dicas do bairro e do RJ que nos ajudaram no passeio.

Voltarei, com certeza!

Very nice and well decorated appartment with a speechless view of Rio! We didnt have the chance to meet Cesar but he was very available and helpful by phone and (Hidden by Airbnb) . He is for sure a super host!

Was an excellent experience right from the start. Cesar was very attentive and took care of our well-being more than he needed to: he offered breakfast and even supper during our stay. He was also giving great recommendations to restaurants. Would go back again!

This was a great apartment in Rio waking up every morning to a great view.  Great location close to the nightlife but just far enough away to avoid the noise.  I highly recommend this apartment to anyone.  The pool was a nice touch on hot days.

Ceaser's place is very much a rooftop penthouse. Beautiful original art pieces and wonderful furniture. Great to hangout on the roof or in the pool. Best of all though is the service his housekeeper offers. Breakfast every morning. Laundry items. And ceaser even cooked us a meal one day. Lovely place. Luxury living! We will be back
A estadia foi otima e nós só temos a agradecer ao Cesar pela simpatia e hospitalidade. O apartamento é incrível e super bem localizado. Foi uma ótima experiência e esperamos poder repetir em breve.
Cesar esteve sempre disponível, disponibilizou alguns itens extras, que tornaram nossa estadia ainda mais agradável. O espaço é maravilhoso, com uma vista incrível.

Cesar was an amazing host and his place was great! He was super helpful with suggestions and very accessible any time we needed anything. We ended up trying all the restaurants he recommended and weren’t disappointed! The place is fantastic and we made daily use of the pool and rooftop patio, both which had amazing views and were kept very well. We would definitely stay there next visits to Rio!

Cesar’s place was fantastic.  The views could not have been better. The apartment is designed beautifully and located on a quiet tree lined street. Ana, the maid, made us a wonderful breakfast every morning. Wonderful Airbnb!

Demorei bastante tempo a encontrar um hotel/apartamento  onde ficar no Rio de Janeiro. 
E não podia estar mais satisfeita com a escolha que fiz. 
O apartamento é exactamente o que se vê nas fotografias, super cool, num bairro bastante acessível e charmoso de Ipanema, rodeado de boas ofertas. E claro, a mencionar a vista indescritível para a Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas. Saudade!
O Cesar elevou a fasquia de Airbnb ao incluir pequeno-almoço diário na estadia. Um acto que muda a experiência e de uma simpatia irrepreensível.
Obrigada Cesar e anseio voltar muito em breve!   
Abraço, 
Mariana Colaço
Absolutely loved it - stunning place, superb amenities, great location and incredible views. Cesar is a great host - would love to stay again!

The view is FANTASTIC
The host is very very sweet
The pool and location is very nice.
thank you

Este lugar é único! O apartamento é muito confortável e tem uma vista incrível para o Rio de Janeiro. Fotos não fazem justiça. O café da manhã também é de primeira. A convivência com o Cesar é tranquilíssima e ele fez questão de que estívessemos sempre confortáveis. As dicas de restaurantes e turismo dele foram excelentes. Ele e a Ana também foram muito flexíveis com nossos horários.

My husband and I had a wonderful time at Cesar’s place. The location and condo are unique and the views are amazing. The condo is on a beautiful quiet street but within a short walk to beaches, restaurants, shopping, running paths and more. 

Cesar was a great host! He provided us with tons of helpful tips about the city, activities, and restaurants. He was easy to communicate with and always available for any questions we had. He definitely made us feel welcome, making us a great little meal when we arrived. 

To top it off, Anna, his maid, made us a traditional Brazilian breakfast in the mornings. 

Can’t say enough good things about our experience.
O apartamento é muito bem localizado e super estiloso. A vista é impagável e não dá vontade de sair de casa. Cesar está sempre a postos para ajudar. Recomendo a todos que forem visitar o Rio.
Great host, exceptional services, incredible penthouse! 100% recommendable! Such awesome experience!

Cesar’s place was the perfect compliment to a beautiful city. The place is in a terrific neighborhood for a leisurely stroll. The views are far more incredible than the photos. Swimming in a private pool overlooking the Christ statue was truly remarkable. And of course, the hospitality demonstrated by Cesar and Ana was terrific.

O apartamento é sensacional!!! A vista deslumbrante!!! Tudo exatamente igual como nas fotos!!! Cesar e sua secretária Ana são excelentes anfitriões, nos receberam com um café da manhã fantástico. O ap é super silencioso e perto de tudo!!! Super recomendo !!!

Cesar's beautiful triplex was as described, if not, more beautiful than the pictures. Overlooking Christ the Redeemer and the Rodrigo de Freitas Lagoon, the apartment had spectacular views. Breakfast was served on weekdays, the apartment was sparkly clean, the small private pool was a special treat after exploring the city, and the views were one I won't forget. Conveniently located in Ipanema, the apartment is walking distance to grocery stores, world class restaurants, and beautiful beaches. Cesar was an incredibly kind host. He left us snacks on arrival and shared with us a cake upon departure. A truly kind spirit. The hardest part was leaving. Would love to return one day. Saudades!

We had a great stay. The location is the best in town, the view is amazing and Cesar and Ana are excellent hosts.  The apartment is stunning and with Cesars tips and local knowledge we enjoyed our time immensely.

What can I say....

César is a great guy, I had a pleasant stay in his apartment, he basically showered me with tips and possibilities and helped me wherever he could.

I only had a rather short stay in his apartment and Cesar helped me to fill the short time as much as possible with the main activities. I enjoyed the time a lot.

The view from his rooftop terrace is just marvelous. 

I would rent the apartment definitely  again.

My husband and I had a great time while staying at Cesar’s place. The location was perfect- close to the beach and restaurants. Breakfast was delicious. The outdoor space was the ideal spot to unwind after a day of exploring. Cesar gave us recommendations on activities each day which was really helpful, as we had not done much planning prior to arriving in Rio. I highly recommend staying here!
Cesar was indeed a super host couldn’t have asked for at better place to experience Rio! He made our trip Amazing

name: FloresRooms 3T
summary: FloresRooms esta situado no coração da cidade do Porto. Tem disponível Internet por wireless e TV por cabo, como maquina de café , frigorífico e micro-ondas.
space: FloresRooms é um apartamento renovado situado no coração do centro histórico do Porto. Este apartamento acomoda 2 pessoas. A kitchenet esta equipada com máquina de café, micro-ondas, frigorifico e máquina de citrinos. Disponível também a tv por cabo e internet wireless. As roupas de cama, toalhas de banho e secador de cabelo são fornecidos por nós para que possa ter uma estadia tranquila. Nos dias mais frios tem sempre ao seu dispor um emissor térmico, para que torne a sua estadia acolhedora. A varanda deste apartamento fica virada para uma das praças mais recentes da Rua das Flores, a Praça das Cardosas. Informamos os nossos hospedes que no prédio ao lado está em reconstrução.   Os trabalhos na obra realizam se entre as 8 da manha e as 18 horas, de segunda a sexta feira.
description: FloresRooms esta situado no coração da cidade do Porto. Tem disponível Internet por wireless e TV por cabo, como maquina de café , frigorífico e micro-ondas. FloresRooms é um apartamento renovado situado no coração do centro histórico do Porto. Este apartamento acomoda 2 pessoas. A kitchenet esta equipada com máquina de café, micro-ondas, frigorifico e máquina de citrinos. Disponível também a tv por cabo e internet wireless.
