neighborhood_overview: The beach is one of the best kept secrets on Oahu!  The unique offering of our Beach is the natural reef wall situated about 40 yards off shore.  This reef wall serves as a break wall for incoming waves which creates a very calm shoreline and "bathtub" effect for your group to safely enjoy the ocean. Snorkel, Swim, Kayak, and more!  Stand Up Paddleboards, Kayaks, boogie boards and surfboards are all provided free of charge. During the winter months you'll enjoy seeing whales breaching right from the backyard. We are a 5 minute walk to Hawaii's #1 attraction, the Polynesian Cultural Center, with it's many, shows, performances, cultural activities, and award-winning Luau. Turtle Bay Resort is a 15 minute drive away, where you can enjoy world-class golfing, fine dining, horseback riding, mountain biking, surfing and much more.  The iconic North Shore is a 20-minute drive away, where in winter months you can observe professional surfing at its finest. The small yet cultural town of Laie ha
interaction: I live in another separate house within the gated estate - will be here to welcome you and answer any questions you may have along the way.
house_rules: No Pets No Smoking

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 70 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Noah was an excellent host!! The place was absolutely amazing!! You definitely won't be disappointed... The ocean in front of the property was perfect for the kids to swim, fishing, diving, snorkeling, paddle boarding.. Etc.. Everything was so convenient grocery stores, places to eat and getting in and out of the property was a breeze.  It's a very quiet area where you can relax and just get away from it all. We will most definitely consider staying here again!!

This spot couldn't have been more perfect. We had a big group and there was plenty of space, enough bathrooms, tons of space to cook and all the tools/ amenities we needed to do everything we wanted. The private beach was fantastic. So close to the Polynesian center and a good in-between spot for tons of hikes, beaches, shops and food. 

Noah was incredibly helpful, responsive and discreet so we never felt like didn't have the privacy we needed in our own little get away!

Noah was a fantastic host and the property is just gorgeous. The entire island is out of this world beautiful, but this property's secluded location and private beach make the ocean views that much more special and breathtaking. I booked the home as accommodation for my wedding party guests (my husband and I had a small, beach wedding in the North Shore) and it was perfect. We had everything we needed and the extra beds in each room saved me headache and money - very efficient! Noah was also quite accommodating when I told him our original plan of having the ceremony on the private beach and outside reception in the backyard (which we didn't wind up doing) - he was totally cool with it. Overall, a wonderful Hawaii experience in a lovely beach home where I felt at home and completely relaxed.

We stayed at Noah's house on the beach for 4 nights in July 2016. We had a wonderful experience, and Noah was extremely kind, generous, and always available. We had a few steps break on our walkway to the beach, and Noah took care of it right away.

We had a phenomenal vacation at Noah's place. The home is beautifully kept, and Noah was on site for any questions or concerns. The home was large enough for 9 of us and we never felt cramped or in each other's way. The Polynesian Center is 2 minutes away, and there is so much to do there. Northshore offers a very local Hawaii feeling, and was so much fun to explore! Thank you Noah and family for being gracious and attentive hosts! We would definitely go back our beautiful private beach!

Everything you think about a Hawaii vacation home, this one is it! Noah was excellent at getting the amenities we needed! August, it was hot and humid, but all the fans that were provided kept us cool. At night it was even more cool with the wonderful ocean breeze. We love the that we had a beach right there. My kids played in the sand the whole time! we went swimming when we can, the tide was higher in the afternoon. There was some much room for everyone to spread out and relax! There were local supermarket close by too, so convenient!! Thank you again Noah!
房东很热情,房子环境很好,面临太平洋,有私家小沙滩,孩子们玩的很开心,周边有超市,演绎中心,沿途的风景优美,很愉快的一次体验

호스트인 Mr. Noah는 상당히 친절하고 따뜻한 사람이었습니다. 가족이나 친구들끼리 온전한 쉼을 얻고자 한다면 이 집은 최상입니다. 걸어서 5분거리에 Polynasian Culural Center가 있고 바로 집앞에는 아름다운 태평양이 펼쳐져 있습니다. 또한 15분 북쪽으로 가면 Shrimp Food Truck이 있고 10분거리에 9홀 골프장이 위치해 있습니다. 비록 전동카트가 없어 걸어야 하지만 바닷가를 배경으로 골프를 치는 환상적인 경험을 하실 수 있습니다. 가격또한 한사람당 골프클럽세트까지 $32.50으로 상당히 저렴합니다. 하지만 한인마켓에서 장을 보거나 Costco 또는 쇼핑을 하기 원하신다면 하루 날을 잡아야 할 것입니다. 이유는 그곳들까지 대략 1시간남짓 걸리기 때문입니다. 그래서 며칠간 도시와 떨어져 쉼을 갖기 원하신다면 정말 좋은곳입니다. 현대적인 도시의 삶에서 벗어나 아름다운 노아의 집에서 한번 머물러 보시길 추천합니다.

An excellent location. Plenty of privacy yet close to restaurants & entertainment.  Note:  No AC.  Some minor maintenance issues that surely will be quickly resolved. Plenty of space to accommodate our group of 8.

This vacation was fantastic and it will always be some of the most incredible memories for our family. The property was just as described in Noah's listing.  The ocean access and view was phenomenal. It was everything we could have asked for.  The house was stocked very well with all the necessities.  I would definitely stay here again no matter what I planned to do on Oahu.  It was very easy to get south or north from here. I would definitely recommend this home to everyone.
What a loving location. Can't say enough about the view and location. Noah was so easy to deal with. House was wonderful and just as decribed. would recommend to friends and family.
Everything was perfect for us!

Very nice place for a large family get together. We had three generations. The property is very family friendly although the beach was less sand than the photos (probably due to the fall/winter season). The beach dand house are very private. The four bathrooms with showers were very useful after swims and hikes with so many needing to shower. Hot water is plentiful.

My family and I had such a lovely stay here. The house is spacious and family oriented, and was clean and neat. We woke up to the sound of the ocean every morning and beautiful views. We had all the amenities we needed and Noah was able to answer any additional queries we had throughout the stay. Being winter we missed out on beach access as the tide was in, but it didn't stop us taking advantage of the private water access and sitting out on the steps. There were food trucks and cafes and restaurants nearby, as well as grocery stores within a short driving distance. The rustic feel of Laie is so much more pleasant than the hustle and bustle of Waikiki.

Stayed for 4 nights during the summer.

Positives:
-Great location
-Master bedroom very spacious
-Enough fans and AC to generally keep things a good temperature
-Good communication with host
-Amazing views
-Great mudroom with washer/dryer and outdoor shower.  Perfect for returning from the beach.

Negatives:
-Floors were not clean, feet got super dirty even indoors.
-Lots of flies in the kitchen.  Not sure if we just got unlucky of if this is constant.
-No sand on the beach.  Water access involves some slippery stones.

Lovely home! Awesome ocean front property with great sunrises and moonrises. Plenty of space - large kitchen, large great room, covered lanai, and huge lawn. Nice getaway from the hustle and bustle of town.

House has beautiful view and worked great for our large family with lots of little kids. Safe (gated and off the road) and very quiet. Large, grassed yard for playing. Noah was very responsive and helpful from the get go. Highly recommend this home in a lovely part of Oahu.

This home is ideal for a large family/group.  Lots of space for kids to run around in the yard.  Gorgeous views and everything you need to relax and enjoy the beach.  The home is very spacious and we absolutely loved the covered lanai.  We spent all of our time outdoors .. it was heaven.

Great, roomy beach home on the water.  Beach area behind home has no sandy area, but rocks.  Huge home, lots of space, great family home.  North shore, close to culture center which has a must see Hawaii Lulu and show.  Noah is in the front house for any help needed.  I highly recommend the house, lots of privacy and room....    Thanks Noah.
Great private house. Close to shops and restaurants. Gorgeous ocean views and sunrises every morning. A great, open space for a large family.

The home is a little on the older side. We had a hard time getting hot water to take a shower. There is also very few cable channels. Other than these two issues our stay was great. The house is really big. The parking space and yard are amazing. Great location.
Great views and location!    Spacious home with a responsive host!

This beach house is an absolute gem and some of the photos just don't do it justice. From the moment you walk into the front door, you have stunning views of the ocean. We enjoyed breathtaking sunrises from the master bedroom and outdoor sunbathing pad almost every day. We chose this location for our intimate wedding ceremony and casual dinner for about 45 friends and family. We originally planned both the ceremony and dinner outdoors, but due to the unusually windy weather, we decided to host the dinner in the spacious living room instead, which worked out great. Noah was very responsive and helpful before we arrived in Hawaii, as well as throughout the wedding weekend. Unlike previous reviewers, we had no issues with the hot water, the floors were clean when we arrived, and flies only became an issue when we left the doors open for long periods of time. There wasn't any sand on the beach in early March, but the water was calm and protected - perfect for wading around with water shoes. The house was fully stocked with amenities, and in a fantastic location if you're looking to get away from the hustle and bustle of Waikiki and Honolulu. I would highly recommend staying at Noah's beach house, and hope to find another reason to stay again in the future. Thank you Noah for making our weekend so memorable.

We loved staying at Noah’s place! It was the perfect spot for our multi-family vacation. We had 6 adults, two teenagers and 4 kids ages 4 - 9. The water right in front of the house is the perfect spot for snorkeling and we saw lots of fish and a seal that came right by us a few times! When the tide is out the water is very calm. Around the corner is Pounders beach which has some decent waves for boogie boarding. It is a 5 minute walk to the Polynesian Cultural Center and about an hour from Honolulu. If you want a more slow paced vacation away from crowds then this is the perfect spot. We would absolutely stay here again in a heartbeat. Our whole group loved it.

This is a great house.  We stayed with a group of 8 teenagers and this house was up to the task.  It has four bedrooms and four full baths.  The hot water was able to keep up with three showers going at the same time and the kitchen was plenty big enough for all.  The host was extremely easy to work with and had pre-stocked the house with pots/pans, paper towels, coffee, toilet paper, etc.

The best part about this house was the location, being right on the coast.  There is a nice back patio, and another concrete slab by the water with steps leading down to the beach.  The master bedroom has windows facing the ocean, so you can open the windows and hear the surf all night and wake up to the sunrise.

I would most definitely rent this house again, and certainly from this renter.
Noah was very accommodating and the views are to die for. We had our own personal beach and swimming was perfect during low tide. Couldn't have asked for a better house or host! Highly recommend!
This place is awesome!!! The pictures aren’t even close!! For us locals, this staycation was way way better than stay in the concrete jungle!!!

전체적으로 아주 좋은 숙소입니다. 편안하게 집에서 쉬면서 언제든 바다에 뛰어들수 있는 점이 최대의 장점이죠. 집앞에 바로 아담하고 예쁜 모래 해변이 있고, 각종 물놀이 기구가 있어 더욱 편리합니다. 카약, 각종 보드(서핑, 패들, 부기), 스노클링 등을 자유롭게 즐길수 있습니다. 지금시즌에는 많은 모래도 아주 곱게 펼쳐져 있어요. 
걸어서 폴리네시안문화센터에 갈수 있고, 차로 5분거리에 식료품점(푸드랜드)이 있어 장보기에도 불편함이 없습니다. 오아후섬 북쪽지역(노스쇼, 할레이바 등)을 한가롭게 두루 다니기에도 좋은 거리입니다. 가까운 카후쿠의  새우트럭에서 점심도 좋고요. 오히려 할레이바 새우트럭 보다 더 편안하게 먹을 수 있습니다. 
주방이 아주 잘 갖춰져 있어서 집에서 식사준비해서 먹기 편리합니다. 오히려 주위에 유명한 식당이 있는 게 아니어서 집에서 어느정도는 식사를 해결하는 것이 좋습니다. 
집 주인인 노아도 바로 옆에 거주하고 있어 필요사항 부탁할 경우 바로 해결해 줄 수 있습니다. 별로 그럴일이 없긴 하지만...
바로 바닷가 집이라 어쩔수 없이 전체적으로 습도가 많은 편이어서 집안은 좀 축축하지만, 지내기에는 어렵지 않습니다. 그리고 네개의 방(1층 한개, 2층 세개)중에서 3개의 방에 에어컨이 새로 설치되어 있어서 어느정도 쾌적하게 지낼수 있습니다. 
다시한번 이야기하지만, 모래사장이 있는 바로 바닷가 집이고, 각종 물놀이를 자유롭게 할수 있다는 것이 이 집의 최대 장점이라 하겠습니다. 

We had a great time. Thanks a lot, Noah!

Our week at Noah’s “blue house” was a dream! Our party consisted of 9 adults and 7 kids and our stay was perfectly comfortable. With 4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms we all felt like we had enough personal space and the large kitchen and living area was such an added bonus for so many bodies! The house has an enormous side/backyard with steps that lead to the perfect little private beach. We honestly had a hard time ever wanting to leave the house! The house came equipped with kayaks, canoes, boogie boards, and plenty of toys to keep us entertained! Noah and his family were beyond hospitable. They went out of their way to make sure everything was going smoothly and truly made us feel so welcome! We hope we get to come back soon!!!

There are so many wonderful things we can say about Noah & the Laie house on bathtub beach. The location is perfect for families. The yard, the lanai, the living room & kitchen all have ample space for everyone to spread out. The beach location is amazing and private; the reef & tides making it fun & safe for all ages.  Noah provides everything you could possibly need to make it the perfect Hawaiian vacation.  Four bathrooms & five showers make it the perfect spot for a girls getaway as well. We will certainly be planning additional adventures here in the future- highly recommended!
Great place, excellent location!

name: Suíte em local tranquilo e seguro
summary: Casa próxima à Barra em Jacarepaguá, com piscina, churrasqueira e internet. Facilidade de deslocamento à Barra e Centro da Cidade.
description: Casa próxima à Barra em Jacarepaguá, com piscina, churrasqueira e internet. Facilidade de deslocamento à Barra e Centro da Cidade.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

name: A large sunny bedroom
summary: A large, sunny , affordable and very clean room in a fully renovated 2-bedroom apartment with only 2 mins walk to D train at Bronx.
description: A large, sunny , affordable and very clean room in a fully renovated 2-bedroom apartment with only 2 mins walk to D train at Bronx.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments:
I had a fantastic stay. I didn't meet Ehssan in person, but he did a great job of making sure his roommate took care of everything I needed and he was extremely hospitable. The place was especially clean, and the room was exactly as pictured and described. Note that there was a block party nearby, so there was some level of noise a couple nights, but it ended at reasonable hours.

I would DEFINITELY stay here again and recommend it to others.
Excellent accommodation in staying here. A very clean apartment with a friendly and helpful roommate. The bedroom was large, quiet and air conditioned :)

name: Best location 1BR Apt in HK - Shops & Sights
summary: Welcome to my apartment, 1BR newly renovated and furnished. Located in the heart of Hong Kong's shopping, food and culture center.  1 minute walk to TST MTR station, airport transfer and all major transport.
space: Newly renovated and furnished 1 bedroom apartment.  Conveniently located and very quiet.  All decorations and fittings have been completed. Our Cozy 1 bedroom apartment for 1-4 people is located in the heart of Kowloon (on Nathan Road), and just next to the Tsim Sha Tsui MTR station, 1 min walk from the entrance to the MTR!! The location is incredibly convenient. Air-Conditioner  40" Interactive Smart TV Xiaomi Table with Chairs  Standard Double size Bed & Mattress Queen size sofa bed Cabinets  Refrigerator  Electric Water Kettle  Microwave / Induction cooker  Cutlery Set / Bowl / Mug / Cup  Free Hi Speed internet (WIFI)  24 Hours Hot Water Supply  Body Gel & Shampoo  Clean Bed Sheet / Pillows / Covers  Toilet Paper  Power Adaptor Additional Top quality Intex Queen Size Air Mattress available on request.
description: Welcome to my apartment, 1BR newly renovated and furnished. Located in the heart of Hong Kong's shopping, food and culture center.  1 minute walk to TST MTR station, airport transfer and all major transport. Newly renovated and furnished 1 bedroom apartment.  Conveniently located and very quiet.  All decorations and fittings have been completed. Our Cozy 1 bedroom apartment for 1-4 people is located in the heart of Kowloon (on Nathan Road), and just next to the Tsim Sha Tsui MTR station, 1 min walk from the entrance to the MTR!! The location is incredibly convenient. Air-Conditioner  40" Interactive Smart TV Xiaomi Table with Chairs  Standard Double size Bed & Mattress Queen size sofa bed Cabinets  Refrigerator  Electric Water Kettle  Microwave / Induction cooker  Cutlery Set / Bowl / Mug / Cup  Free Hi Speed internet (WIFI)  24 Hours Hot Water Supply  Body Gel & Shampoo  Clean Bed Sheet / Pillows / Covers  Toilet Paper  Power Adaptor Additional Top quality Intex Queen Size Air Mattres
neighborhood_overview: Tsim Sha Tsui is the city's most exciting area, with top notch museums such as The Science Museum and Art Museum clustered around the waterfront. Nathan Road, Chungking Mansions and the Avenue of Stars, the latter boasting the best views in town. Although the apartment is in a vibrant area, the apartment itself is very quite a night. Its a perfect escape after a long day out and about. There are over 2,500 restaurants in the area which cater to every taste, from traditional Chinese Dim Sum, hawker style stall foods to exceptional French cuisine within 5 star hotels. Supermarkets and 24/7 convenience stores are just down the road, which can provide you all of your daily necessities any time day or night.
transit: Basically right downstairs and within 250metres, you get access to any form of transport you can think of to your sightseeing locations in Hong Kong. - Airport Express - 7 minute Taxi,  - 45 minutes to airport by Bus A21 (HK$33),  - 30 minutes to Disneyland by MTR.  - 10 minutes Admiralty bus to Ocean Park by MTR.  - 10 minutes walk to Harbour City, Tsim Sha Tsui (luxury brand-name stores).  - 6 minutes walk to Avenue of Stars, (overlooking the Hong Kong Island, Victoria).  - 10 minutes to Lan Kwai Fong, Central, by MTR.  - 8 minute MTR to Electronic products (Sai Yeung Choi Street).  - 8 minute MTR to Shoes Street (Fa Yuen Street).  - 8 minute MTR to Langham Place.  - 8 minutes MTR to Prince Edward (Flower Market, Birds Street, Goldfish Market and outdoor markets.)
access: Electronic lock system with passcode, no check in or check out issues.  Full 2.5 & 5hz WIFI internet, microwave.
interaction: Please contact me anytime with any inquiry.
house_rules: Quiet time after 10:30pm Check out by 11, latest by 12 noon. Penalties Apply

host.host_about:
Loves to travel and see the world.  Over recent years, I've travelled to London, Amsterdam, Paris, LA, San Francisco, Taiwan, Shanghai, Beijing, Australia, India, Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, and Korea.  However, there is no place like home.

That is why I want to be a great host and have you enjoy your holiday.  Welcome fellow travellers.

reviews.comments: The unit is as it appears on the description, small and cozy, located in the heart of Kowloon. I find it good for young travellers that want to discover the city (our case). Not recommended for copuples seeking a romantic trip since is quite busy and noisy. Big dissapointed was that Water heater didnt work and had to take a cold water shower. Regarding owner response, it took a while for him/her to answer but afterwards everything was fine.

It was my first Airbnb experience and we like its brand new and great location of this apartment. Jenkin is a fabulous host that has answered all needs in a quick manner. We will definitely stay again at his place in the future (Website hidden by Airbnb)
Really nice!The apartment is new and comfortable.The bed is soft.And there are a lot of restaurants and shopping malls near by.House keeper is so warm because she help us a lot.

Great little place in a very convenient part of Hong Kong.  We are a family of three who have been to Hong Kong a number of times.  Although we usually stay in a hotel on Hong Kong Island, we decided to stay in Jenkin's place due to the price, apparent cleanliness, and in order to better experience life in Kowloon.  We were definitely not disappointed.  The unit is quite small but they make efficient use of the space and the reality is that it was more spacious than any hotel room, aside from the most deluxe suites. Location wise it doesn't get any better.  Just steps from Tsim Sha Tsui (TST), and then everything that TST has to offer readily at hand.  Shopping and eating for all price ranges and tastes.  We won't hesitate to stay there again on future visits to the city.

Hey the apartment is centrally located , 2 mins walk from the TST MTR and the apartment has been beautifully decorated. Also the Host Jenkins and lilo are welcoming and very helpful , they do everything possible to make sure you are comfortable. I would highly recommend this apartment for smaller groups. 

It was a wonderful experience and I really enjoyed my stay. I am sure the hosts will make your stay comfortable and do everything possible to make sure you face no problems.

We had a great time! Hosts were very easy to get in touch with, promptly helped us out with a water issue at the building (that was not their fault), and the space was very clean and comfortable.

It's a small space, definitely best for folks like us who just need a comfortable place to sleep after a day of exploring the city. Thanks for a great experience!

Our stay was wonderful and hassle free.  The apartment is what we expected it to be, warm and homey. The location of the place is convenient as public transportation, convenient stores, local restaurants and malls are nearby.

Suggestion/Feedback 
Toilet - at the shower area, to do a sliding door instead of using curtain  as water will spill to the floor near the toilet bowl area.
No place to hang socks after washing. 
Sofa bed - material catch dust easily. To extend it to become a bed and making sure that it is fixed correctly, must be extra careful as  my son hurt his hand. 
Living room aircon - thought aircon was spoilt as we couldnt on it. We didnt know that the switch, which is hidden in the cupboard, is not switch on until when we met Helen when we are checking out.
Overall, we still can accept and hope that there will be improvement. Thanks to both Jenkin and Helen.

Wonderful location, seconds from MTR and so much to do and eat in the area. The apartment is small but comfortable. Glad there's an elevator too! The check in process was flawless. Easy to communicate with owner and check in person. Will definitely stay here again in the future.
Great location in the heart of TST.  Newly renovated unit perfect for a short trip.  Jenkins is very responsive to messages and accommodating.  Great stay.  Highly recommended.

I didn't personally meet Jenkin/Ricky. However, communication was a breeze. He connect me with Helen and she was nice! Jenkin allowed me to put my luggages first in the apartment which make things easier for me and family before actual check in. He also allowed me to keep those luggages while I kill some times before leaving. Thank you for that! Room was very nice, clean, cozy (looks exactly from the pictures). Amenities are there, TV, kitchen, iron, etc. Wifi is good! Location is perfect! Going to places were easy via MTR. The area around the apartment was always busy but very safe, I must say. Happy with the whole trip to HK. Stay with Jenkin, highly recommended! Thank you for everything, Jenkin and Ricky! And thank you to Helen too!
Fast, easy and good service :)
位置很不错,靠近地铁｡我这次是替妈妈定的apt,联系上有点困难｡这也没办法,不过当时特别挑了会中文的房东,可是妈妈说到了香港后是另外一位女士来给钥匙的....语言上交流比较困难,鸡同鸭讲｡还有被子感觉上没有更换新的....房子是新装修的!
Due to the personal reason, I cancel the booking of the second day. Thanks for the understanding and support.
A kind host greeted and directed us over the phone to make sure we were alright. Highly appreciated! The place was very clean and comfortable.

Location is almost everything in Hong Kong.  Host service is a close second. Jenkin is an accessible and attentive host, and that's something you may need in a complicated city like Hong Kong. This is an efficiently designed very small space which makes it seem larger than it is. The layout is (1) a bed-sized sleeping area with a curtain and sliding door for privacy; (2) a comfortably sized and appointed bathroom with a nicely tiled shower with plenty of hot water and strong water pressure; and (3) a living room with comfortable sofa, reliable wifi, and clothes hanging rack. There is a fridge and microwave and hotplate, with enough cookware for two people. You wash your dishes in the bathroom.  All three rooms are recently remodeled and tiled.  The bed is very comfortable. Both the bedroom and living room have air conditioners.

The little apartment is on the 6th floor of an old and dingy (but clean) Kowloon apartment building one block from the stunning fountains of Kowloon Park and the subway, and a million places right there in your face.  It is a 10 minute exciting walk (as in every single time its exciting) to the picturesque  harbor ferry to Hong Kong Island (or you can take the subway there).  Like many Asian buildings, the elevators are very slow and often crowded with friendly people, but remarkably, each floor has an elevator on either end of the hallway. You walk out of Jenkin's apartment, look left and look right to see which elevator will arrive first, a fun little game for us. 

The very safe neighborhood is extremely trendy, filled with excited locals and tourists, and many places open until late. (My favorite bar and restaurant were open until 3am, both very funky). 

I might stay in one of Jenkin's larger units next time but, you know, I'm not sure since this little place just grows on you after two days.  He is a master host, his cleaning lady is so nice and right nearby, and he takes a lot of pride in making your stay high quality.  He even guided our taxi driver to the front door by cell phone, and he is always, always accessible.  It's remarkable.
我们去玩迪士尼很晚回来害怕要找一段时间,地理交通条件好出地铁口走几步就到了,很容易就能找到｡去维多利亚港看完夜景回来到楼下有便利店茶餐厅吃点东西非常方便,房子感觉卫生,有电视和无线网络整体感觉不错!

The apartment is in a great location for exploring the Tsim Sha Sui area. The MTR station is right outside the building entrance, and the harbor area is just a few blocks away to the south and west. The living space is small but well organized, with a separate bedroom (just big enough for the bed) with its own air-con, and the bathroom is a very usable size. The main drawback to the apartment is that it is on the 6th floor of a 15 floor building and the queues can get long for the elevator. There is one elevator at each end of the long hall on the 6th floor but on the ground level they are completely separated.  A few times I waited on the ground floor in a queue for 15-20 minutes and the elevator fills up before being able to get in, so plan your trips, don't expect to go in and out a lot, and avoid mid-day and evening hours when people are coming home.  Of course this is not an issue the host can resolve, but I think any guests should anticipate.
地理位置很棒 (Hidden by Airbnb) 都比较方便

位置十分方便 近地鐵站 商場 晚上吃東西都方便
房間有點小  浴室更小  有許多雜物堆放在櫃子裡  打掃也不乾淨  沙發上有需多頭髮  垃圾桶只有一個  因為不知去哪倒  對旅行的的人來說 不夠使用   
浴室一沖水 浴簾就會亂飄 常會黏到身上  老實說以房間的價格還是打過折的  不如住飯店  既沒有價格優勢  環境也不太ok

Host was very friendly and accommodating! Place was big enough for 2 adults and 3 kids, and a good location for accessing the city. Close to star ferry, MTR, airport bus stop, and a host of interesting sights around tsim sha tsui. Very happy with my pick.
Location is super convenient, and the apartment is spacious yet cozy :)
房间整洁,空调强劲,交通便利

What you see is what you get. 

The apartment is fantastic. What I loved most about it is the location where you're smack in the middle of Nathan road and very near malls such as Harbor City. Not only that but the place is literally beside the MTR Tsim Sha Tsui Station, so commuting is a breeze. 

You'll never feel alone given how responsive and accommodating Jenkin is. Helen (the housekeeping lady) beats any housekeeping services from hotels. She's easy to talk to and extremely friendly. 

I'm definitely going back.

This flat was in an extremely convenient location.  A few steps to the MTR and the airport bus.  Jenkins provided easy to follow directions, and the self checkin was hassle-free.  The apartment was a small, but clean and well organized.

The place looked exactly like the photo. It was just me and sister but the place is convenient enough for three people. Location was phenomenal, as it was right next the TST station, big malls, and the harbour. Even though we never met, Jenkin was a very helpful host. Reply came in less than 5min! I had a great stay and I def. recommend the place. The dumpling place on the first floor of the building was a nice surprise too, should check it out if you choose to stay here.
jenkin在尖沙咀的这套房子离地铁口很近,去海洋公园和迪士尼都在50~60分钟内,走路30分钟就能到维多利亚港和星光大道,而且边上广东道,北京道啥的,买化妆品买药相当方便｡房间虽然不大但整洁干净,香港这种寸土寸金的地方住着还算是比较舒服的了｡所以总体上值得推荐｡
The host was extremely friendly and gave us good advices on places we should visit. The apartment is well done up and in the heart of Kowloon.
jenkin's apartment is very good!! especially good location!! if you stay in jenkin's apartment, you can go anywhere shortly and fast!!

Jen's apartment is super. Prime location to reach any point of interest and good foods around. Decor just nice, clean and comfortable. 

Highly recommend to anyone who's planning your bnb staying in Hongkong. A 2 thumbs up place, don't miss it!
A bit small but cozy and nice host. Thanks
位置很好,逛街方便,很干净,住得很舒服

Best place to stay in HK. Literally steps away from TST station. Easy access from and to the airport via A21 bus. Lots of food choices nearby. Highly recommend the N1 coffee shop. 

Elevator access isn't a problem as mentioned in early reviews. Didn't have to wait in line at all most of the time. 

Shopping isn't a problem with Harborcity and Oceanterminal districts nearby. 

We felt safe at all times in the neighborhood. Will definitely stay in this place the next time we come back.
非常好的一次民俗体验,地理位置优越,出门走几分钟就海港城,去大型的购物中心,地铁,去坐船都非常的近｡房间整洁干净,装修也很新,就是客厅的空调开动后有点滴水｡为了干净建议下面用桶或盆接一下｡房东态度很亲切｡对于一些找不到的东西｡发信息给他询问,一般不出5分钟都能得到回复｡
The host was available throughout our stay and always made us feel welcome. Location was ideal.
Very close to Victoria Harbor, convenience for us.

Jenkins is a fantastic host and checked in via message during our stay to make sure that everything was working well. The apartment is extremely modern and the two beds are extremely comfortable! The location is so convenient and was perfect distance from my conference and also local shopping centres.
Definitely a great experience and I don't hesitate to recommend.

Une très belle expérience pour une première utilisation de AirBnb.
L'appartement est petit mais très bien décoré, et surtout très bien situé très proche du métro TST (30 mètres).
Jenkin le propriétaire est très gentil et surtout très réactif même en pleine nuit, il vous répond dans la minutes, vous donne les explications qu'il faut, 
Personnellement je vais souvent à Hong Kong, j'y retournerais et avec plaisir.
Azizi Simo

Nice Host
Ultimate Location
Very Clean
All necessary things were available
a bit cosy appartment
距離尖沙咀地鐵站幾分鐘的路程,出行方便,雖然是比較舊的大廈,進去房間發現比較整潔,第一次用airbnb訂房子,是一次不錯的體驗｡
我们一家4人住这个公寓还是比较舒适 ｡

Our stay in Hong Kong was very nice, we were here for business and visas so the location of this place was fantastic. Make sure to try the buns from the eatery below. They are amazing. Would definitely stay here again.
交通极其便利,无论往返机场还是到香港各景点｡房间干净整洁,应该新装修不久,房东沟通畅通,有任何问题都能及时响应｡
地段好､屋子舒适温馨

房子總的來說還是蠻舒適的,就在尖沙咀商圈內,交通方便,靠近尖沙咀地鐵站~而且周圍有吃的,有买东西的地方,离海港城也挺近的~如果希望交通便利的话非常推荐入住^_^
而且James是个超好房东,我当时找不到位置他让他同事带我们去到房子,超棒的~
房子地理位置很好 打扫也很干净 网速很快 如果2个人住非常好 4个人有点拥挤 小贵
As described and in a central location. James was a great host too.
地理位置没话说,楼下尖沙咀地铁口,房间温馨舒适,虽然空间不大但基本够用,总体满意｡
Great location. We had a pleasant stay. Thanks!
Comfortable apartment. Well set up for airbnb and great location. Would stay here again.

The location is very convenient. Downstairs a Michelin guide recommended dumpling shop. Nearby plenty of local eateries and 5 minutes walk to harbour shopping centre and isquare shopping centre which houses mark & spencer. Place is very small( I live in 770msquare block)  but clean and tidy. Highly recommended! Thanks for having us.

James is place looks just like the pictures. It was easy to find with his directions and James let me check in early. He was very helpful and nice. The apartment is nice in the inside and located near a MTR location which is great.  if you stay here make sure to eat at possianos pizza place which is about a five minute walk. Best pizza ever. Lastly, for the price of hotels in Hong Kong I'm sure James could raise the price and still rent this out. Hotels are outrageous in HK. Don't hesitate to book this place.

Good location, spacious, ample bath and bedroom.  Noisy talkers, actually yelling conversations at street level are easily heard...    If you can sleep with the TV on at a moderate volume, then this is the ideal place..
位置不错,周围吃喝玩都很便利

Excellent location!!! Subway exit just downstairs and a few minutes walk to almost everything! Very easy communication with James. He is very responsive and the direction he gave us is clear. Cozy lovely apartment. Although the building is a little bit old, the apartment inside is clean and has everything I need. Definitely recommend to visitors who loves to experience local life in HK.
房子的位置非常好,就在尖沙咀地铁站的出口,离维多利亚港和明星大道10分钟的步行距离｡房东的回应非常快,任何问题,房东5分钟内就能回应,非常满意｡房子比预想中的要小,因此觉得性价比一般｡
干净,装修不错地段好,房东很nice
Perfect location
房子的位置非常棒,就在尖沙嘴地铁站,阿过个马路就是,交通简直太方便了｡周边购物､美食什么都很方便｡不过房间比较小,虽然说可以住4个人,但是仍然建议2个人住,不然会很拥挤｡床太软了,睡的有着不习惯~但总体来说,很棒!
Apartment is a very convenient location close to many attractions, and is in great condition. James is a very responsive host. Would recommend.

The location of Jame's place couldn't be better. Very walkable and is just across the street from MTR station. James is very responsive. Before we arrive, we got detailed msg regarding how to get to the place and etc. 
What I really appreciate about is he allowed us late check out, which gave us extra flexibility in touring Hong Kong. We'll definitely stay at Jame's place again.
Nice place! Convenience and comfortable! Feels like home to me :)
首先感谢房主在新年带来家人送来了新年礼物,让我们感到意外的惊喜,谢谢啦!设施齐全,屋内整洁｡完美的一次住宿
James人超好,给的信息很详细,还给了我们新年礼物,即使半夜才到也感受到了满满的暖意｡地方很好找,交通很便利,房间很干净,麻雀虽小五脏俱全｡下次去香港,我还是会选James的房子!

Apartamento pequeno, mas com banheiro espaçoso. Bem localizado, a poucos passos do metrô e a uma curta caminhada do pier de Tsim Sha Tsui. Elevador às vezes demora a chegar ou vem cheio, o que é comum em Hong Kong. Várias opções de comida ao redor, supermercados, shopping centers, lavanderias etc. Ponto negativo para o colchão pouco confortável e para o barulho de campainha do 7eleven em frente que passa a noite inteira tocando. Anfitrião atencioso. Voltaria a me hospedar.
房子位置交通便利,房内环境舒适,房主待人不错
環境好 交通便利
Very convenient location. Spacious apartment for HK standards and nice, clean living. Great communication as well.
首先民宿位置真的非常优越,所在的大厦跟isquare是连着的,按照房东的指引很容易就能找到了,购物和美食都很方便｡房间很整洁,设备也很齐全,我们一行三人入住,希望没有给房东后续收拾房间带来麻烦｡再次感谢!
Excellent communication, great location for Tsim Sha Tsui next to the MTR and the apartment was as described. Thanks James!

Stayed here for 2 nights. It was a perfect place for us (2 tourists) amid of the busy TST area. It was literally at the corner of the TST station which was convenient to go to ANYwhere, not to mention all those places and attractions you must visit right around the area. The room was very clean and spacious to comfortably fit both of us. I would highly recommend this place to anyone who wish to stay around the TST area.

We had a great time at this apartment. Location wise it was absolutely perfect, so close to Tsim Sha Tsui station, with lots of amenities, restaurants and bars nearby. Walking distance to the Star Ferry.
I wouldn't recommend more than 2 people staying at this apartment, as it is small, but more than suitable for a couple. It had everything you could need.
The lift wasn't working one night when we got back late but received excellent communication from the host immediately with what to do.
Thanks for the stay!
The apartment is great for small families or couples.  It is centrally located and close to everything.  We loved how accessible it is to the metro.  It is only 1 block away!  James is a great host!

James place was perfect, very near at the TST station and near the malls markets restaurants. The place is very clean and with complete home stuffs like microwave, ref, tissues, towels, etc. feels like your at your home. Don't expect that the place is big, but if you're staying for travel only the place is perfect for you, and compare with the HK standard the apartment was big unlike the other hostels in HK which has only 10-11sqm. 4persons can fit the room If we'd visit HK again, i would definitely stay here again. And I would highly recommend this place to my friends. Thank you for the nice service.
침사추이역 출구에서 멀지 않아 정말 편했습니다. 숙소 내부도 깨끗하게 정돈되어 만족스러웠으나 중심가이다보니 저녁 늦게까지 조금 시끄러웠습니다.

Tsim Sa Tsui 역에서 정말 가까움
심포니오브라이트, 명품샵, 훌륭한 음식점들이 걸어갈 수 있는 인접거리에 즐비함

James's room is clean and easy to find. They offered a 40% discount so it was a good deal. Pinkey, one of the hosts,  contacted me before we arrived and after we left. I could have asked for Pinkey's help easily if I needed. I recommend this place!
交通非常的方便 离尖沙咀各个景点都很近

ﾄﾗﾝｼﾞｯﾄで､私と娘3人で利用しました｡
駅至近､六福ｼﾞｭｴﾘｰの上の建物でとても便利な場所です｡詳細な場所が送られてくるので､問題なく辿り着けて､鍵を開けることができました｡
ﾄﾗﾝｼﾞｯﾄであまり時間がなかったけど､夜景だけは子どもたちに見せたいと思って､ﾈｲｻﾞﾝﾛｰﾄﾞ沿いにﾌﾟﾛﾑﾅｰﾄﾞまで歩いていきました｡香港らしい雰囲気が味わえていい滞在となりました｡部屋も綺麗でWi-Fiも使えてとても良かったです｡
建物裏手のﾏｶｵﾚｽﾄﾗﾝのｴｯｸﾞﾀﾙﾄがとても美味しかったです｡
地理位置超吃好 距離海港城10分鐘左右 超級好找 提供的位置也非常準確 房間各種用品都有 不用擔心轉換插頭 有一個超大的轉換充電板~超貼心 有窗耶 大家都很滿意
房间的地理位置非常不错,到了香港后房东给了非常明确的指示,所以没费什么力就到了,机场坐大巴过去也很方便｡房间离地铁站,公交站都很近,周围吃饭,购物去处一应俱全,房东也给了饮食,购物方面非常实用的建议,并且帮助我解决了很多难题｡再次感谢房东,I love HK｡
房间非常干净整洁｡因为地段的原因去购物或乘交通都很方便｡最让我满意的就是楼下有特别多很棒的餐厅!
The apt is located in the center of everything, 10 steps the the subway station.  The room is a bit small but this is Hong Kong.  The host was super nice and responsive.  He let me
交通方便
Perfect location. At the center of the shopping / restaurant area. Nice apartment.
Location was perfect. Great price would definitely recommend

James place was amazing. Phoebe was an amazing host who let me have an early check-in and was very responsive when I had problems with check-in. The place was very clean and very cozy. The best part of it is that it's just a minute away from the station and has easy check-in. Would visit again
特别开心的一次旅行,和妹妹,和女儿｡到达后发现房间位置真的是得天独厚,饭店､海港城､重庆大厦触手可及｡期待下一次再来｡
房间很够用,很好｡很方便
地方确实很方便,房间干干净净的很可爱,到尖沙咀这里会是一个不错的选择
Perfect location!

The location is great. It's just a few minutes walk to Harbor city,very convenient for shopping and meal.
But the air-conditioner at bedroom was noisy.

nice location and clean. close to MTR. but a little bit tiny for 4 persons. Much cheaper than comparable hotel.

地理位置好,靠近地铁站｡
Problemas con el aire acondicionado que causó molestias importantes por el tiempo que llevó repararlo

침사추이 역과 아주 가까운 위치여서 이동하기 편리하였다. 
사진보다는 조금 좁지만, 2명이 지내기에 충분하고, 깨끗하다.
건물내부(복도, 엘리베이터 등)이 허름해서 여성분들은 조금 무서워 할 수도 있다
호스트가 친절하고 요청사항에 대한 조치가 빨랐다.
수건이 두개 있어서 빨아쓰거나 개인 수건을 가져가야 한다
clean and nice. i recommend.햰국쁀들보쇼.비밀번호잟못갈를쳐줘서삼십분기다리게햏고,결제했는데확인안해주고보증금요구햇어요여행존나망침~~~!!절대가지마쇼~! i love this place ^^!!
房子很温馨,很干净,用具都很齐全,空间虽然不大,但是比较安静,安全,交通特别方便,楼下旁边就是尖沙咀地铁站,到哪都方便,吃的楼下旁边都有,靠近海港城,维多利亚港,希望下次再来

Great location and price, meaning you can spend more of your time (and money) around Hong Kong.

Great communication, easy to check in and handy advice for the area too.
A little expensive given the apartment is in a very old building. Ongoing building renovation work creates noise in the morning. Good location in TST.

Excellent accommodation in a great location very good hosts very prompt and helpful 
Will definitely use them many more times as we travel frequently to Hong Kong 
Clean and well equipped accommodation easy access and lots of good eating places nearby 
Most of all hosts are very quick to respond and very cheerful and helpful
交通便利 适合购物
Vraiment bien, un très bon emplacement pour se promener dans hongkong. Et assez calme. Je recommande
Apartment is located in a very convenient part of TST. It would be considered quite big for Hong Kong standards. A cozy place to relax and chill.
The apartment was in the perfect location, plenty of amenities, very clean! Would definitely stay again. Thanks James!
地理位置很好,楼下往左边走五十米不到就是尖沙咀地铁站,出行购物都很方便｡

James’s place is awesome. Location is superb. You couldn’t find such a great location in the middle of TST at this price. Lots of great restaurants around and even great with local Michelin guide shop at your door step. Room was comfortable and perfect for 2-3. We stayed 4 people and 1 child, so it was little crowded for us. We did not spend lots of time in room anyway, so it was perfectly fine. James was very great host. He responded promptly and visited to take care to make sure we had enough beds. He also allowed us to leave luggages after check out. Love the place!

Phoebe was very helpful and quick to respond. She was kind enough to let us Check in early and leave our bags there on the last day before we flew. The location is perfect for central HK right next to everything you need and within walking distance from shops restaurants the water front etc.

Pros are Phoebe was pleasant to communicate with, location is great if you want to be central to the tourist spots in TST, transit from this location was very easy, and apartment was clean. 

Cons are that the apartment is a bit tired and battered, there’s construction on the building so it’s noisy, and the building’s hallways and common areas are not clean (I expect this is partially to do with the construction). Okay for a short stay, but I would opt to be somewhere quieter for a longer stay.
离市中心超级近,环境卫生,居住体验超级好!

The location is very good as it is near by to transportation, many shops and restaurants. Lovely Kowloon Park is very close by as well. The building is older, but it does have an elevator. 
The apartment is really just a room that is divided into a tiny sleeping area with a sliding glass panel and curtain. There is no kitchen just a fridge, hot water kettle and some dishes, cups, etc. There is no place to even wash cups or dishes other than the bathroom. The apartment is nicely renovated and decorated and the bed and couch are comfortable. The shower pressure is good. It is in a busy shopping and restaurant area but it was quiet enough at night for us to sleep with earplugs. 
We had a problem at check in. We needed an early check in and I asked for this before booking. Phoebe, the co-host assured me several times that we could arrive early and I reconfirmed the time after I booked it. Unfortunately, Phoebe did not tell her assistant and we arrived to find ourselves locked out. We messaged James and the only response we got was to contact Phoebe. Phoebe couldn’t be reached- later when we spoke she explained that she had lost her phone for a period of time. She was very apologetic and brought us a bottle of wine. No corkscrew in the apartment but still nice of her. The next day we were able to store our luggage for a couple of hours without a problem. 

This place is nice but understand that it is basically a hotel room. I don’t know the prices of hotels in that area but I suspect they’re much higher. It’s a clean, comfortable room in a great location.
Good location  very convenient
很棒的房间,虽然有点小,不过在市中心这个价格性价比很高了!而且房东响应很迅速!有设备不会用,五分钟内就到了,也很热情!
挺方便的,就是过年期间去确实人多什么都贵

This appartement is very well located next the MTR station and Nathan Road commercial avenue. It is small, enough for 3 adults but not much.
The price is correct for the place.
It is very clean and functional.

It was a tiny but functional place to stay. Good for 2-3 adults or small families with 1-2 toddlers like us. Love, love, love the location!!! MTR station, shoppings, restaurants, bus to and from airport are all few steps from the building. The neighbors were kind and friendly too.

Great location, good house-keeping. Easy to get around, with bus stop and subway station right next to the entrance of the building. The only pain would be the size of the condo—it’s ideal for two. But we came with two little kids, so it turned out to be quite an embarrassment for us... The landlord has been very responsive. We have to give him credit for that. 
Airbnb customer service was overwhelmingly great! They were very responsible and responsive, and they were quick to take care of our requests and inquiries. Overall speaking, this property is an ideal place for singles or young couples WITHOUT having children with them...

I had a fantastic time in Hongkong.
The place is very clean and look new.
The host really helped me find the apartment. 

Recommend!!

Given that the apartment is in a '60s-era building, the apartment itself has a surprisingly contemporary, modern feel.  All amenities and features work well--air con, wifi, water, security, ventilation.  It's compact, but big enough for one or two people: comfy bed with black-out curtains in the bedroom,  sofa in the living room, bathroom big enough for two. It's clean and feels homey.  The location is unbeatable, steps from MTR exit, park, mosque, shops, all that TST and HK have to offer.  There's an excellent fried-bao shop on the ground floor!  Finally, the check-in/out was super-easy, and communication with the manager was always rapid and obliging.  Highly recommended.

Tolle zentrale Lage. MTR direkt vor der Tür. Restaurants, Geschäfte, 7/11 auch direkt vor der Tür. Zimmer waren so, wie auf Bildern zu sehen. Gastgeber schnell erreichbar. Für 2 Personen in Ordnung. Auch vom Flughafen gut mit öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln erreichbar. Wir würden wiederkommen.
房东热情,我们提前到民宿,前面客人还没退房,房东帮忙保管行李而且晚上我们回去行李房东已经帮忙放到房间里了｡
干净的房间,非常黄金的地段｡
很棒的一次入住体验
A comfortable spot in a central location that is convenient for so many things.
位置绝佳,绝佳,绝佳｡房间不大但很可爱,住了几天不自觉把它称作“家”了｡房东人特别好,我们购物的时候遇到一点问题无法及时取回退换的东西,房东还帮忙去商场取回,赶在我们走前送了过来,一万个感谢!

Been a long time since I have travelled to Hong Kong. By far one of the best deals for staying near Central Hong Kong. The host was super responsive to any questions I had and most importantly all the directions were easy to follow with regards to locating the apartment and checking in. Would stay here next time I am in Honk Kong .
This apartment is comfortable once inside, although it could use a bit more cleaning and a coat of paint.

Fantastic apartment in the heart of TST. Easy access to MTR, restaurants and shops, and fantastic communication from the hosts.

Would happily recommend and would happily stay again.
挺好的!位置也好!
The flat is a little small but reasonable according to the price. The location is really good which is right beside the MRT station and walking distance to the Harbour City.

Tsim Sha Tsui was superb in every way.

The Airbnb is located in the heart of an area booming with rich culture. Steps away is the train station and bus stop. Access to and from the airport is smooth sailing all the way. 
The Airbnb is at the doorstep of an array of different cuisines. What to eat will seem like the difficult choice because of the variety. 

The apartment itself is on a sixth floor with an elevator. Clean and cozy. Once I stepped in I felt right at home. A comfortable space for 2 people. 

Hong Kong itself marveled. There’s so much to do and see even if it’s not your first time. Having James’ home away from home location allowed for maximum enjoyment. 

Will stay here again on my next visit. 

Thank you!
房子位置很好,出门就是地铁站,很方便｡晚上周围会有点吵,我们住的时候正好也在装修,隔音效果不太好｡房间不大但是我们三个人够住了,算是在香港很好的一次体验了｡房主回复很快,也很热情~
房东很好,中间有一些波折,但是房东解决的很不错｡新房间很好,在香港这种地方,能有这么大房很不错了｡房东是香港人里少有的比较善良的人｡说点题外话:香港人势利眼太严重了｡今天正好下大雨,我们在去海港城的路上突降大雨,我带着孩子去躲雨,没有任何干扰店家的行为,竟然被人赶出来｡当然这个和房东无关,房子和房东真的都很不错,赞一个｡来香港的不二选择｡
地理位置很好,临近弥敦道,楼下就是机场大巴车站｡香港真的是寸土寸金的地方,房间看起来不大,但基本生活用品都很全｡第一天晚上盖的被子有点热,第二天房东就让人送来了薄被子｡唯一有点不足就是房间里的空调声音太大,门锁有点难开,不过掌握窍门了就能快速打开了｡房间到处都有如何使用家用电器的指示,最后一天要寄存行李,房东很贴心耐心的和我沟通~

same as in pics, clean, very easy self check in.
all went smooth, no bad surprises.
五星推荐非常好,有任何问题都及时得到回复!赞
地址位置很好｡就是退房时联系房东需要寄存一会儿行李再没回应很失望,拖着行李下楼吃饭买东西..挺干净的
在这种黄金地段有这么温馨的房间很满意｡房子大小也很满意!性价比很高!
记得开门看门上的小提示,要用力抵住下面的门再开门,不然就跟我一样要拧断钥匙了｡
Location is great! Super close to the tsim sha tsui station! It's located in a noisy neighborhood with a lot of restaurants and people passing by.
地理位置很好,物品一应俱全,灯光再亮些就更好啦
Excellent location. Plethora of restaurants and bars. Clean and comfy place. Water was inconsistent . Otherwise would be perfect
地址位置绝佳,交通便利｡周边美食､药妆､金店非常多,距离大型购物中心也非常近,我们去海港城都是步行来回｡房间面积不大但胜在温馨整洁设施齐全,除了房费小贵肉疼别的都很赞啦
The location is awesome - Close to public transportation, shopping and food.
房东很Nice!讯息基本上是秒回的,房间很大,床位刚刚好,而且床超软睡的很舒服!下次有机会还会再来的
房子装修很温馨,整洁,下楼就有自主洗衣,周边国际购物中心,DFS免税店,购物天堂｡

name: Room For Erasmus
summary: Hello, flat is located at Göztepe, 10 mins away from Kadikoy. Rent is 800 Turkish Liras and it includes all the bills, and plus, the cleaning is carried by cleaning lady once a month. Please feel free to contact for more information :)
description: Hello, flat is located at Göztepe, 10 mins away from Kadikoy. Rent is 800 Turkish Liras and it includes all the bills, and plus, the cleaning is carried by cleaning lady once a month. Please feel free to contact for more information :)

name: BBC OPORTO 4X2
space: The apartment is well situated near the historic Praça do Marques, A few minutes, close to major attractions including the protected area by UNESCO. There is a great facility of public transportation; the Metro station of Marquês is just 2 minutes walking from the apartment. The apartment is furnished with modern style of contemporary and practical, flowing into a pleasant and comfortable space. The Kitchen is fully equipped. Just around the corner you have Supermarket, Take Away, Restaurant, Coffee, Store Magazine, Gym and Swimming Pool, Pharmacy. Private parking is available in the building on request with charging. Connected at airport by direct subway. Also provided: 4 BEDROOMS New individual bed bases and mattress ensures you a restful night sleep Linen / Bed Sheets 100% cotton Baby Crib LIVING Lounge Dinner Table Cable TV with all international channels Really Fast ADSL WI-FI Internet 2 BATHROOM Bath Tub Shower Soap and Shampoo Towels 100% cotton Hair Dryer KITCHEN Plates Cutlery

host.host_about: Natural de Lisboa. Trabalho no desenvolvimento de projectos culturais.

reviews.comments:
The apartment really is spacious - we were 8 people and not only had our own private rooms (4 bedrooms, it is), but also 2 bathrooms and a very big dining/lounging area. 
The downtown/oldtown is in a walking distance with great views on the way. We never used public transport, apart from getting there and leaving Porto. 
There was some noise in the mornings as an adjacent apartment was undergoing renovation, but I guess that's permanent.
Other than that this place is good value for money.

We stayed in cristina's apartment for 5 nights And we were 7 Architecture students travelling to Oporto for a project. We had a great Time in the flat which was perfect, big, with everything necessary to clean And make food. The flat was close to city centre and to marques metro station. In the are there were shops and bars to have breakfast and buy food. We have been welcomed by cristina's friend Silvia which was very kind and patient Even if We called her few Times because We couln't find the apartment! Thank You very much

Hemos estado  cuatro adultos con tres niños. El apartamento es como se dice en la descripción. Es amplio y los dos cuartos de baño facilitan la estancia. El contacto ha sido siempre por correo electrónico o mensajes, pero no hemos tenido ningún problema. La realación calidad precio es muy buena. Buenas comunicaciones con el centro tanto en metro , autobús o andando. El barrio no es especialmente bonito a la vista, pero es muy práctico y tiene muchos locales para las compras. hemos estado contentos y lo recomendamos si se busca un alojamiento económico y amplio para conocer Oporto.

Super séjour à Porto, nous étions une famille de 9 personnes avec enfants et bébé! l'appartement est spacieux et très bien situé dans porto. Nous avons été très bien accueilli par silvia. Nous sommes ravie des ces moments passés à porto et nous y retournerons. Merci Cristina

Gospodarz bardzo miły, niestety trochę spóźniony na spotkanie. Odpowiadał  szybko na każde pytanie zadane przed wyjazdem. Po zgłoszeniu zepsutego czajnika, na drugi dzień dostarczył nam nowy. Podobnie z apteczką, która poprzedni goście zabrali z mieszkania.Zdjęcia  w zasadzie odpowiadały rzeczywistości ,aczkolwiek sprawiały ze przestrzeń mieszkania wydawała się na nich większa.
Nos recibió Lidia muy amable, piso muy cerca de la estación de metro Marqués, apartamento limpio y con todo lo necesario .

Cristina's partner Silvia was very helpful and sent us a lot of information about the flat, the neighborhood and the metro system which made our arrival very smooth. She was also very responsive to any questions and let us check-in early.  The flat was great, spacious with plenty of room for all five of us, and we really enjoyed being able to hang out in the living room with a glass of port on our last night! Also, being just around the corner from a metro stop, it made getting into the city center very quick. The only downside was that even with the small space heaters in each room, the flat did get very cold. Nevertheless, I would definitely recommend staying at Cristina's flat!
The host canceled this reservation 31 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Tudo óptimo! Parabéns!

Grazie ad un amico ho scoperto l'app di Airbnb.
Con la mia famiglia (due adulti e due bambini) e due amici dovevamo andare in vacanza a Porto, in Portogallo. Così ho cominciato a cercare tra gli host un appartamento nella città di Porto che avesse le caratteristiche necessarie per questo viaggio vacanza per ospitare le 6 persone comodamente. 
Ovviamente cercavo anche qualcosa di economico.
Alla fine ho contattato Cristina in quanto la sua offerta era molto vantaggiosa sia economicamente sia per la capacità di spazio di cui avevo bisogno. 
L'appartamento si trova molto poco distante  dal centro della città solo due fermate da Trinidate (centro nevralgico di tutte le metropolitane di Porto e per andare sia verso l'aeroporto che verso le stazioni ferroviarie), ma a pochi passi dalla fermata della metropolitana di Marques. 
L'appartamento si trova al quarto piano di un palazzo servito con ascensore.
Con l'host ci siamo dati appuntamento alle 13.30 presso l'appartamento. 
Quindi mi ha fatto vedere l'appartamento e mi ha spiegato come funzionavano le cose della casa, il collegamento al wi fi e dove riporre le chiavi quando avrei dovuto lasciare l'abitazione, e se avevo bisogno di ulteriori informazioni. 
Quindi ci siamo salutati. 
L'appartamento corrispondeva a ciò che avevo visto su Airbnb. Pulito, ordinato e tutto funzionante. Ci siamo trovati molto bene, come a casa.
Lo consiglio a chiunque.
Très bon accueil de Silvia qui a de plus répondu rapidement à nos demandes. Mais appartement un peu trop cher pour l'emplacement et les services proposés
La estancia en la casa fué cómoda a excepcion del ruido provocado por la bomba de agua y el tráfico de la calle. ·El barrio en general bien, con todos los servicios comerciales en la proximidad.

Appartement spacieux, bien équipé, bien situé, accessible, mais très bruyant par la circulation côté rue (2 chambres de ce côté). Très bonne literie. 
Four inutilisable car trop sale et quelques éléments de vaisselle à nettoyer avant usage.
Nous recommandons malgré tout.
Le logement était fidèle à la description et nous avons passé 3 jours très agréables à Porto. Nous recommandons ce logement !

Logement en tous points conforme à la description.
Accessibilité et description parfaites
Adapté a 8 personnes avec 2 SDB et 2 WC. Proche du centre à pieds ou sinon métro proche. il y a quelques commerces ou restaurants proches. bel appartement et bon séjour.

Nous étions 8, appartement confortable et non loin du métro. Nous le recommandons fortement.

Nicolas
Por arbnb

Apartment is clean and spacious. Kitchen is big, well equipped. Water pump is noisy but it's not so annoying. The owner provides electric heaters, if it's required. Partner of the owner, Anabela is lovely person, very helpful. She gave us 3 sets of keys and bottle of porto :)
There is metro station near the flat and cheap supermarket.
Very nice place to stay, truly recommend.
Reserve el apartamento para mis padres y sus amigos y han venido muy contentos. El apartamento muy comodo y centrico. Muy buena comunicacion con los dueños. Repetiran.
Appartement bien situé tout prêt d'une station métro ou à 20 min du centre à pied. Il est un peu bruyant (chambre côté rue et pompe à eau) mais est très spacieux et tout confort.

The apartment is beautiful and clean, the hostess is nice, but they installed some new equipment there to make the water flow better and did not do it properly so that every flush or drop of water was crazy noise all over the apartment!

I stayed in the apartment with a group of students from Edinburgh. It was clean, spacious and very comfortable. The location was a short walk from the metro and an easy taxi journey to the centre of town, so very well connected. The apartment had everything we needed for cooking, cleaning and relaxing and has restaurants, shops and so on near by. Porto is a beautiful city, with so much to do and Christina's apartment is a fantastic place to stay to experience it.

We had a lovely stay in Cristina's apartment, everything needed was there, the supermarket and the metro not far away, but most of the time we walked to the city center and the water front (about half an hour) 
Really nice flat, just the right thing for 8 people!

Siamo stati nell'appartamento in 8, due famiglie con bambini da 8 a 11 anni.
Anabela, collaboratrice dell'Host, è stata gentilissima e premurosa informandosi periodicamente sull'andamento del soggiorno.
L'appartamento è ampio e spazioso situato in un condominio tranquillo e pulito.
E' risultato decisamente confortevole e silenzioso come da descrizione.
L'unico piccolo difetto è la rumorosità notturna della pompa dell'acqua, situata in una veranda a ridosso di una camera da letto, nel caso di utilizzo notturno dei bagni.

El apartamento es mas grande de lo que parece en las fotografías. La situación es genial, con una parada de metro al lado. Toda la casa estaba muy limpia y con el equipamiento necesario. La anfitriona ha sido muy amable en la llegada, facilitándonos una estancia maravillosa en Oporto. ¡Muy recomendable!
Great flat, wonderful host. Thanks.

Superbe logement, un peu vieillot certes.
Mais très SPACIEUX et correct.  bonne literie
Chambres du coté de la route un peu bruyantes.
mais très content de l'appartement.
Encore merci à Annabella pour son accueil, ainsi que ses conseils et ses bons plans. Surtout celui du parking juste à coté de l'appartement. (pas trop cher)
Centre ville à 20 mn à pied ou 5 mn en métro qui se trouve à 200 mètres de l'appartement. A coté de l'appartement vers le métro des petits restaurants pas trop chers.

Nous avons apprécié les grandes chambres, les deux salles de bains, idéale pour 2 familles. Une grande salle à manger. Vous êtes accueillis par Anabela qui est super gentille. Et en plus elle parle très bien le français. Supermarché, boulangerie, métro très très proche. Et à 30 minutes du centre ville. Nous recommandons cette appartement. Mickael

Casa spaziosa (molto spaziosa) dotata di tutto il necessario. Host preciso e puntuale, ha risposto a tutti i nostri messaggi in tempi brevi. Casa come da descrizione, posizione non centrale ma molto comoda per prendere la metro, in 15 minuti si è in centro. Per chi è con la macchina la zona è vicina all'imbocco dell'autostrada ed è comodo per visitare i dintorni, il parcheggio è a pagamento, ma Cristina ci ha indicato una via dove poter parcheggiare gratuitamente a meno di un minuto da casa. Soggiorno piacevole, vi consigliamo di soggiornare da lei.

Bruits côté rue. Un volet ne fermant pas correctement. Pas de climatisation donc très chaud dans l'appartement. Excellent accueil par une amie. Le manque du Wifi à notre arrivée nous a beaucoup déçu. La remise en service est arrivée 3 jours après. Appartement très bien équipé en accessoires. Merci à Anabel pour son dévouement.
Hote très sympa souriante et parlant français.Appartement très bien situé près du métro parking sous l immeuble (payant). Séjour à Porto très agréable

Super appartement, pas loin du métro Marqués, de supermarché... 
Anabela est adorable, elle nous a donné pleins d'infos et a envoyé un message pour prendre de nos nouvelles. Je recommande !

Logement un peu ancien mais très fonctionnel.
Dommage que les volets n'aient pu être réparés avant notre arrivée mais ceci n'a pas gâché notre séjour.
Très bonne situation géographique : à deux pas de l'arrêt de métro MARQUES.
Et un grand merci pour l'accueil et le dévouement d'Anabela.
Nous recommandons cet appartement pour un séjour à PORTO en famille ou entre amis.

Fantastic Porto apartment.  So groovy in its 60's mod building - such cool mid-century flourishes.  Perfect for 6, but large enough for 8.  Really huge for an in-city apartment.  Great kitchen, comfortable living room, and just a really cozy and nice apartment to come home to each day after exploring.  Two bathrooms - a rarity in Europe - and a lift in the building for hauling your bags up the stairs.  A little bit out of the tourist center, which in our view provided a more authentic experience.  Great place!

Christinin smještaj je odličan izbor za posjet Portu za veći broj ljudi. Stan se nalazi na četvrtom katu stambene zgrade u kvartu bez mnogo buke. Prostran je te sasvim dovoljan za 8 ljudi. Nismo upoznali Christinu no njena kolegica Anabela bila nam je uvijek dostupna te nam je dala sve potrebne informacije o stanu kao i savjete za boravak u Portu. Svakako preporucam ovaj smještaj.
Departamento muy grande. Cerca metro. Limpio. Cocina muy equipada. Recomiendo

Ce logement est très spacieux et surtout très bien situé pour visiter Porto en transport en commun. Nous avons eu un super accueil, en français! Merci pour votre hospitalité portugaise légendaire! Nous recommandons ce logement.

Pobyt bardzo udany, w mieszkaniu wszystko to, czego człowiek potrzebuje. Czyściutko. W okolicy wszystko co jest niezbędne. Osoba opiekująca się mieszkaniem bardzo sympatyczna, udzieliła nam sporo wskazówek:)

Perfect place for large groups! Big and clean common areas and cozy rooms, showers are a bit old but they serve its purpose. Anabela was a great host, replied in no time to all our questions and gave us a bunch of really helpful local tips. Also both; the huge flexibility in terms of check-in/out and the extra sets of keys considering we were a big group deserve special mention.
O local é bem próximo ao metrô. Ótimo custo beneficio. A anfitriã com muito carinho nos agraciou com doces na Noite de Natal
We enjoy the stay and the owner was very kind and available. The quality-price level is great and I suggest the apartment.
O apt atende as expectativas com boa localização ( proximo a metrô). Vários restaurantes ao redor com destaque o PREGOS E MARTELOS.
Perfect place!
j

Top.
4 chambres spacieuses dans un appartement bien situé : a 150m du métro et de tous commerces.
Point de départ idéal pour visiter Porto et se reposer.

El ruido de la calle se escucha en exceso 
Los armarios no cierran bien
La bomba del agua hace mucho ruido
Los cuartos de baño son mejorables 
Es amplio y está bien comunicado
Las camas son cómodas

Lo primero felicitar a la anfitriona, agradable, simpática, puntual y atenta para todo lo que necesitamos, es absolutamente inmejorable el trato que nos ha dado. 

La casa grande, limpia y agradable. Volvería a repetir sin duda.

No lo dudes si vas a reservar, un saludo.


First of all to congratulate the hostess, pleasant, friendly, punctual and attentive to everything we need, the treatment that she has given us is absolutely unbeatable.

The big house, clean and nice. I would definitely repeat it again.

Do not hesitate if you book, greetings.


Antes de mais nada, para parabenizar a anfitriã, agradável, amigável, pontual e atenta a tudo o que precisamos, o tratamento que ela nos deu é absolutamente imbatível.

A casa grande, limpa e agradável. Eu definitivamente repetiria novamente.

Não hesite se você reservar, saudações.
Cristina’s place has a very good location, easy access to the metro and local shops in the area. The host was easy to contact and there were no problems with communication.

Ce fût un merveilleux séjour chez Christina. Toute la famille a pu facilement découvrir Porto et se retrouver le soir en famille. C'est un logement surprenant par son emplacement et la grandeur du logement.
appartement très bien situé; Parfait pour une visite de PORTO

This place was very well located and we enjoyed our stay, especially because we were a large family of seven and we never felt like we were too many in the same house. We all had our space. 
Anabela was helpful and welcoming and was always ready to answer our questions. 
The place is next to the metro station, which is a very good plus in Porto!

Grand appartement spacieux. Situé en plein centre ville proche de toutes commodités.
Une recommandation, il n'y a pas de parking propre à l'appartement mais à proximité il y a des garages payant moyennant 28 à 35€ les 24h ou alors, les parkings payant horodateur de 9h à 19h30 ou encore comme nous avons fait, il y a à proximité une ruelle ou le parking est gratuit. Inutile de prendre la voiture pour visiter Porto, les bus et métro sont vraiment à proximité

Cristina a été très arrangeante malgré une arrivée retardée plusieurs fois. Elle a été très réactive pour nous faciliter le séjour en répondant à nos questions et en trouvant des solutions. L'appartement est très confortable et pratique. Sa localisation permet de rejoindre le centre historique très rapidement. Le marchand de fruits en face de l'immeuble est très bon rapport qualité-prix.
Je recommande fortement!

We hebben 3 nachten gelogeerd in dit appartement en het was gewoon perfect. We waren met 7 personen en we hadden meer dan voldoende plaats. Het ligt iets verder weg van het centrum maar door het metrostation vlakbij toch heel gemakkelijk bereikbaar. De kamers waren heel erg schoon, net als de badkamers, en ook de keuken was voldoende voorzien. En vooral Anabela, de dame die je ontvangt, is gewoonweg fantastisch. Ze heeft ons van heel veel leuke tips voorzien, ook dingen om te doen met onze kinderen, en ze was altijd bereikbaar voor vragen ed. Dit appartement is zeker een aanrader!

what a lovely, sympathetic and friendly woman. Very good and uncomplicated communication. The location is tiptop. The small bathroom with the shower is not so nice (floor of the shower) but it still has one. Otherwise everything super:)
Piso espacioso, con buenas camas para el descanso, y buena ubicación.  Para combatir el calor, sería recomendable algún ventilador.
Para unos días correcto

Una estancia muy cómoda. La casa muy amplia, nos gustó mucho vuestra ciudad.
Todo bien conectado en metro desde Marqués. Oporto es muy bonito. Muchas gracias
Very convenient location, 3 minutes to metro station and 30 minutes to Douro riverside. Easily fits 8 people in comfort.

Abbiamo utilizzato l'appartamento in due famiglie con due figli per ciascuna famiglia. Le quattro camere e i due bagni sono risultati quindi ottimali per le nostre esigenze. L'appartamento risulta inoltre molto spazioso è dotato dei confort necessari. Posizione ottima per l'accesso con le auto e molto vicina alla fermata della metro. Il centro è solo a 2-3 fermate. L'host molto disponibile e gentile ed ha risposto prontamente ad ogni nostra richiesta. L'appartamento è inoltre provvisto di brochure utili per visitare e vivere la città. 
Da segnalare solo come nota negativa, la presenza di un autoclave nella terrazza in adiacenza ad una camera, eccessivamente rumorosa.
A very nice appartement with enough space for eight person and a metrostation and busstops nearby. Good place to stay to explore Oporto.

We had a great stay in this wide appartement, conveniently place near the subway.

The owner has been very welcoming and available for any kind of advise !

Appartement conforme à la présentation. Au 4éme et dernier étage avec ascenseur, interphone. Les lits sont bons, le lit pour bébé est bon également, il manque une chaise haute pour bébé. Très bon accueil d' Anabela qui nous attendait et qui a répondu à nos questions en français. Vraiment proche du métro: il suffit de remonter la rue sur la gauche et en moins de 5mn vous êtes à la station Marquès, qui donne un accès direct au centre ville et aux quais de Vilanova. WiFi performant et réseau 4G. Commerces également à proximité. Nous avons apprécié ce grand appartement, nous étions 7 adultes et un enfant de 14 mois.
En enkel lägenhet med bra läge i Porto.  Lätt att ta sig mellan Portos olika delar med Metro eller till fots. Bra mottagande vid ankomst!

Appartamento molto spazioso e pulito, particolarmente vicino alla metro e abbastanza vicino al centro ed ad una ottima trattoria tipica.
Anabella è stata sempre disponibile, dal check-in al check-out, ci ha consigliato l'itinerario ed i posti caratteristici della città.
Appartamento ideale per famiglie.

Boa noite Cristina,
Fomos muito bem recebidas pela Maria, o apartamento é como foi descrito, tudo organizado e limpo, ficamos em 6 pessoas, mas teria capacidade para até 8 pessoas, muito bem localizado, muito próximo de metro e confeitarias, com certeza eu e minhas amigas voltaríamos, muito obrigada Cristina, Maria e Anabela 

Rita Soares
Grand appartement agréable mais relativement bruyant

name: Apartamento Mobiliado - Lgo do Machado
summary: Apartamento todo mobiliado, novo e muito bem localizado a apenas uma quadra do metrô do Largo do Machado. Possui 1 quarto com cama de casal, armários e TV de 42" HD. A sala possui um sofá-cama de casal e TV de 47" com home theater. Cozinha equipada.

name: luxury apartment in istanbul taxsim
