host.host_about:
Hi there,

i'm Osman From istanbul.

i have been living in this historical and beautiful city for 7 years

I really believe that you will enjoy istanbul and Turkey 
So, if you are ready to come and explore it yourself, please feel free to contact me about one of my apt's for a great stay in an amazing city! 
Hope to see you soon,

Feel free to reach out to me anytime!

Osman

reviews.comments: Osman's apartment was comfortable and nicely situated. The apartment is rather equipped like a hotel suit but Osman is very helpful and he will surely try to accommodate if you have additional requests (he bought a new iron as I have needed one). I think this apartment is a perfect alternative to a hotel in order to get a excellent location and good decoration for a reasonable price.

Хорошее жильё за свои деньги. Двуспальная кровать в спальне и раскладывающийся диван в гостиной. Хороший выбор для бюджетного проживания семьёй. Находится недалеко от площади Таксим и улицы Истикляль, ориентир для таксистов — немецкая больница. В то же время немного в удалении, значит не будет толп туристов под окнами. Прямо в апартамент можно приехать на лифте — весьма необычно. Хозяин вполне доброжелателен.

Впервые попробовал снять квартиру вместо гостиницы. Выбрал квартиру Османа - очень понравилось. По деталям, очень близко от метро Таксим - минут пять пешком. До Истикляль можно дойти минут за 6-8. Если пойти вниз от квартиры мимо больницы немецкого посольства, то до трамвая всего минут 15 ходьбы. В доме 6 этажей, лифт имеется. Подъезд закрывается на ключ и в маленькой коморке в подвальчике обязательно кто-то дежурит из людей Османа. Рядом с домом есть супермаркет CARREFOUR, что очень хорошо. Пару раз дергал Османа просьбами - он всегда помогал. В квартире 2 кондиционера ,  посуда, вайфай, тв, чайник и тд. рекомендую!

My family enjoyed staying in Osman's flat. Osman is very helpful, kind and communicative person. Although the flat is smaller than what you see in the pictures but it was clean and tidy and comfortable enough to stay.

Apartment is in very good location in Taksim area! It is located in calm small street, but not far from Istacle street and the square, where airport shuttle buses are arriving. There is also supermarket just around the corner. So very convenient! We had everything we needed in the apartment, but don't expect 5star hotel :) It is cosy home atmosphere. There are some problem in shower as water is passing by and getting on floor, but otherwise all is good :) Thank's for Osman and his team! Osman was very responsive, when I had some doubts due to not calm situation in Taksim square. Luckily all was good :) I can for sure recommend Osman and his apartments as home out of home :)

There was 4 of us staying in this luxury apartment in Istanbul. We were there during the end of the protesting but we felt so safe the whole time. Our host and landlord Osman cannot be faulted. He was there for any of out needs and questions and was continuously welcoming and friendly during out stay. I will be returning in the future and could not imagine a better place to stay. The area of the apartment was perfect. A stone throw away from the main street and taxsim square and a 5 minute walk to kabatas. I couldn't think of a better place to stay if your a family or a young group like we were. I cannot recommend this more. THANK YOU OSMAN
Very nice and simple apartment in a great location about 5 mins walk from Taksim Square. Everything was great and Osman was helpful! Only issue was the wifi in the apartment which was poor.

Our stay in stay in Istanbul at Osmans place was very nice, the apartment was very clean and looked as described.

The location is very good, very central and you can reach the public transport easily too.

Besides that Osman is a very kind and helpful guy.

Стамбул произвёл на нас отличное впечатление и квартирка Османа не стала исключением. Её расположение позволило нам очень быстро добраться от площади Таксим,но она находится немножко вглубине, поэтому шум улиц нас совсем не беспокоил. Единственным неудобством было то, что вход в душевую проходит через одну из комнат.

Thank you Osman, your apartments are lovely and in a great location.  Easy walking to Taxim square (10 min) and downhill and across the bridge to the Old city (35 min).  Apartments are clean and well furnished.  
Osman took great care of us.  Because the person before us had not checked out from our room when we arrived, Osman placed us in a different room, then moved us to a top floor penthouse for our second night. The view from the roof top suite the second night was fantastic. Osman was very responsive and easy to work with.  I highly recommend staying in his apartments when in Istanbul.

Osman was a great host! My friends and I arrived early and we did wait a few minutes but Osman and his friend Rejup were really helpful. The location is perfect - close enough to taxsim, but not too close and loud. 

Would stay here again if i'm in istanbul
Osman's place was great! I enjoyed the stay very much.

Osman est une personne très agréable et serviable. Il a fait son maximum pour que nous nous sentions bien dans son appartement.
L'immeuble où il a les appartements est bien situé dans Taksim. Il y a cependant un bar à proximité et on entendait souvent du bruit la nuit (pour les personnes dormant dans le salon). La chambre était calme. L'appartement était propre.
En revanche, lorsque j'avais réservé (pour 5), je ne pensais pas que nous dormirerions sur des matelas pneumatiques. Nous en avons parlé à Osman qui a arrangé la situation et nous a donné deux appartements. Nous avons eu à changer 3 fois de chambre et c'est un peu dommage ! 
Mais ça reste une bonne expérience. Appartement à recommander plutôt pour 2 ou 3 personnes !

We were stying 5 girls in this apartment. We enjoyed our stay so much. Osman was very friendly. the kitchen and bathroom were small for 5 of us. Anyway we didnt need to cook since there are lot of opportunities to eat outside. Sleeping was comfortable for each of us, Osman provided us after request with extra blanket so that we didnt have to sleep under one for couples. The apartment provided also free Wifi which was working great and there was also hair dryer which we apreciated a lot. We would definitely recommend this appartment to our friends.

We really loved staying at Osman's place! It was hidden from d main road but yet steps away from Taksim Square. Super quiet at nite n thts what we wanted, a peaceful sleep. 

Its a really clean apartment. No problem wth getting food, near to the subway n bus terminals. 

Osman was very helpful esp with our luggages n easy going host. Next trip to Istanbul, we will definetly be staying there again.

I love staying at Osman's place. It was close to the Taksim area where exciting events are going on! He was kind and nice to us. I wish I could stay in Istanbul longer and definitely go to Osman's place when I visit Istanbul! Moreover, the shuttle service from airport was cheaper than I expected. It costs me $35 US dollar from his place to the Ataturk airport! 

Thanks for great memory Osman
Greatly enjoyed our stay in Istanbul and this place was the ideal base for is. Around the corner of Taksim square and near all the nice cafes. Would definitely recommend it!
It was a great time in Istambul, the flat was clean and correct, the location is perfect. Osman is a very good host, it is highly recommended flat.
Osman is a great host! Always available and supportive! The flat is simply perfect, both in terms of position and itself! Great experience!

Overall our stay was very nice... everything was clean. However, there is an elevator going through the flat, which is not awful, however makes inconvenient noise... further was the shower lacking water, making it complicated to shower after one another, as you were constantly standing on a wet ground.

we could live and work with everything, though. overall a very nice stay

Very well located, the welcoming was very nice. 

The flat is clean and it looks exaclty like the pictures.

Osman was a great host, helpful and kind. Appartment is really convinient for three to four persons, 5 minutes walk from Taxim square (excellent location), very clean. People seem to look for appartments in Sultanahmet were tourist attractions are, but to us there is absolutely no need for that - you go there once or twice and thats it. Taxim is real center, and you can easily walk to some other great parts of Istanbul  from there (Dolmabahce palace, Istanbul Moderna, Istiklal street...) or take cab that is really cheap. Plus, as I said appartment is cozy and clean, and Osman is like the good host, there for most of the times (which is not always the case). Recomendation for sure!
Thank you Osman for the accommodation!the appartment is lovely, the location is great and Osman really helpful with everything!

We had wonderful long weekend (holiday) stay in Istanbul. Apartment was clean and nice (as in pictures), equipped with all necessary things (kettle, tv, beds, linens, fridge etc). Located in quiet side street but still only approx 10min walk away from Taksim square. I was not able to meet host Osman, but people who were taking care of the apartment during our stay were nice and friendly. I can warmly recommend!

I thoroughly recommend this accommodation to everyone. first of all it is very clean and neat. Osman and his friends are very polite and helpful. the building has about 5 or six apartments each one including a living room, a bedroom and bathroom. there is s nice real bed in the bedroom and although 2 sofabeds in the living room. There is although a small kitchen with cooking stuff with help you to reduce your eating costs so much. the place of the residence is also very good.Just about 3 to 4 minutes far from Taksim square. When we got the apartment in the early morning, actually 3 hours before the check-in time, Osman was so kind to give us another apartment until our apartment gets ready. In the same way, because we were about to leave Istanbul some hours after the check out time, Osman helped us to leave our staff in his office and enjoy our last hours in the city. and the photos are exactly the same as the apartment. I highly recommend the apartment.

Notre séjour a été parfait, Osman est un hôte très sympathique et l'appartement que nous avions était très confortable, impeccablement propre, parfaitement bien situé. 

Je recommande vivement !

Nous avons été très satisfaits par l'accueil et la disponibilité d'Osman ainsi que de son personnel. 
Outre ses fonctions de propriétaire, Osman a pu nous réserver un taxi pour notre arrivée à l'aéroport et pour le retour aussi, il a su même très bien réagir pour le retour (trop long à expliquer ici mais c'est un professionnel très fiable).
L'appartement correspond très bien à la réalité. TB entretenu et à proximité de tout dans l'Istanbul moderne et du tramway pour rejoindre le vieil Istanbul (10 min. en descente, provilégier le funiculaire pour la remontée !...).
En conclusion, c'est une TB adresse avec des professionnels sérieux et très accueillants.
Osman was very friendly and helpful, apartment is   Centrally located on Taxim near amenities and many bars and cafes. Definitely recommended!

Osman was very helpfull and organised our airport transfer so a driver was already waiting for us. The appartment is very well situated, shops for food and restaurants are just arround the corner...there is nothing more pleasant than to fetch warm bread in the mornings. The appartment is nice and tidy and  there is allways somebody in the house to get information and help if needed. The only disadvantage is the small bathroom but Osman is already thinking about a solution. I can only recommand the place and it also works very well for families.

Fist of all , the location of the place is perfect and close to Taksim area by 5 minutes walk. Inside the apartment is very clean and everything looks good. Osman is a open guy and you can give your comments to him and he accept them.
Nice and quiet appartment near Taksim Square, where you can take metro or bus to anywhere in or out Istanbul. Osman, the host, was very helpful with us. So we can only recommend to everybody.

Osman was very friendly and helpful. The flat was clean practical for 4 persons. The neighborhood is good, with many bars and restaurants, and very central (near Taksim). We enjoyed our stay very much.

Osman was a great host.
The location was perfect and very close to all the great restaurants.
Had a great time and Osman was very accommodating even when we had two extra guests show up!
Thank you and will definitely stay there next time I come to Istanbul.

Amazing flat in a good location (Taksim).  We were 4 and we felt very comfortable sleeping in a large bed in a separate room and 2 comfortable sofa-beds for 1 person each (could also be 2 and 1).  Although the kitchen is a bit small we managed to cook most of the meals there (there is a Carrefour grocery store 30m away).  There is also a lot of very good restaurants nearby.

The flat is very safe as Osman or one of his friends is always on site to control who enters the building.

The flat is about 30 minutes from the airport (Ataturk) by taxi.

Thank you Osman for a perfect stay in the wonderful Istanbul!

My family stayed at Osman's place for two nights and we really loved the place. It is close to all tourist attractions and transportation is easily accessible. We arrived at 6 in the morning but Osman was able to help us leave our luggage in his office. We would stay at Osman's place again !
Good location, a little bit dangerous, everything is clean, but no hot water
Appartement propre et très bien situé. Bon accueil d'Osman qui a été présent pour toute info nécessaire!

We so enjoyed our stay. Osman was extremely helpful and welcoming. The flat was clean and very comfortable. It was good value and its location was excellent. Nothing was too much trouble and Osman organised all of our taxi travel etc.

Overall we had a very pleasant experience with Osman and his apartment. 

The apartment itself was very clean and exactly what we expected based on the listing. The location was very convenient since it was close to many restaurants and bars and also near public transportation.

Getting to the apartment from the airport was simple and worry-free thanks to Osman arranging a car to have us picked up. Getting to the airport at the end of our trip was simple as well by walking to Taksim Square and taking a shuttle bus.
Value for money choice. The room is at excellent location, near Taxim square where you can go anywhere in the city. Clean, tidy and newly renovated.

We had a very nice stay in Osman appartement. Osman was very helpfull and the appartement is exactly as describe. Furthermore it's well located in a quiet Street close of Taksim place and public transportation.
Ottima posizione, appartamento pulito e nuovo.

Die Unterkunft ist wie auf den Bildern zu sehen und liegt genial in der Nähe des Taksim Platzes, alle Sehenswürdigkeiten sind gut zu erreichen.  Allein das Bad ist etwas klein, für den Aufenthalt ist es jedoch auf jeden Fall ausreichend. 
Osman kümmert sich um alles und hilft bei Fragen gerne weiter. Auch der Shuttle Service vom und zum Flughafen hat einwandfrei geklappt!
Wir würden wieder kommen!

L'appartement est très sympa, propre, il correspond bien à la description. Osman est charmant et discret. Avec son bureau dans l'immeuble la remise des clefs est très simple. L'appartement est idéalement situé près des endroits qui bougent mais reste très calme. Je recommande !

My friends and I stayed a week at Osman's apartment . It was a good experience. We were pleased to have had such a nice place to stay with comfortable beds, modern interior, neat and with perfect location. We thank Osman a lot for being a good host. Our best wishes to you! Çok teşekkürler! ;)

The place was great, it was just as pictured and perfect for two people.  The portable stove did not work but we improvised with cooking by using the grill.  The building is also known as "Sunflower Apartments" and has an apartment for each floor that the owners seem to rent out.  The location is great, I'd recommend staying here.
A very good flat and location! I would come back again. Thank you Osman)

This apartment in Taksim was very neat and in a great location - lots of lovely cafes and bars nearby and an easy trip to any of the major sites. Osman provided clear instructions to get there and was waiting for us upon our arrival. The other people who man the desk in this building don't really speak English, but they could always call Osman for help which they did. He was helpful with other questions we had too. There was a problem with the plumbing in the bathroom, some leaking around the base of the toilet - which made the small bathroom quite wet. Osman offered to have it fixed while we were there to be fair, but we didn't want a tradesman through during our stay. It will hopefully be repaired when you stay here. The electric stove top did not seem to work, but all other appliances did. All in all, we really enjoyed our stay.

Osman was very friendly during the whole stay and also helped with the airport transfer. Thanks again!
The apartment was clean and has everything you would need for a short stay. We really enjoyed the location near Taksim place with all the little restaurants/bars and cafés. this also means that it can get loud during the night.
We can recommend this apartment and would definitely come again!
The flat is really nice, exactly like in the pictures and really well located in Istanbul. Osmane was very nice with us and explain everything. I recommend it !

A lovely home, close to Taksim, an important place for Istanbul. Besides, you only need five minutes to catch the train or a bus. 

The apartment is nice, with wifi, and nice bedroom. And for the other apartments of the building, you have a private lift! The only problem that we had is a leak in the bathroom. The floor was always wet.

So it is not so expensive for the neighborhood and if they fix the leak in the bathroom, it is a lovely place to stay !

Die Wohnung entspricht genau den Bildern auf airbnb. Die Lage ist super zentral und man hat gleich um die Ecke Einkaufsmöglichkeiten. Osman ist super nett und jeder Zeit erreichbar, wenn er nicht selbst in seinem Büro ist, das sich in dem selben Haus befindet wie die Wohnung. Er hilft gerne weiter und ist auch bereit den Transfer vom und zu Flughafen zu organisieren. Die Sauberkeit ist in Ordnung. Das Bad ist klein und zweckmäßig. Die Nachbarn sind etwas laut zu hören, das ist aber das Einzige, was zu bemängeln ist. Wir würden jeder Zeit wieder dort einchecken.

Osman was a great host (always available if needed), and the flat is exactly as described! No problem with the heating (heavy snowstorms and cold weather during our stay).
The location is perfect, you can find nearby everything you need during a vacation (restaurants, cafes, shops, bakeries, etc.), and you can reach easily the historical old town either with public transport or by walk. Even one of the main ports (Kabatas) is located close to the flat, so you can walk there in 10 min.
Definitely, I recommend it to everybody who need a pleasant and affordable apartment in Istanbul!

The apartment matched the description and was as centrally located as told. Supermarkets, excellent cafés and local restaurants within a short distance. 

Although we didn't meet Osman himself during our stay (3 guys), he made sure we got safely to the apartment from the airport and had another guy giving us the keys and taking our luggage upstairs. Very kind service all in all.

Would definitely recommend for a price/quality sensitive traveler who is looking to minimize all the fuss related to living and wants to focus exploring the city.

unfortunately Osman wasn't there but a colleague of his showed us the flat. all was according to the description and very comfortable! we liked the flat and the surrounding neighborhood a lot... especially that you are so close to all the main hot spots is a big plus. definitely recommendable :-) we would stay here again any time.

Osman's place was a really good choice. It is very well situated, walking distance to Taksim and in the heart of the Cihangir neighbourhood next to cozy cafes and restaurants. Very clean, well heated and fully equipped. Osman was a very helpful host, when we arrived he helped us find the way to the appartment and was very eager to answer all questions we had about the city and about places to eat or hang around. It was an overall very good experience, we would definitely revisit.

Osman provided an excellent experience from start to finish. Upon our arrival, he had organized a car to take us directly from the airport to the apartment. We also got upgraded to a different apartment with an amazing view of the Bosphorus and Sultanahmet. The apartment's neighborhood is also an excellent starting point for sightseeing or going out. I will definitely keep Osman in mind the next time I am in Istanbul.

Osman is a fantastic host! We stayed at his place for 4 nights – the apartment was very clean and cosy. Osman provided us with interesting information and helpful tips for our sightseeing tour in Istanbul. We had everything we needed in our apartment and felt very welcomed. The location was great – very close to Taksim square with many sights in foot-walking distance.

Many thanks  Osman for a very pleasant stay!

This apartment was very comfortable and well located in a trendy area (Cihangir neighbourhood in Beyoglu district), close to lots of great restaurants and cafés and a Carrefour supermarket. The apartment was clean and exactly as the photo shows. Osman organised a private  airport pick-up for us which is easier than finding a taxi and not much more expensive.
The only issue was that the lift (elevator) is actually inside the apartment. Each apartment has its own key which only allows you to access that floor......but somehow there was a problem with the key of another apartment and they came to our floor by mistake and arrived in our apartment! Quite a shock to find them in our kitchen, but luckily they were just friendly and confused tourists. The whole building seems to be just 4-5 apartments rented only to tourists. Anyway, this is a security issue and needs to be fixed.

We had a good time at the appartment, Osman was very nice and welcoming and the pictures confirming the reality. The location is near Taksim but pretty difficult to access by taxi (lot of stairs and slopes before getting to Taksim). 
Die Wohnung befindet sich im Stadtzentrum, so dass man eigentlich alle wichtigen Sehenswürdigkeiten zu fuß erreichen kann. Die Schlüsselübergabe hat einwandfrei funktioniert, wir wurden direkt von Osmans Freund abgeholt und zur Wohnung geführt. Die Wohnung ist zwar sehr klein, aber genau wie auf den Fotos zu sehen. Ein Plus ist die schöne Dachterrasse, auf der man wunderbar frühstücken kann.

Osman was really helpful throughout the whole stay , although I didn't manage to see him a lot , my stay was hassle free and I really enjoyed my time over there .A definite place I will return to when I come back to Istanbul

Osman is very accommodating and friendly. His apartment is well located, very clean and comfortable. We really enjoy our stay there. We would not hesitate to recommend it to anyone visiting Istanbul (excepting the early birds who will find it noisy, especially at the end of the week, due to its proximity with a club-concert stage). çok teşekkür ederim, Osman!

The location of apartment is very nice, only 300 meters to taksim square, the traffic is very convenient. The apartment is also good, clean and comfortable. Osman is a very helpful host, he can try his best to help u when u ask for any help.
Very good. The flat  is perfectly  located  and Osman is à very helpful and convenient  host

Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit in Istanbul!
Die Unterkunft liegt sehr gut. Es gibt unzählige nette Bars und Restaurants in der Nähe, man kann von dort aus gut zu Fuss los oder die Metro nutzen. Obwohl wir abends erst sehr spät ankamen hatte man uns ein Taxi organisiert, welches uns direkt zur Wohnung brachte. Auch als wir so spät noch auf die Suche nach den nächsten Kneipen gingen bekamen wir Hilfe.
Insgesamt war es überhaupt kein Problem nach irgendetwas zu fragen, Osman war immer hilfsbereit und freundlich!
Auch mit der Wohnungsausstattung waren wir zufrieden. Die Wohnung ist nicht besonders gross, war aber auch für 4 Leute absolut ausreichend und an Sauberkeit fehlte es auch nicht.

Очень понравилось. Всё соответствует заявленному. Присутствует всё необходимое. Очень удобное местоположение, рядом есть различные магазины, 5-10 минут до Истикляль, площади Таксим. Хозяева доброжелательны и приветливы.

Ещё из плюсов - трансфер из аэропорта, встретят в любое время и с комфортом довезут до апартаментов.

Из минусов - чистота, там не так чисто как можно подумать по отзывам. Пыльный ковёр, мебель, недостаточно чистые полотенца и душевая.

Osman is a very friendly, helpful host, and he gave us good information about how to get from the airport to the apartment. The place is clean & it has nice interior, just about enough space for 4 people.
The location is in the lively neighborhood of Beyoglu. If you like an authentic atmosphere, good bars, restaurants, antique shops, ... it's the place to be! Nighttime can be quite noisy because of cheering football fans or people drinking in the streets in weekends. Walking distance to Taksim square, where you have all public transport. If you are in good shape, it's nice to explore the neighborhood by foot.
The host canceled this reservation 50 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

What an amazing apartment!! In the coolest little neighbourhood, close to shopping, eating, sightseeing, and a wonderful place to come back to at the end of the day. Extremely clean, looks just like the pictures, and Osman is a really helpful host, always replying to my questions quickly. Perfect size for 5 people, would definitely recommend to anyone travelling to istanbul.

Osman deliver nice manner by telling me and my family about the different tourist location.

Osman's apartment locate quite close to the metro station where it is convenient for going to the tourists' locations in Istanbul. The apartment is quite a cozy and neat apartment and we had a nice experience.

Sunny and very clean apartment, conveniently located, just a short walk from Taxim square where we could get bus to the airport and metro to Sultanahmed. 

Osman was very accommodating and responsive. We loved our stay there!
This apartment is really nice. Modern and comfortable. Suits 5 or 6 people perfectly. Its 5 minutes away from Taksim Square.  Osman very kindly received us for a late check in.
The apartment is great few minutes walk from taksim square! Osman was responsive and helped us arranged a car pick made it easier to reach the place. Great experience!
Really nice apartment with perfect location near to Taksim square. Really quiet, clean and friendly flat. Osman was nice and friendly and answered all our questions. We enjoyed our stay here.

Great location 
Great apartment 
Highly recommend 
Would love to come back

L'appartement est très bien situé à deux pas de la place Taksim et de tous les autres lieux touristiques. Nous avons passé un bon séjour, néanmoins, nous avons été déçu par la propreté de l'appartement. Le ménage lors de notre entrée dans les lieux n'avait pas été fait et après multiples explications, ils ont fait le ménage 2 jours plus tard. La salle de bain est trop exègue et surtout elle est vétuste, la robinetterie qui bouge, les WC qui fuit, et la douche qui donne de l'eau chaude et froide d'une façon aléatoire. C'est dommage que notre hôte n'ai pas réagit quand nous avons demandé. 'Nous voulions quitter les lieux pour aller ailleurs mais pas facile avec des enfants en bas âge. Globalement, nous ne recommandons pas cet appartement dans son état actuel de Salle de bain,

Apartamento en muy buena condición y excelente localización a sólo 300 metros de Taksim e Istikal. No tiene vista pero es claro. Tiene aire acondicionado y buena conexión de internet. Lo encontramos en buen estado de limpieza.  Está en una calle trasera pero la sensación es segura. Buen precio y buena atención (hay una oficina en el edificio, donde recibieron el equipaje antes de la hora de chequeo y después de la salida, por lo cual quedamos muy agradecidos). Estuvimos muy cómodos (familia de 4 personas).

L'appartement est agréable, dans un immeuble typiquement stamboliote, situé dans un quartier central de la rive européenne d'Istanbul. A cinq minutes de Taxim, l'endroit est pourtant très calme. L'intérieur est soigné et très propre. Osman est hôte disponible et 
sympathique.
Osman is a very nice host,the apartment makes us feel like home,really love the decorations.And the Tram stop is very close,about five-minute walk.
Osmans apartment was perfect for our stay in Istanbul. Walking distance to Taksim square with easy commuting through public transportation was just what we wanted. The apartment was nice and clean.
Thank you Osman, I really enjoyed stay in your apartment, the location is great and everything was perfect! See U next time :)

Osman is a great host. The house was very clean.
I totally recommend it.

Locatie top. Kamer genoeg voor een gezin met twee kinderen. 

Helaas niet geluid dicht allemaal. We hoorden de boven buren druk bezig s'nachts.

The apartment was great everything as seen in the photos. The only problem was the AC wasn't working will then I contact with Osman, and he fixed everything. Osman is a great host thanks for the fruit dishes. Wish you all the best.
Прекрасный апартамент отель, мы остались всем довольны.
Best thing in Istanbul:)

Thanks for being a great host! Your apartment was great and we enjoyed the apartment and the location! Will hopefully be back in Istanbul and consider staying again! 

- Good location, good value for money and friendly host! 

Thank you!!

Appartement d'un bon rapport qualité prix, très bien situé. Le seul petit bémol étant les toilettes : il faut soulever le capot de la chasse d'eau pour l'évacuation et il y a un peu de bruit à cause d'une discothèque situé tout près. Osman m'a donné des informations complètes, j'ai été accueillie par un de ses amis à une heure tardive. Je recommande vivement cet appartement.

It was great!

Found an apartment quickly, settled immediately. Osman is very friendly host.

The apartment is nice, warm. Location is very convenient.
Mejor imposible. Volveremos. Osman estuvo pendiente de todo desde el minuto uno. Gracias!

our stay was good. the location is perfect and convenient. the flat size is ideal. just some cooking facilities is suggested to make the flat , a wonderful gem:)
Osman was a helpful host and thanks to him  for our early check in and late check out.

Our stay in the first floor apartment of the building was very comfortable. The beds were nice and the shower just got renovated and had a cabin instead of a curtain, which was a  positive surprise.
Although it could get a little noisy outside we could sleep well. The direct access to the elevator is uncommon but totally fine, we actually kind of liked the idea in the end! 
We'll definitely come again!

The place was exactly as described, it is very close to Taksim yet located in a quiet beautiful vintage street. The place was very clean,cozy, and Osman is a great host very responsive,thoughtful and helpful.. I would definitely recommend this place and surely would stay there in any future trips to Istanbul.

Osman and his colleague orri were very friendly and very supportive on everything we needed
The apartment is more than enough provided with all ammineties you might need on your vacation (clean bathroom, neat beds, space for luggage)
Estadía excelente, una de las mejores, Osman y su compañero muy amables y disponibles a toda hora. Céntrico y muy recomendable para todos.

The space is close to everywhere you want to walk to : close to the square and galata. There is also a supermarket around the corner. There is a club close by but we didn't hear any noise.  Osman was awesome enough to let us check in early as well. There are elevators so you don't need to walk your stuff up to the floor.
Highly recommend to anyone who looking for good place to stay with access to local businesses and restaurants

"luxury" is not the word I would use for the apartment, but we had a nice stay in a comfortable, well located place.
Good: location, very clean, warm (cold outside), overall comfort
Bad: low-cost furniture, lack of light, kitchen equipment, WIFI quality
Nice Place!

Мы останавливались у Османа втроем с женой и дочерью, для нас это было идеальное место. Вполне чисто и уютно, дом в тихом переулке, в спальне полная тишина и полумрак даже в солнечную погоду, так что можно отлично выспаться. Лифт приезжает прямо в квартиру, но шум, когда он ездит мимо не мешает. Рядом супермаркет, вокруг полно кафе и ресторанов. Есть электрическая плитка, но мы сами не готовили, wi-fi слабоват. Далековато от основных объектов на другой стороне бухты, но если любите ходить пешком, то для осмотра всех основных достопримечательностей в центре транспорт не понадобится. В целом, прекрасная квартира за свои деньги.
Hyvä sijainti lähellä kävelykatua, kuitenkin hiljainen sivukatu. Tilavat huoneet kolmelle hengelle. Kannattaa pyytää etukäteen vuodevaatteet lisäsänkyyn jos sitä haluaa käyttää.

We stayed 5 days , 5 star. Location: close to everything that you need. The place was clean and comfy. Osman is a great guy, he helped us a lot .i recommend it to anyone that wants to enjoy the trip. I will stay there next time that I go to Istanbul.
Nice place, great location
The staff were very responsive and professional. The apartment was neat, and in a great location. It was ideal for our stay in Istanbul.

Nice- secluded small central studio close to restaurants and walk to the sea. The flat can  sit up to three people, but u have to respect each other’s space. One suggestion is , the bathroom/ shower is small.

Easy going hosts responsive - 
Good, pleasant stay
Thanx

Osman was a fantastic host with great communication and always happy to help. The apartment is well situated with a 5 minute walk to Taksim square. We found transport links and getting around Istanbul very easy by both transport and foot. 

The apartment was clean and perfect for us (a group of 4). It may feel smaller with such a group but it ticks all the boxes and was great value for money. 
  
I would happily use Osman's apartments on any future return. Thank you!
Good location, clean facilities, great friendly reception.
Great apartment in perfect location. Best place in one of the best cities in the world!
Great place and excellent location! Although it could be a bit difficult the first time to get to the apartment. Close to main commercial zone.
Great place, amazing location, friendly staff and a very comfy bed.. loved my stay in this place!.

Osman’s place is a perfect choice for short trips. In few minutes walking you will be in Taksim square where restaurants, Café’s and Metro station is.
The Wi-Fi was working fine. The bathroom is tight but it is expected when you live in downtown. The appartment is very clean.

Negative:
Saturday evening the noise coming from nightclubs around the place was annoying till 3am. If you sleep early in weekends, this is not your perfect spot.

Als eine Person, die ständig in Istanbul ist und sehr viele verschiedene Orte bis jetzt ausprobiert hat, kann ich sagen, dass diese Wohnung die beste von allen war! 
Die Wohnung sieht aus wie auf den Bildern und ist sehr sauber.
Wir wurden sehr herzlich empfangen und haben bei jeglichen Wünschen immer schnelle Hilfe erhalten und auch die Kommunikation verlief reibungslos.
Auch gab es keinerlei Probleme, nachdem wir einen weiteren Gast hinzufügen wollten, der nicht von Anfang an eingeplant war. 
Ständig war jemand im Büro vorzufinden, was uns sehr sicher fühlen lies.
Am letzten Tag durften wir nach dem Auschecken den ganzen Tag die Koffer im Büro stehen lassen, da unser Flug sehr spät war!

Alles in allem; super! Immer wieder gerne!

Muy buena ubicación. lejos de la mezquita azul y aya sofia pero re bien ubicada en cuanto a zona de bares y restaurantes. departamento con aire acondicionado. acceso x ascensor. aceptable decoración. todo de 10 en cuanto a comunicación con Osman. lo recomiendo.
Osman was a great host, and the place was sparkling clean! The house itself was well decorated and located in a great spot in Istanbul.
Nice and clean

This place is the best. The location, the price, and the apartment are all excellent. But more than anything, the staff working here were absolutely amazing! They were able to help us time and again taking care of my mother, who is in a wheelchair. This is honestly the best place we could have stayed in Istanbul. Thank you, Osman!

Sejour très agréable. Globalement le logement correspondait à nos attentes car spacieux, appreciable avec la Climatisation et très bien situé.
Un peu bryuant.mais.normal étant en C.V
3 Bemols à ameliorer
- SALLE DE BAIN : Trop etroite + a.mettre d'urgence des portes serviette  car pas du tout hygiénique de.les.poser pres des.toilettes + Revoir le debit de la chasse d'eau.

CUISINE : Etoffer les ustensiles de cuisines : Couverts, eponge, torchon, mettre 1 cafetière etc....

1 CHAISE CASSEE à changer car cassée...
Quite near to the central-walking distance. Nice cosy place. Felt a lil bit at home!

Great place in a really good location. Looks exactly like on the pictures and is spacious, clean, and stylish. The location is perfect for sightseeing around Istanbul using busses, tram or taxi. There is a huge shopping street just 3 minutes away where you‘ll find shops, restaurants and bars. Overall, our stay in Istanbul was exceeding all our expectations and the apartment fit right in. Thank you!
PS: The guy at the reception was super nice and welcoming. Thanks a lot!
Indeed excellent location, but not very fast Wi-Fi. Good for vacations, difficult in case you want to work. Pics are accurate but at the same time they are a bit flattering
nice apartment and very central position!

It was great staying at Osman’s. The property is accurate as per the picture. Clean, furniture is also ok, and the living room is spacious. Location wise is close to the center like Taksim, Istiklal and even still walking distance to new/modern city around Sisli and Besiktas. 

But the bathroom is very small and no sword hanger inside the bathroom just to hang our dirty clothes and towel. Just hang one or two hanger on the wall would be helpful.
This place has a great location as mentioned before.   Pictures show the place as it is.  I highly recommend it.
The perfect place!
Everything was great! The location is really nice and there's people to help you with anything you need 24/7. The elevator can be a little bit loud at night but other than that everything was great!

My stay at Osman apartment was amazing! 
the apartment was so clean and comfortable exactly as in the pictures, and the location is excellent!
I would defenitely recommend it

Me and my friends had a great stay at Osman’s place. The apartment is in downtown (taksim square). Osman and his guys were great. If I ever want to go back to Istanbul I’d stay in his apartment again. Thanks Osman
beau appartements,excellent emplacement,proche de nombreuses attractions,lit confortable, chauffage sans problème,recommander

Нормальное жилье, удобное расположение. В доме сдается несколько апартаментов, и видимо всегда присутствует дежурный. Поэтому заселение и выселение как в отеле. Если приехали раньше, то можно оставить вещи на первом этаже и пойти погулять.

Из минусов: маленькая неудобная и неуютная ванная комната без вешалок и полочек; в зале работало не все освещение.

Very cute apartment. Comfortable for 2. Excellent location. We were so central we felt local. On site staff to answer questions and give travel advice. The host allowed us to check in a little earlier and this kindness was very much appreciated. Amenities were all clean and functional. Good accommodation to accompany a good trip.

This appartment is ideal if you want to have a small but tidy flat in the city centre. The rooms are clean, the host is very kind - there is always someone at the entry if you need anything. It's only a 5 minute walk from Istiklal Street and Taksim Square away, there are plenty of nice cafes, restaurants, bars and clubs in the neighbourhood.

It was a very good place with a very convenient location. It’s a five minute walk more or less from Taksim Square. Osman was very helpful and hospitable. The house was spacious for two people and it was clean and organized when we came in. We had a small issue during our stay and Osman immediately helped us to resolve it. There was only a small issue with the lighting, it was a bit dim. Overall experience was very satisfying :).

Very cool place, perfect for 4 people!

Perfect location! Would stay here again:)
The description was very accurate and my expectations were met. Would recommend.
Tolles Apartment. Ca. 200m zur İstiklal caddesi. War alles super gewesen.

Ficamos muito satisfeitos com nossa estadia. Pousada limpa e com decoração de muito bom gosto. Lídia e seu marido são anfitriões amáveis e nos fizeram nos sentir em casa! Super recomendo.

Lugar maravilhoso! 
Anfitriões super receptivos.
Sempre que retornar para a Ilha,  ficarei nesse lugar!
Lidia e seu esposo foram muito agradáveis e deram ótimas dicas sobre a Ilha. A pousada deles é de fácil localização e muito aconchegante. Fica localizada muito próximo a um mini mercado 24h.

neighborhood_overview: Jacarepaguá é um bairro de classe média alta e classe média da Zona Oeste do município do Rio de Janeiro, no Brasil. Localiza-se na Baixada de Jacarepaguá, entre o Maciço da Tijuca e a Parque Estadual da Pedra Branca e na beira norte das lagoas de Jacarepaguá e Tijuca. É atualmente o sexto maior bairro da cidade, passando por um forte processo de urbanização. O bairro ainda é um dos maiores e mais importantes da cidade, com um dos metros quadrados que mais encarecem por ano. Nele estão localizados o parque olímpico, o Barra Music, o Centro de Convenções do Rio Centro, o Estádio Olímpico de Hóquei, o Hospital Sarah Kubitschek, a HSBC Arena, o Hotel Hilton, o Hotel Ramada o Parque Aquático Maria Lenk, o Velódromo Municipal do Rio, o Parque dos Atletas, o Shopping Metropolitano e Vila Pan-Americana, a Vila Olímpica do Rio de Janeiro e o Rock in Rio.
