Shower, hairdryer, great water pressure.  And if you forgot something (toothpaste, razor, etc.) just
neighborhood_overview: We are walking distance to harbour beaches.  And Manly is 5 min away driving and 30 min walk along the beautiful Spit-Manly foreshore walk.  You can also take a swim at local harbourside beaches, walk thru the neighbourhood to some of the most scenic spots in Sydney.  A Coles grocery store is walking distance as are other local shops (I have a map in the room with details).
notes: OPAL cards are available for adults and children.  I try to make sure the correct number are in the room, but if they are not, just ask. As summer has arrived and doors and windows are open you may hear voices in the morning from us and the neighbours.  Mainly In the evenings around dinner time and in the mornings as the family is getting ready for work and school you can hear sounds.
transit: Direct buses into Sydney CBD and Direct buses into Manly are a 4 min walk.  G@@gle Maps is a great option for finding your way around on public transport.  Sundays are $2.50 AU for the entire day of travel if you use OPAL cards. Please let us know how and when you intend to arrive here.  We may be able to help you in some way.  Particularly if you arrive to Manly by ferry.
access: There is a private, external entrance to your room.  And there are stairs leading to the entrance. PARKING:  Is on the street and there is always plenty available, so it is free.  There are no parking restrictions on our street. GARDEN:  We have beautiful outlooks and garden areas.  We expect you to make use of them.  Most guests eat breakfast outside on our balcony if weather permits.  And some will work on laptops during the day.  Others enjoy a glass of wine in the evening.  If you would like to use the BBQ please inquire, we are happy to oblige--just be sure to wash up.  Note:  we do charge $2.00 per use for gas.
interaction: We are generally on hand as needed.  And I like to meet guests.  Self check-in is available.   I am easiest to reach through the Airbnb app, but you can also text me. We expect guests to take advantage of our garden spaces and verandah, Make yourself at home and enjoy the view.  We are always happy to chat if we are outside.  :)
house_rules: Treat our home the way you would want your home to be treated. Keep towels hung. Recycle. Follow checkout rules posted for checkout--check room, take sheets off the bed, recycle. Have we run out of an essential?  Text us and we will get it to you. Did you forget something?  Text us and we can usually help.

host.host_about: We are a family of four (Two teens).  We love meeting our Airbnb guests and sharing our favourite places to eat, travel, hike, cycle, or sight see in Sydney.  We are originally from the US, but have lived here for over 10 years.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 73 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

super comfortable room, great location (few min from manly wharf by bus or a fantastic walk on manly scenic walk). Safe neighbourhood and quiet. Leslie and Eric are great people and have a great family. Thanks very much!  I look forward to catching up again next time I am in Sydney. Elias
We spend  4 perfect days ! Helpfull and guestfull !  I recommande !

We were warmly welcomed as friends when we arrived. It was very easy to talk with Leslie and Eric. The beds were very comfortable and the bathroom was clean, the shower was very good. The location was very handy to the remarkable Manly and the ferries allowed us to get to the city. The weather was lovely warm during our stay. the views from the balcony was spectacular.
Very clean and confortable. Nice view on the bay.

The home, location and experience staying with Leslie and her family for 2 nights far exceeded our expectations. We had a fabulous introduction to Sidney, as this was our first visit to the area. The home was as described and her family was gracious, engaging and very helpful. We will return without a question the next opportunity that we have to visit the Sidney area!
Thank you Leslie!

Leslie, Eric and your family are lovely people. we have provided anything we needed. their home is very spacious fit to stay whether on holiday or for work. the bus stop is within walking distance from home. Balgalowah is very beautiful and is very close to Manly. Thank you!

Great house with an amazing view over Manly Harbour, lovely room and Leslie and her family made us feel at home. They gave us everything we needed including the Opal cards.
A bit far from the city but was worth it for the quality and price!
Leslie and her family were very welcoming and the accomodation was perfect for me. I stayed 2 nights on business and would happily stay again.

Leslie's place is located in a quiet and family friendly suburb not too far from Manly and the city. The room, located in the basement, is large, with lots of privacy. The house has an incredible harbour/ocean view. Leslie and her family are friendly and full of character. We would definitely suggest this accomodation to anyone visiting Sydney.
Fantastic area in manly with great beaches and towns. Easy access to city and a nice breakfast included!
Loved it. Great family home

Die Unterkunft ist in gute Lage, nahe zu Hotspot von Manly. Die Fotos zeigen die schöne Aussicht auf das Meer, dich das ist nicht diejenige vom Zimmer aus. Dieses hat gar keine Aussicht / Fenster 
Es gibt einige Verbeserungsmöglichkeiten
Value for money stay in a lovely house. Leslie made us feel very welcome and a fantastic base for exploring Sydney.
We stayed 2night in Leslie's accommodation,it was a lovely place. Leslie was really friendly and we appreciated the accommodation and what a beautiful view.

Spacious self-contained apartment and wonderfully hosted. Leslie and her family were very welcoming, and offered next level service in a stunning location. Having breakfast on their balcony, overlooking the water and moored boats was a highlight of my trip. I will definitely stay again, thank you for the toothpaste rescue!!
Very lovely home with a beautiful view of the harbour . Would recommend to anyone visiting sydney.

Leslie's place was very nice, spacious, and clean! The whole bottom floor made it feel as if it were our own place, and it was nice to meet others from Texas while traveling. Would highly recommend if in the north!
Excellent host and a spacious room with a great view with the harbour! Convenient to get around with a car too.

Leslie's family home is close to the bus line and ferry; an hour ride from the airport and a thirty minute commute to Sydney Harbor.   The room has plenty of sleeping quarters, the bathroom is stocked with all essentials (shampoo, conditioner, body  wash, hair dryer), and  breakfasts are light and delicious.   Having a refrigerator, microwave,tea and coffee pot are helpful; and a washing machine within the unit is terrific.  The family accommodated all are requests; we traveled some days as two persons and some days we had three persons.  Leslie helped us with restaurant suggestions and paths to walk.
Leslie was very accomodating, house was comfortable, clean and spacious. Great value for money. Would recommend.

Leslie was very accommodating and provided all the information needed. The room was nice and cozy. Towels, toiletries, etc. were provided. The room had it's own bathroom and washing machine. The room also had its own entrance. Their home was also a few steps away from the Manly Scenic walk which was great. It was also near the bus stop. We would highly recommend Leslie's place.

The apartment was great. It is away from the city area, and in a little town, away from all the noise. The balcony view is great. The room is very cosy with everything you need. There is a washing machine as well. Breakfast was great and communicating with Leslie was very easy and accurate. She was very accommodating and understanding. There is a bus stop nearby that allows us to take the bus to the city. There is a comes supermarket nearby too.

Thank you Leslie and family. We'll miss you!
We really enjoyed our stay here and would definitely recommend to stay here.
Leslie's unit was comfortable, clean and well equipped for travellers. Breakfast! The best ever! Leslie was very kind and friendly.  I strongly recommend Leslie's place.

We loved the location, with amazing views of the bay from the deck. The coastal walk to the Manly ferry terminal was delightful and the ride across the Harbour spectacular. We took the bus back to the house from Manly and that was very easy with buses running every 10 minutes.  The apartment was perfect for 3 of us with a small fridge, TV, washing machine and  milk, coffee and tea provided.  We were very comfortable. One really nice touch was the  amazing breakfasts Leslie made for us. 
Thanks so much.  We highly recommend this place

Leslie's hospitality was perfect, my friend and I felt very comfortable. We are on a road trip at the moment and have stayed at a few AirBnB and Leslie's is the best so far! Thank you for everything you have done for us

Would recommend if you need a place to crash and experience Sydney. Checking out the buses to the Manly Wharf and the Ferry to the CBD was a thrilling experience. No need for a car to drive around. 
There are nearby restaurants and Supermarkets for convenience as well as a lovely complementary breakfast provided by the host.
It was a good spot to stay for exploring the Manly & Northern Beaches area. Our hosts were very friendly and helpful, and it's obvious they enjoy the company of others.
Leslie's place was very cozy and clean.  It had all that we needed and more.  Leslie and her family were very welcoming and helpful.  Our family really enjoyed our short stay.

We really enjoyed our stay with Leslie and her family. My son was delighted that Leslie's son is a talented jazz musician and they ended up playing some jazz together. It was a very good start to our few days with them. The basement is quite spacious and doesn't feel like a basement  as it is beautifully decorated with Leslie's son's artwork.  I enjoyed my morning tea and fruit provided by Leslie on the deck with a quintessential Australian view; a kookaburra sitting on a nearby television aerial and the Manly ferries on the harbour. A perfect way to start the day! We would love to return and I recommend anyone considering staying to do so.

Leslie's home is definitely one that my family and I would love to revisit! It was perfect for an intimate quality time spent with family in the basement studio. While noises of upstairs and neighbour's dogs was audible on occasion, it did not affect our stay. Beds were comfortable and we still got a good night's rest.  The TV entertainment and wifi access was helpful and the stunning views overlooking the sails is second to none!! Leslie's complimentary breakfast was exceptional and her and her family made our stay feel like home - if not, better than our home in fact! Thank you again!
Great to have opal cards for transport and free parking. Very nice view from deck and lovely breakfast.  Cant beat the price with all the benefits.

We stayed for at Leslie's for 7 nights and it was perfect. The location was great & the home had a beautiful view! The room was spacious, bright & clean & had everything we needed. Perfect for the 2 of us as well as a 5 year old. Leslie was so accommodating and she was a great host! Perfect location & we look forward to staying here again soon!

Our stay at Leslie's place was great and all we needed.
The room has all the necessities we needed and all was as described.
We ended up being on the go most of the time and for that it was a perfect place for us to stay: close to the bus stop and the ferry station in manly as well.
Would stay again!
Leslie was zeer behulpzaam en erg vriendelijk, locatie is fantastisch met een prachtig uitzicht op de haven....
Check in was very easy, the studio was well maintained (although ceiling heights are low, and the lights are fluorescent). The host was excellent with communication and the location is excellent.
Really nice place with great view. Would love to stay again!
Lovely and clean studio, the host was great - very fast in response and friendly. Would definitely recommend to stay :)

Leslie was very lovely and accommodating. The room was tidy, the bed comfortable and it was exactly what we needed for our short overnight stay. I would definitely recommend a stay here! Thanks again.
Have a beachy holiday in Sydney at Leslie's lovely place. A beautiful walk to the ferry along the bay or a handy bus just down the road make this a great base. We slept well here in the lovely place.
Fantastic location, lovely family, great balance of hospitality and privacy. Will definitely be back.

Fantastic place to stay. Private, very clean, excellent location and very good value. Would definitely stay there again and probably will. Family friendly and had helpful advice. Very good for Northern Beaches transport and experience.
Loved our stay in lovely AirBNB located in the central, delightful  suburb of Balgowlah. Views beautiful, bed very comfortable & bus stop very handy.
Fantastic budget accommodation, great location, close to shops and public transport, quiet area, comfy bed , slept well

Could not recommend this place more highly! Travelling solo with my 3 month old daughter this place was a little piece of home! Immaculately cleaned and well thought out. Small touches like a bath robe, clothes washing and drying facilities, Apple TV and Netflix - all added to the experience! Close to supermarket and shopping centre and bus to Manly. Hosts were friendly and helpful - even letting me store my bags after check out! 

Sincerely enjoyed my stay. Only downfall is that I wasn't able to stay longer!!

Thanks again Leslie!

It was great place to relax
Great view
But nothing much to do near the house
But if u have a car even if you dont, its only 10mins away by bus to Manly
Fantastic place.  Fantastic host.
Un petit coin sympa, avec des balades au bord de mer toute proche, la vue de la maison est superbe, la chambre à tous se qu'il faut.

Convenient location in a beautiful, quiet and safe neighborhood.  Buses to Manly or to the city are a 5-minute walk away.  Leslie and her husband Eric were very accommodating, helpful and responsive hosts.  The place is clean and comfy.  We enoyed our stay here, and highly recommend this place.

A simple, clean room with galley kitchen facilities (including dishwasher, fridge and induction cook plates (rather than a stove persay) and a good size bathroom.  We were only there one night, so didn't get to experience either the room or the magnificent view (due to poor weather) to any great extent, or the other nice touches like the provided Opal cards.  The beds were comfy and warm.  Loved the spare toothbrush - as I actually forgot to pack mine!  There are quite a few stairs to contend with but this is pointed out in the dossier (that I failed to read carefully).  Also a quiet neighbourhood.  Leslie responded to any query we had very quickly.  A very good first up Airbnb experience.

Great value for money. Very large, clean studio. Leslie was a superb host, friendly and reliable. Beautiful view from the balcony. 
I would recommend for an affordable stay in Northern Beaches.

Large studio space in a great location with views to the water out the kitchen window. Leslie was a very helpful, friendly host and the studio was clean and well equipped with a comfy bed! Guests should be aware that you can hear muffled noise and voices from the room above the studio.

In a very nice and quiet area, Leslie’s house is very comfortable, clean, well-equipped with everything you might need. Close to public transports to the city and to the beach as well. 
Leslie and her family were very nice and helpful. I would definitely recommed staying at their place!
A great place to spend the night with a beautiful view :)
Simply one of the best place, well equipped, in a nice quiet neighborhood. Close to Manly Wharf. We loved the stay a lot.
Great hosts! Warm & welcoming. Such a great roomy space- and with a view too!

Our stay at this airbnb in Manley is highly recommended! The kitchen is very well equipped and practical, great to have a washing machine. The beds are very comfortable and the space very comfortable for 4 people. The view is absolutely stunning and its very easy to get to busses and ferries into the city. Thank you so much for a wonderful stay!
Nice living, had everything in the apartment

Organised a night at Leslie’s for my mother. She was very pleased with her brief stay.

Thanks.

友人と二人での滞在でしたが､広いお部屋で清潔感もあり､とても快適でした｡
ﾊﾞﾙｺﾆｰからの眺めが素晴らしく､朝焼けは特に綺麗です｡
歩いて行ける距離にｽｰﾊﾟｰやｴｽﾆｯｸなﾚｽﾄﾗﾝがいくつもあって､食事はいつも楽しみでした｡
ﾎｽﾄのLeslieが気さくな方だったので､自宅の様にﾘﾗｯｸｽして過ごせました｡
お家の黒猫も人懐っこくて､とても可愛いかったです｡
また行く機会があれば､もう一度泊まりたいと思えるお家です｡
Leslie and her family were very welcoming and thoughtful, so many generous offers to ensure our stay was perfect which it was.

Leslie was there when we checked in and showed us around the place. She introduced us to Molly, their pet cat and invited us to use veggies from her garden. It was a very pleasant stay and we would definitely stay there again if we go to Manley.

It was great view, quiet and safe, close to public transportation, great value. The owners are very thoughtful, care about details, provide transportation cards, milk & sugar for coffee, I highly recommend it
Very lovely host and well equipped studio, only 10 min drive from Manly
Leslie's place was perfect, we wish we could have stayed longer than one night. Well equipped with everything you could need and the view was spectacular!
Excellent private apartment under the main house. Washing machine and kitchenette was incredibly handy on route to QLD. Leslie is a sweetheart. You won’t be disappointed.
Great apartment, convenient location.  The Opal cards were handy, and Leslie even gave us a lift down to the wharf one morning.  Great hosts!

Leslie is such a warm lovely person who welcomed us readily and offered earlier check in to suit our needs and was beyond helpful. The space was perfect size cosy but not at all cramped and she went out of her way to make it easy and provide everything you could possibly need. Definitely worth a visit :)
Lovely comfortable apartment, great access into Manly! Clean and well maintained! Perfect for our needs! Thank you Leslie!
Great location, friendly hosts. Highly recommend
Leslie's place is great

Situated in a quiet suburban area. Walking distance from the bus stop. The kitchen window has a good view of yachts, you can go in the balcony for a better view. They have fresh plants in the garden for cooking. Best accommodation so far in our stay in Sydney. Leslie responds quickly to all our queries. They also have a friendly cat who likes people.
Private, clean and easy to get to
leslie的房子位置极佳,而且有非常棒的厨具｡希望能再次见到你!

We had a great stay at Leslie's place. The apartment had everything you could possibly need and was conveniently located to public transportation, supermarkets and restaurants. It slept four adults and a small child comfortably. Leslie was an excellent host and a great resource for places to go and things to see. Communication was prompt and spot on. Highly recommended!
Unbelievable value, great facilities with stunning views to boot.
Leslie's apartment was super convenient and very central to transport and shops. Communication was great and Leslie and her husband Eric were really nice hosts.
Spacious, comfortable apartment with everything you need for a relaxing time in Sydney. Having your own transport is an advantage.
Great value for money place to stay when in Manly
Great place, easy access to everywhere and lovely host
Vue incroyable du balcon, beau quartier, hôte à l'écoute de nos besoins. L'appartement en soit est humide car au sous-sol mais bon rapport qualité-prix.
Very convenient and homely space. Nice touches like free use of the excellent kitchen garden. Leslie also communicates very well!
Very comfortable accommodation. Helpful friendly hosts. Nice view. All contributed to a great weekend.
Great location, perfect family space, close to Manly.
Perfect view for watching sunrise.
A nice affordable stay for a family of five in a central location in Sydney.
Great place and fast response!
Great stay,  great service, great value for money.  Thank you.

The view from this place is truly beautiful! The kitchen is well equipped. This place could be used just as easily for a long stay as it was for our shorter one. We were there for three days. Leslie was a very thoughtful host, leaving wine and chocolates in the fridge, and even brought by Band-Aids for me when I got a really bad blister from my new shoes. 

DOWNSIDES:
As mentioned in previous reviews, the basement holds moisture. As long as you keep using the de-humidifier, you’ll be okay. 

A major problem we had was Sydney’s inconsistent public transit, more specifically the buses. If you’re used to relying on transit, look for a place that is closer to the central parts of town. I think of all the buses we took, we had ONE arrive on time. Some showed up 10 minutes after the scheduled time, and one didn’t even show up at all. So, look for something nearer the main harbour or CBD, or you can do like we did a lot of the time: walk down to the Manly Wharf (about 25 min walk) and take the ferry to the main harbour, and only stick to the areas that are closest. Honestly, take the ferries as much as possible. The views are phenomenal. They absolutely -made- the trip for us!
Great value for money. A nice affordable basement studio in Balgowlah.  We stayed there with our family of 4, for one night.

A convenient location to Manly .
A good idea to bring milk, snacks etc as these are not provided
This is a  great spot with great hosts, it was our second stay at Leslie's and we would like to return again :-)
A spacious studio with kitchen and toilet. There is one Queen size bed and a single bed. A Computer table, TV with Airplay. Kitchen has all amenities. Close to Supermarket and bus stop.

Great value for its location and ease of access! It is a small area (ideal for our purpose) but with 5 people it is quite cosy. Also, the balcony, whilst beautiful is a shared space so don’t go with the expectation that you’ll definitely be able to use it. We enjoyed our stay and was very convenient having somewhere to stay after a nearby event but probably wouldn’t recommend for a ‘holiday’ purpose.
Great for a quick stop, friendly hosts & good walking to restaurants & beaches
All good and I have my privacy on the stay..
so comfortable room and so kind host! I wanna stay again.

We had a nice stay, and were really blessed with great weather.  If it was hard to be outside, it might have been a little "cozy" for staying inside with 5 of us, but a smaller party would manage fairly well.  Beautiful area and view and Leslie was super helpful and answered questions quickly.
Great view to the bay and close to public transport.  Leslie is great host.

Leslie and Eric's place is very nice and in a great location. We found buses and ferry's a plenty and really loved the apartment and all it's conveniences. Thanks To Leslie and Eric for a great stay..
Beautiful view, good hospitality, superbe terrace for taking breakfast. Quite far from the center. Could be a little bit more clean, especially if you have children.
Leslie's place is great and she's a very helpful host. The location is convenient, lovely view from the deck, peaceful for sleeping and comfy beds - an ideal spot to explore Sydney.

This apartment is fantastic value, in a great location to enjoy Middle Harbour, Manly Beach and the Spit Bridge to Manly walk... which is spectacular. 
Comfy beds, spacious bathroom, practical kitchen and GREAT harbour VIEW.  Perfect location for using public transport.  Hope to stay again.

name: Bondi Beach Dreaming 3-Bed House
summary: This peaceful house in North Bondi is 300m to the beach and a minute's walk to cafes and bars. With 3 bedrooms, (can sleep up to 8) it is perfect for families, friends and pets. The kitchen was recently renovated and a new lounge and chairs installed. The house has a peaceful, airy, laidback vibe  - a perfect beach retreat. Longer-term bookings encouraged. Parking for one car. A parking permit for a second car can also be obtained on request.
space: Serene space with three bedrooms, including a studio at the back, 300m to the beach and near to best cafes and bars in Bondi. Parking for one car. This wonderful house is designed to cater for families or groups with plenty of space and flexible bedding arrangements. There are three bedrooms including a master bedroom with a king bed, separate studio with a queen bed and a room with two single beds (with an additional two single trundle beds) that also can be converted into a king-sized bed. Just 300 metres to the beach, you'll find great cafes, bars and a small supermarket within a two-minute walk. The house has a front deck and back garden area. A new kitchen was recently installed with all mod cons including an induction cook top, Nespresso machine, dishwasher and microwave.  The foodies will love the good quality cookware and lots of bowls and platters for salad and food preparation. There is also a semi industrial vegetable juicer, orange juicer, soda stream machine and blender.
description: This peaceful house in North Bondi is 300m to the beach and a minute's walk to cafes and bars. With 3 bedrooms, (can sleep up to 8) it is perfect for families, friends and pets. The kitchen was recently renovated and a new lounge and chairs installed. The house has a peaceful, airy, laidback vibe  - a perfect beach retreat. Longer-term bookings encouraged. Parking for one car. A parking permit for a second car can also be obtained on request. Serene space with three bedrooms, including a studio at the back, 300m to the beach and near to best cafes and bars in Bondi. Parking for one car. This wonderful house is designed to cater for families or groups with plenty of space and flexible bedding arrangements. There are three bedrooms including a master bedroom with a king bed, separate studio with a queen bed and a room with two single beds (with an additional two single trundle beds) that also can be converted into a king-sized bed. Just 300 metres to the beach, you'll find great cafes, b
neighborhood_overview: North Bondi is laid back with great food and coffee. You can walk to low key wine bars or larger pubs or stay at home and enjoy a peaceful space. Favourite local haunts that are literally a two-minute walk away include the organic bakery (Organic Republic) on the corner, the local piadina cafe (La Piadina) and a great dumpling cafe and cocktail bar (Mamasan). Just a short stroll to the beach and buses to Bondi Junction where you'll find a giant Westfield shopping mall and connections to the city. Bondi Beach also has boutiques and other speciality shops like the famous Messina Gelato and Bills.
notes: Please nominate the correct number of guests before you arrive. There are extra charges for extra guests and if you do not declare guests I will make a resolution request to Airbnb and review you accordingly. Please note we have friendly neighbours and a security camera at the front gate.
transit: There is parking for one car and a second car can be parked with a street permit arranged in advance.  It's a stroll to Bondi Beach or walk one minute around the corner to the bus stop where you will find buses to Bondi Junction and the city. All cafes, bars and supermarkets are in walking distance.
access: The house has a front deck and back garden area.  I can be flexible with checkin and checkout when possible. If I can't  offer early checkin I can  offer bag drop (from 10.45am) before checkin at 3pm. If you require a super early checkin I offer a discounted rate to block the previous day.   It's also possible to checkin late in the day or night.
interaction: The house is offered as a whole. I won't be around after I've checked you in but the neighbours have my phone number and will call me (or knock on the door politely) if there is loud music or a party that is disturbing them. Please note if guests don't consider neighbours they will he asked to leave.
house_rules: Guests should have Airbnb verification at time of booking. We expect guests to be respectful of our lovely neighbours and keep the noise down, especially after 10pm at night. No loud music at any time of day. That means no parties, move all social gatherings into the house after 10pm. No smoking inside the house. Pets welcome.

host.host_about: I like furry friends and stylish surrounds.

reviews.comments: Great House. Only there for two nights. Conveniently located good vibe

Our stay at Bondi was lovely. Cat welcomed me, was friendly and helpful. The house was very comfy. Close to the beach, coffee shops & cafes. Unfortunately the mozzies were a bother in the only bedroom without nets but this was overcome with extra spray.  And parking is a bother but that is how it is in Bondi. I can recommend and would stay there again.

We loved staying in this house. We had 4 sisters and our mother for a relaxing 5 night stay. There were two bathrooms which was perfect and the house was cosy and clean. Great little backyard for a few wines in the sun. Thank you.
Great house and location. Peaceful and comfortable - and close to the beach and Bondi buzz. Cat was welcoming and helpful. Fresh coffee and milk in fridge was a nice touch.
Great pad in the heart of Bondi. A Feeling of absolute calm when you walk in. Great proximity to the beach, cafes and bars. House has everything you need for a short or long stay.

It was great time at Cat's place. Very close to bondi beach about 5 mins walk. And quiet and relax beautiful place. I love to stay again when my next visit. My family was happy too:)
Thanks again Cat:)
Cats place is a very relaxing environment. Perfectly situated, close to the beach and shops. She's very helpful and always replies to your requests. You couldn't ask for a better house/host.

Cat's flat was ideal for our needs -- three generations visiting North Bondi together. Two bathrooms felt like luxury (as did the king size bed), and the flat was super convenient to great restaurants (Mamasan and Avila were both tasty in their own ways, and right around the corner) and the beach. Shopping and tasty gelato (our kids were staunch advocates for the Messina Gelato) were only a slight stone's throw further away on Hall St. 

Having coffee available in the morning was a particular treat (thank you again, Cat), and there were ample cookbooks to review if we had had the time to really use the kitchen. Communications with Cat were easy for checking in and out; we didn't need to trouble her during our visit because the replacement light bulbs were easy to find when one fixture burnt out. We would definitely consider staying here again.

Had a great weekend away with friends. Great house and location walking distance to cafes and the beach. Amenities were good and Cat also provided beach towels for us to use. Would definitely come back.

Cat was a great host. The house is lovely, very close to the beach, a great organic bakery and restaurants. The kitchen was well stocked with basic essentials and some cookbooks. Cat was very quick to help out when I couldn't find the water heater switch. Would definitely recommend this house for anybody who wants to stay at Bondi.

Myself and 5 friends stayed in the house for 4 nights and had a great time. The house is an amazing beach house. Good room sizes and lounge area. 3min walk to the beach and a wide range of cafes near by. 10/10!
The house is near the Bondi Beach,about 15minutes drive to City｡Nice house…

Cat was very flexible allowing us to check in early & leave our bags until later in the day when checking out. The house was great, it had everything we needed & Cat was very prompt with dropping over a hair dryer when we needed one! Such a relaxing space & so close to everything! Perfect for our girls trip. Would love to return in winter to make use of the great fireplace!

Wow! Cat's place is amazing, well located, lot of shops, coffees (Jed's is a dream) around, a perfect beach house! I'd love to come back very soon!! Cat was very flexible with the chek-out, we had an extra afternoon at beach.
Cat was extremely attentive in providing for my families needs. She was flexible with check in times and the house was well presented and very much as described. A lovely experience.

Spacious beautiful Australian home. Its location couldn't have been any better; the beach, bus stop, and grocery store were only a short walk away. Cat was very accommodating, had a well kept home, and fast internet. Our only regret was that we couldn't stay longer.

The place was beautiful and so so close to the beach and cafes! It was the perfect girls weekend away and we all left feeling super relaxed! The place is exactly like the pictures. I've already recommended Cat's place to many friends. Thanks Cat.

Cat made us feel really welcome, the house was clean and tidy, great facilities and great location, close to the beach but not on a busy road.  The house was ideal for us, two families and our mother in the 'annex'. We would definitely recommend the property and would return.
Relaxed vibe, perfect for families or couples, fabulous location, close to great shops, restaurants and iconic Bondi Beach.

From start to finish, our stay at Bondi Beach Dreaming was enjoyable.  It was homely and comfortable and kitted out with just about everything you could possibly need.  Will definitely book again here.  It is a short walk to Bondi beach, and shops, bars and cafes.  It felt safe, secure and private.  The beds and linen were comfortable and high quality, and the overall feel, was like being at our "home away from home".
Great house and location, walking distance to everything in Bondi! Very spacious rooms with everything you need, would definitely stay again. Cat was great to deal with and very helpful.

Fabulous location and lovely living and dining area, big enough for our group of 8, however there wasn’t 8 adult beds. Probably should be advertised as 6 adults 2 children, the 2 trundle beds were smaller than a single bed an our 5 ft 2 inch companions feet hung off end.

Very generous with late check out.

Definitely would stay there again.

Cat was a great host and catered for our large family group really well!
The place itself is very charming and its proximity to the weekend market, the shops and the beach is pretty unbeatable.

Highly recommend Cat, and highly recommend the place!
Thanks!
Absolutely loved our stay at Cat's place! Fantastic location and beautiful home. Cat was extremely helpful and a great host. Highly recommend!

6 friends and I stayed at Cats lovely house for a weekend and had the best time (apart from the torrential rain)! 
Cats house has everything you need including an open fire you can light, wood provided. I will definitely book again with a group or even take my family for a trip away. 
Cat was fantastic to communicate with, responding very quickly. 
Thank you Cat!!
Great place and awesome location next to some great food. Cat was easy going and flexible on arrival and check out.
Great place and location but needs fixing up. Thankfully Cat was very helpful and responsive to our request.

Cat wasn't there to meet us but we had a fantastic time! The house was a comfortable distance from the hustle and bustle of the centre of Bondi, and only a short walk away from the sea side. Cat's Neighbours were also really friendly and hospitable. Ready to offer us assistance whenever. The heating in the house was great during winter and the wifi was fantastic! The check in process was quick. The kitchen and pantry were really well stocked and the houses was prepped to perfection with small thoughtful things like an international plug adaptor that we had forgotten to bring. Thanks Cat for the lovely stay!!
OK

Best place to stay, Cat is lovely and very helpful, so close to everything and Cat's place is super clean,feels like home and we all had a ball, kids had fun and we loved the kitchen, we will stay again, hoping in summer , as said before, everything close , great restaurants, shopping,  transport  and everything  few minutes walk , thanks again Cat, we all loved Bondi
Cheers

Cat's place suited our needs perfectly. It was clean, comfortable, had plenty of amenities and was close to bars, cafes and the beach. Communication was really easy and Cat responded to any of my questions within minutes. We would not hesitate to stay there again.

Cat's house was in the best location. Just around the corner from great coffee shops and just a short walk to Bondi Beach. Bondi Beach itself is still only a 15 minute car ride to the city so it was terrific. The place was lovely and clean and beds very comfortable.
House was warm and decor fantastic. Had a great stay. Cat communicated promptly throughout.
We really enjoyed the our stay at Cat's in Bondi. The location was great, and the home itself was a good fit for the two families of 4 who stayed there for a couple nights.
Great central location only a short walk from the beach, loved all of Cat's recommendations for the area and LOVED the fireplace!  Really homely and comfortable.

We loved the vibe of the house, it was comfortable, had a great atmosphere and suited us perfectly. The neighbourhood is full of character and laid back, near the beach and shops, all round great for us.
Fantastic place everything you want and more.. we enjoyed our time at cats bondi home entirely...!!
We had a wonderful stay at Cat's place

Great stay 
Fabulous location 
Would definately stay again 
Homely 
Clean 
Everything we needed and some! 
Thank you Cat!
Such a gorgeous oasis. The photos in the listing don't do it justice. It was such an enjoyable stay.
Great value, great location and very responsive host. Thanks for having us, Cat.

A perfect getaway for our girls weekend away! Great location close to the beach as well as some amazing places to eat and drink. Cat's place was homely and welcoming and the ideal amount of space for 5 people.

Great stay at Cats house in Bondi! It was everything were after and more. Could not ask for a more perfect location. The house was clean and tidy and the bakery on the corner is to die for, we visited there every morning! Will definately stay again and recommend to all.
Had a great time at our reunion because Cat's place lived up to the photos and description and was just perfect for us.
Great house and location

Cat's house was great - exactly as described, awesome location close to everything! The house was clean, and the space worked really well - especially since we had 3 kids with us, who were able to spread out and play without getting under our feet! Cat was a very accomodating host, great communication and we felt really comfortable. The little extra touches like extra blankets and towels, and lovely soaps / shampoos in the bathrooms just topped it off! I would highly recommend staying at Cat's place.
Very nice family house, well equipped, close to the beach! Very nice breakfasts at the corner juste on the left!

I organized a weekend away with 4 of my girlfriends and me at Cats place in Bondi the weekend just gone. I was so impressed with the funky beach house and amazing location! The house was fully equipped with everything we needed for the weekend including shampoo & conditioner, beach towels even milk in the fridge. I couldn't recommend this place more if you are looking for a relaxing weekend away with friends or other couples, it was situated within easy walking distance to the general store, awesome little bakery and beach road hotel. We thoroughly enjoyed breakfast at the local Harrys café yesterday morning also. Thanks so much Cat, I will definitely be back :)

Our stay was fantastic. The house is in a perfect location and is very eclectic & funky. Cat (the owner) was fabulous. She answered any questions I had during our stay straight away and was very helpful. Highly recommend :)
The host canceled this reservation 32 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
We had a fantastic time in Bondi. Thanks Cat, your house is lovely. Comms were always prompt and very helpful.

Coordinating the check-in time and receiving the keys was effortless and smooth which is always much appreciated. The apartment is a few minutes walk from the beaches and the shops. There is also a cafe at the end of the block which was even more convenient for morning coffee/breakfast. Would definitely recommend!

We live near Portland, Oregon in the USA and it prides itself on being hip and weird. Bondi Beach must be its sister city times two. As a bunch of aged birdwatchers we didn't really fit in but felt comfortable and accepted anyway. Lots of shops and good restaurants within easy walking distance, and the beach is just as close. There's even a funky little nine hole golf course close by. It's perched on a cliff that overlooks the ocean and has million dollar views.

The house worked well for five adults (one couple and three others) and was clean and well appointed. There are even cookbooks displayed in the kitchen in case you wanted to get adventurous. One of the bedrooms is in a guesthouse in the back yard and it was a nice place for the couple to sleep and be apart form the others. Be prepared for visiting bugs, though.

Believe Cat when she says that you won't be able to park inside the gate without a high clearance vehicle but you will be able to park in the driveway if your car is on the small side. We had a minivan that was simply too big to allow for pedestrians pushing baby strollers to get by. Parking on the street is for two hours only and the nearest long-term free parking is s few blocks away. Remember to always leave space between you and the next car as locals seem to have no issue with pinning you in if you don't. 

Cat was great about communicating with us. She seemed available at all times, promptly answering any questions that we had.

Eric
Vancouver, WA 
USA

This accommodation is in a lovely location, quiet close to the beach. There was some miscommunication at the beginning, but Cat was exceptional in communication and sorting matters out straight away. 
The accommodation was very rustic with all mod cons, but in need of some refurbishment with the kitchen, which is due to be done after our visit. 
The location is easy to get into Sydney central with good transport links. It's also close to the stadiums and Bondi Junction shopping centre.
I would recommend this property for a relaxed stay. Thank you Cat!
what a perfect spot a really beautiful place .

Excellent stay at Bondi. All you can want in closeness to restaurants, the beach, busses and still have a secluded feel to it. The house had everything we needed and it was great for the kids also. We can highly recommend the house and the host Cat.

We stayed at cats place, travelling from the uk , for our daughters wedding in Sydney .
There were 6 members of extended family staying together.
Cats place was very homely and cosy, there were lots of extras included, quality toiletries , sun cream and a very well stocked larder that we were encouraged to use.
we were left to enjoy our time at the property , and any questions we had were answered promptly by Cat .
Highly recommended
The house was perfect for what we needed!  Tranquil and close to shops beach bars and restaurants. Great communication from Cat.

Good place for staying in Bondi. Unfortunately it was raining the whole time we were there so we couldn't really enjoy the nice outside space, which would have made the place a little more open and welcoming.

Having previously lived in Bondi, we were pleased to discover Cat's quiet beach bungalow. Great proximity to everything in Bondi - just next door to the weekend markets at the local school, 3 minute walk to the beach. The house has lots of space - we had no issues with 8 adults and a baby. Cat was an excellent host. Enjoy your stay!
The perfect Australian beach break, in the heart of Sydney

It was wonderful to be based in such a fantastic location for a long weekend of sunshine in Sydney! Cat was very responsive and helpful with all our requests. The house is clean, very well equipped and suited our family holiday of 3 generations perfectly. We would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a beachside place to stay.
A terrific stay in a lovely house near the beach. Host was always ready to respond and let us have an early check in if possible.
Fantastic home. Cat was a great host. We had a wonderful stay!
Great location, straightforward communication, well equipped kitchen. Close to great cafes and Bondi beach. Well recommended
Great location - close to pretty much anything you could need.

A beautiful house. Very large and comfortable, with ample inside and outside spaces. We chose this address to prepare for a wedding. It was perfect. Cat was always available and attended to every need.
This place was in a fantastic location. The house was large and very tidy. Cat was very easy to communicate with. Highly recommend for a comfortable stay.

The property was exactly as presented, immaculately clean and relaxing upon arrival. Beautiful open space and only a short walk from the main road. Little extras like quality bathroom products and comfortable beds made a huge difference. We will definitely be back.

Cat's place out the back of North Bondi is literally around the corner from a hip local scene with good grocers, bar and cafe action. The house is spectacular - classy and comfortable and in excellent taste. Cat is a genuine host and communicates extremely well. If this is the size and location you need, you'll not find better.

Cat's place was warm and welcoming, had everything we needed and was in a wonderful location close to Bondi beach but far enough away to be (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was easy and prompt.  The house was perfect for a group of friends or a couple of families.  I would be happy to stay again.

Cat's place was perfect for our girls getaway.  Amazing location, right next to Bondi Beach with a market and Harry's Expresso on the corner.  We walked everywhere.  Lovely, clean and funky décor, great outdoor entertaining space and plenty of beds.  Loved it, thank you.
Great house, great location. Just a few minutes walk to the beautiful bondi beach!
The house has everything you need and more.  wonderful location just steps away from great coffee and. rea shops and a stroll to the beach. s

This house is perfect !! It's in a fantastic location and really made our trip one to remember. Beautiful home and had everything you could need. Cat is a great host In all ways !! 
Cannot rave enough about this place and you will not be disappointed in any way !!!
Great location. Easy walk to the beach. An assortment of restaurants down the hill. The house was everything it said it would be. Recommended.
We spent a lovely weekend at Cat's place and everything was perfect from the communication, an option to check out late and the most amazing beds! Thank you Cat we would love to stay here again!

Cute traditional Sydney house, in a super location- away from the crazy touristy parts of Bondi, but close to the beach and in the more charming part of this ever-vibrant part of Sydney.
Equipped with everything you need, and close to plenty of good bus routes.
A bit chilly in this very cold spell of winter, but there are a couple of portable heaters.
Cute place with easy access to bondi and yummy food. A little cold at night through the winter, so if you travel with small children bring extra layers for sleeping!
Fantastic location. Walking distance to everything. Accomodation outstanding and the host was amazing. Would not hesitate to return.
Great location, very nice house. Cat had been great in answerring all possible questions
Fantastic location, great apartment set up and responsive and accommodating hosts.
Amazing location and every little detail in the house has been well thought out. Fantastic for extended families and groups. We can't wait to come back.

Cat's place was great, location was fantastic, a short walk to restaurants and the shops.  The corner shop cafe was very warm and welcoming and a really funky place to have a light meal or just a coffee. The house was very comfortable for a group of friends or family.  What struck us was the open plan living and plenty of lovely places to sit outside or on the porch or back deck.  Very nice.. would definetely stay again.

Le logement est parfait pour 2 familles, nous étions 2 couples avec 4 enfants et l'espace était assez grand pour tout le monde et bien pensé (1 chambre en bungalow en extérieur avec douche/toilette).
Le logement était propre (intérieur/extérieur), tout était prêt pour notre arrivée (hiver à Sydney) couettes sur les lits, bouillottes, radiateurs à disposition et la cheminée feu de bois ! génial ! (vraiment appréciable pour la saison). 
Le logement est vraiment joli, coquet. On s'y sent bien. C'est confortable (lit douillet) et bien aménagé.
Les enfants ont appréciés l'espace extérieur, le bassin à poissons.
La communication avec l'hôte a été bien organisé, aucun problème pour récupérer les clés. 
Le logement est extrèmement bien situé, c'est résidentiel, calme dans le sens ou se sont surtout des familles qui y vivent, c'est près mais aussi loin de l'agitation des bars et restos...branchés de Bondi.
Endroit très près de la plage et de l'arrêt de bus (1 min à pieds), très pratique lorsque l'on est avec des enfants. 
Sympa d'être juste à côté du marché de Bondi du samedi dimanche.
Juste le seul point qui peut être un inconvénient pour certains : l'isolation, ce n'est pas bien isolé pour l'hiver mais c'est partout pareil dans les maisons en Australie (cela doit être appréciable en été !), et pour le bruit de la route (camion poubelle) et des passants (le week end, la nuit)  aussi, la buanderie des voisins est collée à la chambre/bungalow extérieur, mais cela ne nous a pas plus dérangé, c'était vivable. 
Nous recommandons vivement se logement aux familles, groupe d'amis qui souhaitent séjourner sur Sydney et plus particulièrement sur Bondi.
Merci à l'hôte Cat, pour nous avoir permis de passer un agréable séjour dans une maison à Bondi.

Highly recommend this beautiful place. We booked for a girls' weekend, and we were really happy. The place is very clean, and just perfect for a relaxing holiday near the beach. Cat is a wonderful host and easy to deal with. Plenty to see and do, great access to public transport, and the shower is amazing! Would definitely stay there again. :-)

This house is so zen. The rooms are gorgeous, it has such a great vibe and set up. The bath tub is awesome, the kitchen has everything you need. The location is perfect, close to everything. Cat is the perfect host, very reliable and flexible. We all had the best time.

What a great house. Close to everything Bondi has to offer. We loved the beach and the beach hotel. 
Really well equipped and very clean. Great big comfortable beds and great little extras. Thanks to Cat for the early check-in, it all went without a hitch. 
See you next time!

This place provided the perfect accommodation for a getaway with my girlfriends! We all loved the location, the cosiness and the comforts of this place which sleeps 6 very comfortably. 
Cat was very easy to deal with and even gave us a late checkout which was what we needed for a lie in on our last day before returning to our daily grind! 
I'd recommend this place to anyone looking to have walking access to all that Bondi Beach has to offer!
Cat was amazing to deal with. Organized cots and highchairs for my twin babies so I didn't have to arrange a thing. Super helpful!

Cat's place is in a really good location, on a nice residential street but very close to the beach, shops, restaurants and public transport.  The house is really homely and comfortable, and the cleanliness couldn't be faulted.

Good location and nice house but not 5 star. Needed a good clean and there is no parking within the property. The adjoining property was being renovated, so we had to leave the house most mornings due to the excessive noise from a jackhammer. House had all the amenities most people would need and was very secure. Nice front and back outdoor areas.

I would highly recommend booking this house for a group of people. All the amenities you could possibly need, seperate bungalow out the back and fantastic location. Cat was very happy to answer any questions you need and quickly aswell.

Absolutely loved sharing a weekend with my daughters at your home. We enjoyed the location, so close to the beach and cafes and the warmth and ambience of the house was exactly what we were hoping for.
Great place to stay, well presented, handy location, host was excellent to deal with. Would recommend for group accomodation in the heart of Bondi

The location is fantastic. Walking distance to the beach yet far from the crowds, loads of coffee shops and stores nearby.
The house itself has a great feel to it. Hope to come back some day.

Cat’s place is amazing. It have a lovely yard and lovely plants in there. It is very close to the beach, just 10 min work. And Cat has a set of wonderful cook, the house is perfect for people who like cooking.

Just returned from a 2 night stay at this property and we could not fault it. House has plenty of space for 6 adults. Perfect location as it is close to everything. 
Communication with Cat was above and beyond amazing as she was always so efficient with replies and helpful with anything I needed. 

I Would definitely recommend this property for anyone looking for a great place, great location and great surroundings.
Fantastic home in a great location to walk to everything in Bondi. Really loved the tranquil feel of the house and the back and front yard. Thanks Cat!
Lovely 7 minute walk to the beach and 2 minutes from the bus stop. Great dining areas both indoor and out! Kitchen perfect for cooking!

Loved the eclectic style and additional room outside.  Very open feeling and well stocked
With everything you need, including beach towels.  Turn right out of the driveway and the organic coffee a shop is at the next corner, which is great for coffee and breakfast.
A fantastic house in a great location. We really enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay again in the future!

Cat's place was great. Pictures just as it was in reality. Also very repponsive and felxible in terms of numbers of people that we were being charged for, even reducing the original price we paid because 1 person couldn't come. Also allowed flexible check in and out times which was very helpful.
Plenty of outside spaces to relax. Safe for children. Fantastic location, close to beach, coffee shops and recreation areas. A bit like home away from home.
Beautiful home in a great location!
Beautiful home! Close to beach and shops. Large home with breeze and comfort

Cat was a quick responder and accommodated all our requests, the bungalow was quirky and more spacious that the photos suggested. The location was excellent and we loved every second. Two families stayed and it was perfect for us. Thanks!
A lovely place to stay. It is a nice little home a short walk from Bondi beach and local shops. Be aware that one of the rooms is the old garage and detached from the main house.
Such a great base camp for visiting Bondi. Cafes and shops close by, and a close walk to the beach! Cat was a great host. Thanks!

We can’t love this house more.
Parking was a little tricky but didn’t damper our experience. Highly recommend this stay being close to beach, buses and cafes :)

We loved staying at this house in Bondi;  it was close to the beach, shops, transportation, and the Saturday Farmers Market.  We have many good memories.  We had many good BBQs on the patio.  Such a great setting with potted plants all over.  The house was definitely comfortable for six people.

This house is a five minute walk to the beach - AMAZING location. Perfect for early morning walks to see the sunrise at Bondi Beach. The space is large and the main house shower was spectacular. The bedrooms and living space are large. The small touches were nice - there was coffee available which was huge, and the hair dryer available worked really well (long haired Airbnbers know how important this is)! 

Cat was an amazing host, and was extremely responsive. The outdoor spade was lovely and the fish are a great touch. As someone who isn’t used to seeing bugs often, the amount of bugs we saw was a bit alarming, but Cat took care of this right away!
Lovely place, great location. Would stay again
Great house in perfect location. Would highly recommend and Cat is an extremely helpful owner.

LIVE THE BONDI DREAM!  Cat's place is a private oasis in  the heart of beach-chic Bondi, only three quaint blocks to the sand (which my four-year-old insisted on completing barefoot like the locals).  It's as hip as Brooklyn but with better weather than Los Angeles and a fraction of the people,  Everything you could want is in the kitchen, and many thoughtful extras in the bathroom.  We enjoyed reading on the front porch and dining al fresco in the garden. Cat was a responsive super helpful hostess with a nice vibe in keeping with the Bondi lifestyle.  Hope to return soon.
Cat’s place was a pleasure to stay at. I would definitely recommend this home and will stay there again when the opportunity arises!

Wonderful spot, close but not on top of the cool Bondi scene.  Instantly felt at home there. Kids enjoyed it tremendously. 

Only slight issue was the neighbours had a young screaming baby which was rather noisy. 

Cat was great!
Great spot, short walk to beach and a ton of great cafes and food options nearby!

This was the first Air bnb booking I have done and I was a bit nervous.  It was the best experience ever.  Cat is an extremely gracious hostess.  Very friendly, great communication and really thoughtful, unexpectedly offering us early check in and late check out because it was possible. 

The house has a lovely friendly feel to it, and is as amazing as the pictures look, they are accurate.   Loved sitting in the beautiful courtyard, sipping champagne and enjoying the fish.

So many small attentions to detail.... having champagne stoppers, insect repellant and a really helpful guide to the house and how to navigate the surrounding areas. Lovely toiletries and an amazing open fire - yes I had the fire going, not because it was really cold, but because I love an open fire and this was one of the reasons I chose the property.  Cat was very accommodating with this and we had plenty of firewood. The fire burnt and drew well.

Great location. The house is a very easy walk to Bondi Beach, even for unfit me, and an even shorter walk to groceries, bottle shop, cafe and restaurants.

Parking is the only thing that is a bit awkward.  The listing description is accurate in this regard.  If you have a regular size car you will not be able to get into the driveway, which is such a shame.  We were able to get longer stay parking in other streets, but this obviously wasn't as convenient. It was doable though.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and intend to stay there again.

Stayed for a hens weekend, very central location and access to everything in Bondi. Cat gave us some great tips for restaurants and cafes! The bakery on the corner was insane! Very flexible with check out time which was helpful for our afternoon flights out.. thanks Cat!
Beautiful, spacious, stylish accommodation. Everything that 5 adults needed in a great location. Perfect for us!

We had a great stay at Cats Bondi house. The house is very stylish and had everything we needed. We loved  all the tea and Nespresso machine. The house is close to the beach about a 5 or so minute walk. Close to bars and restaurants. Would definitely stay here again.
Nice house & good location.

A lovely rustic beach house with good sized beds and great spots for family entertaining.  Added extras were a box of toys for the grandkids, nice products in bathroom and plenty of plates/cutlery/saucepans etc.  cat was very welcoming and provided plenty of information to help us with our stay.  Thank you Cat for your hospitality
Cat’s place is beautiful, we really enjoyed our stay
Great location, close to beach, restaurants, Rose and Watson Bay.  Cat was very responsive and helpful.  Great local cafe less than 100 metres walk on the corner.
A place to relax and rejuvenate x
A great location and a fantastic layout.

Cat's place is a little home away from home. It feels very cosy, the fire place is a great asset and while you're waiting for it to get going, you can warm up with the gas heater. As we were there in winter, the added heater in each room were a great help as was the hot water bottles :) The bath is so big and instant hot water aplenty!! All the local tips were a great help and we even managed to park our monster 4WD rented car in the driveway ;) 
A great holiday and we would be happy to return.
Thank you Cat.
Good experience in Sydney, convenient location to the Bondi Beach
Excellent!
Beautiful house, great location! Was a wonderful stay!

You cannot beat this location in Bondi. Walking distance to the beach, cafes and restaurants. The house was big enough to accommodate two couples and two babies plus have some friends over for dinner without feeling cramped. We ended up having bad weather so we were inside a lot but that didn’t matter because the house was so spacious and had a fireplace! I would highly recommend this house.
Great stay thanks!

Cat's place was the perfect base for our girls' trip in Bondi. We took full advantage of the short walk to everything in Bondi, from the beach to shopping to restaurants. The house had plenty of space, and our group of 5 was extremely comfortable. The large, open areas were perfect for dinners and hanging out together, and the backyard had some beautiful fish!

I would definitely recommend this place to anyone who is looking for a stay in Bondi!
Cat was more than accommodating and an excellent communicator. Her house is brilliant with lovely private spaces and a quick walk to Bondi. Highly recommend :)
great place! super location. close to shops, restaurants, beach, public transport. house has a lovely, zen feeling. makes you feel very safe, comfortable and at home.
lovely space,  great location

Cat was great! The place was welcoming and homey. We felt right at home. Definitely recommend. This was perfect for my family of four. We were able to cuddle up in the comfy couch after a day on the beach. 

We are especially grateful for our experience here because we had to cancel our previous place at the rocks.  The host there was unaffected with our concerns. All of which were half heartedly addressed, if at all.  The house at the rocks where we stayed had a terrible mold problem. My poor son was having asthma attacks. 

Luckily, Cat was able to accommodate last minute and she was sure to deal with any concerns we had right away. But we didn’t have any. Everything was great, you won’t be disappointed.

name: March 2019 availability! Oceanview on Sugar Beach!
space: NIGHTLY RATE INCLUDES ALL TAXES!  The Kealia Resort - Just a few steps from the warm sand of Sugar Beach, Maui's longest white-sand beach. With gorgeous views, this nicely updated, fourth floor, condo at the Kealia Resort beachfront complex is waiting for you!  The six-mile stretch of beach, calm waters, and close proximity to town, make it the perfect vacation spot for honeymooners, families, and everyone in between!  A beautiful and relaxing beachfront retreat. Treat yourself to long walks on the beach and spectacular evening sunsets. You'll enjoy fantastic whale watching from your balcony/lanai (in the winter months). Or grab your snorkel and swim with the green sea turtles. You'll love the warm and gentle ocean, perfect for swimming, kayaking or try windsurfing.  Free WiFi high speed internet access. 42' flat screen TV, with cable. Lounge in the sun, and cool off in the oceanfront pool. Or grill some fresh seafood on the beachfront grills. Then take few steps to play on the beach.
description: NIGHTLY RATE INCLUDES ALL TAXES!  The Kealia Resort - Just a few steps from the warm sand of Sugar Beach, Maui's longest white-sand beach. With gorgeous views, this nicely updated, fourth floor, condo at the Kealia Resort beachfront complex is waiting for you!  The six-mile stretch of beach, calm waters, and close proximity to town, make it the perfect vacation spot for honeymooners, families, and everyone in between!  A beautiful and relaxing beachfront retreat. Treat yourself to long walks on the beach and spectacular evening sunsets. You'll enjoy fantastic whale watching from your balcony/lanai (in the winter months). Or grab your snorkel and swim with the green sea turtles. You'll love the warm and gentle ocean, perfect for swimming, kayaking or try windsurfing.  Free WiFi high speed internet access. 42' flat screen TV, with cable. Lounge in the sun, and cool off in the oceanfront pool. Or grill some fresh seafood on the beachfront grills. Then take few steps to play on the beach.
notes: NIGHTLY RATE INCLUDES ALL TAXES! The Kealia Resort is next to Sugar Beach Resort on the north side.  The address is 191 N. Kihei Rd.
house_rules: No pets please No smoking please

reviews.comments:
This is a great place to stay, we really liked the condo and the property, particularly the ability to walk out onto the beach.  Very quiet, just a few folks strolling the beaches, nice change from Kaanapali.   

The room is very private, with only palms and ocean outside the windows.  The small park area next door is nice as well.

The condo is comfortable with everything you need.   Will be hoping to come back in the future.
The apartment was great. Beautiful view, peaceful neighborhood, great location and easy beach access. The whole process and stay was hassle free and very relaxing. Highly recommended!

The description of this condo was exactly what we found when we arrived.  It was very clean and we had everything we needed.  It's located in a central location.  It's in an area that isn't overly crowded with businesses or hotels yet not a far drive from restaurants, shopping, other beaches etc.  The lanai felt very private and peaceful as we watched the waves crash along the shoreline.  We really enjoyed the use of the boogie boards that were in our condo as well as the coffee & donuts on Friday morning provided by the condo complex!  Would definitely go back!

This was our first time in Hawaii. We were told tha the location  we chose was not near anything. This location was BEAUTIFUL and absolutely perfect. It was quiet and the beach was always empty. A short drive from restaurants and a shirt beaxh walk from the best little bakery. The condo was everyrhing we needed. The beds were comfy and it was clean. Loved that we didnt have to worry about keys. There were beach chairs, noodles, and boogy boards available for use. We had an amazing trip. Cant wait to go again! The location was perfect for us. Absolutely perfect!

Absolutely a wonderful place to stay when wanting beautiful scenery and super great access to the coolest part of this island! The condo had everything we needed and the snorkeling equip and beach chairs were used everyday. It felt like the honeymoon my husband and I never took! Thank you gage and Andrew. We WILL be back!

The condo was just as described and wonderful! Lovely views from the lanai and common area room. My Wife and I just visited for our honeymoon and had a great time exploring Maui and relaxing on the Beach. 

The location is a very quiet and peaceful area of the beach but still close to everything. We were able to see many sights and surrounding towns, yet get in beautiful beach time. The building and condo is well maintained, and the grounds are landscaped very nicely.  The sound of the ocean and the palm trees at night in the bedroom made for a relaxing way to fall asleep. There are all the needed beach necessities and the kitchen is well appointed. We also enjoyed listening to the Hawaiian Cd's that were available in the apartment. It was a good introduction to the Slack Key style and added to the ambiance.   

Don't forget to take a walk to the farmer's market and Sugar Beach Bake shop. It was our favorite way to start the morning. There are several supermarkets / drug stores within a 10 minute drive or less should you need anything. 

We hope to visit again someday soon!

The check in process was easy. The condo was well equipped with beach supplies beach chairs, umbrella, sand toys, snorkeling gear and towels. The location was perfect on the beach and easy to get to stores. It was a perfect condo for my family. We had an amazing time. I would highly recommend this place.

Gage was receptive and communicated well with us. Gave us great tips on where to go locally. Their place is well kept, everything one needs is there... Everything. The place is clean. Central to where we want to visit. Walk down and you're on the beach. The place was perfect and we made the right choice! Thank you Gage!

We stayed 3 nights at the condo, first pitsop of our Maui tour. With teenage boys this was a perfect location with pool, grass area and beach. We visited the big beach (20-30min drive) but otherwise enjoyed the beach right in front of the condo. And the view from the balcony, it was perfect! The condo was comfy and had all the amenities we needed. Highly recommended!
Location is great.
Great communication. Place was as advertised and suited us well for our weeks stay. Would definitely recommend.

We stayed here on our first trip to Maui and this location was fabulous!  Beautiful beach walks and so much to do nearby.  Sugar Beach is lovely and the view from the balcony is amazing! The condo was clean, quiet and cool.  The condo was well stocked with all we needed.(cooler, beach towels, dishes, etc.) Condo is centrally located and close to grocery stores and great restaurants! (Paia fish market, Kihei cafe, Nalu's, and pizza madness)

Great location, very close to all the restaurants and other beaches in Kehei. The property itself is right in-front of Sugar beach which is a beautiful beach, very walkable. We enjoyed our early morning walks on Sugar beach. The condo is comfortable with a washer-dryer, a fully equipped kitchen in-case you get tired of eating outside and want to make your own meal. Safe and family-friendly property.
ﾛｹｰｼｮﾝは最高です｡海が近くで､波の音を聞き､星空を眺め､素敵なﾊﾞｹｰｼｮﾝが過ごせます｡

Super Cozy and Super Clean.  Fantastic view from the balcony.  A very good location in Maui to access the entire island and see all the attractions.

Gage was very prompt and responsive.

This rental is a great value! Loved the location, so convenient to all parts of the island.  Gage was quick to respond to our inquiries.  The condo management were very nice and everyone staying there was very friendly.  Grounds are well kept.  My daughter loved playing in the pool with other children.  We enjoyed having a washer and dryer in the unit.  During the day when we were there, we just left windows and door open because the cross breeze was so nice. Many others did the same. The ocean waters on this side of the island are calm, especially in the morning.  So we enjoyed swimming and riding the waves during the day.  We loved morning walks along the beach and watching the sunset. The beach was not crowded and we really appreciated the beach chairs and beach towels provided by owners. We also appreciated the designated parking space. Condo had everything we needed for a wonderful Maui vacation.  We highly recommend this budget friendly rental. I would rather stay here than a high priced hotel condo.

Awesome place - great view, great location, very clean, strong A/C, free parking spot. It gets better: the apt has snorkeling/beach/surfing equipment , and its own beach is 1 min walk away. We loved this place and wanna come back!

Excellent location for exploring Maui. Gage provided beach towels, beach chairs, umbrellas, & everything one would need for checking out all the great beaches Maui has to offer. Kihei is a super chill area with quiet beaches, great food, and friendly people.
Cute, clean, awesome view, saw whales every time I looked at the water. We came home to watch the sunset from the balcony everynight.  Good location. I would reccomend to everyone.

name: Sala e quarto em copacabana com cozinha americana
summary: Apartamento novo e reformado, em prédio residencial. Cozinha americana, quarto virado para uma reserva, muito silencioso, vista para árvores. Possui ar condicionado novo, internet, máquina de lavar roupas.  Tudo novinho. O apartamento fica localizado a 3 quadras da praia, perto do metrô cardeal arco verde, com muitos restaurantes, mercados e shoppings perto.
description: Apartamento novo e reformado, em prédio residencial. Cozinha americana, quarto virado para uma reserva, muito silencioso, vista para árvores. Possui ar condicionado novo, internet, máquina de lavar roupas.  Tudo novinho. O apartamento fica localizado a 3 quadras da praia, perto do metrô cardeal arco verde, com muitos restaurantes, mercados e shoppings perto. O apartamento fica localizado em copacabana, o melhor e mais badalado bairro para passar o Reveillon!!!! Ponto de ônibus exatamente em frente ao prédio, sem tirar que fica ao lado da estação de metrô cardeal arcoverde. Possui estacionamentos perto também.
