host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

name: Where Castles and Art meet the Sea
summary: The flat is located in Matosinhos, part of Porto's District, where you can have the best of both worlds: the magic and beauty of Porto's Old City and the Beaches, Central Park and Seafood restaurants, with plenty of eclectic entertainment.
space: The space is a luxurious one bedroom apartment, with 80m2, in front of the sea, with all amenities that you need for a luxurious and relaxed experience, alone or with your family and friends.
description: The flat is located in Matosinhos, part of Porto's District, where you can have the best of both worlds: the magic and beauty of Porto's Old City and the Beaches, Central Park and Seafood restaurants, with plenty of eclectic entertainment. The space is a luxurious one bedroom apartment, with 80m2, in front of the sea, with all amenities that you need for a luxurious and relaxed experience, alone or with your family and friends. Nearby you can find plenty of entertainment, like our Porto's "Central Park" (200m), the "Parque da Cidade", with its heathy lifestyle and great concerts. The Matosinhos beach (20m), where you can relax or do some water sports, like surf, kite surf, etc. The best Seafood restaurants (1km) with the amazing fresh fish and traditional Portuguese flavors. The fanciest part of Porto "Foz" and "Avenida da Boavista" (1km) with their beautiful people and trendy restaurants and shops. And last but not least, our main pearl, Porto's Old Town (8km), with their beautiful hi
neighborhood_overview: This apartment is located in a residential and Up-market Complex, that will give you a "Homy" feeling, where your neighbors appreciate privacy and tranquility. So, a perfect place for a high-quality and relaxed staying.
notes: The house is perfectly prepared to have a baby. In the bedroom (stored on the closet there is a travel cot ( (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) cm), ZIPPY NAP NAP ZY BABY, with an extra mattress, bed sheets, duvet and baby pillow. The house has, as well, a highchair with tray (IKEA, ANTILOP) to help the baby to have his/her meals. To help you store your value belongings the house has a safe box for your comfort.
transit: The house is located in a place where you have diferente options of Access, for instance, you can access by Car, by Train, by Cruise or by Airport. There is Metro station nearby (Matosinhos Sul), right on your door step (500m away from the house). If you prefer, you can always use the city Bus (10m away) or UBER (taxi is another option) for your comfort. The sightseeing buses, stop just in front of the House.
access: Nearby you can find plenty of entertainment, like our Porto's "Central Park" (200m), the "Parque da Cidade", with its heathy lifestyle and great concerts. The Matosinhos beach (20m), where you can relax or do some water sports, like surf, kite surf, etc. The best Seafood restaurants (1km) with the amazing fresh fish and traditional Portuguese flavors. The fanciest part of Porto "Foz" and "Avenida da Boavista" (1km) with their beautiful people and trendy restaurants and shops. And last but not least, our main pearl, Porto's Old Town (8km), with their beautiful history and old buildings, new trendy restaurants and bars,  Museus and theaters and so much more... Everything just few minutes away from the house, you just have to check your mood and you will always find something different to do here.
interaction: To ensure that you will have a fully supported staying, I will provide all the assistance that you need, namely, guide you through all your concerns, needs and wishes in Porto,for instance, help you finding a cruise in Douro's River, a Show in a Theatre, a dinner in a fancy restaurant at Foz (most exquisite area of Porto), or a traditional Portuguese restaurant. You just have to name it! We will provide you as well, with all support for any house's issues so you can enjoy your stay peacefully. Your comfort and happiness are our main aim.
house_rules: I think the main rule of the house is, take care of that as if, is your own house. If you decide to rent more then two weeks is mandatory a weekly cleaning, with an extra cost of 30€ per week.  The house has fibre TV with 130 channels, nevertheless, if any extra subscription will be activated during your stay, that amount will be charged to your account, on the end of your staying.

host.host_about: All my life I’ve travelled hopping that one day I would be able to share my country, my house, my experiences, with those who have the same love about new cultures, new people and new emotions, as I do. Thank you for being a part of that!

reviews.comments: Perfect stay ! Impossible to do it better , Thank you Jose and i hope That i Will come back soon :)

Apartamento impecable, situación inmejorable. Perfectamente equipado, con todas las comodidades y màs!! Nos recibieron puntual e impecablemente. Trato superamable y acogedor. Mil gracias a nuestro anfitrión y su amigo Sergio, nos sentimos como en casa. Obrigada!
Excellent reception and follow up by Jose and Sergio. My family really enjoyed their support. Many thanks

José is a fantastic host, together with Sergio they took care of our stay in the apartment. The place is fantastic, with a view to the beach and the giant sculpture "She Changes". Well placed between Foz, the beaches and the restaurants area. The apartment is well equipped, with a modern decoration and clean. They provided us with a cot and a high chair for our baby. I recommend the apartment if you want to know Porto and Matosinhos, or simply relax by the sea. Thank you Jose and Sergio. We hope to return! Everything was perfect

It was an amazing apartment close to the beach, you only have to take the escalator, you walk 2 mn and there you are! You also have access to a swimming pool. Our kids had a lot of fun there !! Sergio, a friend of José welcame us with such a kindness... Really! If you want to visit Porto and you love the ocean Matosinhos is the place to be and this apartment is the place to rest !! Thanks for everything José and Sergio and thank you most of all for your kindness !!!
Très bel appartement situé à deux pas de la plage. José est très accueillant et laisse des petites attentions partout dans l'appartement!

The apartment is really nice & comfortable. It really does have everything:) José & Sergio were great hosts. It's a shame that there is a huge building in front of living room & bedroom which almost completely blocks out sea view :(  Take note that Matasinhos is a 25/30min tram journey to Porto (although  much closer by car).
Perfect as usual , best stay in Matosinhos

Estuvo esperando Sergio a nuestra llegada porque Jose estaba fuera. Nos enseñó la casa y nos sugirió sitios a donde ir. Atendió una llamada nuestra enseguida y nos despidió a la hora concertada, todo con amabilidad y en español. El piso está en una playa tipo surfista, en primera línea y delante tiene la línea del autobús que te lleva al centro de Oporto bordeando el mar y el río. También a unos cuantos metros puedes coger el metro que te deja en la parte alta del centro de Oporto pero es bastante ruidoso.
El piso está muy bien para los que quieren combinar playa con ambiente de la ciudad de Oporto.
Nosotros íbamos en familia con niños (12-14) y nos encajó bien. Pasamos un par de días en Oporto (pateada, paseo en barco, funicular, telesférico, tranvía...) y otros dos en Matoshinos y en Leca da Palmeira (surf, piscinas de mar, baños...). El agua del mar fría, conviene neopreno.
Bueno, que hemos pasado unos días estupendos y entretenidos.
Felicidades a los portugueses por hablar inglés y más o menos español y hacerse entender. Gracias, algunos deberían aprender de este país.

Idéal situation to enjoy both the best beach of Porto and the city. Shop close by. Metro very close as well. Touristic bus stop at the bottom of the building. Apartment clean, matching the pictures. Welcome gift very enjoyable, and nice attention: water in the fridge. Comfortable bed, and well equipped kitchen. Super quite apartment.
As a summary, perfect for a couple
The host canceled this reservation 100 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Logement idéalement situé près de la fameuse plage de Matosinhos, spacieux, très propre, décoré avec goût, près de délicieux restaurants où le rapport qualité/prix est vraiment interessant , une vie nocturne vraiment sympa et la piscine très appréciée les jours ou trop de vent pour la plage. José notre hôte nous a gaté en nous laissant des gentilles attention tel que de l'eau et des jus de fruit au frais dans le frigo (ce qui est bienvenu quand on a fait 17h de route), du vin, du lait, des bières, shampoing, gel douche etc... Je suis tombé sous le charme de ce lieu.  Merci José

The apartment was in excellent conditions. Very clean and warm. Everything was well organized. The position of the apartment is perfect. Close to public transportes and with direct access at the sea. The view from the balcony is amazing. The owner, José, was very helpful and always available for anything we needed. I recommend the apartment without any doubt.
Panagiotis Saliaris

name: Aluguel Temporada Casa São Conrado
summary: Casa em São Conrado, com vista para a floresta e para o mar. Apenas 5 minutos da praia e do super mercado Zona Sul, rua com segurança e guarita. Próximo do Shopping Fashion Mall. Bairro mais Private do Rio. Próximo ao Clube de Voo Livre.
space: Piscina, gramado, acomada 8 pessoas em 4 suítes.
description: Casa em São Conrado, com vista para a floresta e para o mar. Apenas 5 minutos da praia e do super mercado Zona Sul, rua com segurança e guarita. Próximo do Shopping Fashion Mall. Bairro mais Private do Rio. Próximo ao Clube de Voo Livre. Piscina, gramado, acomada 8 pessoas em 4 suítes. Acesso livre pela casa. Permitido fumar. name: Homely Room in 5-Star New Condo@MTR
summary: Located in Mongkok, close to everything. 2min walk to both Mongkok and Mongkok East station. Gym, sauna and swimming pool (in summer) are available in the clubhouse.   You'll have a private double room. Washroom and kitchen are shared with host. We are family of 3, my husband, 1y old son and me. The guest bedroom can accommodate two people, the 3rd person has to sleep on the couch (3'x6') in the living room.
space: You will stay with my son, my husband and me. We couple love travelling very much and have been to more than 35 countries in the past few years. We like to share our travel tips and photos with everyone.  There is a luxury clubhouse in my building, with gym and swimming pool.  The building is newly built and it's the most luxury one in Mongkok area.
description: Located in Mongkok, close to everything. 2min walk to both Mongkok and Mongkok East station. Gym, sauna and swimming pool (in summer) are available in the clubhouse.   You'll have a private double room. Washroom and kitchen are shared with host. We are family of 3, my husband, 1y old son and me. The guest bedroom can accommodate two people, the 3rd person has to sleep on the couch (3'x6') in the living room. You will stay with my son, my husband and me. We couple love travelling very much and have been to more than 35 countries in the past few years. We like to share our travel tips and photos with everyone.  There is a luxury clubhouse in my building, with gym and swimming pool.  The building is newly built and it's the most luxury one in Mongkok area. Wifi, gym, swimming pool (in summer), kitchen, shower room, living room, dining room, TV My husband and I will stay with you. So we would like to chat with you anytime when we are at home.   Our first son was born in May 2016. Many rest
neighborhood_overview: Many restaurants and shops nearby.
notes: Just feel as home. We will give you all assistance. The 3rd guest is allowed to sleep on the sofa in the living room, and it's subject to an extra charge HK$250 per night.
transit: 2min to both Mongkok and Mongkok East MTR station.  1min to China coach station. Direct bus to airport (A21, E21, N21A, NA21) Many buses go thru Nathan Rd and Argyle St.
access: Wifi, gym, swimming pool (in summer), kitchen, shower room, living room, dining room, TV
interaction: My husband and I will stay with you. So we would like to chat with you anytime when we are at home.   Our first son was born in May 2016.
house_rules: • Check-in time is 2PM. Keep silent after 11pm as law required. Clean up the kitchen after used. Please turn off the light and air-conditioner when you leave.

reviews.comments: 房间很干净,位置超方便,附近吃东西买东西离地铁站大巴都很近,房主一家都是喜欢旅游的,特别热心帮我们规划行程,推荐我们好吃的餐厅,来香港完全没做任何准备也逛得很顺利

1) Well located: close to the Mongkok Metro Station. The bus stop A21 to the airport is also within 6 minutes walking. 
2) Very convenient for shopping.
3) Personal space and privacy is guaranteed for guests: I felt convenient and relaxed while staying here.
4) patient, considerate and friendly hosts: Crystal and her husband are of great help and they are very easy to get along with. When I were leaving, they noticed that I got two pieces of  heavy luggage. They helped me take it to the bus station and saw me off. As a first-time traveler to Hong Kong and a Main-lander, I thank Crystal and her husband for offering me such a pleasant experience.

Great location in heart of Mong Kong. Super clean abd well organized house with all confort you need. Mike and Crystal are very sweet and cheerful person. I enjoyed stayed with them and Sauna at 5 floors was so good.  My first choice in Hong Kong.

This is a clean and beatiful apartment, I really enjoy staying here. Also, Crystal and Alon are very nice. It is the coldest in HK, luckily, with Alon's help, I enjoyed the warm air conditioner and felt warm and safty. Thanks the sweety couple! Highly recommended you to live Crystal's apartment.
真的太棒了,房间是小了点,但是很实在｡房东很好很nice｡非常喜欢那公寓,好豪华,连门卫的素质都超好,服务一流｡高端住所,安全性高｡距离旺角站,旺角东站都好近｡真的很不错｡
房东很nice ,挺热心的,房间干净整洁,很舒服,地理位置很好,离地铁站很近,但又不吵闹,逛街买东西吃饭很方便,下次来还会考虑入住,哈哈
房东夫妇非常的热情,为我们的旅行提供了很多帮助｡房间位于大厦里面,是那种有专门的工作人员开门的那种高级公寓里面,有club house｡房间很温馨,面积不大,但两个人住也够了｡靠近旺角和旺角东地铁站,附近就是女人街和波鞋街,购物非常方便｡附近一家Miss Indian的咖喱饭特别棒,Miss Indian左转左转巷子口一家档口的双拼面粉值得光临,人多需要等位｡期待下次再来香港
很棒的一次住宿体验!首先,住宿的位置优越,出了地铁站没几分钟就到了,离女人街､波鞋街都非常近,附近就很好逛;其次,房东Craystal和阿龙人都非常好,特别热情!会告诉你怎么游玩比较合适,还会给我们推荐去哪里吃东西､买东西,非常nice!下次去香港,还住他家!

Thank you  very much Crystal , for providing such a beautiful and convenient room for us . The room was well decorated and equipped .  The couple , they were really hospitable and  helpful , we immediately got what we wanted when we asked for the ways to Vitoria Bay.   Thank you again Crystal. We will have another go if we go to hk in next time.
Modern n safe building , central located, friendly hosts, comfortable apartment. Highly recommended!!
Great experience. The apartment has premium location and superb facilities. Chrystal and Thl are probably the best host you can expect. Highly recommend!
Crystal's husband meet us at the train station, they are young and nice couple. The apartment is new and located at Mongkok, very near to the MRT (Mongkok East Station).
本次旅途非常愉快!第一日很早就到了旺角东,房东已经早早的在等候我们了｡来到入住地方的大堂,管理职员都很有礼貌地主动问好,进入家里感觉很温馨,摆设都是井井有条并且干净｡为我们准备的房间很舒服｡地理位置是最满意的一点｡如果起得早楼下二楼还有一个酒家在十一点半前有早茶优惠,我同妈妈两个人食得很饱,买单才70港币｡回来可以推荐给身边的朋友｡
很好的住宿体验,年轻的房东夫妇友善热情,提供了很多帮助给我们!地理位置离旺角很近,交通非常方便,也很安全,房间不大但干净整洁,住的温馨舒服,下次来香港还会选择这里!
非常干净整洁的房间,房东人也超级好,虽然交流不多但是有问题必热情解决｡边上走几分钟就是繁荣的旺角地区｡虽然我们基本上都在外面,但是一回来就有回家的感觉｡在香港这个价位应该是住过最好最舒适的地方了!
房间有些迷你,但很温馨,房东夫妇很热心为我们介绍屋内设施使用方法,并为我们提供了许多帮助,会向朋友推荐的
第一次住民宿,Crystal 和阿龙都热情很亲切,给我们推荐好吃好玩儿的地方,对我们很关心｡位置绝佳,大楼环境很好,出去到哪都很方便｡家里也很整洁很温馨,不太大,但是是很实在的,应有尽有,真的很喜欢!超级推荐!下次有机会一定再来｡
房东夫妇很好人,很贴心,也很乐于未我们解决问题!房间很温馨,很舒服!下次来一定会再次选择1!

There is wonderful place.,, I'm highly regard clean,,, also He has very clean room. Everything is perfect. The Host was very kind and civil. He gave us delicious snacks :-) The lodging was taken a share for our trip!! Thankyou for my Host.

홍콩 첫 여행이었기에 침사츄이쪽에 숙소를 잡아야 좋은줄 알았는데 아니었어요 몽콩에 위치한 이 숙소는 다른 장소로도 여행하기 편리했고 시설도 너무 완벽하고 몽콕역에서 숙소까지 오는길도 가깝고 좋아요 그리고 호스트는 정말 친절!! 최고!! 지금도 (Hidden by Airbnb) 으로 연락합니다.  깔끔하고 아늑하고 전망좋고 시설좋고 친절하고 정말 완벽한 숙소입니다. 다시 여행가도 또 지내고싶은 숙소!!

Hello Crystal and Mike~^^
im arrive in Korea 
i was good stay coz you're kk
and i was funny to talking with you
i hope so good healthy bron baby~!!
see you again in HK orKR!!!

We liked the apartment. The location is very convenient. The condo where the apartment is located is very beautiful. The apartment itself is very small, though comfortable. 
If you want to stay in Hong Kong at a reasonable price I would definitely recommend. It is difficult to find something better for this money.
好舒服的家｡地點方便｡Crystal很 friendly,關於行程問題都可以問她｡只可惜我行程太緊迫,沒什麼和他們聊天｡會推薦給朋友｡

Staying at Crystals place was fantastic. Our flight landed earlier than check in time so she was very accommodating and allowed us to check in early. Her and her husband greeted us with smiles and showed us around their place. They thought of everything for their guests - including a power adapter! In addition to their bathroom and kitchen, we enjoyed the extra amenities their place provided like the work out facility and yoga room. Hopefully we will be back when it is warmer to use the pool! Great location in walking distance to many shops and restaurants - fun area of Hong Kong. Thanks again Crystal!
房间的地理位置很好,离旺角地铁站和旺角东地铁站都近,整栋楼是酒店式管理的感觉｡有一点没有预料到就是床有点小,这次两个人睡就不够睡了｡

Feel at home, that's how i felt at Crystal's home. 
Her and her husband were very nice and helpful at check in and for any question I had. 
The room was clean, small but it's very hard to find a big room in Hong Kong. 
The apartment situation is very convenient, near shops, 7/11, restaurants, subway,... 
I recommend to stay there!
Very convenient to Mong Kok station. Hosts were very nice and respectful of my privacy. Would stay with them again!
房间是在旺角地铁附近的高级公寓,位置很好啦,房东也很友好,比住酒店经济实惠多了,nice

Crystal and her husband are the sweetest people ever!!! Thank you so much for your hospitality! They are very informative about the area and give great advice and tips! Thank you so much had a great stay!

Communication was good and everything went smoothly. The location is great with plenty of places nearby to eat. Hosts were very helpful. Thank you! The room is quite small but I hear it's like this in most places in HK.
位置優越,就在奶露臣街轉入染布坊街,麥花臣球場後面,從旺角地鐵E2出口走過去大約8分鐘｡房間幹凈整潔,舒適雅致,Cristal與阿龍都十分nice健談,期待有機會再次入住｡

It was a wonderful experience. The apartment is too good and the location is also good. Bed was not that wide and we (me along with my wife and kid) did not get enough space :-). About hospitality - he leaved us (Website hidden by Airbnb) we could enjoy the stay completely.
地理位置非常优越,就在波鞋街旁边,离地铁站,火车站都很近｡房主们很和蔼,到的第一天还给了一堆打折卡方便使用~

超级喜欢Crystal的房子很温馨,有家的感觉,在香港的最后一晚没能继续在Crystal的家住真的感觉很可惜,当时逛街逛到旺角时都会有一种想回家的感觉,下次还会来!房东夫妇人真的超好,和他们聊天超开心,还会帮我过生,超级感动!房子的位置很好,离旺角站只需走3分钟左右很便利,周围附近各种吃的逛的,基本上你想在香港买的很多东西都能在附近买到!每天回家公寓的管理人员都会帮开门还会问好,很亲切!公寓是旺角最新的一栋楼,所以会很舒适!总之,谢谢Crystal夫妇给我们的香港之行留下这么好的回忆!下次见!

Hosts were friendly and helpful. Very sweet couple and were concern for our safety as well. Even prepared card holder of various member cards for our use since they know we wouldn't have. They also provide us some useful tips and very responsive in text and able to give us the help we need. Thankful for that. 

Really good location to stay in and MTR is just 5mins walk away which is just a straight route. We can start shopping once we get out of the building. It's a waste we didn't had time to use the facilities.

The only con part would be the room is really small. It only allow us to open one big luggage (29' inch) at a time. But the room itself is pretty cozy and clean! :) 

Overall it's a good stay, wouldn't mind booking their place when I visit HK again!
房东一家人特别好,住的大厦很安全,房间小小的但是受到了很多照顾!希望能生个健康可爱的宝宝哦~加油~

地點非常方便,特別適合想買球鞋或運動用品的人來｡
Crystal 跟先生兩人都很Nice, 我的班機延誤,讓他們倆久候至深夜,還熱情的幫忙找查附近還沒關門的深夜美食--好旺角粥麵,指引地圖讓我在睡前還能吃上一餐道地的港式美味｡
房間雖小,但一切都很舒適,只是床的尺寸跟位置的關係,一個人睡會比較適合｡兩人就稍微擁擠一些｡

Очень гостеприимные ребята! Ник встретил нас  около дома( так как мы заплутали).
Мы довольны!

Crystal and her husband were great hosts. Her responses to our questions were usually prompt. Also their place is new and spotless. Room could be a little bigger but by Hong Kong standards I guess it is standard size. Also location was great as it was close to the MTR and lots of shopping and eating. We highly recommend this room for anyone visiting Hong Kong.
小区的地点非常好,房东也好｡去机场跟购物非常方便,性价比高｡
很棒的住宿体验,赞
홍콩에 있는 동안 너무 편안하고 친절하게 해줘서 고마웠어요! 우선 위치가 몽콕 MTR 과 가깝고 주변에 편의시설도 많아서 좋았어요! 그리고 숙소 비용도 저렴해서 부담없었어요! 무엇보다 호스트인 크리스탈 부부가 너무 친절해서 좋았습니다.

when we arrived, none of us had internet connection on our phone, so we couldnt reach crystal. Also crystal had informed us that she wont be around during a certain time a few days earlier but we'd left for macau/hong kong just a day before she sent us a email, which made things worse, as none of us had bought the local sim card and i didnt check my email. And since we didnt know which flat she was stayign in, we couldnt even tell the guards there, for them to allow us go up. when we asked the guard if there was wifi at the lobby, sadly there was none so we couldnt get into airbnb. so we had to get the local sim card and connect to the internet so i could check my email. thank god her husband mike, left his contact number and flat number via email. basically the timing was so wrong. cant entirely blame it on crystal.  otherwise everything was good. the space was a bit small, location is walking distance from Mongkok East station. So that was really good for moving around. Hardly got to meet crystal but her husband mike was always around  in the evenings. so, he gave us quite a tip to take a cab to go to the airport rather than taking the MTR especially if you have luggage. 

main tip: take the train to mongkok east, and check your email/airbnb a day before and on the day of arrival in hong kong for updates your host has left for you.
房東很親切,房間乾淨,地理位置良好

The couple were very pleasant and keep the apartment and room clean and fresh. There is a restaurant on the 2nd floor of the apartment block that seemed to be a favorite for locals' "yamcha" session. Plenty of food outlets nearby. Highly recommended.

We had a really nice stay here. We would recommend it over a hotel. The building is in a great location and is stunning inside with door men and a fancy lobby. The place has a gym and a pool and feels like a 5 star hotel. The room and bed are small but this is too be expected in Hong Kong and it's more than enough. The hosts were lovely and really got us out of a pickle with speedy replies and instant book even though it was late.
房间很干净,房东人也很棒,周围食肆选择也多,哈哈,很开心的一次体验
Nice host
房东非常nice,对我们的疑问有问必答｡屋子很干净,床的大小适合两个人住｡小宝宝很乖,房间的隔音效果不错,虽然宝宝偶尔有哭,但是在房间里也不会听到｡希望有机会再来,祝小BB健康成长
第一次用airbnb就遇到一對喜歡旅遊的房東,所以我始終相信那些心在路上的人是最具包容度的,房間準備的各品牌打折卡,交通逛街很方便､房東寶寶很可愛,眼藥水掉在他家裡還提醒我,下次有機會大家再選擇他們家｡
房东夫妻非常友善热情,公寓5楼的健身房很高档,可以游泳,也有跑步机可以跑步｡｡附近购物非常方便｡｡

In the heart of Mongkok - a very busy and densely populated area. The hosts were shy and helpful. I stayed for 10 nights with the majority of my time out, and tippy toeing back in anywhere between midnight and 5am! The room itself is small, but very typical of Hong Kong with air con (a must in humidity of 80%). 
The block in which the tower is in is clearly very well looked after and very classy - it even has a gym and swimming pool on the 5th floor which I used once. 
When I stayed they had a newborn baby, which I have to say didn't have the lungs or the crying capacity to make any noise whatsoever. It was more silent than me. 

I didn't make much use of the flat as a whole, but stayed mostly in my room. Have to say, I really liked the husband as did my friend. Really decent guy - just hospitable and someone you can see yourself going out with. Top people and exactly what this website is about.
房间虽小,但是很温馨,最主要离旺角很近,很不错,祝宝宝健康快乐成长,么么哒
环境很好｡住的很有安全感｡高档小区有物业｡感觉很棒啊｡交通什么都很方便｡住的很有家的感觉｡超喜欢的｡

Hi Crystal, Thanks for letting us stay. You and your husband Mike were so kind and the location perfectly fit our travel agenda and the apartment was neat and clean. The air-conditioner was a life-saver! HK was so humid.  Thanks again!
The hosts are really nice, and the place is also nice to stay. PS: the baby is pretty cute!
为朋友订的｡交通方便,信息精准｡只是第一晚到的太晚,麻烦房东了｡

We like the location of the apartment. It's close to  metro stations along two different lines. No matter you wanna go to Hong Kong Island or the New Territories, it's very convenient. We are also glad to find various shops and restaurants near the apartment. Moreover, the outdoor swimming pool is fantastic!  And our host is really a lovely couple. The only shortcoming is that the room is a little bit small. But that's Hong Kong, so we feel it acceptable.
这是第一次尝试在Airbnb上订房,它是一个区位优势很好的房间,周围可以吃好喝好并且吃的相对便宜;距离公交､地铁站近,搭乘公共交通非常方便,如果有喜欢运动品牌的朋友更可以考虑因为离波鞋街非常近｡房东虽然刚有了小baby但一点也不会吵,小baby也很可爱｡走之前有和房东谈心到半夜,一直以来他们都很nice,最后一天也让我倍感温暖,很开心能够认识他们｡
非常nice的一家人,我和朋友都很喜歡呢,可惜逗留時間太短了｡交通很方便,離旺角和旺角東地鐵站都很近｡下次去香港都可以來這裡住呢｡
房子位置很好,交通便利｡房主人很温和友善,还有小BABY可爱极了!祝好!
非常方便,公寓很高级,香港年轻人具有代表性的家庭,只住了一晚很遗憾,还没好好逗一逗两个月大的小盆友,装修对于我在上海来说,具有借鉴意义｡感谢房东夫妇,非常让人感觉舒服｡

The building and room of the condo are luxury same as the host discribe. Room is cozy but clean and very convenient. Its a great location, a shopping center in Mongkok taking only a short walk to thier apartment.

Host is lovely and very kind. Though they have a lil infant, its not a problem to stay with them during your vacation in HK.
第一次用Airbnb,住的这家,位置在繁华的旺角地带,房东一家人非常好,住的很愉快,分享旅游心得,还有他们的宝宝非常可爱!
房子非常好 又豪华 楼下还有管理员为你开门 又安全又舒服 房主人非常nice 建议入住这里
Crystal and Mike were very welcoming hosts and always friendly.
很可惜沒有足夠的時間游泳｡
房东很早就联系我们啦,公寓位于旺角,地铁公交都很方便,房间不大,但设施齐全｡
房东人很好,地理位置佳｡

Location of the hotel was a convenient location to access the sights of Hong Kong. The hostel is located in the downtown area was close to many amenities. In addition, the master of the house was also very friendly.
They are very friendly, and just stayed like home^^
It was really nice to stay with crystal, her husband and super cute and quiet Baby! :)
旺角难得的房源,交通十分便利｡而且,非常非常非常的新!很干净!房东非常好,还给我们准备了女人街各种店的会员卡,哈哈,很方便的｡我们到的有点早,走的又有点晚,但都被房东很nice的接待,很温馨｡如果下次去香港,还会选择这家住｡

Crystal是个很好的人哦~皮肤很白净的小伙子呢
房间地理位置非常巧,怎么样都能找到旺角地铁站｡
最后,希望房主阖家幸福!
호스트는 괜찮았지만 엄마랑 함께 묵기에는 좀 좁았던 것 같습니다! 위치는 몽콕역에서 얼마되지 않기 때문에 좋아 여행하기에는 편리했습니다~
我们在Crystal的住所里度过了愉悦的住宿时光｡ 房东一家人都很有教养,也十分helpful,他们的房子区位条件很好附近就可以购物娱乐｡

The Airbnb was conveniently located to the MTR and was only a few minutes walk away. There are many shops and restaurants nearby, and was also close to the Ladies Market. Crystal and her husband were very nice and friendly and tried to provide everything we needed. They have a newborn baby, so I would suggest bringing a pair of ear plugs.
房东人很好,房间特别干净,公寓环境也好,交通方便｡还有一个可爱的小宝宝哈哈哈哈

An upscale condo at the heart of Mongkok, practically matching every word of the listing description. More importantly, the hosts are friendly and polite. The room itself is small but cozy, with quality furniture and ergonomic bedding. For single travelers, this is an easy choice; less so for couples (due to space). Do note, however, that since there is an infant, washing machine is not available for guests to use.
很nice的一次入住体验,房东很热情,下次还会选择他家
房間感覺好好,房東好nice,位置,環境都很不錯!好評!
交通方便 近旺角､旺角东地铁站 住处安静舒适  房主人挺热情 还有可爱的小宝宝

房东主动发 (Hidden by Airbnb) 号让我添加,便于后期联系,到香港没买电话卡,全靠 (Hidden by Airbnb) 联系,所以添加 (Hidden by Airbnb) 很重要哦,另外,crystal和她老公都很好,随和,房子位置麦华臣汇位于旺角中心区,购物出行都很方便,香港寸土寸金,房间的确有点小,不过不碍事,我和老公两人照样睡了一夜,第二天早上还借用了厨房烧开水,总体来说值得入住,
很好啊!位置很好找,出去玩也方便｡
Crystal is a very sympathetic guy. It was a great experience to stay by him and his family.

Location very good,  near night market.
Host crystal and tang very friendly.
房子地点非常好,我们在香港转机呆了一天,除了从机场过来,其余地方全是用走的!房间干净小巧,阳光充足｡房主非常友好且有帮助,给我们发了很多吃饭的地方,还借给我们会员卡使用,值得一住!

我只是想提醒想入住的老年朋友,这个真的不合适｡房间小到二个人转不开身,最大的问题是那张儿童床还要去掉内侧的40公分左右宽50公分左右高的搁板位置,要入睡只能钻进去｡年龄大的晚上要起夜,那二个人就不用睡觉了,加上床小,二个人必须分二头睡,那有一头的人空调的风口就正对着,想不感冒都不行｡卫生间是要跟房东公用的｡我订了4晚,当晚没法入睡,半夜3点重新定了城市酒店,价格跟这间基本无差别,环境条件好了很多倍,交通也很方便｡不要被首页的一间房,一个卫生间,三个人迷惑,请看清楚后面附的图片,我就只看了首页跟评论,想当然,陷入了这个营销陷阱,airbnb 可是不会退你钱的哦｡
非常nice的房东一家人,还有个可爱的宝宝｡房子位置距离旺角地铁站大概五分钟左右的距离,附近很热闹｡
虽然房间有丢小,但位置很方便,离旺角站跟旺角东站都很近, (Hidden by Airbnb) 都快,推荐推荐~

位置很好,是购物中心,而且楼下就有直通车卖票点,离地铁口很近｡
房子是高级住宅,房间很整洁｡
房东夫妇也很nice,退房后,可以把行李寄放在她那里,逛完街再回去拿｡
总之很满意,下次如果再去香港还会选择这里｡
虽然短暂,但是很好的体验!
房东非常热情的在大楼外接我们,家里环境非常干净,就是房间虽然小了,但是设施齐全,地理位置很好,出门5分钟内就是旺角地铁站,去哪都很方便,从机场来回也有机场大巴,推荐,推荐,下次来香港还会选择这里｡
地理位置非常好,交通方便,吃饭,购物也很便利｡房东还准备了打折卡可以用,很贴心｡

Our stayed at Crystal's house was ok. They allowed us to leave our luggage before check-in time and after check-out time which was great as we didn't need to carry our bags during the last day before going to the airport. Also, the house looks perfectly the same as it looks in the pictures. The room is small but enough for one-two nights in Hong Kong. The most important thing is that everything was clean and we rest 100% in the room provided. The only thing we are disappointed with is that we couldn't have a chat with them and it could have been a great help for our visit in Hong Kong giving us some tips about the city. That's how Airbnb works, experience in a local house to share a small chat or even a coffee but it wasn't nothing like that. Anyway, in general, we are happy with our stayed.
地理位置佳;布置温馨;虽然到达时间已经凌晨两点多,但房东还是热情接待｡

这几些天来麻烦屋主了 名宿离旺角地铁很靠近附近也有机场巴士 
bb也很可爱 谢谢你们热情接待介绍我们好吃的 教我们路线 希望下次再入住

Crystal/Lung's apartment is definitely the type of place you would desire as a visitor to the city. It is a newly developed condo located at one of the prime locations of the city, with access to all amenities you can imagine. Besides, I am particularly impressed with the lobby and property management service. 


The room is not big, but quiet and comfortable. And Lung is an amazing host who's always there to offer help and advice.  


I would definitely choose Lung's apartment again. My rating is "strongly recommend".
以前來香港都是住酒店,第一次嘗試住民宿,開始預訂的時候還有點擔心會不會不方便,因為畢竟是住在別人家裡,住了一晚上感覺還不錯,很舒服,地方雖小但是夠用,地方很乾淨!房主和他太太都很nice!還有一個小bb,非常可愛,會對著我們笑!周圍交通很方便,公寓後面就是波鞋街,反正就是在旺角中心,出行方便!給380個like!

Crystal & Lung did everything to make us feel welcome. We were very impressed by the lobby and the staff and happy our late arrival was no problem even with the baby. The room is not very big and the bed was quite small and a bit hard but for a short stay it is totally sufficient. Lung was always there for our questions and very helpful. Kitchen and bathroom are also clean and nice. The location of the apartment is great with 5 minute walk to 2 MTR stations and some markets in the neighborhood.
地理位置很好
房东很好 聊得来 大厦环境也很好 地理位置优越 下回还会选
Great stay experience with Crystal family~ My gals very enjoy this trip~
Great location. Very welcoming hosts. Good place to spend a couple of nights.
住所的位置非常方便,毗邻两个地铁站,四通八达｡房间很舒适,还有可爱的小宝宝,crystal和丈夫都很周到热情,语言沟通也流畅,是旅行香港的理想住处
房东一家人都很棒 会主动在出行前加你 (Hidden by Airbnb) 询问到达时间然后告诉你路线｡房子的位置不错 楼下超级豪华哈哈哈哈 虽然进门第一眼觉得房子小拥挤而且房间好迷你(是实话)但晚上入住莫名安心 包括厕所淋浴吹风什么的都很好用｡推荐~
还不错的体验
非常好的住宿体验,房东夫妇人都非常好,很耐心的解答我的问题,还有个超级可爱的小宝贝,祝福你们幸福的一家

A great location, convenience for using public transportation and kind hosts. 
Want to recommend if you find a convenient and cozy house.

Crystal and her husband LUNG is a great couple. They are most helpful and are more than happy to be of any assitance.

The apartment is situated in Mongkok,  the most conveient downtown part of Kowloon, metro, train and bus stations are just a stone throw away. It is a fairly new building with an impressive entrance reception hall. It is safe as there are receptionists there at all hours, and with security pass needed to get through to the elevtors. Room is fairly compact but is adequate.

You can literally find whatever you need in the area with hundreds of restaurants, foodstalls, clothing , shoes, electronics and inexpensive goodies along the streets. We had a great time.
房东人很好,交通便利,第一次住民宿跟住在家里一样
地理位置佳,下樓就是旺角了,去哪裏都方便｡房子是在一棟高級公寓里,周圍環境挺不錯｡房間雖然不大,但一應俱全｡而且房東非常友善,給了我們很詳細的資訊｡他們的小寶寶非常可愛哦~
地铁站下来走五分钟就到了,很近很方便了~小宝贝很可爱,胖乎乎的好喜欢笑也不太哭,好乖!去各个地方的交通都很便利!
挺好的 挺温馨的

到着したときから笑顔で歓迎してくれて､とてもﾎｯとしました｡
ﾏﾝｼｮﾝ自体も豪華な雰囲気で､お部屋の中も綺麗だったので居心地が良かったです｡
気さくに話しかけてくれて､おすすめのお店を教えてくれました｡
ﾎｽﾄさんと､東京の旅の話や子どもの話などｺﾐｭﾆｹｰｼｮﾝがとれて､とても嬉しかったです!
ありがとうございました｡
地理位置优越
主人很nice 高级住宅挺舒适的 也干净 性价比很高 还有免费桑拿游泳池设施
房子地段很好 走5分钟就是旺角站 离朗豪坊非常近 但是房间较小
这是一次非常好的体验!第一次尝试和房东合住,以为会非常拘束,但是并没有,房东一家非常的nice!还有一个可爱的小baby~房子位于旺角附近,离shopping的地方都很近,走路就可以了｡楼下安保做的很好,不用担心｡房子很温馨,特别喜欢浴室哈哈哈~花洒会旋转,真的是第一次体验呢!下一次来香港这里依旧是住宿的首选!感谢房东这五天四夜的贴心照顾~新年快乐啊
闹中取静,购物和交通都超级方便,房主一家人都很好,普通话也很赞,唯一的就是,房间比较小,所以,180以上的男生估计不大好住
真的真方便,在旺角和旺角东中间,楼下购物也真的超全,闹中取静,房间虽然比较小,但通风很好,不用开空调就可以睡的很舒服｡房主一家都很热情,沟通也很畅通,下次去玩的话,也会首先看这里有没有房哦
房东人超级nice,住的地方交通便利,旺角购物,地铁都很方便｡10分钟路程而已｡房东小孩子也非常可爱,有机会下次还会选择

The best homey place away from home. Lung and Crystal was a great help on all our queries that made our HongKong experience unforgettable. We will definitely stay with them again. We highly recommend it.

民宿位於旺角,交通便利｡房間儘管比較迷你,但床鋪很舒服,讓我們這兩晚睡得很安穩,舒服｡阿龍和Crystal都很nice｡謝謝你們給予我們的便利,讓出門在外的我們,也有種居於家的感覺｡   特別謝謝Crystal,和你聊天,感覺很親切而溫暖｡謝謝你和我share你的小故事,讓我渡過了難忘的一晚｡還有你們小baby,超級可愛,希望有機會還可以見到小baby｡祝bb快高長大,祝Crystal和阿龍家庭幸福!
房子处在非常有利的地理位置,也很干净舒服｡房东也很亲切!
방이 좁아요
地理位置十分的好~离旺角地铁站十分钟不到的步程｡那里就是在旺角旁边,很繁华,晚上建议去逛一逛｡一开始搞了一次乌龙,后来发现搞错了房间｡房间干净,房主又帅人又nice,还会给我们很多店的会员卡｡小宝宝很可爱~肉嘟嘟的~总之体验不错｡

처음 해외여행인데 늦은비행으로 새벽에 몽콕에 도착했습니다. 그때는 로밍,유심칩도 사지않아 폰도 잘 되지 않았고 길도 찾기 힘들었지만 크리스탈의 남편분이 친절하게 우리의 마음을 달래주었고, 늦은시간에 체크인을 했음에도 불구하고 너무 친절했습다. 방이 조금 좁지만 불편할 정도는 아니였고 따뜻한물도 너무 잘나오고 매일 새로운 수건을 주었고 세안도구가 모두 배치되어 있었습다! 와이파이도 아주 잘되어 있었구요 아파트도 매우 좋은 아파트였습니다. 위치는 몽콕역과 아주 가까워서 매번 늦은밤에 귀가해도 안심할수 있었습니다. 야시장과도 너무 가까웠습니다. 제일 중요한것은 크리스탈 부부가 너무 친절하여서 처음해외여행에 친절한 호스트를 만나 너무 기분이 좋았습니다! 아기와 함께 꼭 행복하게 살길 바랄게요! 좋은 숙소를 제공해 주어서 감사합니다. 다음에 또간다면 이숙소를 또 사용할것 같습니다.
房东人很好,交通很方便,购物只需要步行就能到了,下次去香港还要入住这家
房东很nice
沟通很顺利,房东人很好,房间也很整洁,地段超级好,满意!中港通巴士就在楼下｡
位置非常便利,靠近波鞋街,房东家人好nice,房东的bb好可爱,房间卫生干净,总体很不错,值得推荐!
Crystal 家是幸福的一家子,住在一起很和谐,在旺角闹市区,出行方便,类似大陆的酒店式公寓,只是房间的面积真的很袖珍,估计是寸土寸金的香港特色,此外,和阿龍以及Crystal 沟通很方便很随意,能够感受到一些地方的习惯和热情,对于初来港的大学生朋友们们是非常合适的,在此表示感谢!
位置好找 交通便利 房间整洁 房东nice
Very nice apartment, super clean, everything is perfect, a lot better than hotel, highly recommended Mike's place :)
交通很便利,出门就是地铁站和公交车站;购物很方便,旁边就是朗豪坊､波鞋街､女人街~房东一家都很热情,下次来还要住这里~
最意想不到的是一进門口是跟屋主一家三口一起住的,房子里没有牙刷没有毛巾而且没有牙膏,卫生更加不用说了感觉是那个洗手间很脏,就是地点比较近旺角,反正性价比不是很高下次一定不会再来感觉很差
交通方便 地处闹市 和房东同住 房东很nice 给了很多优惠卡便于消费 就是房间小 但这个价格也ok了 毕竟旺角闹市
房东一家真的非常和蔼易沟通宝宝也超可爱｡什么不懂的都可以问他,会耐心详细解答｡公寓高级安静所处地段超方便一般要去哪步行没多久就会到!!
很小,但是五脏俱全｡我们度过了一次愉快的香港之旅｡
配合入住時間!
地点相当好,楼下交通购物都非常方便,屋主热情给我们提供帮助,除了地方有点小就没有缺点了｡
在香港的一个晚上能够住下觉得很幸运,房东很热情友好,我们住的地方也很舒适便利,晚上很安静,地方很好找,交通便捷｡
房屋位于旺角,方便购物观光,离地铁口较近,方便出行｡总体来讲非常不错
thank you mike and wife for the hospitality.. totally worth to stay at thier place..mike and wife is so friendly,the baby so cute.. nice to meet u 1 family..
房东人很好,房间整洁
位置很好,隔一個路口就是波鞋街/女人街,地鐵也很近｡房源比想像中高級,目測是旺角區唯一新建住宅,這裡落成只有2年,保安員會幫我們開門像酒店一樣｡特別要讚房東很好很熱情地給我很多指引,家裡很乾淨,床很舒適,洗手間特別豪華全是雲石,下次一定再來!
非常安靜的公寓｡小朋友非常可愛噢~爸爸媽媽兩位也超nice!
The crystal is very friendly and the location is very good
离旺角站和旺角东站很近,附近有朗豪坊等购物的地方,很适合购物旅游的人入住,入住的房间有点小,香港那个地段基本都一样吧,不过房东很nice｡
Really appreciated this couple opening up their home to me. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone because of it's location and access to many sites. I would stay here again!
虽然小但是温馨｡床品非常舒适｡出门购物特别方便｡房东很亲切~
真的很不错

The pictures are not accurate with the place, they seems to be really nice people but get ready to find something completely different when you arrive... I ended up going to a hotel at 10:30pm and paying much more.
住宿环境挺好,跟朋友一起的｡他家bb超级可爱,看到就要抱抱,哈哈哈｡房东人超好的｡給⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Crystal人很好,家里的小BB很可爱
就在旺角地铁站附近,高档小区,很不错
lisa是一位非常不錯的房東.家裏非常的整潔.是我外出名宿最好的一次體驗.從中受益了很多.不單單是體驗不同的環境也看到了不同人文與世界觀.lisa是位非常謙遜的精緻女生.可以從她的生活氣息裡找到.如果你是一位女生我覺得她是位非常值得學習的榜樣.
非常溫馨的一次出行,很感謝房東一家的招待,特別是超級可愛的小寶寶｡屋子位置很好找,入住也很舒適,我們很喜歡｡
位置很好
上次已经住过Crystal管理的民宿,今次由于同行有几个朋友,都是带宝宝来打针,所以订了这里,原来是Crystal的家,她宝宝差不多一岁长得非常可爱胖胖的,不怕陌生人,我们都玩得很开心｡她家很干净整洁,楼下5楼还有免费会所可以给做运动,下次再来香港打针必定回来入住Crystal的家,谢谢招待,祝宝宝快高长大!
很愉快的入住体验,妈妈和宝宝都聊的很愉快,宝宝真的好可爱,下次去香港依旧会选择｡

Communication is prompt. Location is good with food, metro and buses just around the corner. Their baby is just so adorble!!! Hope he recovers from his cough T.T 

The room is abt 4-6 square meters with aircon, hair dryer and water boiler. Will stay again if I am travelling alone.
旺角繁华地段,去哪里都挺方便,楼下有小的游乐设备｡床比较小｡一米二多一点,男生如果180估计睡着困难｡床垫柔软舒适｡洗澡水舒服｡房东人好亲切,BB听话可爱｡
很好,交通便利｡房东也很热情~
很舒適 房東人很好
房东太好了 超级喜欢房东一大家子~住宿性价比超级高耶 就在旺角 去苗姐啥的都很方便 附近还有好多好吃的 应接不暇 总而言之下次还要来 ｡住在房东家是这次来香港最开心的事情之一了~
Great place to stay! Very kind family in a new apartment building.
地理位置很棒,住所大厦很高档入口处有安保人员开门,房间很精致睡得很舒服,通风特别好!房东也很热情,宝宝很可爱!

There are a few things I love about this place.  It's in the middle of the Kowloon area, it's close to a couple MTR/subway stations (less than 10 mins walk).  It's very close to lots of restaurants especially if you enjoy local street food.  It's safe as there's 24/7 security in the building.  Last but not least, the hosts (Both Mike and Crystal) are super nice and friendly.

Yes, the room is quite small but it's common in HK.  It should be sufficient for 1-2 people.
有电梯,大堂很漂亮,距离地铁近,附近是市中心.

They are very nice and kind. Baby boy was super cute.Location is good. We can access to the restaurant and shopping mall and the station within 10 minute.I recommend this place to stay. You will have a wonderful stay. I will stay here again if I get a chance to visit HK next time.

房东夫妻俩太有爱了,小baby很可爱~入住时间虽短但是房东也很细心的帮我制定出行计划,简直太赞了!
房子就在旺角,离朗豪坊很近购物很方便,周围吃饭的地方也多,只是作为身高184的男生,床确实小了点(仅作参考)总体来说很棒!
也很喜欢他们的生活态度和生活方式,我也深受感染,努力活成自己想要的样子吧!
超棒的夫妻还有可爱的海登

Nice family, very very good location. Room is small but I guess that is how spaces are in Hong Kong.
Mike and Crystal were both very friendly and helpful. Their baby is very cute and makes up 70% of charm of the place iny eyes.
Room is private so one feels good there.
I was on my own for some days and was nice to know that Mike and Crystal trusted to leave whole apartment with a stranger. 
Plenty of life going on right around the corner.
Pool in the evening was a highlight of the day for me.
Recommended place for solo travellers and people who like to blend in to new companies and for Whom presence of the baby is considered a plus.
我们找错了地方,感谢房东跑来特地接待｡房东人很好,下次有机会再来香港还会考虑这里｡
住在旺角的不二选择~房间舒适整洁,房东超级nice
친절하고 위치도 좋았다 매우만족

This place was AMAZING! This was my first time ever using Airbnb and I was not disappointed. They are an amazing family and their baby boy is the sweetest thing (he made the entire stay 10x more fun)! Great location right by the MTR station, and the apartment was always clean. They gave great recommendations on places to eat, and were extremely friendly and welcoming!

name: Greenwich Fun and Luxury
summary: Fabulous architect-designed home with incredible space, natural light and bush surrounds, on the cosy Greenwich peninsula. Equipped with heated pool, multiple indoor/outdoor spaces, it's ideal for a luxurious holiday and comfortable entertaining. Please note minimum stay is five nights.
space: The home has generous spaces, two living rooms, pool table, pool with courtyard for entertaining, separate BBQ deck for chilling, loads of outdoor space and grass for kids.
description: Fabulous architect-designed home with incredible space, natural light and bush surrounds, on the cosy Greenwich peninsula. Equipped with heated pool, multiple indoor/outdoor spaces, it's ideal for a luxurious holiday and comfortable entertaining. Please note minimum stay is five nights. The home has generous spaces, two living rooms, pool table, pool with courtyard for entertaining, separate BBQ deck for chilling, loads of outdoor space and grass for kids. Complete home. Someone will always be accessible for guests to contact for information, assistance, etc.   If the hosts are indisposed, there is another person who lives nearby who is paid to be available. Greenwich is a fantastic village atmosphere on the doorstep of the city and the fabulous Sydney harbour. Short walk to Wollstonecraft train station, short walk to River Road bus routes.  Short drive to Greenwich Point ferry wharf. Plenty of off-street parking for guests, climate controlled heating and cooling as needed.
neighborhood_overview: Greenwich is a fantastic village atmosphere on the doorstep of the city and the fabulous Sydney harbour.
notes: Plenty of off-street parking for guests, climate controlled heating and cooling as needed.
transit: Short walk to Wollstonecraft train station, short walk to River Road bus routes.  Short drive to Greenwich Point ferry wharf.
access: Complete home.
interaction: Someone will always be accessible for guests to contact for information, assistance, etc.   If the hosts are indisposed, there is another person who lives nearby who is paid to be available.
house_rules: We expect guests to respect the property as they would if it were their own.  We don't allow smoking indoors.

host.host_about:
I'm an entrepreneur with a couple of different business interests. I work from home on the Sydney lower north shore. 

One of my businesses is based in Shanghai, the other has operations in Shanghai and Singapore (mainly). 

I travel more than I would like, and am looking for an alternative to always staying in hotels, which get old after many years. While travelling, I usually spend most of my evenings doing email after having dinner out. No wild parties, but I enjoy a beer and/or a glass or two of red : ) 

I use a personal email address for correspondence associated with AirBnB and other websites to do with travel and administration.

name: The Garden Studio
summary: Our newly built (2013) self contained studio with loft bedroom is a great example of clever design in a small space. With everything you need, it will comfortably accommodate two adults, situated in Marrickville, 8km's from Sydney's centre.
space: ***Christmas New Year 2017*** I am only taking bookings of 2 weeks or longer over this period at this stage. Quick Overview... Recently built Garden Studio (3mt x 6 mts) with queen sized loft bed situated in the rear veggie garden of my home in Marrickville. It’s an easy 15-20 minute Taxi ride to or from Sydney airport. Separate access at the side of the main house. Queens size bed in Loft Bedroom, accessed by ladder Good sized new Bathroom  Well equipped Kitchenette  Courtyard with BBQ. Cupboard and hanging space for clothes. Free Wifi available Includes breakfast hamper and a baked treat for your stay.  MP3 connectivity to portable speakers Board games and playing cards available. Some More Detail…. New garden studio situated at the rear of my home, which is located in the Sydney suburb of Marrickville.  With it's own bathroom and kitchenette the Garden studio has it's own access down a side path of the main house, which is also used by the household chickens to access the front gard
description: Our newly built (2013) self contained studio with loft bedroom is a great example of clever design in a small space. With everything you need, it will comfortably accommodate two adults, situated in Marrickville, 8km's from Sydney's centre. ***Christmas New Year 2017*** I am only taking bookings of 2 weeks or longer over this period at this stage. Quick Overview... Recently built Garden Studio (3mt x 6 mts) with queen sized loft bed situated in the rear veggie garden of my home in Marrickville. It’s an easy 15-20 minute Taxi ride to or from Sydney airport. Separate access at the side of the main house. Queens size bed in Loft Bedroom, accessed by ladder Good sized new Bathroom  Well equipped Kitchenette  Courtyard with BBQ. Cupboard and hanging space for clothes. Free Wifi available Includes breakfast hamper and a baked treat for your stay.  MP3 connectivity to portable speakers Board games and playing cards available. Some More Detail…. New garden studio situated at the rear of my hom
access: Guests come in to the studio using their own access via a side path. Guests have use of the garden and outdoor table and chairs in the backyard.
interaction: I er on the side of privacy but if you feel like a chat or want info about the area or Sydney in general I'm happy to help.
house_rules: No smoking. Would prefer no shoes in the studio. Please take rubbish out when you leave, and empty coffee machine of used pods.

host.host_about:
I am a professional photographer, based in Sydney. Australia. Covering lifestyle subjects such as Food, Interiors and travel, mostly for magazines and books and advertising clients. Born and raised in Sydney, I do love to travel and I have been lucky to have done a lot of that both personally and professionally. 
I enjoy making things and have always got a project on the go
Cooking is another great passion of mine. Hence the offer of baked goods and homemade jam!
Please feel free to email me with any question you might have.

reviews.comments:
This studio out the back of caths house was a pleasure to stay in. The clever design makes use of a small space and the decore was stylish. Cath treated us with her homemade treats which were a real welcomed surprise.
We enjoyed looking out onto her veggie patch, the morning sun lit upnthe big photo of clouds on the wall and was lovely to wake to every morning.
Highly recommended.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Cath's Garden Studio and we're already looking forward to a return visit. The studio itself is light and bright, as well as clean and comfortable. Cath was a welcoming and attentive hostess who was not only knowledgeable and helpful with all our queries, but provided a wonderful breakfast hamper with home made goodies that really made us feel welcome. The garden setting and chooks only added to our experience. We loved the location and enjoyed exploring the adjoining areas such as Newtown and Surry Hills.
Thoroughly recommended.

What a wonderful experience staying in The Garden Studio. We arrived and were greeted by the very friendly and attentive Cath - who introduced us to the chickens on the way to the studio. As soon as we stepped inside we felt comfortable. The decor is modern, quirky and stylish, there is a lovely area to sit and watch television, a user friendly kitchenette, a comfortable bed and a clean and modern bathroom. Cath provided us with a lovely array of breakfast and snack options and she even baked a delicious loaf of fresh bread which she left at our doorstep the following morning along with a newspaper. There is a large collection of DVD's to watch and books to read and the studio is in a quiet location with plenty parking - also within easy walking distance of public transport. I highly recommend The Garden Studio to anyone looking for a private, convenient and comfortable place to stay. My partner and I will definitely be returning in the future.

My husband and I had a wonderful stay with Cath.. This lovely garden studio is functional, modern and comfortable.. Delish freshly baked bread and cookies from Cath.. The breakfast hamper is welcoming and generous! Definitely highly recommended!

My boyfriend and me are a young french couple who stayed 1 week in the lovely Cath's studio. We really enjoyed this staying for our first booking on airbnb. Cath is a very smiling and nice person. The studio is fully adjust to feel like home.
The basket for breakfast is really complete and everything is thinked that we lacked nothing. Moreover it was a pleasure to be able to taste the delicious biscuits and bread, all home made by Cath. The bus stations and shops are close and there are only 15 minutes walking to go to the station Petersham.
I really recommend Cath's studio !

I had a lovely stay with Cath - the studio is beautiful and her chickens are so cute! She was a fantastic host - friendly, easy going  and kind (baked fresh bread!) but respected my privacy which was great.

This garden studio is absolutely comfortable  and private but also very clever in the way it uses space. Cath is a generous host providing muesli, home made muffins and fresh eggs from her very own chooks..wow. I was only able to enjoy 2 nights but I hope to stay again soon.
We had a fantastic time in Cath's beautiful Garden Studio.  Cath's freshly baked bread was amazing & the freshly laid eggs superb! Highly recommended.

The garden studio was a wonderful little place in Marrickville, close to new cafes popular in Sydney!  Cath was a fantastic host and provided more than we expected. We'd recommend couples to stay for a little hideaway away from the hustle and bustle of the city!

The Garden Studio was wonderful. It had everything we needed (and more!) and it is a beautiful space. Cath has thought of everything, from a change of towels mid-week to shampoo, cereal choices, and even a homemade loaf of bread for our 6-night stay. We felt truly spoilt. Marrickville is being hailed as the "new Surry Hills" and at the number of quality cafes and food stores nearby was just astounding. We rented a car, and we were really happy with the easy (and free) parking on the street too.
Great place to stay in a really interesting suburb I wish I had more time to explore.....

We felt so at home at The Garden Studio, it's a pity we didn't have more time to thoroughly enjoy this cosy space. 

We loved the ginger biscuits, & freshly baked bread, that Cath handed to us in the morning, still warm from the oven. Cath was approachable & helpful when we needed info on how to get around, but at the same time, gave us the space we needed. Her chickens too, were rather welcoming! A joy to talk to; we appreciated the short exchanges & enjoyed listening to her share bits about herself :) 

A gem of a place!

The studio is lovely space and convenient; small kitchen with almost everything, confortable beds, outside table, TV and WiFi service. We found many kind of cereal, jams, fresh eggs, fruits, chocolate, and etc. in the kitchen.  Cath gave us a freshly-baked bread in the first morning, and we could enjoy breakfast with the table in the garden.
There is a park near here and it is quiet area.
Cath is very friendly and a kindly person.
   裏庭にある素敵な可愛いｽﾍﾟｰｽです｡庭のﾃｰﾌﾞﾙで朝食を取りながらゆったり楽しみました｡ｵｰﾅｰに気兼ねなく過ごせるのですが､Cathさんは親切な方で､市内の情報を色々と教えてくれます｡最初の朝に大きな焼きたてﾊﾟﾝをいただき､2日間楽しみました｡

We had such a wonderful stay at the garden studio.
Cath is a very welcoming and generous host.  She even made us  freshly baked bread and cookies!
The studio is very well designed and has a very comfy split level bedroom. It's located in a quiet neighbourhood and close to train and bus stops. Guaranteed to make your stay in Sydney unforgettable.

My sister and I had a lovely time at Cath's Garden Studio. It was the perfect little space with everything we needed. Cath was extremely lovely and helpful making sure we were comfortable and happy whenever we crossed paths in the garden. The fresh bread was amazing to wake up to on our first morning and the food provided really helped us in keeping our spending costs down. I will most definitely return to the Garden Studio next time I am having a little getaway in Sydney!

Cath's beautiful little studio was the perfect place to visit Sydney and the local neighborhood of Merrickville. She provided a wonderful array of breakfast treats as well as fabulous teas! The place was clean, private, and had all the amenities we could need. Thanks for a great visit, Cath!

Our stay at the Garden Studio was perfect! Cath baked fresh bread and we had breakfast everyday with all the cereals, eggs, vegemite, nutella, etc. she also provided. The studio is small but cozy and she has taken care of all kind of details, we found anything we needed!
Cath also was very nice helping us with some directions and printing maps for us, thank you for a very nice stay!

My mom and I had a fantastic time.  Cath is an absolutely wonderful host and the place is lovely, super clean, relaxing and you get your privacy.  Street parking is free!  Do note that climbing the ladder might be slightly tricky, specially if you are slightly tipsy.  Ha ha.  Very happy with my stay and highly recommend the cute garden studio.  

Both my mom and I had a great time in Sydney.

I spent one whole week at Cath' studio and I loved everything about it! Cath is a very warm and generous person, nothing can beat her big breakfast hamper and the delicious bread she's providing you with. She even brought me some freshly baked muffins over!
There is a direct bus which takes you to the city within 25-35 minutes, depending on traffic. The studio is in a quiet neighborhood, it's perfect to relax after a busy day in the city.
This was a 5 star experience, I would book again anytime. Thank you for a lovely time, Cath!
Very best,
Daniela

We loved the Garden Studio. It is absolutely perfect with so much style, love and details and you have everything you need! The breakfast basket is delicious as well as the self made bread! Cath is very helpful if you have any needs. We could not imagine any better place to stay in Sydney!

My stay at The Garden Studio (4 nights) was thoroughly enjoyed and a great experience... Why I'd recommend you stay:

* Lots of privacy, with your own entrance...

* Cath is a very generous, understanding, and thoughtful host, and easy to contact. We particularly loved her guides about where to eat in the local area.

* TGS is very well located in the central suburb of Marrickville - easy to get into the CBD/Newtown/Surry Hills, and if you drive like me, never any complications with street parking!

* The studio was meticulous, and very well stocked - Cath filled the fridge/kitchen with nearly everything you'd need... The variety of teas and delicious homemade cookies were mostly appreciated, and I'm sure most Airbnb users are interested in an espresso machine, which was also available!

* The shower in this place is truly amazing.

All in all, if you don't mind a smaller place, this is the place for you - we found it worked well for 2 people. Thank you again Cath. :-)

it was our first experience with airbnb and it couldn't have been better. we felt very welcome by cath and the studio offered everything we needed - even an umbrella. all the information cath provided (both in person and written) were highly appreciated. definetely will try to check in here again if i come back to sydney.

We spent two days at the Garden Studio and were impressed immediately on our arrival. Such warmth and sincere hospitality. Handed a loaf of baked bread straight from the oven within moments was an unexpected delight. The beautifully styled and thoughtfully prepared space is ideal. We felt that the attention to detail was the best we have experienced using AirBNB. From the generously stocked fridge and hamper, bathroom items, games, videos and books and even picnic gear it was clear the stylish owner is well travelled and knows how to make a space a temporary home. The kitchenette has everything you need. In fact the space and the lovely courtyard was so delightful we surprised ourselves by spending the first morning there enjoying a lazy breakfast reading the terrific range of wonderful magazines rather than head out. The location is great. At the end of the street is a lovely park where we were able to fit in a morning run. Very comfy bed, quality linen, a super quiet fan. Great information and maps were a welcome addition. We would love to return here and most likely will. Highly recommended.

My 4 night stay at Garden Studio was a lovely, tranquil experience.  On arrival I was greeted at the front gate by the fragrance of frangipanis, my favourite!  The studio has been cleverly designed and has a crispy clean, fresh, airy feel to it.  Cath was the perfect host who was there if I needed anything while also giving me a sense of privacy.  All your needs are met at The Garden Studio with extras of yummy home baked ginger biscuits and the morning paper delivered to your front door!  All this with a lush raindrop shower head made for delightful stay - it was a treat and a retreat all in one.

BEAUTIFUL and very easy to use studio in a gorgeous garden!  Everything is done to a really high quality level, from the sheets on the perfectly made bed to the spotless interior and the fantastic breakfast box Cath left for me.  The garden is a wonderful and quiet place to hang out, although it is definitely shared between you and the host.  Privacy feels more private that a room in someone else's house, but probably less than a stand-alone apartment - reasonable since it's a studio in someone's back garden.  The neighborhood is quiet and pretty, with nice cafes and a farmer's market a 15-minute walk.  Getting into and out of other places in the city takes a while; you are not in the center of things, but in a nice neighborhood.  A car or a bike would be more flexible than using transit.  Overall a great place that I would use again!

The studio was really lovely. It was very clean, well equipped and pretty spacious. Everything was as how it looks in the pictures. We liked how the studio was designed, it gave us a very comfortable homely feel. Cath was patient and helpful with our questions, and she gave us our privacy, only popped in to give us some baked goodies and fresh towels. Overall we enjoyed our stay there and we would definitely recommend it to our friends.

Just spent a lovely weekend with my mom in Cath's Garden Studio. The studio's gorgeous and equipped with everything we needed for a comfortable stay. The area is quiet and pretty interesting too - enjoyed my Sunday morning run in the diverse surrounding neighbourhoods :-) Cath is lovely too and very helpful - will definitely be back the next time we are in Sydney.

Cath's garden studio is lovely and we enjoyed our 2 nights stay there. Comfy, clean, quiet, generously equipped, private, great location (if you have a car) and perfect if you need to be close to the airport. Cath is welcoming and has definitely lot of taste, the garden and interior is beautiful. And I wish I had a shower like this!

The Garden Studio has had a Hundred positive reviews and We finally see why! It's all true!
Seriously Cath has provided the most thoughtful services, she even personally got us fresh Bread in the morning and Jam donuts too! The place is filled with everything that we need, more than we even expected.
She has done such amazing work with a small space, it's functional and we just love the layout and modern design aesthetics! Cutest Studio we've ever stayed in!
Thanks Cath!

Had a lovely stay at Cath's Garden Studio. We chose the studio following the excellent reviews. The place was very comfortable and suited our needs perfectly. The breakfast was the highlight, including fresh croissants and bread. Would definitely return. Thanks!

Had a really nice stay at Cath's place. Small space which we were expecting but everything we needed and more. Bed was comfortable, breakfast was great and there was even the facility to cook for ourselves. It is a very convenient place for anyone with a car. Location nice - the pub, the Henson Park Hotel is worth checking out!

We had a great experience at the Garden Studio. It was so clean and comfortable with every need provided for. I had wondered about the ladder to the bed as in my 60s with a not good knee but it was fine and the bed was exceptionally comfortable. We loved the shower and bathroom provisions and the kitchen was great. We had delicious breakfast every morning with everything provided by Cath and only needed to purchase yoghurt.We had a weekly travel pass and there was a short walk to regular buses and the new Dulwich to Central light rail line which we used daily in combination with rail. Highly recommended .

My girlfriend has been wanting to stay at Cath's place for quite some time now so she was quite pleased that we were able to book our last few nights in marrickville. Cath is an excellent host and a very thoughtful one as well! She welcomed us with a generous breakfast basket and with freshly baked bread the next morning! She was very organised and had all the need to know information all sorted into a little file with all the maps, delivery menus etc. The location is great just about 15 mins away from the domestic airport and about 25 mins away from the international airport. Our favourite airbnb stay so far!

I couldn't have wished for a better 'first-time' experience with using Airbnb!!!! The Garden Studio was fantastic. I felt so comfortable staying there, that I completely forgot that it was located at the back of Cath's house. Cath has done an amazing job with making her guests feel welcome and well cared for. The breakfast hamper was beautiful (especially since I'm a fussy eater!!) fresh bread, home made jam, milk, juice, coffee, herbal teas etc etc was ALL provided. Being a tourist to Sydney, the information folder Cath has put together herself was extremely helpful. One night I tried one of her recommended restaurants and the food was amazing. I can't thank Cath enough for allowing me the privilege of staying in her beautiful studio.

The Garden Studio is a lovely place to stay.  We were warmly greeted by Cath, and Chips the dog, and once inside the studio there was a lovely hamper of breakfast foods, fresh bread, a coffee machine and various teas - breakfast then sorted for the next four days.
The studio is in Cath's garden, with a paved area and table and chairs for sitting in the sun.  While it is small it is very sunny and really well set out with modern furniture and we loved the loft bed.  The bathroom area has a shower curtain, not a door but that was not a problem for us. 
Cath - thank you very much for making our stay so nice.  Your home baking left for us on one of the days was really thoughtful.  I highly recommend you and your Garden Studio.

I did not personally stay with Cath, as we booked her room for an employee on an extended out of town stay. The booking process was very easy, and Cath was very understanding of our needs for the accommodation. 

The feedback from our staff member has been great - so much so he has requested that when he returns that he stays with Cath once more. The room is in a very central location of the Inner West region, with great access to buses, trains and the light rail at Dulwich Hill. 

I would highly recommend Cath's property for anyone looking for a cosy, homely location to stay :) Thanks Cath!
The reservation was canceled the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

My partner and I had the best stay at the Garden Studio, and hope to stay again one day. The space was beautifully and thoughtfully designed, and had everything we needed. We loved the generous breakfast spread and enjoyed fresh eggs and homemade bread both mornings, and slept so well in the loft bed. We had our car, and found Marrickville a really easy place to stay, it was very central to everywhere we needed to go (city, Surry Hills, Alexandria), and parking was easy.

Cath had also baked me the most beautiful white chocolate mud cake because she knew my birthday was coming up, and we arrived back to the studio one night to find a box of meringues waiting for us. I'd highly recommend the studio :)

If you're looking for your own little place while away, this is the place for you. The Garden Studio had all the little things you'd need on a weekend away: a lounge area, a nice little kitchen and bench, a great bathroom and a very comfortable loft.

Being out the back of the house, separated by the courtyard, and accessible through path along the side of the house (bordered by a chicken coup) it  is in a very private location.

Cath was great too! She was there to greet us and left us a hamper to snack on. I would highly recommend this place to anyone!

We had a fabulous 5 days in the Garden Studio. Comfy bed, lovely rain shower and a super little coffee machine. Cath is a great host - attentive and yet respectful of privacy. We welcomed a few cuddles from puppy host Chip also! If you are considering the Garden Studio, book it in now. Cath has thought of everything and it is all yours to enjoy.

Absolutely beautiful place. I was only there for a couple of days mid-week however would of loved to have stayed a little longer, dive into some of the books and enjoy the remainder of the awesome food hamper. Everything you need for a home away form home with a great host to match.

Cath is an excellent communicator and an outstanding host. Her studio is perfect, spotlessly clean and everything one could possibly need is  supplied. Even games, umbrellas, egg poacher and toiletries. Her array of tea has widened my tea drinking repertoire enormously. A folder was available outlining all the local cafes, restaurants, hairdressers and any other professional you might need. Before we arrived Cath contacted us to ensure her breakfast hamper contained things we liked. In additional to the hamper, each day we were treated to a range of treats including fresh eggs, delicious cakes or freshly baked bread. Even the paper was delivered most days courtesy of Chips the guide dog in training. After eight days we rolled out of the Garden Studio wishing we could stay indefinitely. This standard was maintained with Cath being extremely busy with an enormous photo shoot as well as her impending wedding this weekend. What a wonderful find. We would definitely recommend Cath to our family and friends and in fact have done so,

We had our second stay at Caths Garden Studio and it was again perfect for our needs. We got up early and ate the breakfAst provided before heading out, but a pleasant spot to relax too. Every need met. We'll be back!

Wonderful host: emailed and asked if we needed anything prior to arrival. Breakfast supplies save you trekking out first thing; Fresh eggs, Bread cereals and well stocked fridge
Great place for an extended weekend: had everything you would need ( and more).
Lovely leafy neighbourhood: AAA +++

Staying in Caths cosy little Garden Studio was absolutely wonderful. The Garden Studio is decorated with much love for details, clean, comfy and very charming. Cath was great host. I was totally surprised to see that she prepared a breakfast basket for us with self-made jam and eggs from her three hens. I would definitely stay there again if I ever have the chance to visit Sydney again!
A beautiful stay was had at Cath's gorgeous cottage. She is a most gracious host, having made me delicious bread and a brownie for my birthday!

We were welcomed by Cath with fresh bread and eggs and a kind, warm hello. The studio was clean and various food was supplied in the fridge and in a basket.  Also an extra mattress was provided for my friend which was so much appreciated.  The neighborhood felt very safe and friendly and some great cafes and restaurants within walking distance.  I would easily return again and would recommend it.

Cath gave us a warm welcome that included biscuits straight out of the oven! The room was delightful, funky and immaculately clean. Cath has thought of every possible thing a guest might need which gives a stay here a sense of abundance and generosity. From fresh flowers down to oven-fresh bread and the newspaper at our doorstep the next morning. The fridge was well stocked with condiments, chocolates, juice, milk and more. Tea and coffee choices were plentiful. There was a book full of maps, tips on things to do and see, menus for local restaurants and other useful contacts. 

The space was quiet with no traffic noise, just the cluck of the friendly chickens and someone playing piano in a nearby house (not intrusively!).

The location was great for us. Close to several parks and a short walk to Marrickville shopping strip, restaurants, bars (Gasoline Pony) and the train station was about 30 mins walk away. Parking was easy.

Communication was easy and prompt which made it easy to change our plans which we had to do at short notice.

We'd highly recommend The Garden Studio to guests wanting a peaceful stay close enough to the city.

Cath was a lovely host, she went above and beyond to provide food, directions and additional supplies to ensure her guests were well taken care of. She maintained the place very well and I would love to stay here again.

A beautiful moment was spent in Cath's Garden Studio from the warm welcome received from Cath, Chips the in-training guidedog and, the 3 chickens, her scrumptious breakfast hamper and an arranged portacot for our toddler. The studio was fully equipped and beautifully styled. Our privacy was respected. We will definitely be staying again on our next Sydney visit. Thank you Cath

As description by Cath in her profile, everything is what you see in the picture and the place is amazing clean, neat and tidy. Was pleased to find that the place very cosy and quiet which is a plus point to me. 

Not forgetting her lovely pet dog, he was super friendly and obedient which i enjoyed so much playing with him even though he has enter the room without notice. :) 

It's a shame Cath place was taken up when i return to Sydney but will surely choose over her place if i ever return to Sydney for holiday. 

Thanks for the host Cath.

I had an absolutely lovely stay at Cath's Garden Studio. Such an easy location and I was amazed by how much thought and care was put into looking after her guest's needs. The fresh croissant for breakfast was one of my favourite parts of my stay. The chooks were very cute, as was Chips. Cath is very helpful while still being respectful of your privacy. I would definitely stay here again!

Wow! What a beautiful little studio. We loved it. 

Myself and my girlfriend stayed here for two nights and it was perfect for us. There was enough room for two of us to stay but cosy enough to make it feel comfortable. Being in Marrickville, it is so handy to where we wanted to be. 

The breakfast Cath provided was amazing, such great hospitality. My girlfriend says Cath really knows the way to a girl's heart as there were plenty of amenities included with the stay, even a hairdryer and shampoo/conditioner, not to mention the fully stocked kitchen. 

Cannot recommend enough for either singles or couples. Cath made us feel very welcome yet with enough privacy that we felt comfortable.

Cath's place was lovely and she was a great host. She left us to our own devices most of the time, but was always available and forthcoming with great advice about the area and very generous with her delivery of home-baked bread, a muesli slice that she made and fresh eggs from her cooks. Marrickville is a really nice area - very quiet and relaxed, but with plenty of dining options within a 15 minute walk and the city and Newtown also very accessible via public transport. Highly recommended!

Lovely set up! Who expected chickens and a veggie garden in a. Small suburban setting?? I loved seeing the chickens. Wandering a mongst the frangipanis and greeting me as I  left in the morning or as I arrived home. Cath has done a wonderful job creating a sweet and very comfortable place for her guests to stay. Her breakfast hamper was divine and she thought of everything to make her guests welcome! Thank you!!!

Thank you Cath for a fantastic stay. The Studio was just as described in the listing with all the amenities and appliances one could wish for. The breakfast hamper and well stocked refrigerator made me feel very welcome. Plenty of towels and the shower is a dream.  The neighbourhood is quiet and a ten minute walk across the park to the station.  I highly recommend the Garden Studio to anyone wanting a base in Sydney out of the city centre.

Very convenient to the airport and a vibrant local community, Cath and her place were very accommodating and friendly and the bungalow is to be recommended for short stays. Its small and gets some aircraft noise but its also well maintained, clean, very comfortable and Cath provided a bunch of great breakfasty snacks - I was lucky enough to get some freshly baked muffins also!

This was our second stay at the Garden Studio and we were again made most welcome and comfortable.
 The studio is well equipped, spotlessly clean and Cath is a most thoughtful host.
Stylish and beautifully clean. Everything I needed and a great location. Cath is lovely and helpful.

Goodness. An air bnb host with both a great sense of style AND with relaxed insight into what makes for guests feeling really welcome and comfortable.  The linen was yummy to sleep in and the plethora of breakfast and snack offerings in the basket and fridge were also a great treat.  We could walk to more in the area than we even managed to do in the 3 days we were there (so there is no shortage of great food or entertainment). Even with an air mattress on the downstairs floor my friend and I felt we had plenty of room.  We'd stay there again in a flash. Next time we'll bring our nona trolleys, and cooler bags and shop up on goodies from the Greek deli and places on illawarra rd.
Cath was such a welcoming host! She left is the most beautiful fresh eggs from her hens, home made bread and little midnight snacks. The apartment was clean and tidy albeit small, but cosy!

Beautiful spot in a great location exactly as advertised. The breakfast hamper in particular was a treat! Cath was a great host who made us feel welcome but also respected privacy as needed. 

We would be happy to stay there again in a heartbeat.

I was organising accomodation for a work colleague , Cath was great , very clear promt communication.
A great little pad with everything needed including great light reading material.Our overseas guest was more than happy to stay comfortably for the week and commented on the great sleep she had .

Cath's studio was a delight. It was all the little extras like a slice of cake waiting for you upon returning back for the evening, home made jam, biscuits, gourmet butter for eggs on toast, chocolate, trail mix... that make it so much more personable and enjoyable than a hotel.  It has to be one of the best and most authentic airbnb places I have stayed in. 
Cath has thought of everything! Comfy bed, choice of pillows, great shower and super clean. It is also close to the airport and train stations to easily get into the heart of the city. Highly recommended!

Thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The studio was such a smart use of space; easy to move around and access everything we needed. Spotlessly clean, gorgeous decor, and very modern too.

Breakfast provisions were scrumptious and generous. All the little extra touches such as the magazines and DVDs made our stay and we wish we could have stayed on longer just to relax a bit more. 

Will consider again for our next trip to Sydney.

Cath is a superb, warm and friendly host and was quick to respond to any queries we had during the booking process. The studio is just like it is shown in the pics being even better than a hotel stay. It is fully equipped with everything you need and it has everything as described on the Airbnb site. We were blown away with the fresh and tasty eggs Cath provided us from her own chickens on site. Her breakfast hamper has fresh bread, yogurt, muesli, milk and other baked goods that was more than what we needed. Cath is very thoughtful and considerate of her guests and will provide you all the information required to travel, eat and be like a local which is what we wanted to do in our Sydney stay. We also loved her sense of style and the way she has done up the Garden studio. Also there is a lovely vegetable patch with herbs and greens right outside the studio. Very pretty.  The little details matter like the umbrellas, picnic basket, extra blankets, etc that were provided to us. The studio is not located within the CBD area but that was not a problem at all since we were commuting around via trains and buses and did not find any issues doing so. Also it is in a suburb very close to the central area so you are still pretty close. Besides Marickville has some of the best food and coffee options that we explored in our trip. Stay at the Garden studio and you will not be disappointed. We were sad to leave and only wished we could have stayed longer. This has surely been our best AirBnb stay till date. 

P.S. Just make sure you are okay to stay in a loft like bed with a movable ladder to climb up and down which may not suit everyone. That was a highlight for us though and we wanted to experience it :)

We had an amazing stay in Cath's studio. It has absolutely everything you could ever need. The thoughtful touches such as yoghurt, milk fresh bread and fresh eggs were just some of the things Cath provided us to make our stay as comfortable and enjoyable as it was. Beautiful clean studio that has everything and more you could possibly need. We will never be staying in a hotel in Sydney again ! Cath went above and beyond to welcome us and make our stay as comfortable as possible. Heaps of DVDs, magazines and books, fluffy towels and extremely comfortable bed and pillows ! Everything you could possibly need in the fridge and a great location to get to the airport and nearly by restaurants cafes and inner city. We loved our stay at Cath's! Will definitely be back soon!

Cath and the garden studio are just amazing and I thank her for the effort that went into making her studio have all the small items needed to make time away spent comfortably.. I have been left with lasting experience that i shared with my friends and family I don't think I need to say much more.. Thanks Cath and Hazel

Cath was so great in making us feel at home in her studio, she was super accommodating  and hospitable. The studio itself is immaculately clean and very homey, we had access to everything we needed from storage to toiletries. Cath was even lovely enough to provide us with some breakfast options and snacks in the fridge! Cath's place is situated not too far from the city which made it very convenient for us to travel to and from by car. We loved every minute of our stay there Cath, thanks again!

We really enjoyed our stay at the Garden Studio. Cath couldn't have been more welcoming. She put the effort into getting the kind of milk and bread we liked for the breakfast hamper, which we really appreciated, along with the delicious fresh eggs. She thought of everything - including a little machine for cooking the eggs, some chocolate, homemade jam, chocolate and beers!

The studio is pretty easily accessible from the city by bus. The studio is small but big enough for too people. It's really clean and stylish. The only thing we weren't fans of was the bed in the loft - we had a tendency to hit our heads on the roof a bit and it might be a pain for some to go up and down to get to bed. But other than that, couldn't have asked for any better!

Es war unser erster Airbnb Aufenthalt: 
wir haben uns bei Cath sehr wohl gefühlt.
Das Garden Studio war für uns perfekt: es liegt zwar etwas außerhalb, es ist aber durch diverse Bus-  und S-Bahnlinien sehr gut an die Innenstadt angeschlossen. 
Das Studio war sehr sauber und ist sehr gut ausgestattet. 
Es gab eine Mappe mit wichtigen Infos über Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Cafés und Restaurants in der Nähe, was sehr hilfreich war.
Cath war so nett und hat sogar auf meine Allergien ( Tierhaare, Nahrungsmittel etc.) Rücksicht genommen, was ich wirklich klasse fand. Es gab sogar extra nussfreie Kekse für mich. Toll!
Vielen Dank Cath für den schönen Aufenthalt bei Dir!

We couldn't have felt more welcome when we arrived at the Garden Studio. Cath had so thoughtfully displayed a "Happy Birthday" banner and special breakfast treats for my son's birthday. Everything you need is provided, an array of breakfast supplies - including fresh eggs from their chickens and delicious homemade jam as well as homemade Choc Chip cookies! The accommodation is comfortable and homely - we honestly wish we could have stayed for much longer.
