address.street: Sham Shui Po, Kowloon, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: it was a really bad experience. the room was really dirty, there were ants everywhere even in the water kettle there was an army of ants. the roof was leaking!! every corner of the room was just plain dirty. we didn't feel comfortable at all and when we messaged the host he ignored us. too bad! the location was nice for us but it's a 10 minute walk to the next mtr station. maybe you can take some bus but we didn't look it up because most of the time the prices of the mtr is the same and the metro is faster.
The host was quite responsive. He sent his staff several times to fix things. There was a small issue with wifi but he got it resolved almost immediately. Overall a good experience.

Feel at home, that's how i felt at Kwanbo's home. He is  very nice and helpful at check in and for any question I had. The room was clean, small but it's very hard to find a big room in Hong Kong. The apartment situation is very convenient, near shops, 7/11, restaurants, subway,... I recommend to stay there!
 I am an agent in Hongkong who help some travel to reservate apartment ,the above review is wrote by that apartment guest

Location was so so. We usually used Prince Edward rather than Sham Shui Po. Then we went to McDonald's for our brunch on our way to the station.  
The room was also so so. Necessary things like towels, body soap, hair dryer, etc was provided. So it's worthy.

這次的住房體驗不是特別好,房主聯繫我加了 (Hidden by Airbnb) 加載了視頻(視頻還無意中聽到一句粗口)指引我們去公寓貌似好溫馨｡結果跟了視頻走兜了很大的圈才到,夏天已經汗流浹背｡之後自己根據 (Hidden by Airbnb) 地圖去地鐵站才知道只要出門往深水埗市場直走就可以到｡不過也蠻遠,起碼走15分鐘吧｡再說說房間,整體上還能接受,但是房東的態度令我真的無語,很多次 (Hidden by Airbnb) 問他東西他都已讀不回｡這樣真的很沒禮貌｡還要給錯密碼,搞到等了很久才進房,3人房有一個以為是床的東西在廳就當床了,長度只有1米多點,就算小矮人睡都不夠位置啦,而且還沒有被子床單,之後叫佢拿上來只是一個麻袋,也不沒有打算幫我們鋪好｡然後熱水器竟然冇熱水是壞的,這一點我的小夥伴就不能忍受了,叫我一定要來給差評你們｡
房東很通情達理,友善｡Good
Nice room, no lift for building is one issue.

Хозяин гостеприимен, обеспечил встречу. Квартира расположена удобно, недалеко от метро и основных транспортных магистралей. Квартира небольшая, тесновата для 4 человек. С удобствами в целом все в порядке, только плохо работала кухонная плита. Но с учетом цены это очень хороший вариант.
總體性價比不錯
Good
1. 大樓門鎖彈簧故障,無法隨時開門,安全堪虞｡ 2. 鑰匙盒密碼給錯｡ 3. 從12/29起即無法淋浴與如廁,無法即時解決問題或安排其他住處｡ 拉､撒､睡只提供了睡, 故要求退回: 1.清潔費NTD194 2.服務費NTD710 3. 2/3住宿費NTD3682 將如事實給評價,並請確實改善後再刊登廣告,謝謝!
Good owner, 2nd visit.
Все хорошо, две комнатки, есть где приготовить, хозяин встретил,рядом метро и автобус,типичный китайский район ,цены на продукты порадовали,очень подойдёт кто хочет снять на неделю и больше!
Very affordable price. Accessible place. Would definitely refer this to my friends who are looking for an affordable place but in the heart of the city.

Cosy little flat. Very cheap. No WIFi was a downer. Bed was way too short, but I am also quite tall, 191 to be precise, so pretty used to having my feet dangling on the  side. Location was very nice. Would definitely want to stay in the same area next time in town. Much nicer than staying on the Hong King island in my opinion with lots of markets and nice bars and cafe's right down the street. And also, Kwan was very helpful meeting us at the metro station and taking us to the flat. Make sure to install (Hidden by Airbnb) before you go!

It's good except shower issue. 
I could go to the market on foot.
This is very nice place and convenient! The service here is superb and owner is very friendly. Owner is very helpful.
Small bed and Sofa, not bad.

name: Tropical Jungle Oasis
summary: 2 bedrooms, one with a queen sized bed, one with 2 single beds. 1 and 1/2 baths. Full kitchen. Nice location bordering a stream with an enclosed patio area. Fully furnished and includes WiFi and cable TV. Reserved parking stall. Outdoor pool available for guest to use as well as coin operated washer/dryer facility available on premises. 10-15 minute walking distance to downtown Hilo.
space: 706 square feet. Guest room at left of entryway, 1/2 bath at right of entryway with adjoining door to master bathroom. Access to the screened balcony through living room or master bedroom.
description: 2 bedrooms, one with a queen sized bed, one with 2 single beds. 1 and 1/2 baths. Full kitchen. Nice location bordering a stream with an enclosed patio area. Fully furnished and includes WiFi and cable TV. Reserved parking stall. Outdoor pool available for guest to use as well as coin operated washer/dryer facility available on premises. 10-15 minute walking distance to downtown Hilo. 706 square feet. Guest room at left of entryway, 1/2 bath at right of entryway with adjoining door to master bathroom. Access to the screened balcony through living room or master bedroom. We welcome our guest with the Aloha spirit here in Hawaii and are available anytime as needed. This neighborhood is about a 10-15 minute walk to downtown Hilo where you'll find local coffee shops, juice bars, restaurants, grocery stores, the post office and Hilo's famous farmer's market every Wednesday and Saturday. This condo comes with an assigned parking stall. Hilo is best accessable by car. The main bus station is a
neighborhood_overview: This neighborhood is about a 10-15 minute walk to downtown Hilo where you'll find local coffee shops, juice bars, restaurants, grocery stores, the post office and Hilo's famous farmer's market every Wednesday and Saturday.
notes: INFORMATION regarding current Kilauea Volcano Eruptions: Some of the mainland news stations have been sensationalizing what is happening with Kilauea and her current state. Sensationalized news sell advertisements!!!! FACTS they are not sharing with you: • The Big Island Is 4,028 mi². The affected area is less than 10 mi² • Kilauea is a shield volcano versus Mt. Saint Helens which is a stratovolcano • The volcanic activity and where lava has flowed along the East Rift Zone in/near Leilani Estates and Lanipuna Gardens Subdivisions is limited to an ISOLATED area in Lower Puna on the island of Hawai‘i ’s east side • This area in the Puna district covers only less than a 10-square-mile area of the island’s 4,028 square miles. The district of Puna is approximately 500 square miles (the size of half of Rhode Island) • This is more than 100 driving miles away from the western Kohala and Kona Coasts, where the island’s major visitor accommodations and resorts are located, and the area furthest
transit: This condo comes with an assigned parking stall. Hilo is best accessable by car. The main bus station is a short distance away located on Bay Front in downtown Hilo.
interaction: We welcome our guest with the Aloha spirit here in Hawaii and are available anytime as needed.
house_rules: Please, kokua: • This is a quiet complex so noise level should to be kept to a minimum as  there are other tenants in surrounding units.  • No smoking. Under the Smoke-Free Hawaii law, smoking is prohibited within 20 feet of doorways, windows, and ventilation outtakes. • Please remove shoes upon entering.

reviews.comments: We thoroughly enjoyed staying here.  The email from Deb made our arrival and entrance easy.   We were welcomed with fresh fruit and lovely flowers.  The apartment is well furnished with many artistic touches - very clean and comfortable.  Comfortable bed, nice linens and abundance of clean towels. The location provides easy access to Hilo and surroundings.  The view into the tropical foliage and the sound of the stream rushing below were special.

We enjoyed our stay in this Hilo condo. The setting was very nice with a stream and tropical foliage out the window. The condo was as expected, small bonuses included fresh local fruit and a coffee sample. The location is a plus, easy drive from airport and walking distance (10-15 minutes) from shops and restaurants in Hilo town. Doug was quick to respond to questions and concerns and very friendly.

It's not air conditioned like most units in Hawaii and since we live on Oahu we were prepared but it's good to know in advance. There are four tower fans throughout the unit that make it comfortable for relaxing and sleeping. 

Overall, I think it is a good value and I would recommend it.

We loved staying at Douglas's lovely home! He was very communicative before our trip, delineating in great detail how to get in, what to expect, etc. The space itself was beautiful (really, the pictures don't do it justice), and it was incredible to fall asleep to the sound of the river rushing nearby.  We were comfortably close to restaurants, etc. in downtown Hilo, and a great in-between from Volcanoes National Park and the north Hilo coastal towns. Great stay! Wish I had planned my whole vacation based out of this spot.
We had a nice stay

Apartment was comfortable, clean, and easily accessible.The owners were great in terms of communicating to us before arriving, giving full instructions, and making us feel welcome.  Greeting us with a bowl of fresh fruit was a nice touch. The location is a short drive (Or a long walk) to several restaurants and coffee shops. we enjoyed our stay very much.
Thank you Douglas! My crew was very happy with the apt! We will be back in a month and hope to stay with you again. Mahalo!
Good location excellent communication from host. Location is above river stream. Overall good value.

Doug sent detailed instruction before we arrived.  The place is 2 flights down from the parking spot, so we we had to carry up and down couple of or big luggages, but it wasn't that big of a big deal.

The place itself is beautiful. All the amenities for a comfortable stay. There is a creek right next to it and you can hear the sound which adds to the charm. The place was gorgeously decorated with rustic furnitures.

It did get a little hot in the night and the cooler could not keep up so we slept with the doors open towards the balcony area.

A good central place to explore Hilo - a couple of minutes drive from a bunch of restaurants. While the complex the apartment is at is not very modern, the apartment interior is modern, well decorated, and has all the amenities you'll need. There is a little stream with out the back window of the dining area - so expect the sound of streaming water and lush green trees. The complex has a laundry room - so just make sure to bring in coins if you want to use it.
This is a great unit. It is extremely clean and very well equipped. The running stream and birds chirping were wonderful!! Highly recommend.
Nice little cozy two bedroom apartment located walking distance to downtown Hilo.

Doug's place is so beautiful and almost magical with the sound of the creek and the birds and frogs. Its a tropical paradise equipped with everything you may need. The kitchen is so well equipped, the bedding ia beautiful and so comfortable.  There are scents of candles throughout the house. Doug thoughtfully  provided some fruits and water for us. The WiFi works well and the condo is centrally located.  I would definately book again if i was ever in Hilo again.
The host canceled this reservation 99 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
My family and myself enjoyed staying at Douglas's place. Definitely come back to their place if we come visit again!
A home away from home! Excellent stay!

This is a very nice condo as a base for Hilo-side explorations. We only stayed 2 nights but it met all our needs. Doug and his daughter were excellent in communicating and answering any questions. I would recommend staying here, especially if you need a base for excursions as opposed to a place with a pool to hang out at.

Two nights at Doug's in Hilo was not part of my original plan. However I am glad it all worked out. Really enjoyed the Hilo area. Highly recommend Moon and Turtle for dinner and Zipline Through Paradise for a thrill and mostly staying at Doug's. The unit's ambience and style is indicative of Hilo's early architecture and Craftsman bungalows. Doug took much care in all the details and amenities. The exterior lacks curb appeal but once inside it's another world. The "River" View is more like a tropical jungle, a la Rousseau.  Parking is a breeze,  the steps... not too bad.  Location is close enough to town; short drive or nice long walk.

꼭 가세요.... 더굴라스네 좋음 왕만족
It was ssssssso good! I really recommend this air bnb

Beautiful setting by a tropical stream. Watching the birds flit through the foliage outside and falling asleep to the Coqui frogs and the sound of the water made our stay much more memorable than being at a hotel. Only a two minute drive from downtown Hilo, but a world away in atmosphere. I would stay here any time I return.
Friendly and responsive! Highly recommend!
The location was handy enough as we had a car. We could walk to restaurants. The apartment is spacious for 2 adults and 2 kids.

Perfect dot on the map! Walking distance to downtown and only a few minute drive away from some hidden gems such as the rainbow fall and the botanical gardens! Don't forget to check out the local beaches for snorkeling or walk downtown to Pineapples for a refreshing drink and some live music! Looking for a lazy morning or a relaxing night? Pull up a seat at Doug's and sip on your coffee while enjoying the view of the jungle or lounge around in the quaint living space and put a movie on. 
Hands down, I highly recommend Doug's place!
Nice flat with stunning jungle noises!
Great location close to rainbow falls and carlsmith beach park. A lot of restaurants and a near by market if you want to cook at "home".  I would stay hear again and highly recommend to others.

The condo was great. Very close to everything in Hilo and only 40mins to the volcano. The outlook over the stream and greenery is gorgeous. Everything was really clean and a lot of thought had obviously gone into considering what the guests may need. The owners were easy to contact and the check in/out process was simple. We would definitely stay here again.
We had a pleasant stay in Douglas's house. Very nice veranda to look at te jungle as you are comfortably home. Very well equipped and easy communication. Thank you!
OMG! Best room in the big island. Close to the volcano park and airport. The room has a nice Zen atmosphere. Big room with three beds and a nice kitchen! Family friendly.
Excellent communication and value!

Douglas' place is breath of fresh air.. literally. Very breezy with lovely sounds of the stream. Nice treats included too :) Great directions, friendly and easy communication. We're going to stay here again next time we venture to the Big Island.
화면에 보이는 것과 같은 숙소였습니다.매우 깨끗했고 부엌에는 요리를 위한 도구도 충분했습니다. 주차장에서 내려가는 길이 조금 수고로위서 주로 스트릿파킹을 하고는 편하게 다녔습니다. 테라스가 있어서 스노쿨링으로 젖은 수영복과 도구들을 말릴 수 있었습니다. 다시 힐로에 간다면 꼭 다시 방문하고 싶습니다.
A very decent place with large room!

Great Place to stay, enclosed eating area with sounds of the creek and forrest in the background. 2 Bedrooms with so many great touches made us feel very welcomed. We had a great stay with my wife and 2 year old son. 

Good location with a car, and Hilo downtown still an easy 10min walk anyway.

Great Value... Would Highly Recommend.
Clean, quiet place close to the town center. We enjoyed our stay.
Een heerlijk appartement met jungle geluiden maar door horten geen last van insecten. Netjes, sfeervol en gastvrij.

Doug's condo was a relaxing retreat overlooking a wooded ravine filled with nature sounds instead of the usual traffic noise. It was clean and looked as though it had been recently renovated, with a well-appointed kitchen and pleasant bathroom next to an ample walk-in closet. We particularly enjoyed the eating area in the screened-in porch. Doug's daughter Deb promptly replied to our inquiries, and we had a delightfully stress-free stay.
The location is great, it’s walming distance from Hilo. Comfortable place to stay!

Beautiful house, spacious, clean. There is a balcony facing a creek and we hear frogs singing. Big screen TV, stereos, sofa made our stay comfortable. Highly recommended for people who want to experience living next to tropical forest. The owner was very responsive and could meet up to offer help.

Douglas's Jungle Apartment near downtown Hilo was such a great accommodation. We had a wonderful 5 days at his place and it was everything and more than expected! The apartment was tucked away from downtown, but within easy walking distance. It was much more roomier than described with a great layout, everything that you would need to comfortably stay and much more. The windows look out onto the stream as described.. but it was more like a being in a jungle house! with the rushing stream below, the canopy of the trees and noises from the frogs it truly felt like you were in an exotic jungle location. Everything went smoothly from check-in to check-out. We didn't end up using the pool, but did check it out. Hoping to be back to stay! Thanks!!

Despite Hilo living up to its reputation for rain, we had a great stay.  Enough space to spread out, comfortable beds, plenty of towels and the extra half bath provided the comforts of home.   A very good base to explore Hawaii.
房东非常热心和热情,看到我们是中国人,还专门准备了中文说明给我们｡

Outstanding location, near by access to tons of Hilo attractions.  Everything is a drive anyway.  Beautifully decotated and extremely comfortable, has everything needed for a family stay.  We didnt get to use the pool, as there are just too many things to do.  Laudry room was a plus since we did some off roading (Champagne Ponds) and muddy hiking (Waipi’o Valley). It was great to come back each evening to a nice comfortable spot.

Loved the sounds of the stream and coqui frogs during dinner, really added to the ambiance.   

Floor plan is very functional.

We had a wonderful time and i would highly recommend this place for parties of 3 or 4.

Doug has a great, centrally located place that had plenty of space for the three of us.  He was also very helpful in recommending attractions within Hilo that turned out to make my trip that much better. Reliable WiFi has nice as well.

We really love this condo! — very cozy and tranquil. I enjoyed listening to the sounds of wildlife every day and walking to the downtown area every morning. The two twin beds were perfect for our tweens.  The kitchen has everything  you need to make a meal. Thanks, Douglas, for letting us stay at your place so we could have a memorable vacation!

Douglas' place is very well appointed, and was very comfortable.  It's in an unassuming apartment-like complex, which could be a little off-putting, but once inside, you feel like you're in a completely different space.  Very quiet ... and your view out the wide windows is really a tropical jungle.  Very convenient to downtown Hilo too.  Douglas left a greeting of very yummy Big Island Candies mango manju and fresh fruit too!!
정말 아름답고 깨끗한 숙소였습니다. 공용 세탁실 가격도 저렴한 편이었고 기본적인 물품들도 완벽하게 준비되어 있었습니다.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. It’s a cozy clean apartment in a quiet residential neighborhood. The apartment is very clean and stacked with absolutely everything we needed during our four-day stay (Deb was very kind to even arrange a play pen and a high chair for our baby!) Communication was extremely easy. Other guests mentioned, but I’ll repeat it again - the river and forest right outside the windows is truly amazing. We slept wry well and had a relaxing stay. Thank you, Deb and Douglas!

This location is beautiful! You have both privacy (not in actual downtown) but the convenience of being extremely close to the downtown area so you can easily walk to the market/shops/restaurants. The condo was fully stocked including linens and everything you would need in a kitchen. Doug was very responsive and kind, and even left us a welcome box of macadamia chocolates. The back patio was enclosed and perfect to sit and relax and play cards. Below the condo area is a small river so you constantly have the sounds of not only the river but the frogs at night, which I love! I would highly recommend staying at Doug’s condo, it is wonderful!

We very much enjoyed staying at Doug's apartment. Everything was sparkling clean, you have everything you might need, the location is great, communication was really prompt, and they were willing to accommodate us and an early check-in even at short notice. We can definitely recommend it!

A well equipped and private apartment, quite comfortable for a family of four and convenient to downtown Hilo. The host was responsive and helpful. After all reviews about the rain it was a pleasant surprise to have some sunshine and a chance to use the very private pool.

Douglas is a great communicator and was easy to reach if needed. His place is in a good location and easy to find with good parking- if you have more than one vehicle in your group one will need to park on the street. The stream behind the condo is very peaceful - at night the coqui frogs chirp their song all night

My brother and I stayed at Douglas's place for 7 days. Everything was as presented on the website. The place was clean, had all the amenities with no bad surprises. Everything in the condo worked as expected. Two special things of note for me were the fresh smelling towels in a very humid town and the sounds of nature coming in from the thick jungle right outside the condo which one can enjoy sitting in the well screened patio. 
I recommend the place highly! 
Thanks

Naseer

We had a lovely stay at this home! Check-in was seamless, the location is perfect to explore Hilo, the house was in fantastic condition when we arrived and Deb and Douglas were quick to respond to any questions. Highly recommend if you’re looking for a little home away from home in Hilo!
Great location with a  responsive host.
Cozy and cute condo with fantastic jungle view and within earshot of the stream.  Highly recommended!
This is a great spot in Hilo.
Great place to stay excellent hosts who provide all that is required for a very pleasant stay

Douglas is a very kind, organized,  experienced host. Instructions for  check in and out were easy to follow and very informative.
The condo is nicely furnitured and cosy, very clean and we didn't miss anything.  
We really appreciated the cookies and fresh fruit on the table when we arrived .
We had a good time  in Hilo and recommend Douglas and his condo for a nice and smooth stay in Hilo!

Doug’s place is in a beautiful location with a gorgeous view of the jungle. Apartment is beautifully appointed and very comfortable. Kitchen has good quality equipment which was appreciated for cooking. Very quiet and peaceful with the sound of the river. Easy walking distance into downtown. I was totally charmed. Doug was very responsive and accommodating. Mahalo!

힐로 숙박을 고민하다가 어린이(8세)가 있어서 에어비엔비를 통해 결정을하게 되었습니다. 빅아일랜드에서는 30분 거리도  굉장히 먼 거리여서, 편의시설 및 공항과 가까운 곳을 우선 순위로 넣었습니다. Douglas 숙소는 공항 및 다운타운에서 매우 가까워 다니기 수월하였고, 힐로의 유명한 비치들과도 가까운 거리에 위치하여 있으면서도 자연과 함께하는 숙소였습니다.  그리고 주방 및 화장실에 필요한 물품이 모두 구비되어 있어 아주 편리하였습니다.

Apartment was clean and in great condition. Host was excellent at communicating with us throughout the stay and he even decorated the place for Halloween. Perfect place for family with a couple of children.
Excellent emplacement, la ville est à portée de marche. Le bruit de la rivière et le décor tropical sont absolument magnifiques.
Douglas's place was great! Had everything we needed - plenty of towels including beach towels for outdoor activities. I would recommend to anyone visiting Hilo!

This place has everything you need, from the kitchen to entertainment. Its in a great location and close to town. Doug was quick to respond to whatever we needed. He was also able to problem solve efficiently. Plus parking was easy. Highly recommend. He doesn't have all those 5 star ratings for nothing.

Great location and great place!
We had a very good time with the family.
Highly recommended, Doug really deserves his superhost title.
Thanks!

Indeed, it is really a jungle... but outside. Inside, it is a very friendly, cosy, clean nest, very well located near nice restaurants and markets. You will spend good time at the Jungle flat :-) For Web addicted people, notice that the connexion is fast.

name: Luxury 1-Bdrm in Downtown Brooklyn
summary: A perfect blend of one of BKLYN's hippest areas with a new, high-rise apartment building. You'll be hard pressed to find a corner unit like this closer the the City. Almost 800 sf of living space with luxury amenities & modern but comfy furnishings.
space: The apartment is a well lit corner unit in a brand new, luxury building in Downtown Brooklyn close to the city and Fort Greene Park. With luxury furnishings including a Studio Divani couch and a chef's kitchen, you'll find no other unit like this the area. The bedroom features a comfy queen bed. The bathroom is well equipped and stocked. The kitchen is well equipped with all the tools you need to prepare a meal or a morning cup of coffee or tea.
description: A perfect blend of one of BKLYN's hippest areas with a new, high-rise apartment building. You'll be hard pressed to find a corner unit like this closer the the City. Almost 800 sf of living space with luxury amenities & modern but comfy furnishings. The apartment is a well lit corner unit in a brand new, luxury building in Downtown Brooklyn close to the city and Fort Greene Park. With luxury furnishings including a Studio Divani couch and a chef's kitchen, you'll find no other unit like this the area. The bedroom features a comfy queen bed. The bathroom is well equipped and stocked. The kitchen is well equipped with all the tools you need to prepare a meal or a morning cup of coffee or tea. Guests will have access to the apartment, the rooftop lounge, gym, and on-site movie theater. A concierge is available 24x7 to help with security, directions, and packages. If you do have a package or other delivery, make sure it is shipped in care of the host's name. The host will be available by t
neighborhood_overview: Downtown Brooklyn serves as the borough's civic and commercial center. Important looking people enter and exit this neighborhood's marble office buildings during business hours. Plenty of adorable shops and knick-knack stalls line Downtown Brooklyn's main avenues, but the neighborhood noticeably settles down after the clock strikes five. Public transit options abound in Downtown Brooklyn, so getting anywhere else from here is a breeze.
notes: When you're here, please do not tell the concierge or guests that you are an AirBNB guest. Tell them you are visiting a friend at the apartment if the topic comes up.
transit: Downtown Brooklyn has a walk score of 96 of 100, a public transportation score of 100 of 100, and a bike score of 88 of 100 (URL HIDDEN) There are several public parking garages nearby as well as Zip Car lots.  For hourly or daily bike rental, there are tons of Citi Bike rental stations nearby including a block away at Willoughby Street & Fleet Street (URL HIDDEN) For public transportation, Manhattan is just a few stops away by subway -- no more than 10 minutes to the Lower East Side or Chinatown in the city. - A, C, F & R subway at Jay St - MetroTech (0.3 miles) - B, Q, R subway station at DeKalb Av (0.3 miles) - 2, 3 subway station at Hoyt St (0.3 miles) - 2, 3, 4, 5 subway station at Nevins St (0.4 miles) - A, C, G subway station at Hoyt & Schermerhorn (0.4 miles) - R, 2, 3, 4, 5 subway station at Borough Hall (0.4 miles) - G subway station at Fulton St (0.5 miles)
access: Guests will have access to the apartment, the rooftop lounge, gym, and on-site movie theater. A concierge is available 24x7 to help with security, directions, and packages. If you do have a package or other delivery, make sure it is shipped in care of the host's name.
interaction: The host will be available by telephone, text, email or (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) to help you during your stay.
house_rules: RESPECT IT & ENJOY IT! NO SMOKING -- this building, per the on-site management and the individual lease agreements, is a 100% SMOKE-FREE ZONE including both private and communal roof-top areas, the unit itself, and any other public areas within the building and the communal property regardless of whether inside or out. You must be totally off of the premises and on public property to smoke. If you're a regular smoker and feel you'll have a hard time following this rule, then we kindly suggest you look into another property. Evidence of smoking will result in a complete forfeit of your security deposit. NOISE: We have a zero-tolerance policy with noise complaints. We ask that you please respect our neighbors and keep noise to a minimum. QUIET HOURS are from 10:00 PM to 8:00 AM (week) and 11:00 PM to 9:00 AM (weekends). NO LARGE GATHERINGS/PARTIES VISITORS: We ask that all guests let us know in advance if you plan on having any visitors during your stay. We do ask that the number of visi

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
I'm an executive at a wellness company in New York City. Educated in Fashion at Parsons, I'm into fitness and nutrition. I've lived in the city since enrolling at Parsons in the late 90s.

If you're looking for restaurant reservations, boutique fitness studios, or things to do in the city, then just let me know what you're interested in. I'd love to offer some suggestions and help you have a wonderful stay in New York City.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Cozy bedroom Sagrada Familia
summary: Cozy bedroom next to the church Sagrada Família a great choice to stay in a residential area away from the crowds while still being at a walking distance to main attractions in Barcelona.
space: Cozy beroom located three minutes from the Sagrada Família in a central zone of Barcelona.  Equiped kitchen.
description: Cozy bedroom next to the church Sagrada Família a great choice to stay in a residential area away from the crowds while still being at a walking distance to main attractions in Barcelona. Cozy beroom located three minutes from the Sagrada Família in a central zone of Barcelona.  Equiped kitchen. I'll be glad to give you some tips according to your taste. Well located on a calm residential area a few blocks away from the city center. Metro on the corner 5 stops away from the Ramblas, Paseo de Gracia and Catalunya square. Restaurants, bars and supermarket around the area.
neighborhood_overview: Well located on a calm residential area a few blocks away from the city center.
transit: Metro on the corner 5 stops away from the Ramblas, Paseo de Gracia and Catalunya square. Restaurants, bars and supermarket around the area.
interaction: I'll be glad to give you some tips according to your taste.

host.host_about:
Hi, I'm from Brazil, but live in Barcelona.
I'm an sportsman, who loves music and is organized.
Really looking foward to a nice deal.
Cya,
Rapha

reviews.comments: Rapha place is so tidy and the dog there is so friendly. I and my friend had a really good time there. Rapha is such a friendly host and he will always give us some suggestions of restaurants or place to travel. The location of the flat is easy to find and it is just next to the metro station and that is very convenient. The hot tourist spot Sagrada Familia is just next to the flat. We can go to the city centre just by walking. Even though at night, we still feel safe to walk to the apartment from the metro.I strongly recommend people to stay there during staying in Barcelona.

name: Whole Apt. in East Williamsburg
summary: Beautiful open floor one bedroom apartment in small building. Located in a quiet street, only 10 min from downtown Manhattan on the L train and a short walk away from the heart of Williamsburg and Bushwick.
space: Beautiful open floor one bedroom apartment in small building. Located in a quiet street, only 10 min from downtown Manhattan on the L train and a short walk away from the heart of Williamsburg and Bushwick. The apartment is on the second floor of a small building. The Amenities include: * Private apartment all to yourself! * Newly renovated bathroom with bathtub. * 3 Blocks from L Train Subway Line * High Speed Wireless Internet * Clean linens and towels * Fully functional kitchen and utensils. * Queen Size bed. * Street parking is free and easy to obtain.  * 48" LED Roku Smart TV with access to Netflix and other streaming services as well as a DVD PLayer. * Bluetooth capable stereo receiver. * 3 Blocks from L Train Subway line for very easy and quick access to Manhattan. * Street parking is free and easy to obtain.
