The Amenities include: * Private apartment all to yourself! * Newly renovated bathroom with bathtub. * 3 Blocks from L Train Subway Line * High Speed Wireless Internet * Clean linens and towels * Fully functional kitchen and utensils. * Queen Size bed. * Street parking is free and easy to obtain.  * 48" LED TV with access to Netflix and other streaming services as well as a DVD PLayer. * Bluetooth capable stereo receiver.
interaction: I will most likely personally welcome you and be available if you need anything during you stay as I live in the same building. Feel free to message me with any questions!
house_rules: Only scheduled  guests may stay in the apartment. Absolutely no smoking allowed inside the apartment.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I am an artist and curator based in New York for over 15 years.

reviews.comments: What a great place this is, walkable from cool part of east williamsburg and short subway or walk from williamsburg so great for exploring. Guillermo is a real friendly host and the apartment is really clean spacious and comfy to relax in after all that exploring!

Appartement tres agreable Avec salle de Bain tres bien equipee,cuisine adapte pour petit dejeuner principalement
Guillermo tres sympathique et tres a l' ecoute
Station de metro tres proche. Et tres pratique pour se rendre sur manan than ( ligne L ) 
Quartier sympathique Avec magasin alimentaire 
Seul bemol travaux nombreux Avec bop de passage de Camion  et de betoniere  sur borom street Avec en prime un parking de betoniere mitoyen de l  'immeuble difficile de faire la sieste
Bonne adresse tout de meme

Guillermo met us when we arrived and showed us round the place, as well as giving us some good recommendations for the local area. The apartment is very light and a really nice space to come back to after a long day. The road can be a little noisy at times, we had the windows open at night as it got quite warm in the apartment. However,  Guillermo offered as an AC Unit when I mentioned it to him. Good restaurants/bars/coffee shops a few minutes walk away, and the subway is 2/3 minutes walk too. Would definitely stay here again, thanks for having us.
We met Guillemo on our arrival. We were shown around the apartment  and made to feel really welcome. The apartment was just great. Perfect for our needs..

This second floor walkup is just a few blocks from my son's place in Williamsburg making it a perfect location for us.  The apt is modern, new construction, spacious and conveniently located to the subway line at Montrose and Bushwick.

The  host was extremely accurate and dipicted what the place looked like. The room was very clean, very organized without too much clutter within the living spaces. Host was also always in reach in case of questions or concerns and answered within minutes of the requests. Me and my girlfriend had an absolutely amazing time during our stay and really had no complaints. All wifi passwords and tv show programs worked. 10/10.
Walking distance to most places we wanted to see.  Subway two blocks away.  Restaurants, grocer, pharmacy close by.

Guillermo was a great host. He recommended plenty of places for breakfast/coffee around the neighbourhood. The place is beautiful, clean and spacious. As described it is near the L-train and very convenient to get to most places. We had a wonderful time staying and exploring the city. Thank you!

We had a great stay at Guillermo's lovely apartment. It was close to the L train to head into Manhattan or to Bedford and also some great places in the neighbourhood for food, coffee etc. Guillermo was quick to respond to any queries we had and arranged a cab to the airport for us on the way home. Thanks for a great time!

Lovely apartment. Very clean, modern and spacious. Comfy bed! Was exactly as was advertised. Met Guillermo half way through stay - very friendly and welcoming. Quite far east in Williamsburg - 30min walk to main Williamsburg strip but 5 minute walk to the nearest subway, with a couple of bars and coffee shops along the way. Very easy to get across to Manhattan. Only downside was no decent convenience store - closest one was very expensive and didn't have everything we were looking for. Otherwise lovely stay and would highly recommend.

Guillermo nous a attendu le jour de notre arrivée alors que nous avions beaucoup de retard. Il nous a rapidement montré l'appartement et il est resté très disponible lors de notre séjour. L'appartement est à quelques blocs d'une station du L Train, parfait pour une première visite de NY, avec la possibilité de visiter aussi le quartier de Williamsburg. Le logement est très lumineux, très grand et très propre.   C'est vraiment un très bon rapport qualité-prix et notre hôte est en plus très à l'écoute!

This host was a great host. His host skills were very host like and it's what a lot of people would expect from a host. 
Overall score I'll give him is an A

Guillermo's place was ideal fo us. Close enough to walk into Williamsberg and just around the corner from the fantastic Roberta's.

The apartment itself is immaculate and stylish.

The key handovers were really efficient even though we landed quite late; and although we needed no help, and liked to be legft alone - it felt that Guillermo would have been there.

Highly recommended.

Lovely quiet well well appointed spacious one bedder in Brooklyn . Guillermo was there to meet us at the apartment when we arrived as he lives downstairs . He was kind enough to prepare an extra bed for my daughter who came with us at short notice . We stayed for 4 days and found it a great area although we spent all our days in Manhattan , we are looking forward to returning in a few weeks and exploring   The area around East Williamsburg . Fabulous comfortable apartment ,

Guillermo's place is very well lit, spacious, clean and very close (about a 3 min walk) to a subway station which is definitely a plus..wifi worked properly the whole time..the bathroom amenities functioned really well and all in all our stay was very pleasant and (Website hidden by Airbnb) is also great that our host was in touch with us through our stay and answered promptly on Airbnb chat..We would definitely recommend this lovely appartment in Williamsburg to anyone looking to visit NYC while trying to relax and have a quiet time when they are not in the heart of the city

Guillermo's place was a wonderful refuge after spending long hot days  in the city. Communication with Guillermo was simple and we had no problem getting into the place. The space was clean and comfortable. We would definitely stay here again.

Guillermo's place not only met, but surpassed our expectations! It was really comfortable, super clean, much less noisy than we anticipated and very convenient to lots of great places in the neighborhood (especially the subway station.) Guillermo was a fantastic host -  a really nice person and very considerate in every regard. I would highly recommend staying here!

I stayed here 4 nights, very comfortable bed, very close to Montrose metro stop, very very clean, and to top it off some of the best graffiti art/ street art areas in the city are right outside the door. I would definitely stay here again.

We are a family of 3 and stayed at Guillermo's apartment twice during our month long stay in the US and Canada. During our trip we stayed in many Airbnb apartments but none as fabulous as this Brooklyn gem .
 Clean,comfortable , spacious and in a great location . Although in a heavy industrial area noise was not a problem as we were away during the day and in fact it was such a quiet haven and great to return to at the end of a busy day sight seeing.
Guillermo was an lovely host and kind enough to accept and prepare  a futon  for my daughter who travelled with (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was excellent as Guillermo  lives down stairs from the apartment .  Wi- fi was excellent and strong. This was a fabulous and memorable stay.  I cannot recommend it highly enough .

Great, clean, stylish and spacious apartment between Bushwick and Williamsburg. Guillermo was communicative and check in and check out were easy. The area immediately around the apartment has quite an industrial feel but once you know where you're going there are some great places - Arrogant Swine was a particular favourite for us.

Great location  (only 2-3 minutes by walk to Subway directly to Manhattan) and perfect apartment to stay for a whole week in New York.  Nice bars and restaurants only few minutes away. Thanks Guillermo, Simon and Kate

Guillermo was a very helpful host. Gave us clear instructions on what to do when we arrived and made us feel very welcome. The flat is spacious, well decorated and a perfect place to stay for a couple looking to explore New York. Subway links were great. Recommend Roberta's Pizza restaurant just round the corner from the apartment. There was a loud party on the Saturday night in the block of apartments opposite that went on until very late, but we slept through it fine and figure that late night house parties are to be expected if you're staying in Brooklyn! We had a great time and would stay here again if we visit again.
Guillermo's apt was spacious, clean, modern, and had character and charm-the bed was very comfortable and the neighborhood felt safe.

We hebben een top tijd gehad in williamsburg (brooklyn). Guillermo was zeer gastvrij en erg behulpzaam. Hij reageerde altijd erg snel op berichten en had goede adviezen betreffende de omgeving. Het apartment is 5 minuten lopen van de metro, en heeft een zeer goede aansluiting met NYC.

Spacious apartment 5 minutes from a subway. Perfect base for exploring if you don't mind using the subway. Clean and airy. Other reviews commented on noise - we had no issue with this. Communication with Guillermo was great, we had an issue with the lock at 8am and he helped us within 5 minutes. We had another issue with a plug and despite not being in the country he made sure it was fixed. Would recommend staying here.

Comfortable and clean apartment in a cool neighbourhood. Apartment is really nicely decorated and has everything you need. Plenty of great bars and restaurants in close walking distance including the excellent Robertas. The subway is just round the corner making it really easy to get to other parts of Brooklyn and Manhattan.

Guillermos apt is just a great place: bright, clean, comfy. Everything is exactly as described and as in the photos. We have been 3 girls, the second futon was as comfortable as the bed, aircon worked, the waterpressure in the shower was great- so we were happy. The neighbourhood is quite industrial, which can lead to some truck/workers noise in the morning. But we felt very safe, the fast L-train to Manhattan is really near and there are a lot of great bars and restaurants around. And though we didn't get to meet Guillermo, he is a great and very responsive host. Checkin and checkout was easy. Thank you Guillermo!
Beautiful little space in the Bushwick area. Close to breakfast spots, coffee shops, and the subway. Very quiet bedroom with a lovely view of the building's outdoor patio.
Great apartment in Brooklyn. Apartment was clean, air conditioning was great and the bed was excellent. Will be recommending and hopefully staying again.

I had a great stay at Guillermo's. It was very clean, and the bed was very comfortable. Beautiful decor and great location for the L train. Everything you need for a stay in the city and I would definitely stay again.
Our stay at Guillermo's apartment was great. After sightseeing all day it was lovely to come back at this quiet and nice place. We definitely recommend this!

I was very happy with all aspects of my stay at Guillermo's place. I left it pretty late but he was very accommodative in this respect. Place was clean and tidy with everything you could need but no clutter so perfect for me and my requirements.

Guillermo's place was really nice and well kept. It is exactly like the pictures. If we needed anything or had any questions he was quick to reply. The area it was located was nice and quiet. I never had an issue during my stay. It is extremely close to the L- Train which was perfect, made it easy to get around. I would definitely stay there again if I ever went back to New York. Thank you for the stay!

We had a great stay at Guillermos apartment, it was clean and well located for the metro. Bed was very comfortable (on the softer side which we like) and bed linens and towels were nice. We did a lot of walking during the day so it was good to be able to get a takeaway and relax with Netflix and feel like we were at home in the evening. The apartment is close to two stations on the L train, four stops into Manhattan and connected with all the north/south lines, very easy to get around. I think if you haven't stayed in New York before and aren't that adventurous you would probably find this a little too out the way. For those who have visited Nyc before and comfortable finding their way around this is fantastic value and interesting to stay outside of Manhattan. Recommend swallow cafe for breakfast. We also went to Rye for dinner. We used Uber in the evenings if we were eating out elsewhere in Brooklyn for convenience. 
Thanks,
Louise

We Visited New York City for Four days, The appartment was Perfect for using the Subway System the next stop is only a Block away, there were alot of Great coffee Bars and Restaurants In walking distance, always Safe at Night and Most Important of all -the appartment was beautiful. Great Location, Very clean and alot of Space. 
Perfect for anyone wishing for an Authentic Brooklyn Lifestyle Visit.

Guillermo was a very gracious host. My friend and I never actually met him but communication was always prompt and the apartment was exactly as described. Everything was very clean and well kept. Neighborhood was quiet and about a 6-7min walk from the subway. Getting into the city was easy and we would definitely recommend this to people looking for a place to stay in Brooklyn. There were several corner stores very close and restaurants and bars that were within walking distance. We would definitely stay here again. Apartment was spacious and perfectly sized for two people.

Perfect from start to finish! 

Great location - lots of bars and restaurants within walking distance. L train just round the corner which gets you straight into Manhatten. 

Modern and clean flat. Bed extremely comfortable. It also has everything you need. 

Guillermo greeted us and was very pleasant and helpful. Our flight was late so he let us leave our cases in the building until we needed to leave. 

Highly recommended - thanks!

The apartment is a great size and has everything you need for a great stay in NYC. 

We used it as a base to explore the Manhattan and Brooklyn. The apartment is right by the subway so very easy to get around and only takes 15 mins to get into Midtown. 

The place is huge, much bigger than anything else we found in the area, it had a great shower and a very comfortable bed. 

We would highly recommend this place for anyone looking for a place to stay in Brooklyn and i hope we will be back soon!

Lucy

Das ist eine ganz tolle Unterkunft, und der Gastgeber Guillermo ist äußerst zuvorkommend und hilfreich. Hier kann man gut relaxen, wenn man aus der Stadt zurückkommt. Die U-Bahn ist ganz nah (ca. 4 Minuten), ein sehr gutes Bett gibt es, ein ansprechendes Badezimmer und eine kleine Küche, die dazu ausreicht, um Frühstück zu machen. Also, als Tourist in NYC ist man hier bestens aufgehoben. Außerdem bietet die Wohnung genügend Platz, um die Koffer vernünftig abzustellen bzw. auszupacken.
Wonderful host, and very communicative. Would happily stay here in the future!

Really nice and stylish apartment. Calm and comfortable. Near to subway and facilities to buy food etc.
Nice and friendly owner. Would really like to come back another time.
Guillermo's place was wonderful and cozy and a few minutes walk to the L train. Guillermo is super communicative and attentive. My boyfriend and I really enjoyed our stay!
Great stay! Lovely apartment and a fun and accessible area. Couldn't recommend more.

Guillermo was the best host! He's very accommodating and friendly. 
Staying in his place felt like I was home. The apt is very private, bright and sunny.

It is a quick 5 minute walk to the nearest subway which gets you into the city in 10 mins. 

It is also conveniently located close to a yoga studio, great pizza place and natural foods market as well as lots of corner bodegas and coffee shops.

I love NY, I especially love Williamsburg and I loved our stay at Guillermo's. 

I can't recommend it enough.

Great area. Williamsburg has great bars and restaurants. 
Apartment was beautiful and bright. Very clean.
It was on a quiet street and is only 2min walk from the subway.

Booked Guillermo's apt for my parents' first time using Airbnb and they're already talking about how they want to come back... It was the perfect place for their visit to Brooklyn. Very comfortable and clean space and in great location. Guillermo was a very kind and communicative host. Thank you!

Excellent apartment in a good location close to subway stops and in a relatively quiet street. Can be difficult to get to if relying solely on public transport (three trains from JFK) but definitely achieveable. Kitchen is rather limited but stove works well and able to make simple meals if you wish. Clean, well maintained, warm and secure with good bathroom. Recommend to all
Enjoyed our stay here a lot. Close to subway and local spots. Apartment was esactly as described, so clean and the bed was super comfy.
Guillermo was great! Easy check-in and he was super friendly and helpful.  Highly recommended.
Great place in East Williamsburg with cool bars and places to eat nearby as well as being only a block from the L train. Comfortable apartment with everything we needed whilst visiting. Recommended.

This apartment is in a great location. We arrived to -8c snowy weather but the flat was kept nice and warm. The area is quiet and slightly industrial but has a couple of great bars and restaurants within walking distance. The subway is a 5min walk and very convenient for getting into manhattan and williamsburg.

Perfect apartment. Close to L subway and shops, right on the boarder of Bushwick and Williamsburg. Very clean and comfortable. The perfect place for a week long stay or more! Can't wait to stay again!

La estadía en lo de Guillermo fue genial! El depto es más lindo y amplio todavía de lo que muestran las fotos (en serio!) Cuenta con todo lo necesario, y más! Además, todo impecablemente limpio. Muy bien ubicado: a pocas cuadras del metro; supermercados, locales ropa vintage, bares... todo en los alrededores. Muy recomendable!!

Guillermo is a very friendly guy. We felt very comfortable in his apartment. The apartment was clean and close to the subway station. Check in and check out was very easy. We could also store our luggage on our last day. We can really recommend this apartment.

Guillermo's apartment was a great home away from home for me and my husband. We were walking distance to a lot of cool restaurants and bars and had the Montrose stop on the L very close by. The apartment was clean, easy to get to and cute decor too. I would recommend it to anyone.

My stay here was great! Everything was as described in the advert. Close to both Montrose Ave and Morgan Ave subways. The area is great with a good mix of all kinds of people. 
Guillermo was very quick to respond to my messages and was even able to help me out when I forgot my UK-US plug adaptor. 
Thanks again Guillermo!

We enjoyed our stay here very much. Clean and spacious apartment, walking distance to restaurants and bars. Communication with host was quick and very good. We would definitely recommend staying here.

Our stay in the apartment of Guillermo was amazing. 
We'd like the space, the central area near to the subway. The apartment was very clean and comfortable.  
Guillermo is a very friendly and helpful hostess.
I was there with my two (pre) teenage daughters and they like Netflix on the television.  It's fine after an overwhelming en buisy Day in Manhattan you can relaxed in an other part of the city not far away. It feels like vacation.

Geräumiges, helles Apartment in einer ruhigen Gegend. Absolut sauber und appetitlich . Einfache aber praktische und geschmackvolle Möblierung und Ausstattung. Schönes modernes Bad.  Manhattan mit U-Bahn leicht in 30 min zu erreichen. Sehr empfehlenswert.

We had a great time staying at Guillermo's apartment. It was very spacious (bed v. comfortable and bathroom good size with towels and great shower!) and was in a brilliant location; near the subway and also bars and restaurants. Guillermo was very accommodating when it came to our arrival and departure times too. Travelling with two of my friends, we couldn't have hoped for anything better.

We loved Guillermos apartment. It was perfect for our first visit to NYC. The location was great, so close to the subway and within walking distance/easy underground ride to plenty of cool cafes, restaurants and coffee shops. A great base to explore NYC and Brooklyn. The apartment was amazing, very spacious and modern. Much better than a tiny hotel room. Check out Guillermos recommended places to eat. A great tip is to buy a 7 day metro pass for about $30 which will get to anywhere by underground or bus. We got a taxi from Jfk because it was late night but on the way home we found it very easy to get the train.

We enjoyed our stay in this apartment: it is spacious and clean, with  nice furniture, a good bed and a good bathroom.

Hopefully we will have the opportunity to come back soon.
Lovely clean, spacious and light studio in great Brooklyn neighbourhood, Guillermo was super nice and all went smoothly!

L'appartement de Guillermo est bien situé, proche du métro qui mène à Manhattan et le quartier est sûr. Guillermo a été arrangeant aussi bien lors de l'arrivé (nous sommes arrivés très tard) que pour le départ. 
Seul bémol pas spécialement gênant, l'appartement n'a pas de volets comme chez nous en France ! Mais avec la fatigue ce n'est pas spécialement nécessaire et cela permet de se lever tôt pour profiter de la journée ;)
Such a cool place. Close enough to Manhattan but out of the chaos. Interesting neighborhood with hip bars and good food. Guillermo was a great host responding quickly to any questions that we had.
Good amount of space in a great location. Great food nearby and easy access to manhatten by subway

Guillermo was a great host. Check in was easy and the communication was fast and simple. The apartment was very comfortable and in a great location near the L train and many bars and restaurants. I would definitely stay here again my next time in the city.

Firstly, it is important to note that we stayed at Guillermo's place for 1 month. This could make some issues irrelevant for people who intend to stay for a few days to 1 week. 

Host:
Guillermo is a very considerate host and genuinely wants guests to have a great stay. His communications are very quick and he is also very quick in responding to any issues. He is a really nice guy and trustworthy. He personally responds to issues and even got us a microwave oven on request, which was very kind of him. 

Noise:
One issue we had with the apartment is noise. This is obviously nothing to do with the host but it can't really be ignored in a review. There is a cement factory right behind the apartment and a welders/metal works opposite it. This is going to make noise. Both start work very early in the morning so we often were woke up by the beeping of trucks reversing and the grinding of the metal works across the road. They both work 6 days a week. Probably not an issue for a few days but having that noise every morning for a month is annoying. 

Area:
The area (Bushwick) is very different to Williamsburg even though some people call it East Williamsburg. Bushwick is more like real life. Good variety of people and cultures and we found it very safe. Plenty of amenities close by. Getting into Manhattan is very simple. L train is 5 stops away from East Village which is great. Bushwick has artists' residence and an amazing Pizza place called Roberta's, which is a must. There is very impressive street art (lots of it) about 5 minutes away. 

Rooms:
The bathroom is new and everything works well. Kitchen is ok but a little limited. We did have some issues with the power going a couple of times in there. It does need re-wiring. The Lounge is nice. TV has Netflix and the Air Con is pretty good and keeps the apartment cool. WiFi is quick. The bed was comfortable. The Furniture is pretty good. Sofa is comfortable and fairly new and it has a good desk and a place to hang clothes. 

Cleanliness:
In addition to the surrounding noise, the only other issue we had was the cleanliness of the apartment. It looks pretty clean when you arrive but the floor left your feet dirty if you walked around barefoot and when you inspected a little closer (behind sofa or fridge) it was pretty dirty. there is a collection of thick dust in-between the bars of the radiators and there was a strange smell by the bed, which we couldn't work out what it was? Bathroom was very clean. It is an old building/apartment and needs a little TLC in terms of the flooring.

We had a great stay at Guillermo's apartment. The place is beautiful and very comfortable. It's located really close to the subway so it was really easy to go to Manhattan or visit other parts of Brooklyn.
z
Great spot!! Beautiful apartment

Guillermo is an incredible host. He is very easy going and always willing to help you.

We had a great time at Guillermo's we totally recommend his place.

Wir hatten eine tolle Zeit in Guillermos Appartement! Es bot ausreichend Platz für drei Personen und war sehr gut für einen Kurztrip ausgestattet. In unmittelbarer Umgebung gibt es einen kleinen Supermarkt und eine Subway Station. Auch wenn wir Guillermo nicht persönlich getroffen haben, war er stets erreichbar und ein super Ansprechpartner bei Fragen. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und würden jederzeit wiederkommen!

We loved staying at Guillermo's apartment. It was clean, stylish and the bed was super comfy. Only a short walk away from some very cool places to eat and drink and very close to the subway. We felt at home! Can't wait to come back.

Das Apartment liegt in einem sicheren Viertel Brooklyns und ist besonders geräumig und bequem ausgestattet. Uns hat besonders gefallen, dass wir separat für uns waren, die excellente technische Ausstattung (super WLAN, TV mit Netflix, Amazon Prime etc), das bequeme Bett und die tolle Dusche/Wanne. Und so viel Platz. Die Kommunikation mit Guillermo läuft perfekt via mail. Das einchecken und auschecken war total unproblematisch. Guillermo ist sehr hilfsbereit bei allen Fragen. Manchmal etwas lauter Umgebungslärm, aber in welcher Weltmetropole ist es nur ruhig? Insgesamt sehr zu empfehlen.

The host was very quick to respond to messages and was very helpful. It's a nice bright and clean space, comfortable bed and couch, decent TV with a Roku box (netflix etc). Lovely bathroom with a great shower, nice and hot and good water pressure. The neighborhood is quite noisy and its not the most attractive with lots of industrial buildings, but 5 minute walk to the subway which will take you into the heart of Manhattan in 10-15 minutes is great.
I would happily stay there again

Nossa estadia no apartamento de Guillermo foi incrível, sem nenhum ponto negativo! A comunicação com ele foi rápida e eficiente, o apartamento foi limpo e arrumado com afinco. O ambiente é exatamente como nas imagens e muito aconchegante. A localização é bem perto do metrô da linha L, que nos levou para todos os lugares que queríamos. Próximo do apto também é possível encontrar muitos cafés legais de se frequentar.

Guillermo’s place was a perfect spot to explore the city and have a quiet and clean place to lay your head after a long day of traveling. Having a short walk to the L and a quick train ride to the city helped to get as much from the city as possible. 
I️ highly recommend Guillermo’s place and I️ will book again next time I visit.

Ambiente espaçoso e muito iluminado. O host é muito simpático e sempre a disposição para ajudar nos problemas. Ótima localização, com metro  e mercados bem próximos. Só uma aviso para a escada bem íngrime de acesso ao apartamento, isso pode ser um problema para algumas pessoas.
The apartment was exactly as described. It was wonderful and we couldn’t believe how close we were to Manhattan! Guillermo was an excellent host - thank you!

Guillermo's appartment is ideally located, close to the L-line, stylishly decorated and more spacious than expected. Plenty of restaurants and shops nearby. If you have time I highly recommend the Bushwick graffiti tour in the area and the pizzas at Robertas. Guillermo is quick to respond and very friendly
Exactly as described. Great location, friendly host, awesome value. Highly recommend.
Guillermo's flat is very clean and in a great location with lots of fun spots nearby. We enjoyed staying here!

Awesome place, perfect for people who want a special adventure in a very authentic area. If you like art, hip cafes and restaurants, this place is for you. Guillermo is definitely a super attentive host, replies very quickly and is really nice. He even suggested some solutions for us to leave our luggage at the apartment before our flight that was late at night. The appartement is also very, very nice and artsy.
Thanks Guillermo, we really enjoyed our stay!

Très bel appartement fonctionnel et bien situé. La proximité avec le métro à seulement quelques stations de Manhattan est un avantage indéniable. Guillermo a été très disponible et arrangeant sur les horaires de check in et check out. Petit bémol sur la mauvaise insonorisation des fenêtres. Entre le  bruits des travaux, les décollages d'avion de JFK et l'absence de rideau c'est compliqué de dormir le matin. Malgré tout cela reste un excellent rapport qualité/prix pour New York.

This location was perfect for our first visit to NYC. The host was incredibly accommodating and was available if I had any questions or concerns. This location is close to some great places for food and drinks and just a short walk to the subway. We were able to explore the whole city with ease and come home at night to a clean, beautiful apartment. Highly recommend!

Guillermo was very nice and super fast to respond and flexible! The flat is very close to the L Train and only a couple stops away from Prime Williamsburg. The flat is in a triplex and is super bright in a large space with really cute furnishings and a huge bathroom. We really enjoyed our stay and would recommend Guillermo's flat.

Everything was perfect In my opinion, house looks actually better than pictures. I loved the high celling and it was really spacious. Location was also really good, easy to access manhattan. And the atmosphere near the house was awesome! Guillermo truly cared about us and gave his best. I would like to stay here if i come to nyc again.

Great location! The apartment is spacious and bright! Really close to the L train for a quick and easy commute to Manhattan. Guillermo was fantastic with communication and I highly recommend his place for singles or couples.

Nice and cozy Apartment close to the L-train. Perfect connection to Manhattan and many shopping options and Restaurants in the neighborhood. Guillermo is a very friendly and flexible host, we had a great stay.

The apartment is so spacious, and clean with beautiful natural light. The Montrose stop is only a few blocks away, so convenient! Guillermo’s quick communication makes everything easy about staying here. The bed and rollaway were comfortable, the bath was luxurious. It was so roomy, it did not feel like a NY apartment, or at least none that I have stayed in before.
Nice flat in a fun area. Lots of cool coffee shops and some nice vegan places to eat that are close by. Easy to travel in to Manhattan. Would definitely recommend to stay at Guillermos place!
Great loft, truly an intimate experience. Warm an inviting apartment. Also, there a 100 piece puzzle at the apart. We attempted to complete it lol. Only got the border done. Keep the challenge going!

Guillermo is a friendly host and was flexible regarding check-in and -out, which was great. We had a wonderful stay at the spacious apartment which was absolutely sufficient for our 5-Night-stay. The bed was comfy, the bathroom clean and the kitchen seemed reasonably equipped (we didnt use it). The neighbourhood was quiet at night and the streets relatively empty. The restaurant suggestions came handy when we arrived late at night at the apartment so we headed out to Robertas. Cool place with delicious pizza - unfortunately super busy - even on a Thursday evening - so it seems reservations would be recommended. You can take a cab from the Newark Airport to get there, which is 130$ and takes an hour or you choose the NJ Transit and subway transport which is way cheeper but takes you about 2 hours. The apartment is located close to the subway (L line) which is perfect for travelling to Manhattan quickly.

Wir haben uns bei Guillermo sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Kommunikation war top, die Wohnung sehr schön und auch die Lage ideal. Es war immer eine Wohltat aus der überfüllten Innenstadt in das ruhigere Viertel zu kommen. Und doch hat es einige super Spots im Quartier, es ist also nicht abgelegen. Bei einem weiteren Aufenthalt in New York würden wir die selbe Unterkunft wählen.

Guillermo est un hôte très sympathique et très réactif lorsque nous avons besoin de lui. 
L'appartement est idéalement situé (à 4mn à pied de la station de métro), très propre et très lumineux. Nous avons passé un agréable séjour.

We had a wonderful time at Guillermo's apartment. Going to Manhattan by subway is quick and easy. The apartment was perfect for our week in New York. It was very clean and has everything you need. The neighborhood has a lot of nice restaurants. We had a great stay and would definitely recommend this apartment.

Guillermo's flat is exactly how it looks from the pictures: clean, stylish and cosy. The neighbourhood is quiet and you can easily reach Manhattan by train in about 20 minutes. We really enjoyed our stay as the place was true to description.

I couldn’t be any happier with our stay at Guillermo’s place! Me and my girlfriend truly loved it and hope to one day Return. 

 It was both our first time in NYC and this location couldn’t of been any better. 24 hour organic store around the corner and it’s a 5 minuet walk to the subway which connects you to everywhere you might want to go explore.... Perfect. 

 Williamsburg in itself it a really wonderful location with a very relaxed vibe which we both enjoyed greatly. Whilst we loved seeing Times Square it was the vibe around here and downtime Manhattan which stuck with us the most. 

As a host we couldn’t of asked for anyone better; Happy to help with any questions we had and incredibly kind and friendly. 10/10

We loved this apartment! So clean and tidy, super handy to the subway and a short 15 minute trip to Manhattan. Guillermo was an excellent host and answered our questions quickly - always contactable. Fantastic to have some space in the city rather than a hotel!

Como positivo el departamento es amplio y luminoso , la cama es comoda , el bano esta reciclado a nuevo , el living es comodo y (Website hidden by Airbnb) estacion del subterraneo esta muy cerca y  de facil acceso a Manhattan . Como parte negativa el departamento esta ubicado justo enfrente de un taller metalurgico que empieza a trabajar a las 0630 am y hace mucho ruido , tambien al lado hay una empresa cementera con un gran movimiento de camiones por la manana , el parking es gratuito pero el sistema de NYC es un tanto complicado porque hay que cambiar de lado de la calle en determinados dias y horarios .
Great place!
Lovely, stylish place! We had a great stay.

Great place! Good home base for getting into the city or exploring Bushwick. Highly recommend checking out Roberta's pizza/bar just a short walk away. Space is thoughtfully designed. Mattress left a bit to be desired but otherwise great experience.
Great location, clean, nice bathroom and the bed is very comfortable. The kitchen is small and not so well equipped, but normally you eat most meals on restaurants in NY.
Lille fin lejlighed hvor der er hvad der er nødvendigt. Super fin kommunikation med vært som svarer hurtigt på mails
Estilo sin igual
The apartment in East Williamsburg is light and airy and very convenient to the subway. Guillermo was very responsive and I would certainly stay there again.
A nice minimal space, good for two people. Any more would be crowded. Very clean! No microwave but there is a stovetop.
The apartment is perfectly located (less than 5 minutes walk to the next subway Station). You can be in Manhatten in less than 30 minutes. The description of the apartment fits with reality.
The apartment is bright, spacious, cosy and very comfortable. Guillermo made our stay very easy.

This cute Brooklyn apartment is a great place to stay. Guillermo was there to meet us when we arrived and had several ideas of local restaurants and things to do. It is a short walk to the subway and then a short ride into Manhattan. 
Absolutely worth the cost and it gave our trip a more authentic feel.

This place has a great location. Neighborhood felt safe and there were plenty of restaurants and stores within walking distance. It’s a very simple yet stylish feel. It was also very clean and comfortable. We would definitely stay here again. The only complaint is that the neighborhood or shop next door was doing construction so we woke up to metal grinding.
Very nice appartment! Comfortable!, well decorated and good location. We felt at home!
The apartment is nice and Guillermo is a good and helpful host!

East Williamsburg is well served by public transport...quick and easy to get to Manhattan and around Brooklyn. Lots of great food stores open very late. Guillermo’s apartment is a good base in a hip neighbourhood.

I wish I could give this appartment more than 5 stars. It was so good! Really clean, we loved the style en the neighbourhood was very good! Roberta's Pizza is right around the corner, and if you use the metro station that is really nearby, you are in the big city in 15 mins.
Guillermo is really fast in his responses, in advance as during our stay. We had some questions during our stay and we got really fast responses!
We will definitely recommend this place to our friends and family!
Guillermo’s is a great place to stay and is a very quick trip into Manhattan or into Williamsburg. Overall a great place to stay.
This is a highly recommended apartment with all needed facilities - and a bit more because of the cosy atmosphere which makes you feel at home from the moment you enter the apartment. Enjoy !

Guillermo’s place is exactly as described. It’s clean, warm, spacious and ideal for exploring the city without paying ridiculous Manhattan price tags. The apartment is not in the heart of Williamsburg, more on the outskirts but it’s only 5 mins into Williamsburg and 15 into Manhattan on the subway (the nearest station is a few minutes walk). 

The area looks a little shady when you first arrive but we had no issues at all. There is a pizza place and other takeouts, grocery stores and a couple bars all near the subway station.

Guillermo was very responsive and provided us with all the info we needed in plenty of time. He also gave us phone numbers in case we needed them.

The apartment is lovely and spacious and the bathroom and kitchen were spotless. It was freezing when we visited and the apartment was always lovely and warm. The only notes I would make is that the blinds in the apartment aren’t very thick so if you are a light sleeper you may want to take a sleep mask. Also, there isn’t really any storage space for you clothes. It’s fine if you’re there for a week (like is) but might be a bit of an issue for people staying longer.

All in all it is a great base to explore the city and I would definitely stay again on my next trip to New York.
Great place, would recommend this place if you want to see new part of NY. Easy walking distance to Williamsburg bridge into the city. Guillermo always responded quickly and provided some great tips

Excelente servicio, el departamento es igual que en fotos muy limpio, la zona es tranquila y sin mucho ruido, quizás por las festividades pero es una calle muy limpia y accesible, las tiendas en los alrededores muy útiles, es una gran opción, volveria a hospedarme ahí y lo recomendaría, Guillermo siempre atento con lo que necesité y además fue muy amable en dejarnos guardar maletas antes y después del check in y check out todo impecable

Die Wohnung liegt in einem belebten Viertel, in dem es tolle Strassenkunst zu sehen gibt. Nur drei Ubahnstationen entfernt ist die Bedford Avenue, dort kann man ausgiebig shoppen und gut essen. Die Wohnung ist sauber und gemütlich.
Perfect, comfortable, spotless and spacious apartment! on a nice and quiet street, near 2 subway stations. I’ll be back!

Le logement est très agréable, très bien chauffé et bien situé, à quelques minutes de la station de métro. Il y aussi quelques commerces à proximité et on y trouve de tout. 
Bonne adresse!
Very nice place in a perfect location. Very quiet and a few minutes from the subway. It gave us the chance to visit Brooklyn. I highly recommend.

name: Jubilee By The Sea (Ocean Views)
summary: Newly furnished two story home. The upstairs features a full kitchen with a 600 sq. ft. lanai with ocean views. The downstairs has a kitchenette and additional living area. The upstairs has air-conditioning in the main living area and the two bedrooms.  The downstairs does not have air conditioning in the bedrooms or living.  Absolutely beautiful! Aloha!
space: Jubilee by the Sea is a fully remodeled home with spectacular views of the ocean from the wrap around lanai.  All appliances are new, the furniture is new and the mattresses are all high-end "tuft and needle" mattresses.
description: Newly furnished two story home. The upstairs features a full kitchen with a 600 sq. ft. lanai with ocean views. The downstairs has a kitchenette and additional living area. The upstairs has air-conditioning in the main living area and the two bedrooms.  The downstairs does not have air conditioning in the bedrooms or living.  Absolutely beautiful! Aloha! Jubilee by the Sea is a fully remodeled home with spectacular views of the ocean from the wrap around lanai.  All appliances are new, the furniture is new and the mattresses are all high-end "tuft and needle" mattresses. You will have access to the entire home, which can be split into two separate living spaces, with separate kitchens and full bathrooms.  Two bedrooms upstairs and two bedrooms downstairs. Also included are 4 snorkel sets, 2 boogie boards, and 4 beach chairs. I live 5 minutes away and can help with your planning.  We also have 2 copies of the Ultimate Guide to the Big Island in the Jubilee House. The location is fantast
notes: The location is fantastic.  You can enjoy views of the ocean from this quiet neighborhood.  The downtown area is 2.5 miles away and the ocean is less that 1/2 mile. Hawaii Tax ID Number: W (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
access: You will have access to the entire home, which can be split into two separate living spaces, with separate kitchens and full bathrooms.  Two bedrooms upstairs and two bedrooms downstairs. Also included are 4 snorkel sets, 2 boogie boards, and 4 beach chairs.
interaction: I live 5 minutes away and can help with your planning.  We also have 2 copies of the Ultimate Guide to the Big Island in the Jubilee House.
house_rules: 1.NO SMOKING IS ALLOWED anywhere on the property (inside or outside).  2.Please remove your footwear and place them in the designated shoe rack outside of the home prior to entering the home.  This is our Hawaiian custom and helps keep everything clean and tidy.   3.Tidy up all food prior to leaving the unit or going to bed.  Do not leave open food out on the counter.  Food attracts ants and other critters. 4.Guests are expected to be considerate of neighbors in this quiet neighborhood.   5.Use of illegal substances or excessive alcohol is prohibited. 6.Guests are expected to only park in their designated parking spot in the driveway.  7.Beach equipment is stored in separate containers for each unit.  Check-in information will provide the code for access to each units snorkel gear, etc. Please be considerate of the equipment and feel free to utilize the snorkel sets and two beach chairs designated for each unit.   8.The BBQ grill is shared with one other unit.  Please clean grill after

host.host_about: We are from Phoenix, Arizona and absolutely love the Big Island of Hawaii. We are adventurous people and love to find hidden beaches, waterfalls, and new adventures every day on this island. Our home is in very close proximity to all that Kona has to offer. We took special care in renovating our new property to ensure that anyone who comes and stays would be comfortable and feel right at home.  We are always available to answer any questions that you have while you are enjoying your Hawaiian vacation.

reviews.comments: Jubilee by the Sea is a lovely, comfortable place to stay. Clean, crisp, peaceful and decently stocked, all 8 of us enjoyed our time here. Beds were fantastic, lanai very useful with a beautiful view. Quiet community and plenty of beach supplies available. There is an AC unit upstairs, and with fans we were able to make it cool enough, but it definitely is warm at times, so be prepared for that. Great location for all your Kona needs. :) Mahalo!
The host was warming and very communicative. The house was great for a large number of people and very hospitable. Highly recommend!

We had an very good time at the Jubilee by the sea! It was beautiful clean and had a great location! Slept our team of 12 comfortably after a 200 mile relay race and we all loved the house so much! It was even better in person. We all agreed the pictures didn't do it justice. In a beautiful and very quite neighborhood located near Kona town and a short drive to the airport. Loved it!

The reservation, check in and check out process was easy and smooth. The house was exactly what we anticipated, accommodating, homey, in a nice area with a fantastic view of the ocean. Lots of space with privacy. The kitchen was well equipped. The linai was a highlight for family time. Snorkels and beach chairs were appreciated Thank you for opening your home to us. Mark Spangler - Philadelphia

The house is very spacious, clean and quiet. I enjoy sitting on the balcony feeling the wind of Hawaii. The kitchen is amazing to me because of the table and refrigerators. Surfing tools are very helpful when you go to the beach. Will definitely book again for short travel.

Jubilee by the Sea was a perfect getaway for our family of 8 people. Everyone has a great time, we were very close to the amazing Magic Sands Beach and a short drive away from Kona shopping, groceries and dining. We loved the snorkel sets and beach chairs included in this listing. The kitchen was great for our homemade family breakfasts and dinners too. We spent every evening on the wrap-around lanai, it was gorgeous. We would recommend Jubilee by the Sea to our family and friends. MAHALO!
Great place to stay while in Kona!! Nice view on a wonderful wrap-around porch!!  Very family friendly.  Super nice guy--Nate's the best!!
Nate was very responsive to all questions and was accommodating to a few of my requests.  Lovely stay for our family vacation.
Great house, great host!

Nice and clean home, extremly quick response from Nate who was kind and gave good tips about the city and beaches. The house was perfect for a group of friends/family, and a nice touch that we could borrow beach-gear for free. Didnt miss anything! A bit too far from the beach though, and we had to use the car to/from everything, which is the only minus to this house. Would definetly recommend it!!

This is definitely a lovely place to stay if you are staying at Kona. It is close (drive distance) to the central where everything is and have ocean view from the house. it is comfortable for us 7 adults to stay and the balcony is huge. The only thing i would say is that the house could be better equipped with more/better appliances (coffee maker, blenders and etc) and have more daily household stuff to make the stay more enjoyable.

Fantastic house for a family!  We spent so much time on the lanai with our kids running around. It was nice to have a full house and kitchen for us to relax for the week. Easy location to drive to town and things to do across the island. Beautiful home and nicely finished.

This property is exactly as described.  We stayed with small children and it was family friendly and left plenty of space for the little ones and the adults.  The beds were extremely comfortable, the home was clean and decorated beautifully, and all the guests in our party enjoyed their stay. Nate was very communicative and we enjoyed our interaction and our time there.
We would come again!

Not only was Jubilee perfect for our group of 7( me and my husband, our two teenagers, our ten year old and my parents),Nate was also always available for any questions that we had.  He made us feel so comfortable and welcomed. The location was superb-  close to some of the best snorkeling on the island as well as a nice, smaller beach where our kids could do some body surfing.  It is also convenient to grocery stores, restaurants and the airport.  There was nothing to be disappointed about during our stay at Jubilee- everything was perfect!

This was a great place to stay for our extended family of 8. The newly remodeled house was spacious and very clean.  Nate was super nice and very responsive.  The lanai out front was our favorite place to relax and gather morning and evening.  The beds were very comfortable.  The refrigerator was huge.  With a car, we had easy access to the whole coast north and south of Kona.  The snorkeling and other beach gear that came with the house also made our stay easier and more fun!
The only con: Two members of our group needed the A/C to sleep.  We found that the A/C in the bedrooms upstairs were kind of loud as it shut off and on through the night.  And the house rule of running it at a 75 degree minimum still seemed warm to us.  But it was still better than nothing, since we didn't want to keep all the bedroom doors open all night to catch the cross breezes (for privacy and to manage the snorers).
Overall, I would easily recommend this place!

This was our first ever Air BnB stay and it won't be our last. Nate's home is very well presented and was perfect for our family of 6 - with four very generous bedrooms. The beds themselves are very comfortable and the house is situated in a nice quite location.
We hired a car which was advantageous, as a 5minute drive to main street but too far to walk. The house had all the appliances we required and we would highly recommend it. Thanks for allowing us to stay in your house.
Beautiful home and friendly caretaker right next door for any issues. We had a Wonderful stay and had easy access to all the places we ventured to. Loved it!
Great location close to beaches and markets.

Nate's place was perfect for our family of 8 and everyone had a bed and we enjoyed the comfort of this lovely home as well as the convenience of getting to places, whether it be in town (just a short 10-15 min walk/jog if runner) or getting to various locations around the island.  Loved the wraparound lanai, especially with the lovely view of the ocean.  We cooked most of our meals at the house so it was convenient and helped us save a ton of money.  We also enjoyed eating out at the restaurants suggested by Nate (we loved Lava Java).  The house is fully equipped with beach equipment/toys which we didn't really use (we brought our own) but know that it's there.  Easy access to town and highway.  Overall highly recommend this home and cannot wait to visit the Big Island again and will definitely want to stay here again.

Jubilee by the Sea is definitely a nice place to stay.  The house has everything you need.   It it clean and comfortable.  It's got a nice view with a huge lanai and  very quiet neighborhood.  The hosts, Nick and his wife, are very helpful and friendly.  It was a very good experience for us and we definitely highly recommend their house.

We had a blast staying at the Jubilee House! It's beautiful, clean, close to everything, and has a wonderful view. We went to Kona for a family wedding and it was great to have a big house together as opposed to several hotel rooms. In the mornings we had coffee on the lanai while we looked out at the ocean--so lovely! Nate was a wonderful host. He got back to us right away each time we needed something. We did wish for AC window units in the downstairs bedrooms like the ones upstairs. But we were there in August, the hottest time of the year. It probably wouldn't be a big deal to go without AC most of the year. There is usually a nice ocean breeze. Overall, it's a wonderful place and we would definitely recommend it! :)

Nates place is a great location, 5 minute drive to the beach. The cul-de-sac that he lives on made us feel safe with our kids playing outside. The wrap around deck was great outside living space and the was wonderful for winding down with family at night talking about our day events. Much laughter was had at his home and much loved was shared with our family, from renewal of wedding vows for my husband and I, 1 year anniversary for my daughter and her husband and my husband finishing the Iron Worlds 2017. I would HIGHLY recommend this house to anyone wanting to stay close to the beaches and also so close to in town shopping and activities. Thank you so much Nate!!! God Bless!!

This house is in a really great location to explore Kona from. It’s a beautiful house and we had no complaints, everything worked as it should. The upstairs outdoor area gives you enough space to hang out if you have a large group, otherwise the living and dining areas are a little small. It is a residential houses and there was a lot of movement and activity from the neighbors in the court but nothing that would keep you awake at night.

Great place to stay while in Kona.  Fantastic place very clean and NATE and is great host.  He gave great detail on the place and provided spot on directions and also provided some great ideas on what to do.  Very family friendly or a great place just for 2 people.  Enjoyed the deck for having coffee.  Thank you 
Larry
Everything we needed, from snorkling equipement to beach chairs, the location is perfect as is the house! We had a wonderful time in the house and we where 11! Thank you!

Good central location for our beach activities, tourist shops and pubs. Nate was very quick to respond to any information I required during our stay. As this was our first stay at an Airbnb, I was very happy with the cleanliness of the house and that all the appliances worked properly and there enough dishes, towels and room for all 8 of us. It was a hassle free and very enjoyable stay.
Best Regards

Our family of 8 enjoyed the place while celebrate our wedding anniversary. This place was nicely furnished with new appliances and taken care of and remodeled.  The beds were very comfortable and we all slept well.  Close to Kona.

The Home was PERFECT! The location is great, down the road from the nice strip of Restaurants, Bars, Shopping, Beaches. The home is very comfortable, spacious and very clean!! We had an amazing trip with the family of 5 adults and 2 kids ages 10 and 11 and we had plenty of space and an amazing trip!! Thank you!!
Nate was an amazing host. The location was perfect as we wanted to be close to Kona downtown and beaches.

Jubilee was a beautiful house, the lanai was awesome upstairs.  We didn’t have a lot of breeze when we opened up the windows but that’s probably unusual.  There was an upstairs and downstairs living space and refrigerator.

Amenities offered included beach chairs which was great for us - these were to be shared with another property.  We didn’t notice any beach towels but perhaps we didn’t look hard enough since we had our own.  

I admit that I did not realize that only the upstairs living room and bedrooms had AC units, but it was written in the description so I do not fault the host for this - some of our party were very hot downstairs so they just stayed upstairs.  Washer and dryer were on premises but locked up unless asked for - we did have to buy our own laundry detergent.

All in all, the description was accurate regarding the home.  We did have a great time in the home and we enjoyed our stay.  I appreciated Nate’s extremely prompt responses to any questions I had about the place and being as accommodating as possible.
Close to many great restaurants and beaches! Great indoor and outdoor cooking and eating areas. Upstairs Lanai is the perfect spot to chill in the morning and evening.
An absolutely wonderful place with a great view, vibes, and was super comfy!

House is well located, 10min drive to supermarkets and restaurants. Recently painted so looks clean and new. The lanai is big plus. The only issue we had was that 1st floor does not have AC, too hot for kid to sleep so we had to rearrange the room among us mid might on first day, maybe it is just this time of the year. The room facing west is especially warm before midmight but manageable for some of the group members. The matresses are very comfortable.
Clean, conveniently located with excellent local dining and activity suggestions.
Great spot, lovely home.  Lots of great local tips that really helped plan our trip. Thank you!

Jubilee by the Sea  is the perfect house for a large family. Location is close to downtown, and what my children thought was the best beach-Magic Sands.  The rooms are spacious and beds were super comfy. The full kitchen had everything we needed to prepare a dinner and enjoy it out on the lanai if we didn’t feel like going out to eat.  We spent most of mornings and evenings out on the wrap around Lani enjoying the  birds and surroundings. The outside shower was nice to have to make sure the sand was off the kids. Beach equipment, such as chairs,umbrella and snorkel gear was what we needed to head out and enjoy the beautiful beaches. (And it was nice We didn’t have to rent)  Thanks again Nate for everything—till next time
Great location. Awesome lanai to hang out on. Clean house with convenient amenities.

Our stay at Jubilee By the Sea was excellent! Nate is a fantastic host and went out of his way to accommodate us prior to our trip. Our trip was scheduled right when Hurricane Lane was coming through Hawaii, and we were a little nervous that we may not be able to make it to the Big Island on our original schedule. Once I communicated with Nate about our schedule concerns, he went above and beyond to keep me updated about the current weather conditions on the island and in Kona, which really kept me at ease. The house itself is beautiful and is in a great location for sightseeing. I loved the amenities the house provided, including the snorkel gear. I would highly recommend staying here and would definitely come back!
This place was awesome near to everywhere you need to go. Has shower outside amenities great. 2nd floor has air conditioning. Easy to communicate with the owner.
Spotless, modern, convenient and quiet. Loved the location, will rebook again!
이 집은 매우 훌륭한 집이었습니다. 바다를 볼 수 있는 위치에 있었고 호스트는 명료하게 메세지를 남겨 숙소를 쉽게 찾을 수 있었습니다. 모든 물품들이 깨끗할 뿐만 아니라 필요한 모든것이 다 갖춰져 있었습니다. 다음번에 kona를 또 방문하게 된다면 또다시 이곳에 머물고 싶습니다! :)

Nate’s house was really great. It was conveniently located a few mins from the downtown area of Kona and beaches.

Nate provided plenty of snorkel gear which my friends and I used and we loved it.

The house was really clean and had amazing views of the ocean.

I would definitely stay here again.
非常棒的体验,非常棒的房东,干净整洁, 设施齐全｡强烈推荐｡
Wonderful location!  Our favorite spot was the lanai!  It was breezy, relaxing and had great views.

name: Sun filled comfortable apartment
summary: Beautiful and artistic apartment centrally located in Rushcutters Bay, minutes walk from surrounding suburbs Potts Point, Elizabeth Bay and Kings Cross and the
space: Fully furnished
description: Beautiful and artistic apartment centrally located in Rushcutters Bay, minutes walk from surrounding suburbs Potts Point, Elizabeth Bay and Kings Cross and the Fully furnished Roof top access.
access: Roof top access.
house_rules: No more than 2 guest at a time and no guests after 11pm.

host.host_location: Potts Point, New South Wales, Australia

reviews.comments:
Beautiful place in a Great Location.
Perfect host, Harry was very flexible to requests and punctuatal with replying. 
On arrival we met Harry's girlfriend - also lovely who was super helpful and stayed in contact with us the whole
Weekend for any thing we needed.
The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Park Guell apartment with terrace
summary: Apartment with terrace in a quiet street of Barcelona, 5 minutes walk from Park Güell and 20 minutes by public transport to the city center. Renovated and fully equipped. HUTB-000929
space: The colonial decor and terrace with awning and swing make the apartment a welcoming place. The apartment was reformed at 10.11.2015. Public parking nearby.
description: Apartment with terrace in a quiet street of Barcelona, 5 minutes walk from Park Güell and 20 minutes by public transport to the city center. Renovated and fully equipped. HUTB-000929 The colonial decor and terrace with awning and swing make the apartment a welcoming place. The apartment was reformed at 10.11.2015. host.host_about:
Hola, 

Somos Alexandra y Juan dos amigos que estamos enamorados de Barcelona, nuestras pasiones son viajar y conocer gente por lo que nos encantaría compartir con vosotros nuestros espacios  para que disfrutéis a vuestro gusto de toda la cultura, actualidad y diversidad de ofertas que la ciudad os ofrece.
Para nosotros lo mas importante es que nuestros huéspedes puedan aprovechar al máximo su estancia en Barcelona,  que viváis vuestra historia  reflejada en  rincones únicos de la ciudad y por supuesto nuestra mayor satisfacción es que os sintáis como en casa según lo que busquéis.

Hello, 

We are Alexandra and Juan two friends who are in love with Barcelona, our passion is to travel and meet new people so we would love to share our spaces with you and that you can enjoy the culture, the present and the diversity of offers that the city has to offer. 
For us the most important thing is that our guests can make the most of their stay in Barcelona, that you live our history full of unique places and of course our greatest satisfaction is that you feel as if you where at home according to what you are looking for.

reviews.comments:
The apartment is in a nice spot high up in the town with a great view (from til street). 
It is a 15-20 minutte uphill walk from the nearests Metro - but the area is quiet.
The outside terasse is wounderful - we enjoyed to have breakfast here. There is a nice little shop just next door.
The apartment and the bed clothes+towels was clean - so even it is a full time/only guest apartment we can recommend it.

La casa esta muy bien equipada y es realmente muy linda (solo funciona muy mal la conectividad de wife) y queda un poco alejada de los centros turísticos.  El único inconveniente fue que nuestro vuelo se demoro dos horas y al llegar 2 horas mas tarde del horario acordado, pasada las 20.00 se nos cobro 30 euro en el chec kin

Our host's friend was outside the property when we arrived, which was a bonus as travelled with our two children. We were shown around the apartment, and shown all guides personally put together by Regina. The apartment was as pictured and the children loved the apartment, we were within 5 mins walk from a local supermarket be warned parents there are a few steep hills slightly difficult with the stroller buggy but a good workout all the same. We were 10-12 mins walk from the subway Alfonso X only 4 stops from the Ramblas which was "thumbs up".

We loved our stay our two children were very comfortable in the apartment and loved the patio, there were ample playgrounds in close proximity. The neighbourhood was quiet and locals were very helpful.

SUCIO Y MUY POCO RECOMENDABLE.
Bajo con difícil accesibilidad, absoluta falta de limpieza y con fuerte olor a humedad provocada por guardar las sábanas mojadas dentro del único armario de la casa, recubierto de moho por dentro. Falta de limpieza absoluta en toda la casa que hacía muy incómoda su estancia y más con niños pequeños. El sofá donde supuestamente se podía dormir, tenía una gran mancha que ni se habían molestado en intentar limpiarla. Solo había un único armario recubierto de moho para guardar la ropa, que evidentemente no pudimos utilizar. La ducha estaba negra, picada y oxidada, lo que nos tocó limpiar a nosotros y desinfectarla un poco para poderla utilizar. La cocina llena cubierta por una capa de grasa que la hacía inútil para cocinar cualquier cosa. Escaleras hacia abajo completamente empinadas y estrechas.  Nada más llegar ni rastro de Regina o Juan, nos atendió una persona que ni siquiera sabía hablar bien castellano, por lo que dudo mucho de la existencia de Juan y Regina. Es absolutamente indignante que cuando pagas el apartamento te cobran unos gastos de limpieza que no han efectuado. Para colmo nos cobraron 30 € en concepto de checking. La zona es tranquila aunque bastante alejada del metro, dado que tienes unas cuestas muy empinadas desde la parada más cernada de metro y luego toca subir cuesta arriba unos 15 minutos. De cara a los esfuerzos por parte del anfitrión, absolutamente ninguno. La persona que nos recibió ni siquiera sabía indicarnos donde estaba la tienda más cercana, un parking donde poder dejar el coche e incluso la parada de metro más cernada. Soy usuario de esta web desde hace tiempo, he visitado otros países de Europa usándola y ha sido con creces la peor experiencia que he tenido. Me siento completamente estafado.
Authentic experience of Barcelona neighbourhood life. Friendly locals, a number of convenience and fruit/veg stores, and an incredible city view from atop the hill.
The neighbourhood was very timid and relaxing, a good contrast with the city centre and the beaches, so it provided a great haven for relaxation.

L'appartement est sympa et bien équipé, dans un quartier charmant. Il correspond assez bien à l'annonce Airbnb. Il a malheureusement une odeur d'humidité constante et il est tout de même un peu loin du métro ainsi que du parking public. L'hôte nous a donné beaucoup d'informations avant notre arrivée mais nous l'avons pas vu du tout pendant le séjour. J'ai également fait une demande de modification pour la quelle je n'ai jamais reçu un retour. Dans l'ensemble c'était une bonne expérience.

This apartment is perfect for a large family. The rooms are large, clean and cool. The kitchen is basic but serviceable and the outside space is lovely. Maks let us in and showed us around and he was quick to respond to questions throughout the stay.

L'appartement est conforme aux descriptions. C'est sympa on s'y sent presque chez soi. Une légère odeur d'humidité qui est un peu désagréable. Cependant avec les fenêtres grandes ouvertes l'odeur s'en va rapidement.

Au départ le concierge était sensé nous recevoir. Une fois arrivées, ni l'hôte, ni le concierge n'ont répondu à nos appels. Heureusement une jeune fille attendait devant le logement qui nous a expliqué que c'était elle qui était sensée nous recevoir mais nous n'étions pas au courant.
Heureusement elle était très gentille, nous a très bien reçu et nous a expliqué le déroulement du séjour.
Une fois dans le logement nous nous sommes aperçus que celui-ci était très poussiéreux et nous avons donc dû faire le ménage car une des personnes était allergique aux acariens. Nous avons également dû acheter des produits pour faire le ménage, car les produits ménagers sur place étaient très limités.
Au niveau des équipements, beaucoup de choses étaient fournies (lave-vaisselle, lave-linge, fer à repasser, sèche cheveux, etc) mais la vaisselle était très limitée pour 3 personnes (manque de verres et de couverts).
Attention il n'y a pas de volets ni de rideaux opaques sur 2 chambres sur 3. Cependant draps de lit et serviettes de toilette sont fournies. Il manque cependant un tapis de douche pour la baignoire.
Les matelas étaient confortables et le quartier très calme mis à part un voisin qui mettait parfois de la musique à fond.
Au niveau de l'emplacement, le logement est très bien situé car à 10 minutes à pied d'une ligne de métro qui dessert tous les endroits importants de la ville (plage, centre ville, quartier gothique, etc).
Par contre, attention pour les personnes qui ont des difficultés à se déplacer car le logement est tout en haut d'une côte très raide.
Malgré tout, nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans ce logement et avons apprécié la terrasse ombragée.
Muy chulo el apartamento y muy limpio todo bien
Een heel mooi en groot appartement: ideaal om met kinderen naar toe te komen! Alles heel proper en verzorgd.

Das informations Material könnte mal wieder sortiert werden ,da alles mehrfach vorhanden ist und man somit nicht mehr weis was aktuell ist .Im hinteren Schlafzimmer neben dem Bad sollte ein blickdichter Vorhang angebracht werden ,da man vom Treppenhausflur Direkt reinschauen kann ,es ist nur ein dünner durchsichtiger Vorhang dran. Leider keine Kaffeemaschine in einer Größe für 6 Personen vorhanden und die andere hat keine Kanne, Auch fehlen Weingläser für mehr als eine Person. aber am schlimmsten war der Gestank ,Moderich ,muffelig kaum zum aushalten ,wir hatten schon überlegt abzubrechen fanden aber in der Größe keine für uns bezahlbare Unterkunft .zudem konnte eine Person von uns nicht mit da sie einen Unfall hatte und Frankreich nicht verlassen durfte aber es gab keine Reduktion ,sehr schade aber was will man erwarten wenn es kommerziell ist .

5 girls living in the apartment. It is a big place and the distance between the apartment and the city center is ok (you can walk, use metro and bus). When we arrived, all of us noticed a smell all over the apartment - like kind of moldy. This sadly affected our stay in the apartment. The bedding had the smell to, and this was bad! The sink was broken among other thinks. 
Otherwise a big apartment with a little outside teresse. 
- Camilla, Andrea, Cecilie, Kia and Heidi

Une expérience mitigée.
 il est vrai que la rue est calme et que l'on peut profiter de la jolie vue sur Barcelone mais il faudra pour cela monter des pentes raides pour atteindre l'appartement. De plus, dans l'immeuble l'escalier est très étroit et il n'y pas pas d'ascenseur. L'accès peut donc être difficile pour les familles avec enfants en bas age, les personnes agées et les personnes a mobilité reduites surtout qu' il est situé dans l'étages du bas de l'immeuble, sous le rez de chaussé. 
Les photos ne sont pas très fidèle a la réalité car l'apparetement manque de luminosité, effet, a part la terrasse, il y a un manque de fenêtres et aucunes de donne sur l’extérieur. La seule autre fenêtre présente dans une des chambres donne sur l'escalier de l'immeuble.  
Du fait de ce manque de fenêtre, l'appartement n'est pas très lumineux et sens le renfermé.
Il y a de plus une mauvaise insonorisation de l'appartement mais cela n'a pas été très gênant car l'immeuble était dans l'ensemble plutôt calme. 
Point positif : hôte sympathique et disponible, proximité du parc Guell et des transports en commun 
Etant donné le rapport qualité prix, je pense qu'il convient surtout a un groupe d'amis

Regina was communicative before we stayed in the apartment and although she couldn't meet us during our stay, had arranged for someone to do so with keys and information. It's a really nice apartment in a quiet neighbourhood.
The place is spacious located in a nice area of the city

My group of four friends and I had a great stay in Regina's Airbnb. The apartment looked just as it did in the listing and was very clean. Regina was easy to communicate with before our stay and she coordinated for her friend Maks to meet us when we arrived. There was plenty of room for the group of five one the apartment. We thoroughly enjoyed the outdoor terrace and spent our mornings out there to eat the breakfast we had prepared in the well equipped kitchen. We did, however, wish there had been some basic kitchen ingredients like salt, spices, or oil there for us to use. The location was a quick walk to Park Güell and it was nice being in a non touristy area. That did however, mean that it was not as easy to reach the city center.

Regina é stata sempre molto disponibile a soddisfare le nostre richieste e qualunque problema ci fosse é stata pronta a consigliarci nel migliore dei modi.
La descrizione dell'annuncio rispecchia verosimilmente l'appartamento che è in sé molto accogliente è provvisto di tutto cioè che serve.
Il quartiere é un po' lontano dal centro, ma percorrendo un tratto a piedi e poi con la metro basta poco per raggiungere il centro città; il servizio taxi é abbastanza economico e comodo da utilizzare dopo l'orario di chiusura della metro.
Detto ciò risulta ovvio che é stata una bellissima esperienza!

The communication with Regina was perfect. The flat is not really close to the city center, but with metro was it without problem and we had great opportunity to see the sun rise in park guel. I am sure, we would not have this experience without staying here. Thanks.
Great location and communication with host, we arrived late and were able to check-in thanks to their flexibility. However, the flat is somewhat dark and has a strong mouldy smell.

Me and my friends were quite disappointed when we entered the Regina's apartment. First of all, the following guests should know that the pretty view on the pictures is not seen from inside the apartment - not of the windows, no out of the terrace either. That was a big letdown for us. You can see the view only from outside of the building and that's quite confusing. Second, you should know that the mouldy smell on the bedding and the big bedroom are unbearable. Me and my husband couldn't sleep there, it was awful. Fortunately we manage to arrange that problem and sleep in the dining room on the couch that become a bed. The main problem in Regina's apartment is the mouldy smell that she explained is due to the location of the apartment. In spite of all that, Regina was very helpful host. She let us leave our luggage at their family hotel on chek-out day because we had 4 hours to spare before going to the airport. We had a great time mainly on the terrace which is right next to the kitchen. The neighborhood was great - quiet, there is a big market and bus stops very close by. Very easy to get to the city center and even the night buses stopped very close. Bunkers de can Baro are very close to the apartment - 1o min. walk up on the hill. They were spectacular. You'll get a 360 degree view of the city. We had a great time in Barcelona. It's a magical city.

On a passé un très bon séjour dans ce logement. Regina est très sympathique et flexible...
Je recommande vivement ce logement.
Un po' lontana dal centro e non troppo ben collegata... Per il resto una discreta casetta

Regina's house was a great place to stay. Its located in a high area which makes it great for an amazing view of the city. And you can easily reach the center with bus or metro. The house is just like shown in the photos, with a beautiful terrace to have your breakfast in the sunny morning. Its well equipped with the essentials and you have a little supermarket nearby to by food. Overall, great place :)

la casa è spaziosa e ci si sta bene anche in 4/5 persone
spazio esterno molto piacevole e utile, un po' decentrato essere allenati per salire! però la parte alta sopra park guell è molto bella!
attenzione che è un interrato un po' umido, però si sta bene

The apartment was beutiful, clean and well equiped. Regina was very easy to communicate with and always responded promptly. The aparment is about a 15 min walk to park guell and has a great little grocery store down the elevator and a fantastic view outside  just up the stairs. Be mindful though of the two small flights of stairs down to the aparment they are very small and very steep and narrow. Also be prepared to walk up hill if you go anywhere.  The concierge Alex was wonderful and had great recommendations!

The place was clean and was accommodating. There was a smell of mildew as some have said in previous post. The steps going to the apartment are very narrow. The outside terrace was beautiful and a big plus. We had an overall good time there.
We really enjoyed staying at her apartment. The rooms were clean and all amenities were fine as well. The connectivity to the city centre was also good. We recommend to stay in her Apartment.

Интерьер квартиры соответствует фотографиям. Когда выбирали жильё, то почему-то решили, что фото с видом на Sagrada Familia - это вид из окна квартиры... это не так)))
Расположение квартиры неудобное. От метро идти в крутую гору около километра (отличная замена спортзалу). Вероятно есть остановка автобуса поближе к квартире, но я не стал разбираться с автобусными маршрутами Барселоны. Такси от набережной - около 20 €.
Район тихий. Вроде бы даже безопасный)))
По поводу заезда - все хорошо. Встретили, показали, предложили любую помощь.

Appartement très agréable à proximité du Parc Guell, conforme aux photos. 
Endroit très calme. En revanche, le point négatif a été la difficulté pour communiquer avec Régina. A notre arrivée, Régina nous a donné un numéro de téléphone d’une personne qui n’était a priori pas au courant de notre séjour, heureusement qu’une personne se trouvait dans l’appartement pour nous accueillir. De plus, nous n’avons pas eu de connexion Wifi du séjour. 
Mais hormis ces quelques problèmes, nous avons passé un agréable moment chez Régina et Juan.

Appartement très bien situé
Une belle montée pour s'y rendre à pied sinon rien à redire hormis le fait que nous n'avons pas eu d'eau chaude pendant 3 jours
Petit bémol la taxe de séjour 2.55 euros par jour  c'est cher beaucoup trop cher pour des jeunes étudiants

Chegámos ao apartamento e não existia parque gratuito na rua como a descrição do apartamento dizia. Depois de descarregarmos as malas assistimos a uma discussão entre os inquilinos dos apartamentos e a pessoa que nos ia fazer o check in. Tivemos de aguardar com as malas cá fora até que a conversa acabasse e só depois é que entrámos. A pessoa que nos recebeu não foi nada atenciosa ou simpática. A casa estava imunda quando chegamos, cheirava mal, o chão sujo e as roupas de cama com aspeto que tinham sido mudadas há meses. A casa de banho cheirava a mofo, cheia de humidade e as toalhas cheiravam mal. Apesar do espaço ser bonito tinha muitos aspetos negativos por isso não recomendo a ninguém.
