A casa não foi o que esperávamos, pois entre outras coisas:
- Tinha um forte odor a humidade (apesar do desumificador), e a ventilação era muito limitada, sentindo-se bastante calor. 
- O nível de limpeza era mau, com algum pó (meia suja debaixo da cama) e os utensílios de limpeza pouco limpos. Também não tivémos certezas sobre a limpeza das toalhas da cozinha, estendidas no estendal quando chegámos.
- Ambos os colchões estavam em mau estado de conservação, e uma das camas tinha um dos pés solto. 
- Ao nível da cozinha não existiam utensílios suficientes - 2 colheres, 3 garfos, uma tampa de tachos, etc. Na casa de banho faltavam as toalhas de rosto.
Quanto ao bairro era bastante calmo, e mesmo sendo a 15min do metro, aconselhamos apanhar o autocarro para evitar levar malas encosta acima. 
Situa-se perto do Bunker del Carmel que tem uma vista soberba sobre BCN, e supermercados perto abertos até tarde.
Lite långt ifrån centrum och en speciell lukt. Annars inget att klaga på!

Fue una estancia agradable, las camas limpias, la TV funciona bien, el internet va rápido. Solo hay una Habitación privada con puerta ya que la otra tiene solo una cortina de privacidad y las demas personas tienen que pasar por ahí si o si, si te quieres ir a la cocina y el salón, por lo tanto, No hay ninguna intimidad. El apartamento se encuentra en una zona de subida constante ya que esta zona montañosa y esta alejada del metro, supermercados, del centro de la ciudad,...el bus mas cercano es el 24 que te lleva a Plaça Catalunya a 5min caminando. Por lo demás esta bien. Lo recomiendo si quieres un viaje alejado del ruido y tranquilo

Le logement est bien placé, l'accueil est efficace et réactif, immeuble calme, commerces à proximité. Seul bémol les seules toilettes sont dans la seule salle de bain, et c'est handicapant pour 5 personnes. Si vous êtes 3 ou 4 c'est impeccable. Au delà c'est trop petit.

Points forts :
Appartement bien placé (5 mn du parc Güell et 20 mn de la Sagrada à pied), propre à l'intérieur avec bonne literie. A revoir une odeur persistante d'humidité dans la cuisine.
Points faibles :
Très difficile de se garer gratuitement car très peu de place. Sinon parking payant 10 heures par jour. Bien placé (1,3 kms du métro Alphonse X) mais chemin très pentu. Descente sans problème mais retour difficile.

La casa era molto pulita e grande, il wifi funziona bene. Perfetta per 6 persone perché c'è spazio a sufficienza. La cucina è nuova e con tutto il necessario per cucinare (anche microonde e caffettiera). La metro non è lontana, circa 10 minuti a piedi

We had a very nice stay at Alexandra’s apartment. It is on a quiet street but just walking distance to public transportation. The bed was nice and comfy with great pillows! Her neighbor was  very nice and opened up our bottle of wine because we could not find an opener. I  surely recommend her place for your next adventure in this beautiful city.

NO SHAMPOO OR SOAP even though it says on the listing that there will be shampoo. When I asked her about it she said it wasn’t included and I had to screenshot her own listing to show her what it says. Only hand soap in the bathroom. I know shampoo is not that big of a deal but I specifically did not buy it because it says that we would have some at the apartment.

NO WINE OPENER either. I also messaged her about it and she was sure that it was in the kitchen but then I looked back in some of the reviews and found a couple of them that says they couldn’t find it either. It seems like she doesn’t really know her own listing that well. 

We never actually met Alexandra and checked in with her friend, Anastasia. She checked us in right at 2 pm and was  nice. 

The apartment itself was clean and the couch is actually better than the one in the pictures but some of the decorations were different. No biggie though. 

The only thing about the apartment is there is ONLY ONE FAN. There are 2 bedrooms and 3 sleeping areas but we shared one fan which was impossible. It was very hot in the morning. 

Parking was a little tricky because of the hills and one way streets but we found a spot by the place. 

Overall okay.
感谢主人给我们的停车建议｡房屋的布置很美很艺术,尤其是小院子｡十分感谢主人所做的一切!
A simple place on a good place with a nice host. A bit moisty air though and hard to find parking places. A simple hotel with quite the same features would cost less I think.....

Appartement très humide, une odeur de moisis persistante même avec les fenêtres ouvertes, murs qui commencent à gonfler, matériel de cuisine rudimentaire, salle de bain qui manque d’aération et odeur désagréable venant des toilettes même après plusieurs nettoyages, terrasse agréable et machine à laver le linge à disposition ce qui est très pratique, appartement tout en haut de Barcelone juste à deux arrêts de bus du parc Guell ce qui est très pratique, mais prévoir au moins 40 minutes de bus pour aller à la plage, appartement qui conviendrai à un groupe de jeunes amis.

Good location to stay  two days in Barcelona. Bad smell in the apartment ( smell from old furniture and mold). Imposibility to find  parking nearby ,even if in airbnb we found this location with parking included
位置不错,在山坡上,房间布置很温馨,但是霉味很重,也没有驱蚊设施,问房东,房东说她们家没有蚊子

Appartement en sous sol sans fenetre humide sur led hauteurs de Barcelone 
Tres excentre sans transport en commun aucun commerce 
A déconseiller aux familles 

J

Unfortunately, the apartment has an unpleasant smell of rot which is difficult to bear. What's more, the lack of quilts, and the apartment is cold. The infirmity is dirty and damp.The only positive is the location. I do not recommend

situation parfaite pour nous. apprtement très decevant par sa topographie et l odeur d humidité . Alexandra a su être une hôtesse à l écoute et fait des efforts pour nous satisfaire. cela reste insuffisant pour que nous pensions revenir.

Cute place, well stocked kitchen and bathroom. Quiet and safe neighborhood and close to restaurants and grocery stores. Very close to Park Güell but a bit far from Barcelona city center. Alexandra was great with communicating and very quick to respond.

Fue nuestra primera experiencia con Airbnb, 
y fue muy buena. Agradecemos por todo

name: Spacious and well located apartment
summary: Enjoy Porto in a spacious, airy and bright apartment, fully equipped, in a building with lift, located in a region full of cafes and restaurants, close to the subway and close to the best places of the city.
space: The apartment offers total comfort for those who, besides wanting to enjoy the many attractions of the city, also like to relax and feel at home, All airy and bright, with a large living room, fully equipped kitchen, and a delightful balcony, which in the summer refreshes and in the winter protects from the cold and rain, accommodating up to six people very well. It has 40-inch interactive TV, internet and high-quality wi-fi, and for those who want to work a little, it offers a studio with a good desk and an inspiring view.
description: Enjoy Porto in a spacious, airy and bright apartment, fully equipped, in a building with lift, located in a region full of cafes and restaurants, close to the subway and close to the best places of the city. The apartment offers total comfort for those who, besides wanting to enjoy the many attractions of the city, also like to relax and feel at home, All airy and bright, with a large living room, fully equipped kitchen, and a delightful balcony, which in the summer refreshes and in the winter protects from the cold and rain, accommodating up to six people very well. It has 40-inch interactive TV, internet and high-quality wi-fi, and for those who want to work a little, it offers a studio with a good desk and an inspiring view. The apartment is all available to guests. I leave my guests at ease, but I am available whenever they need me. It is a typical neighborhood of Porto, where you have silence and tranquility, little traffic, no noise, but everything at hand: good restaurants and c
neighborhood_overview: It is a typical neighborhood of Porto, where you have silence and tranquility, little traffic, no noise, but everything at hand: good restaurants and cafes, shops, services and even hospital, all with total tranquility and security.
notes: The apartment is located in a strictly residential area, and silence should be kept after 10 pm. Although we love pets, here they are not welcome, not with prior consultation and approval, subject to an extra cleaning fee. No smoking in the apartment. The apartment is ideal for families and couples. It is located in a building and in a strictly residential area, and therefore requires care not to harm the other residents. So, to groups of friends who wish to rent you, I ask you to send detailed information about you, such as the name and profile of the (Hidden by Airbnb) of all travelers, and other information that allows us evaluate a suitability of the property to your needs. Thank you! Take care of the apartment and belongings with the same care that we have.
transit: The apartment is a 15-minute walk from Aliados Square and 20 minutes from downtown, the main sights and conviviality of the city. It is 3 blocks from Faria Guimarães subway station and 6 blocks from the Marquês and Constitución stations, interconnected with buses to all locations in Porto. It has easy access also to the stations Lapa and Trindade, and for those who come to Porto by train, can come directly to Faria Guimarães by the São Bento Station.
access: The apartment is all available to guests.
interaction: I leave my guests at ease, but I am available whenever they need me.
house_rules: Cuidar do apartamento e dos pertences com o mesmo carinho que temos. O apartamento se situa numa zona estritamente residencial, e deve-se manter silêncio após as 22 horas.  Apesar de adorarmos animais de estimação, aqui eles não são bem-vindos, a não com consulta e aprovação prévia, sujeita a uma cobrança extra de taxa de limpeza. Não fumar nas dependências do apartamento.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
We arrived late in the night and the host assistant was so nice with us. She gave us some typical food and presents so that we could feel as good as home. She showed us how stuff works. Then we went together to see where the supermarkt and resaturants were. Everything was clean and tidy. The apartment was big enough for 5 people. It´s perfectly furnished!
It was located in the typical familiarly and quiet neighbourhood, only 20 minutes walking to the city center and near a Subway station. Restaurants and shops are cheaper than city center ones.

He offered him to pick us from the airport and a guided tour as well.

We´ll come back for sure! 


Llegamos muy tarde por la noche y la asistente del anfitrión nos enseñó la casa, nos dio dulces típicos y vino de Oporto. Vino con nosotros por el barrio para recomendarnos restaurantes y enseñarnos dónde estaba el supermercado. 
El apartamento estaba limpio, ordenado y perfectamente equipado. Tenía armarios vacíos para poder dejar cómodamente las cosas. El salón es muy grande. 
Está a 20 minutos andando del centro de la ciudad y tiene una parada de metro cerca. El barrio es familiar y tranquilo. Nada peligroso. Los restaurantes y tiendas eran más baratos que los del centro.

El anfitrión se ofreció a recogernos del aeropuerto y a hacernos un tour guiado por la ciudad.
Volveremos!!

Andre was able to meet us at the apartment. We had a nice long stay there, so we got very comfortable. The apartment is lovely and well furnished and equipped with everything we could have needed. We loved the neighbourhood too!

Great and spacious appartment with a wonderful view and location, it is even better in real life than in photos. We spent a month there and everything worked perfectly, the person who gave us the keys was very welcoming and was always there in case we needed him. Don't hesitate to stay in this appartment, you will not regret it!

L'appartement est tout à fait conforme à la description (peut-être même mieux). Situé dans un immeuble calme, dans un quartier calme où l'on peut se garer.
Accueillis avec une grande gentillesse par Fernando, qui a répondu à toutes nos questions et les a même devancées.
A recommander !

It's a very lovely apartment. José Fernando welcomed us with a great kindness and answered all our questions. Thank you very much for your hospitality and port wine. Everything was clean and tidy. There was lots of space for my family of 4. Especially we enjoyed a big balcony. It's well furnished and equipped but it would be great to add a washing machine. TV has a great channels list in Portuguese and English. The apartment is located in a walking distance to the city centre, metro stations, grocery shops, bakeries and pharmacies. WiFi worked perfectly. The bath has a handle grip, it's perfect for elderly guests and young kids. There is a small lift in a building. Our experience was great and we highly recommend to stay in this apartment.
Malgré nos deux heures de retard l'hôte nous a reçu comme des "princes". Appartement conforme à nos attentes.

Excellent place to stay with either family or friends. Very spacious living area and bedrooms. Close to the centre and we thoroughly enjoyed our daily walks to the centre and local bakery. José is excellent in giving directions as needed. Problems are always fixed on time with the customer in mind.Will highly recommend this place.

Vanessa
The location was really good . You can reach the place by walking
Ok

Si vous allez chez Andre vous y serez comme à la maison! Rien à redire sur la propreté et l'appartement. Je recommande très fortement Andre et son co-host Josè. Ils accueillant, serviable.. enfin bref ils sont top!
Me encanto lo espacioso,como y limpio k estaba todo maravilloso
A very nice apartment. Within a few minutes you are in the centre of Porto. We loved our week here. Almost everything we needed was in the apartment. Thanks for the wine and the fruit!!
Appartement agréable , avec une belle décoration et surtout accueil chaleureux par Fernando .
O apartamento apesar de um pouco velho, é um bom custo benefício. A cozinha tem o que é necessário, as camas são boas, roupas de camas e toalhas não faltam. Só falta uma máquina de lavar roupas.
Excelente! Recomendo!

Excelente em tudo. Agradecimentos especiais ao José, que tão gentilmente nos acolheu e apoiou durante toda a estada.
Recomendo muito a morada.

André est une personne exceptionnelle pour la qualité et la bienveillance de son acceuil, il est naturellement chaleureux, et son logement est situé dans un très bon endroit de Porto, en plus d'etre assez proche du centre ville et transport en commun.
André est une personne admirable, largement recommandé,
Un grand merci a André

Great place to enjoy Porto with space and small attentions.
Our host was lovely and knew perfectly the city which was very helpful !
Appartement confortable, calme et bien situé ! Propriétaire aux petits soins ! La salle de bain aurait besoin d'une bonne rénovation pour correspondre au standing  de l'appartement.

La casa en general está bien y es agradable. La persona que nos recibió también muy agradable y solícita. Pero, el agua caliente el primer día no nos funcionó porque había saltado un plomo. Los días siguientes, al ser calentador eléctrico, para 3 duchas el agua caliente llega justa.

name: Jardim Botânico Gourmet 2 bdroom
summary: Very comfortable, well located (in the safest neighborhood), 2 bedroom (1 double bed, 3 single bed), 2 bathrooms, wifi, tv, fully kitchen, remodeled with lot of style. The gourmet kitchen is modern and very well equiped! A spacious balcony is a plus in this great place to stay!
space: Very comfortable, well located (in the safest neighborhood), 2 bedroom (1 double bed; 2 single beds) and  sofa bed in the living. Extra matress avaliable.  2 bathrooms, wifi, tv, fully equipped kitchen, remodeled with lot of style. The gourmet kitchen is modern and very well equiped! A spacious balcony is a plus in this great place to stay! Very clean, comfortable and well decorated 2 bedrooms. very nice (high quality) beds, matresses and pillows. Living and dinning room. Very spacious balcony (table with 4 chairs, hammock and Pedra da Gavea view).  Very beautiful and charming condo with pool (Christ view), sauna and gym. Restaurants, bars, Botanical Garden and the charming neighboorhood Jardim Botanico.. Air cond, wifi, tv, fully equipped gourmet kitchen. Doorman 24/7. Very safe. The guest can enjoy the entire apartment and the sauna, gym and swiming pool in the condo. Free pass to enjoy the Botanical Garden (1 person) everyday. Free parking Im always avaliable by celphone or email. 5
description: Very comfortable, well located (in the safest neighborhood), 2 bedroom (1 double bed, 3 single bed), 2 bathrooms, wifi, tv, fully kitchen, remodeled with lot of style. The gourmet kitchen is modern and very well equiped! A spacious balcony is a plus in this great place to stay!
neighborhood_overview: Bairro mais seguro da cidade. Diversos restaurantes, bistrôs, bares e muito charme no eixo Jardim Botânico- Horto
transit: Bike, onibus, carro, uber, taxi, metro...
access: Piscina, sauna, área comum, parque, condomínio fechado repleto de árvores, academia de musculação, estacionamento além do apartamento inteiro.
interaction: Estou disponível 24h, indico guias especializados, roteiros de charme, assistência para crianças pequenas, motoristas etc.
house_rules: Respeitar vizinhos e horário de silêncio.  ->>>>>>Desligar ar condicionado e luzes ao sair.  ->>>>>>Qualquer objeto quebrado, manchado ou avariado deve ser comunicado IMEDIATAMENTE ao anfitrião ou através do AIRbnb. • Cuidado com as malas de rodinhas a fim de não arranhar o piso. • SEMPRE usar tábua de corte para não arranhar a bancada da pia! • O número de hóspedes na reserva deve ser respeitado. Não são permitidos convidados ou visitas.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Trabalho com locações de imóveis mobiliados há 7 anos e AMO ser HOST. 
Valorizo o conforto acima de tudo e tenho satisfação em buscar meus hóspedes no aeroporto, ajudar com pequenas mudanças; indicar restaurantes ou planejar passeios. Posso ajudar no que for preciso! 
Além de produtora de locações e mãe, faço trabalhos como curadora de arte e produzo a Organização Socio Cultural “VAGALUME O VERDE  - VOV” cujo BLOCO de CARNAVAL desfila há 14 anos na Rua Jardim Botânico, sempre às terças-feiras de carnaval. 
O VOV  nasceu no Horto Florestal e tem a sustentabilidade e preservação ambiental como diretrizes. Estudamos e pesquisamos diariamente como usar de maneira responsável o que a Natureza nos proporciona e deixar um LEGADO para gerações futuras. 
Além de equipe de coleta seletiva, plantio de mudas para neutralização do impacto gerado pelo desfile (compensação ambiental), mão de obra local e reutilização de materiais, 
em 2013 Implementamos a norma de certificação da “ISO 20121- Gestão em Eventos Sustentáveis”. 
Em 2015, recebemos o prêmio Serpentina de Ouro, por melhor organização. Em 2019 vamos estrear nosso novo maestro com uma bateria inovadora e arrepiante. Vem!

reviews.comments: Nice apartment! We needed an apartment during carnival and this was perfect. Good bed, bedroom had good AC. Two bathrooms. Big kitchen with huge fridge. Very big balcony. Nice common swimming pool. The neighborhood was even nicer than expected. Right next to the Jardim Botanico, many restaurants in this street and in the Rua Pacheco Leao. The Zona Sul, an upmarket supermarket indeed around the corner (corner Rua Jardim Botanico and Rua Pacheco Leao). We very much liked La Biciclette for breakfast, it is a French bakery on the corner of Rua Pacheco Leao and Rua Von Martius. Also we liked the restaurant SOBE in the Rua Pacheco Leao. Good starters, great view on the Christ as it is partly an open-air restaurant. Roberta and her sister were very nice for us.

Roberta muito atenciosa,  disponível, tranquila e sensata, aceita conselhos, e isso para mim conta muito...Apartamento super confortável no Jardim Botânico que eu amo, e a posição do apartamento é maravilhoso, tem o que precisamos dentro de uma casa... rua  tranquila. perto de tudo. Espero de voltar logo, e com certeza para o mesmo lugar . Obrigada Roberta pelo carinho e atenção . Bacio

Obrigada Roberta sempre pela hospitalidade e carinho que você cura seus hospedes. Como sempre muito gentil e totalmente disponível com seus clientes, segunda vez que retorno pode acreditar agora será minha segunda casa no Brasil na minha Cidade Maravilhosa, meu ponto de referencia . Apartamento perfeito localização DEZ. Beijo enorme...
Everything as described. Nice location, felt very safe. Everything you need is close. Wifi was a little bit spotty at times, but wasn't a big deal.

Apto super bem localizado em um dos meus pontos preferidos do Rio. Bairro super seguro com acesso a mercados e comércio em geral. Do lado do Jd Botânico, perto da Lagoa e Vista Chinesa. Fácil acesso aos outros pontos da cidade. Da lavanderia vc tem vista ao Cristo Redentor, uma inspiração.
O ap é grande e arejado. Cozinha equipada com vários utensílios. 
Gostei mto e recomendo.
The apartment was in a great location & a friendly neighbourhood with lots of great places to eat.

Cantinho super agradável e fofo no Jardim Botânico! Localização muito segura e de fácil locomoção, além de vários bares e restaurantes descolados no entorno.
Anfitriã muito hospitaleira e prestativa. 
Foi nossa primeira experiência com o Airbnb e adoramos a diferença entre hotel e uma casinha!!! =)

We enjoyed our 4-day stay at this apartment, while we were moving house in Rio. The apartment is cute and stocked with everything you need to actually live in it, which I appreciated - good kitchen. Roberta was responsive and accessible. If you're visiting Rio, it's a great base, in a lovely neighbourhood. Two things to keep in mind - it's really quite a small space (standard for Rio, but perhaps a surprise for guests who arrive from outside Brazil) and you hear a lot of street noise, so it's perhaps not ideal for light sleepers. We would stay here again!

O apartamento entrega tudo aquilo que promete embora seja um pouco barulhento por conta do ônibus que passa na porta. Mas esse é o preço pela localização maravilhosa.O playground é ótimo , com direito a piscina.

name: Charming Spacious Park Slope Studio
summary: Spacious and inviting garden level studio apartment in townhouse with separate entrance and large kitchen located in Park Slope, very near the F and G subway and Prospect Park, and only a few steps away from 7th Avenue, with its many fine shops and restaurants.
space: The apartment is a very pleasant and comfortable place to relax after a busy day exploring New York. It is located on a quiet tree-lined block on the ground floor of the townhouse where we live. There is a separate entrance to the studio apartment, which leads into a fully furnished living room/bedroom area, with wifi, TV, books to read, music to listen to, even a guitar to strum if you’re in the mood. There is a queen sized bed as well as a futon that can convert into a very comfortable bed as well where children could sleep. The full kitchen is quite spacious, with butcher block countertops and a new dishwasher. There is a coffeemaker, toaster oven, and microwave in the kitchen, as well as other amenities like pots, pans, dishes, glasses, mugs, cutlery, soap, towels, etc. The dining room is connected to the kitchen and is also quite roomy and comfortable, with lots of light coming from the backyard; it is one of our favorite spots in the whole house. You are also welcome in warmer mo
description: Spacious and inviting garden level studio apartment in townhouse with separate entrance and large kitchen located in Park Slope, very near the F and G subway and Prospect Park, and only a few steps away from 7th Avenue, with its many fine shops and restaurants. The apartment is a very pleasant and comfortable place to relax after a busy day exploring New York. It is located on a quiet tree-lined block on the ground floor of the townhouse where we live. There is a separate entrance to the studio apartment, which leads into a fully furnished living room/bedroom area, with wifi, TV, books to read, music to listen to, even a guitar to strum if you’re in the mood. There is a queen sized bed as well as a futon that can convert into a very comfortable bed as well where children could sleep. The full kitchen is quite spacious, with butcher block countertops and a new dishwasher. There is a coffeemaker, toaster oven, and microwave in the kitchen, as well as other amenities like pots, pans, dish
neighborhood_overview: Park Slope is truly one of the best neighborhoods in New York; friendly and safe for kids and adults alike, with all sorts of conveniences, fresh air, a short and easy subway trip to the exciting bustle of Manhattan but also a pleasant escape from it at the end of a long day. We are located very close to 7th Avenue, which has all kinds of shopping. There are fine groceries such as Union Market, several good delis, some of the best bagels in New York at the Bagel Hole,etc., as well as restaurants with food from every corner of the globe, ranging from higher end fare at places like Talde to our local diner located right on the corner of the block.  Many fine coffee shops, bars and stores of every description are also only a short walk away, as is Prospect Park (located two blocks away) with its many wide open spaces and forest paths, where you can forget for a while that you are in a big city.
notes: Please, no smoking, no pets, and no parties, and please use the recycling bins.
transit: SUBWAY We are located three short blocks from the 7th Avenue subway station on the F and G lines. The F train is the easiest way to get to Manhattan, about 20 minutes from Greenwich Village, and there are easy transfer points along the F line that will get you anywhere you need to go in Manhattan. The G train does not go into Manhattan but offers easy access to Brooklyn’s Williamsburg neighborhood and locations in Queens.  BUSES The 67 and 69 buses run along 7th avenue, and the 61 bus that runs along 9th street is also very close.  TAXI There are often green or yellow NYC taxis around. The green taxis work the same as the yellow but are designated specifically to stop in Brooklyn and boroughs other than Manhattan. There are many car services in the neighborhood as well (we’ve had pretty good luck with Eastern). PARKING There is free parking on the numbered streets and metered parking on 7th Avenue. Read signs carefully for street cleaning rules.  CAR RENTAL There are many Zipcar locati
access: The apartment is located on the ground floor of our townhouse. There is a separate outdoor entrance that opens from the bottom of the stoop on the left. Once inside, there is another key which opens the door to the apartment, located immediately on your left. We infrequently use this hallway for basement access. We will either be available to hand you the keys ourselves or make other arrangements if you arrive when we are not able to be there.
interaction: We are a family of three living upstairs (with a cat who is not allowed into the rental apartment), so while we are of course busy with our daily routine, please don’t hesitate to contact us by phone, text, or e-mail if there are any problems, items missing, or other questions. If by chance you are staying while we are out of town, we will give you the contact information of someone who can help.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments:
Ildiko and her space were nothing short of great.

I had rented out the space under unusual circumstances, likely out of the ordinary compared to most Airbnb reservations. Ildiko was super accommodating and understanding throughout our time in her space.

Ildiko met me at the apartment and personally showed me around the space. The apartment is quite a bit larger than the photos made it seem, and I was very comfortable here. It's also on the first floor, which is nice if you have heavy suitcases (it gets difficult lugging stuff up three flights of stairs). Even though it's on street level, the street is a quiet / residential one, and the entrance is some distance from the sidewalk—so noise is not an issue. There are very nice restaurants and cafes less than a block or two away. Ildiko went the extra mile in stocking the apartment with essential items, including a fully stocked first-aid kit(!). Although I had office space in Manhattan, I spent all of my time working from home, because I didn't want to leave the house or this neighborhood. Prospect Park is also very close, which makes for a nice place to go for a walk and clear the mind. Definitely one of the nicest and most pleasant airbnb experiences I've had so far!

This was a spacious, clean apartment in a great neighborhood. The area is quiet, but with many small shops, restaurants and cafes. The owner was friendly and available if needed, and checking in and out was a breeze. I highly recommend staying here.

A fantastic place and the perfect base for time in New York.  Downtown Manhattan is but 25 minutes by the F train (a four minute walk from the apartment) and Ilkido could not have been more helpful.  A really lovely space and I'd highly recommend it - next time I'm here, I'll be checking this place out first!

Apartment is excellent! Good space and very clean. Bathroom is very quite comfortable. The location is very good if you want to wonder around Park slope and other areas of Brooklyn. 

Ildiko was always attentive and helpful.

My wife and I enjoyed staying at lldiko's apartment. It was quite comfortable for us although we did not spend a lot of time there. It was very convenient to come and go and we appreciated the privacy and independence. Ron Walker

Ildiko est très accueillante ! Le quartier super , l appartement très confortable avec les commodités a porté de mains  ( restorants , métros ) 
Une adresse a ne pas manquer  !

My mum had wonderful time at this lovely suited apartment in Park Slope. It was her first airbnb-booking and she loved it. The spacious rooms were clean and tidy. The kitchen and dining area are huge and the whole apartment can easily be used by more than one people. Ildiko was very helpful with every step of our journey and easy to talk to. We highly recommend a stay at this apartment.

Great place to stay in Brooklyn! Very spacious, looked bigger than pictured, very clean and had everything I needed. It also had an outside patio, which I thought was great. It is located in the nice Park Slope area, which is very quiet, safe and has a lot of nice restaurants nearby.  Ildiko  personally welcomed me and showed me everything, she was constantly checking to see if I was comfortable. Such a great lady! Overall perfect experience, wonderful host! Definitely will be staying there next time I am in NY.
the apt was very nice decorated and spacious. very clean. bed was comfortable. neighborhood is great. the host is very nice. I def recommend this apt to enjoy brooklyn!
Terrific stay. The apartment was very clean and uncluttered, owners were extremely responsive and helpful.  Will definitely stay again.

Our stay at Ildiko and Chris's comfortable, convenient, and accommodating Park Slope apartment was great. The neighborhood was quiet and family oriented. Excellent markets and eateries were right around the corner. The subway was just a few blocks away. Ildiko and Chris's apartment was clean, comfortably furnished, and well equipped for a short or extended stay. We hope to return when we're next in New York City.

This studio worked out well for us. It was clean, spacious, and the central air conditioning was a nice perk. We didn't meet Ildiko, but she and her husband were accommodating and provided a comfortable place to stay after busy days enjoying the city.
Ildiko welcomed us, told us about the neighborhood and some of her favorite spots. The neighborhood was fantastic-walking distance to charming shops, grocery stores, the subway, and many restaurants.

Lovely studio, spacious, clean and with a great location (metro stop on the express line) and the hosts are really nice and helpful.
Highly recommanded.

Ildiko's appartment was absolutely perfect. It is big, bright, fully furnished, ideally located and completely spotless. Idilko was very easy to communicate with and we were pretty sad to leave even after 13 days spent there! Overall we had a wonderful experience and would definitely love to stay in this place again! Thank you for having us!

Our stay at this spacious studio was outstanding. There was plenty of room and the location was terrific. It is near subway lines and plenty of food choices. Not to mention, Prospect Park is extremely close. The process of getting in contact with the owners was simple and they were helpful and hospitable. I would definitely come back to this place. Thanks for making our stay in Brooklyn a ton of fun.

I really enjoyed my stay here! The apartment itself is very clean, well-decorated and spacious. Just a stone's throw from a grocery store and minutes from the subway, you really can't beat the location. Ildiko was really accommodating and worked with my schedule. Highly recommend it!

Very beautiful quiet neighborhood, close to great restaurants.  The apartment is very spacious, and quiet/ and nice to look out into the back garden.  The hosts were very accommodating and responsive; and at the same time allowing me my privacy.

We had a great stay at Ildiko and Chris's place.  The accommodation is spacious and clean, the water pressure in the shower is good and strong, and the outdoor space is a big plus.  Even though the apartment faces the street, it is very quiet, and the neighborhood is great.  Plenty of shops and restaurants, and just 4 short blocks to the subway.  The only drawback would be the lack of cable and a radio or cd player.  But really, this is NY - there's not much time for tv.  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay would definitely stay here again.

Ildiko and Chris were very responsive and the check-in was easy.  The apartment is spacious, clean, nicely decorated and light.  Everything we needed was provided.  The neighborhood is safe and convenient to a nice market , restaurants, and subway stops.  We appreciate everything Ildiko and Chris did to make our stay pleasant and would definitely chose their apartment again.

O apartamento da Ildako é ótimo! A localização é maravilhosa, especialmente se viajando com crianças. Bares, restaurantes, mercado na rua ao lado. O metro a duas quadras nos deixa a 25min de Manhattan. A pracinha para crianças no parque é incrível e fica só a duas quadras. Ildako foi uma anfitriã super prestativa e fez com que tudo fosse atendido da melhor maneira possível. Tem um pátio ótimo com esquilos onde tomávamos café da manhã todos os dias. Recomendo! Se der, um dia voltarei com certeza.

This place is great! Park slope is an amazing part of Brooklyn and the apartment are close to the subway. We really enjoyed to relax at this place. Even if a squirrel yeld at us when we had our morning coffe in the private backyard (yes you get an private backyard). :)

Todo estaba limpio. Nos dió toallas en dos ocasiones e incluso unas sábanas limpias por si queríamos cambiarlas. 
No hubo problemas con las horas de llegada ni con la vuelta.

El apartamento cumplía punto por punto la descripción del propietario. Amplio, con todos los servicios descritos y muy limpio. 
El barrio tiene mucho ambiente por el día. Hay comercios, supermercados, tiendas, etc. Bien comunicado con Manhattan a través de metro (a 5 minutos andando desde el apartamento). 
La propietaria facilito nuestra llegada y la salida.

Ildiko's place is exactly how it is presented - roomy, comfortable, and well-lit.  You get morning light from the kitchen and bathroom windows, and afternoon light in the bedroom area.  The kitchen has everything you might need and the back yard area is super nice.  We had two people staying here - the bed and pull-out were both very comfortable and Ildiko made sure to get everything ready for our arrival (which was late at night, but she was amazingly accommodating and lives on the premises so can easily be reached).  The neighborhood is lovely - a short walk to Prospect Park and plenty to do on 7th avenue.  There is a subway stop nearby.  It was also nice to find a ground floor listing!  I definitely plan on staying here again.

IIdiko is a wonderful host and the apartment is so lovely! The location couldn't be better. There are many restaurants nearby as well as shopping, transportation and Prospect Park. The neighborhood is quiet and very comfortable. Thank you for a terrific stay IIdiko! I hope to come back and stay at your apartment again in the future.

We really enjoyed our stay very much.  Ildicko was a gracious host... friendly, outgoing, very sweet and pleasant.  The apartment was all we could have wished for and more than advertised!

We would have given this stay 5-stars except for the bed.  We prefer a bed that is a bit softer... however, that is just OUR preference and could be easily remedied by a "two-inch magic foam" mattress cover on top of the existing setup.  Some folks prefer a firm mattress, so... again... the softer mattress might be fine with most folks.

All things considered... we loved the place and the stay!  We would go back in an instant and on our next trip to the East Coast we will try to re- book.

Happy Trails!

Jerry and Barbara Murry
Super easy to meet Ildiko, she lives upstairs. The apartment was perfect. Flawless experience.
Handy to Prospect Park, only a short 3 min walk to the Subway

El apartamento esta muy cerca del metro y en un barrio muy residencial. La zona es tranquila y segura. Hay bares y tiendas justo en la esquina. El apartamento está muy bien para pasar unos dias. Nosotros somos dos y estuvimos una semana. La cocina está equipada y todo está en muy bien estado. Muy limpio. En el baño hay toallas de sobras, secador, jabón etc..
Place was quite large and spacious for a NYC apartment. Host was very nice and allowed an early check in. Great location on quiet block!
Efficiency apartment with great kitchen and dining area.
Ildiko et sa famille nous ont très bien accueilli, appartement très propre et bien situé proche metro et dans un quartier calme et familial avec toutes les commodités.
We had a terrific stay.   very nice space and convenient
Ildiko's apartment is terrific; clean, modern and comfortable, with everything you need close by in the neighborhood. I look forward to staying again soon.

Ildiko' studio apartment is just as it promised. Very comfortable, roomy, warm and quiet, with everything needed for a weekend stay. Great location for exploring Park Slope and also easy access to Manhattan and north Brooklyn, too.

Ildiko's place is a wonderful getaway in Park Slope. It is located in a safe, friendly neighborhood near several grocery stores, all types of shops, the 7th ave subway stop, and, the park is two blocks away.  The kitchen and dining areas are large and pleasant. The space is perfectly accommodated with a comfortable bed, bookshelves, plenty of storage space, easy access in and out.  The backyard is lovely too!  Most lovely is Ildiko. She is a warm, welcoming and generous host.
Great, responsive host! Lovely apartment. Close to everything.

Everything was perfect during the  5 nights I spent here. Ildiko is accomodating and quite cool for making me to feel at home.

The apartment is too bright, calm and very clean. It is comfortable and has enough space that can fit up to 4 people. The heater worked more than expected during the coolest days.
The kitchen connected with the dining room is a plus, cooking was really a pleasure. Unfortunately, we could not enjoy the backyard which looks very pleasant in warmer weather.

Tons of restaurants, grocery stores and all kinds of shops are within walking distance, subway stations and bus lines as well. Prospect park is less than 10 min away.

All in all, staying at Ildiko's apartment was a great experience. I definitely plan to stay here again especially in summer.
Ildiko is a great host and the place is as advertised.  A nice, clean, homey, sunny space that is close to all that BK has to offer.
Great stay, very accommodating.
I am repeating all of the others reviews......  Great host, great flat, great location. I am already planning a return to Brooklyn and will stay at IIdiko's again!
Great place to stay. Close to everything we needed. Clean and nice space.

Nice house in a really great location.  Very private.  Quick subway ride into the heart of the city, yet you are living in a quiet neighborhood a few blocks from a great park.  Little markets literally steps away for essentials and nice restaurants equally close.  Enjoyed our stay!
Lovely space, very quiet and great for us and our 10-month-old.
Great location, clean apartment, welcoming and responsive host.
The host canceled this reservation 81 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Ildiko's apartment is in a great location, comfortable, clean, really nice kitchen/dining area, and has much more natural light than you would expect in a garden level place. The central air conditioning is a real plus for a Brooklyn apartment! The bathroom has some storage space in the vanity and room on the top for toiletry items, plus 2 towel racks, hand towel holder and wall hooks. We were with our son's family much of the time and for most meals but enjoyed the Purity Diner on the corner for breakfast our last day.  Ildiko was easy to communicate with and responded quickly to emails and texts.
Lovely, very spacious apartment in the perfect location!   Near restaurants, stores, metro and park!
Accommodated last minute plans very well! Much appreciated!
Fabulous apartment with everything we needed.  The location is perfect, lots of shopping and eats within walking distance.  Classic Brooklyn!

Comfy, clean and quiet apartment. Excellently situated with a Union Market just around the corner. The truly wonderful music venue Barbes (our main reason for choosing this location), the F & G subway lines (get you to most places you would want to be), and Prospect Park all within a few minutes walk. The apartment has a great collection of books and CDs, which we highly appreciated, plus a nice outside space. The only thing we would have liked is more than just one towel each for a 9-night stay, particular given the lack of a washing machine/dryer. Communication was a little bit patchy, with access to the property only organised at the very last moment (whilst we were on a transatlantic flight), but ended up being fine. Without doubt would stay again.

This place was great for our 3-night stay in Brooklyn! The apartment is comfortable, well lit, clean and spacious. The neighborhood is quiet at night. It is an easy walk to Prospect Park as well as the F and G lines. The surrounding neighborhood is great for walking around, and there are lots of cute places to grab a bite to eat close by. We had no problem finding street parking. We did not meet the owner, but had great communication and easy check-in!
Ildiko's place is beautiful, spacious and clean. It is convenient to Prospect Park and many of the restaurants and shops in Park Slope. We hope to stay there again.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Very spacious and quiet ground floor apartment.  Ildiko was very easy to communicate with and was very accommodating.  Great location and close to everything.  Comfortable stay!  I would definitely stay again!

Excellent location close to transport and resteraunt also local food markets well supplied with a great range of food to self cater. The apartment was clean and comfortable and very well equipped. We would highly recommend.extreamly good value.

This apartment is fantastic! It is quite spacious for a studio and includes a wonderful eat-in kitchen area with access to the backyard area. Very close to the F/G subway stop on 7th Avenue which gets you into Manhattan quickly. Only a block and a half from Prospect Park and also close to many shops/restaurants on 7th Avenue. Loved the location and also how easy the check-in/check-out process was. Ildiko was flexible with my check-in time which I really appreciated. Highly recommend Ildiko's apartment for a trip to NYC!

Ildiko's apartment is perfect for a couple, and might work for a family with one young child, as well. The kitchen is spacious and well-equipped, and the location is incredibly convenient -- 2 blocks from the F&G line Metro stop, and half a block from the stores and restaurants of 7th Avenue. We hope to stay there again!

Great location. Great food and bars are very close by, but it’s on a quiet block. The apt is spacious and very clean. Very comfortable bed with nice firm mattress. Dining area and nice kitchen. It is on the ground floor so there’s just one step down which was great for my parents  The apartment is very private. The hosts were responsive and helpful.
Great
Ildiko's apartment was the perfect place for my visiting parents to stay. Very close to the subway and in the best neighborhood in NYC! Thanks for making their visit so great.

Ildiko was such a responsive and courteous host and the apartment was quiet, cozy and relaxing. The location is excellent - only a block away from so many good cafes and restaurants, and a quick walk to the F.
Wonderful space, location, and value.
Great space and host.  Would stay again.

Tuvimos una estadia de lo mas agradable. El apartamento Es soñado. Tiene todos los implementos que uno puede llegar a necesitar. Tiene dos supermercados cerca y más locales de comida a poca distancia. La estación de su té más cercana está a tres cuadras y te deja directamente en Manhattan (línea F). Si bien a Ildiko no pudimos conocerla, fue muy atenta y siempre estuvo pendiente de nuestras necesidades, incluso nos dejó comida y agua en la heladera, lo que fue una hermosa sorpresa teniendo en cuenta que llegamos muy tarde. La calefacción fue suficiente y eso que estuvimos en una de las semanas más frías de los últimos tiempos. Lo mismo el baño muy completo! Sin dudas una gran elección! Volveremos!

This was perfect for our visit to Brooklyn: spacious, stylish, and perfectly located near my son's apartment and Prospect Park. The kitchen is huge and well equipped, and Ildiko thoughtfully provided hummus, Brie, and crackers for us on arrival. Great shower and strong wifi (both important to me). Easy access (no need to schlep suitcases up flights of stairs). Mattress is firm - fine with me but a matter of personal taste. It's queen size and there is a futon if you have a kid or friend along.  In summer there is a garden in the rear that would be a pleasant place to enjoy the outdoors in the heart of Brooklyn but away from the hustle and bustle. Numerous shops, delis, restaurants, coffee shops, and groceries within a short walk. We didn't use the TV or sound system (there is a library of CDs) but might do so on another visit -  they are a great amenity, as is the library of books on music and art.

Apartment was exactly as pictured and listed.  Ildiko left key lockbox exactly at communicated making access effortless.  Full kitchen available and bedding and towels were lush and apartment clean and neat.  I look forward to booking this apartment again on our next visit.
This is a great place in a great location.  It is close to a subway stop and to numerous shops, markets and restaurants, but it is also on a quiet street with quite a large kitchen and dinning area.

What a wonderful AirBnB!  It felt like a private apartment, with a separate entrance and its own private kitchen and bathroom.  The neighborhood is great, too, with a bodega on the corner, a bagel shop around the corner, and multiple cafes and restaurants lining the big cross street (7th Ave).  Ildiko was highly responsive by text message and took care of issues almost instantaneously.  Highly recommended!

I didn't stay here, but my mother did (I live close by). She commented that the place was sparkling clean and the bed was comfortable. Ildiko is very easy to communicate with and even let me come pick up the key a day early. Thanks so much, Ildiko!

This is a very conveniently located and fully equipped apartment.  Everything was as promised.  Restaurants close by. Host was very helpful but we really didn’t need anything. Park Slope is a wonderfully cross cultural area with lots of beautiful children and so many trees. We hope to return.
Great apartment and very responsive host. Great location in park slope. Highly recommend!

Had a great experience with Ildiko.  My wife, 13 year old son and I were arrivied in Brooklyn from JFK before official check-in and Ildiko akindly accommodated us by allowing us to drop our bags off and pick up our keys.  The apartment is great.  A  big roomy, sunny kitchen and dining room and a comfortable bed and fold out sleeping futon/couch.  The apartment comfortably accommodate the three us of us. The kitchen is well equipped for basic cooking and coffee making. The location  in Park Slope is fantastic, convenient to a subway stop and surrounded by good restaurants, markets and coffee shops.  Ildiko was a great communicator  One of our best Airbnb experiences.  Can't recommend it enough.

My parents-in-law stayed at Ildiko‘s place when they were visiting us. They loved it! Check-in was super easy. I met Ildiko the day before they arrived to get the keys and she showed me around. She is a very nice person - and a great host. The place was impeccably clean, the bed was very comfy.
There was no need for my parents-in-law to bring their own shampoo and shower gel - everything was there. Even coffee! The apartment itself is wonderful, with a very spacey kitchen. And it offers access to outdoor space which is great in summer. I will definitely recommend Ildiko‘s place to my next visitors!!!

I had such a wonderful stay at Ildiko's place...I would gladly stay here again and readily recommend the apartment to other AirBnBrs. The check-in was very convenient. The neighborhood is beautiful with lots of Brownstones and a large selection of places to eat and drink. The apartment is close to the F subway line as well as Prospect Park. I felt so comfortable in the apartment itself: comfy bed, very clean, big kitchen space to cook, and a beautiful backyard garden space to soak up the sun and relax. Anyone staying here will have a fantastic Brooklyn experience. Thank you so much Ildiko!
A clean comfortable and well equipped apartment. Very convenient for us, a few doors from our son’s place. The neighborhood is loaded with restarants and convenient shopping.

Appartement fonctionnel et très bien placé (métro, bus, restaurants, boutiques...). Propriétaire très sympathique qui nous a permis de laisser nos bagages en attendant au-delà de midi... Un seul petit bémol: l'isolation entre le studio et l 'appartement des propriétaires au-dessus. A recommander sans hésiter cependant.

The accommodations were as pictured: spacious and comfortable. The location was perfect for our needs: a safe place to store our bikes while my son and I biked around to see NYC highlights, yet have a quiet place to come back to. WIFI worked well, nice hot shower, inviting accommodation. I would stay here again!

Le studio est très bien placé dans Brooklyn, mais dans une rue tranquille où on n'entend pas la circulation de la 7ème avenue.  Le métro pour Manhattan est à trois rues de là, et des commerces,  restaurants et cafés à deux pas. Il est facile d'accès (pas d'escalier pour y accéder et tout de plein pied), spacieux, très propre et bien équipé avec tout ce qui'l faut pour le séjour. Ildiko est charmante et très réactive. Nous n'hésiterions pas à séjourner chez elle de nouveau.
Great location, nice responsive hosts.  Kitchen is great but who wants to eat on in NYC?
Great place to stay. Easy to get around town.
The apartment is just like described: spaciuos, comfortable, clean and well equipped. The location is perfect with very good subway connections. Highly recommended!

This location was outstanding; the space was outstanding. Walkable to so many great spots. The apartment itself was spacious. Easy in/out. Great kitchen with everything you need. Bed was a bit hard for our taste but hate to even include that as this was such a stellar place. Absolutely would recommend it to friends/family!

Fantastic location in Park Slope on quiet street, but very close to restaurants, shops, groceries, and subway (F train to Manhattan).
Very spacious kitchen and dining area, living room/bed, clean bathroom/shower, and outdoor garden area.
Ildiko met me at the door and showed me around and gave me keys. Easy process.

This is a clean large flat with a private entrance. The host is very nice and only communicates when you need her. I especially liked the kitchen for doing my own cooking. I felt safe walking in the area as I saw many families. There are restaurants and shops and the subway all within a couple of blocks. Plus it was very quiet. Very nice place to stay!

I can't say enough about this place--it is the perfect size for a couple or small family. Ildiko was so nice and helpful and we really felt welcome. She was responsive to questions and the check-in was really easy. The bathroom was sparkling clean and has been newly renovated, and the kitchen/dining area was large enough to cook in and not feel cramped. There is a lovely garden in the back which we were told we could use but it was really hot when we were there so we didn't take advantage of that (but it looked really nice and peaceful). For location, you can't get much better than Park Slope! It's just a few blocks from the F/G or a short walk to the R line. There are tons of restaurants and shops nearby and it's a 5-10 minute walk to Prospect Park. This space is so inviting and comfortable, it was the perfect place to come back to at the end of a busy day touring the city. And you can't beat the price! We highly recommend and would definitely book again.

You will be well pleased with this home-like living space with a comfortable living/ sleeping area, spacious kitchen and dining room, and access to a well -shaded, quaint terrace. The only issue I had was that the bed was relatively hard, but I managed to sleep well.  Otherwise,  I couldn't have asked for better.   Not only that, the neighborhood is awesome!

Idilko and Chris are wonderful hosts! First, their space is exactly as described...and even more comfortable and peaceful in person.  It’s a garden apartment on a quiet side street, with excellent natural light from the terrace-view windows, nicely decorated, in a convenient Park Slope location (shops and trains right around the corner), and close to fabulous restaurants such as Camperdown Elm and Piccoli Cafe. Idilko is friendly, communicative and helpful, and the apartment has a great selection of maps for exploring the area, books and music for R&R.  I enjoyed the firm mattress, down pillows and soft cotton sheets, and a super-clean, spacious full bath was another plus. It was the ideal place for my stay in Brooklyn – thank you, Idilko!
Nice place to stay & very convenient to the subway.  Would definitely stay there again.

My sister and brother in law stayed at Ildikos place for 2 weeks to visit us in Brooklyn. The place was clean, perfectly located and fully stocked with anything you may need. Ildiko is excellent at communicating with us and solved things immediately. Cannot recommend enough!!

I spent one week at Ildiko's place for the second time and am very satisfied. Visiting my daughter twice a year, I am used to Park Slope area and can confirm that we couldn't expect a better place at this rate.
Idiko was out of town but the check-in instructions were very clear. She was available if needed and was  enough accomodating for the check-out so everything went smoothly.
The apartment is spacious, functional and plenty of natural light. It is very convenient as well: all kinds of stores, markets, restaurants, subway stations are within walking distance. Prospect Park is two blocks away.
The kitchen is very well-equipped,  just perfect for cooking! I truly felt like a home away from home as well as saving money.
I highly recommend Ildiko's place and would definitely plan on staying here again.

Ildiko was a responsive, helpful and gracious host. Her home is well appointed, spacious and in a great location. The apartment would make for a great base of operations for both short and long stays in beautiful Park Slope. And the best bagel in Brooklyn in right around the corner.
Comfortable and spacious apartment in a family-friendly location. An even easier commute to Manhattan than I'd expected!
Wonderful space, great location, best hospitality!

My parents stayed here while visiting me in Brooklyn. Ildiko was easy to communicate with in the weeks leading up to their stay and was responsive  to their needs during the stay. This was the perfect apartment in a great location and my parents will definitely stay here again on their next visit.
Go here!  Close to the subways, local grocery and eats.   All the comforts of home!
Un accueil parfait et chaleureux ,un séjour chez l'habitant, une situation idéale, l'AirB&B comme on les aime.
We had a great stay at Ildikos apartment. Very spacious and clean, great location in brooklyn. The next subway is a 3 minute walk away.

This is my second time staying at Ildiko's place in Park Slope - and I will be heading back there soon.  It is a spacious, stylish, comfortable place on a quiet street.  Very large eat-in kitchen, comfortable bed, and immaculately clean.  It was perfect for me and would be great for a couple.  I highly recommend it.

Really nice centrally located Park Slope apartment in Brooklyn.  Surrounded by coffee shops, bodegas and small businesses, Ildiko’s place is ideal for spending time in Brooklyn whether for business or for pleasure.
My third time at Ildiko’s. Quiet, comfortable, clean, and spacious. Perfect for a single traveler or a couple.

The apartment is close to a lot of coffee and cool places to go out, really close to Prospect Park and subway. Easy to park as well..
Ildiko is easily reachable and answers very quickly, I recommend this place.

The kitchen was very well outfitted with a toaster, microwave, coffee pot and even some coffee.  There was even a dishwasher which we didn't need since we only fixed our breakfast in the apartment.  A very good location, close to our daughter.  We did find the tub to be a bit slippery while showering.  That was solved by putting a hand towel on the bottom of the tub.  The only other problem was that I would knock my knees against the corner of the platform bed.  Having the key in a lockbox that we could access at our arrival was very convenient.  We didn't have any problems or questions, so we had no contact with our host.

Our airbnb was perfectly located.  The rooms were spacious and clean.  The bed was comfortable; the bedding new and fresh; the bath towels large and of good quality,

The best part was not having to run out after a long day traveling to pick up groceries and supplies.
I would highly recommend it.

What a pleasure it was to feel so "at home".

Great Place
Great Location
Great Value
Spacious, very clean and quiet place
A wonderful Park Slope studio, with separate "under the stoop" entrance. Couldn't have asked for more. Many thanks, Ildiko!

Ildiko was such a nice host. The apartment was big, cozy and incredibly clean. It was just two blocks away from the subway station with easy communication to Manhattan. The area was so safe and I felt very safe walking home in the night. Highly recommend this!!
Great place. Book collection, guitar and jazz CDs a great touch.
We enjoyed our stay in this well equipped ground floor / basement apartment in Park Slope. Easy street parking and subway access. Having a guitar is a plus.
It was a perfect space for my wife and I - very clean, comfy, in a great spot. We'd definitely stay here again.

This is a great space and locations. Worked great for our family of three (toddler).  We felt comfy and safe. The neighborhood has everything you need. Two blocks from the park and playgrounds. Ildiko was very kind and accommodating. Will def book again in the future!
This is a lovely basement suite in a great location. It is good value for the price.

name: Panoramic Ocean View Studio in  Quiet Setting
summary: Luxury studio unit is located in a family-oriented neighborhood that lets you experience Hawaii like a local! with tranquility and serenity, while in close proximity to beaches and restaurants! The unit is surrounded by lush tropical vegetation! High-speed Wi-Fi available in the unit!!
space: A large, private patio (lanai) with fantastic ocean views is completely under roof and is part of the studio unit. It's a great space for eating outdoors or relaxing, while checking our the surfing action. This patio is like a living room without walls, with only a roof with lots and lots of skylights!!! We provide Wi-Fi and beach towels!
description: Luxury studio unit is located in a family-oriented neighborhood that lets you experience Hawaii like a local! with tranquility and serenity, while in close proximity to beaches and restaurants! The unit is surrounded by lush tropical vegetation! High-speed Wi-Fi available in the unit!! A large, private patio (lanai) with fantastic ocean views is completely under roof and is part of the studio unit. It's a great space for eating outdoors or relaxing, while checking our the surfing action. This patio is like a living room without walls, with only a roof with lots and lots of skylights!!! We provide Wi-Fi and beach towels! The studio is detached from the main house, which has long-term tenants upstairs and downstairs. The lower yard and the front yard are assigned to those tenants, not the studio guests. The studio has exclusive use of its large (600 sqft) patio - under roof! Check-in and check-out times other than the ones listed, are by request only and an additional charges may apply;
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is called Maunalani Heights and locals refer to it as "mountain" living because it's 5-10 degrees cooler at night than down by the beach. When it's hot at night down in Waikiki, on top of Maunalani Heights we sleep with a light summer blanket and no air conditioning!! The area is lush, residential, yet 6-8 minutes down the hill there is Waialae Ave., the "eating" district of Honolulu (called Kaimuki). Beaches are found 10 minutes away by car. There is ample street parking
notes: There is high-speed Internet and  Wi-Fi service.  There is no laundry service on the premises and for longer stays, housekeeping can be offered upon request.  The unit is in a residential, single-family neighborhood and there is lots of street parking available. Guests are welcome to park along the mock orange hedge. The setting is lush and tropical and sometimes you may come in contact with flying insects or bugs, which are part of the Hawaii eco system. For example at night, when you have the lights on, its best to keep the entry door closed; all windows have mosquito screens and we have the company Orkin under contract for pest control.
transit: Bus number 14 stops on the street, nearly in front of the house. Most guest rent cars when they come to the island.
access: The studio is detached from the main house, which has long-term tenants upstairs and downstairs. The lower yard and the front yard are assigned to those tenants, not the studio guests. The studio has exclusive use of its large (600 sqft) patio - under roof! Check-in and check-out times other than the ones listed, are by request only and an additional charges may apply; please inquire before booking. Check-in times need to be agreed with host.  In general, guests self-check-in themselves into the unit.  The day before guests' arrival, self-check-in instructions and photos are sent by host. A check-in video will be sent to your personal email shortly before your arrival. A KEURIG coffee (K-CUP) machine and coffee capsules (PODS) are provided. Barbecue unit is not shared with guests for safety reasons and only the owner has access. Best to take Sierra Dr. on the way up the hill; it has gentle switchbacks!
interaction: I will be available on the phone or via text; local manager Jhanna will be available to help with any topics that might come up. A check-in "orientation" video will be made available as soon as we have your personal email. Self-check-in instructions will be emailed the day before your arrival or as soon as the previous guests have checked-out; typically, the check in email with access codes is send after you land in Honolulu. Assisted check-in (with a person) is available upon request and for an additional fee; it is available for special situations, "just in case"! It is rarely used by our guests. Our guests find the video and the self-check-in email very helpful and sufficient.  A special message for our international guests: to coordinate the check in, we set up a group text message that includes local manager Jhanna; this is needed because Jhanna does not have access to Airbnb. We can use popular texting applications and we will ask you which one you prefer. It is advisable to have
house_rules: Although the studio is in relatively close proximity to the main house - which is occupied by separate people on each of its two levels - and the next-door neighbors, it enjoys lots of sound and visual privacy – it is basically extremely quiet at all times.!!! The studio guests are requested to behave respectfully, in order to provide the same level of privacy to the people around them. No visitors are allowed on the premises at any time; No smoking, pets, loud music please!!  The hallway door, which affords privacy to your patio, needs to be kept closed at all times; if left open, the wind will slam the door shut and create noise and possible damage to the door. Early check in and late check out by request only; unless owner or Jhanna can accommodate such requests, please observe 3 pm check in and 10 am check times.

host.host_about: I am a clinical psychologist and a passionate Argentine tango dancer. Moved to Hawaii 15 years ago from Los Angeles, CA.  I love the island and its quiet pace.  In addition to the obvious water sports, it is surprising how much great hiking is available on Oahu! I often travel to Europe (especially Italy) and Argentina and when I am off-island, I enjoy sharing my studio with folks from all over the world!! Sharing the studio was so well received by our guests, we just decided to offer a second apartment. I take a lot of pride in offering our guests an excellent experience!!!

reviews.comments: Beautiful views greet you upon arrival! Andrei was great with response to any questions-very quick! Enjoyed our stay here. The kitchen was well equipped to make meals which was very nice.

Andrei was a great and considerate host. Once booked, he kept in content with myself as well as my girlfriend. He responded very quickly and answered all the questions we had. A week or so before our stay, Andrei sent us a video of the place explaining the room as well as to where things were (like a virtual tour) which was very helpful to us. The day we arrived, the drive up is about 7-8 minutes from the bottom. Our informant was Maria who met us there with the keys and instructions. The place was smaller than we imagined but it was to our liking. Well stocked for the kitchen as in utensils and pots and pans as well as a beautiful bathroom. It is a very quiet neighborhood so if you're not quiet, I suggest not staying here. The other tenants are in close quarters to your studio so be considerate and don't make so much noise. Overall, our stay was great. The view was beautiful and had a great scene of diamond head. We would recommend this place. If anyone ever needs anything during their stay, ask Andrei and he would be more than happy to accommodate you!!

Andrei had alot of questions at the beginning, it showed how strict he screens his potential guests.

A video was provided before arrival, it was very helpful and showed exactly what the place looks like.

We were lucky enough that the host organised pick up from the airport. The place is way up in hills, had a great view which we enjoined every morning. Even though it was way up the hills, a bus stop is right outside the place, which runs hourly. 

The place is clean, comfortable and well-equipped (although it does not have wifi). 

Overall the stay was very nice and easy, we enjoyed it very much.

Andrei was fantastic, very easy to deal with and we felt super welcome in his home. The space was fabulous, incredible views and not too far (if you have a car) from a lot of places, although they have a bus stop right nearby also. Would absolutely stay there again and would highly recommend it. Mariya was our contact whilst we were there and found her fantastic as well. Thank you again for allowing us into your home.

Andrei's place was amazing! Incredible views and and an awesome outdoor, covered patio area.  The place was clean and was perfect for 2 people. The property manager was flexible with out arriving time and provided excellent service. We will definitely stay there again!
Great spot, nice views, clean and the host/property manager were very helpful and welcoming.

This was a beautiful piece of property and the pictures don't do justice for how amazing the view is!! I highly recommend staying here. The location is perfect. Being just outside of the city is great because you can avoid all the traffic and craziness and its a short drive in. We had a great time staying here and everything in the studio is great! Thank you for everything we hope to be back one day!

Andrei was a great host! He reached out to me before booking with a video detailing the room and amenities, and provided useful information for check in making the whole process as seamless as possible. The studio itself is modern, recently renovated, and has a great view of Diamond Head, the volcano by the shore. Andrei's studio is also outside of Waikiki, which can be loud at night and make sleeping at night difficult. Not to mention staying outside of the city gives you the perspective of a local, so you'll have a much more rewarding experience. Highly recommend!

Andrei's studio was absolutely stunning. The place had magnificent views of Diamond Head and the ocean from the patio, a well-stocked kitchen, a comfortable bed and a very nice bathroom. My boyfriend and I spent the first half of our trip in busy (and sometimes loud) Waikiki. Andrei's home was the complete opposite of that which was exactly what we were aiming for. It's a very soothing and quiet environment. Andrei was always helpful and informative! Would love to stay here again :)

This studio is beautiful with gorgeous views. Best for those who have a car to get around. It is very quiet and serene. Everything is the studio is upgraded so it feels quite luxurious. We stayed for about a week, and my only issue (which is my own fault) is that for that long of a trip a washer and dryer would have been great. Definitely recommend this studio, mostly for a quite couple who has a car to get around the island.

Andrei's studio was AMAZING. It was clean, modern, quiet, and the view is absolutely fantastic. Parking is super easy right outside the house. Mariya, who helped us check in, was super prompt and friendly. Despite the listing description, there actually is wifi available in the studio, which was super helpful during our stay. The bed was comfortable; it was hot at night but there is a fan in the closet. The kitchen was awesome- we cooked one meal during our stay, and all the appliances are shiny and easy to use. Bathroom was super clean and the stone shower and path was so cute. We loved the outdoor patio as well, not only to enjoy the view but to eat there was convenient and pretty as well. During our stay in late may / early June, which was apparently the rainy season, since Andrei's place is uphill in the mountains, it seemed always rainy or drizzling, but don't be too concerned or deceived because when you drive out of the neighborhood, it's super clear and sunny. Overall, we had a wonderful experience at this super clean, modern, and adorable studio! Couldn't have been better! :)

Andrei has a beautiful cozy place with a great view in a quiet neighborhood. The place is well equipped for longer stays. Andrei sends great video instructions for checking in and where to go to make everything a breeze.

Highly recommend this place! The view was absolutely beautiful, very clean and quite. If you're not renting a car I would imagine it's a drag getting around to and from there. Mariya was very nice and helpful if we ever needed anything.
Everything was wonderful !!! Perfect place with a perfect view. Could have better pillows but other than that everything was convenient

Adrei's studio is lovely and perfect for two people. His home is on a mountain, as described, so the streets getting to and from the studio were steep (at least steeper than I expected). For the most part everything was nice and clean. Basic kitchen supplies and tools were available (knives, forks, cutting board, pots, pans, salt, pepper, oil, etc) and 3 beach towels and 4 bath towels were available for use. The patio was also really nice and wished we could have used it more (but of course, we were out and about doing other things). Keep in mind that the homes here ARE in close proximity to each other, so you may be able to hear other people and their conversations.  We had a really comfortable stay and loved it! Thanks Andrei!
Andrei's place was very quiet with beautiful views, it sits high on a hill so it is a bit cooler and the breeze is very welcome in mid August. We look forward to staying there again .

Andrei was extremely quick to messages prior to our stay, and provided helpful check-in information. We were greeted by Mariya upon arrival, and she was great. She walked us in, showed us how to work a few things and gave us the keys.  

The studio is beautiful. Perfect for two people. The shower at the end of everyday was amazing. We loved the finishes throughout the space- beautiful wood cabinetry, the countertops, appliances, and the bathroom was perfect. The bed was very comfortable- just bring extra pillows if you sleep with more than one per person. 

The outdoor living space provided absolutely stunning views over the ocean and diamond head. There was comfortable furniture, space to hang drying towels and even a sink outside. The flowering trees next to the porch were also lovely. 

The kitchen was very useful. When we arrived, Mariya mentioned that there might be roaches (they do spray the apartment regularly, and there was spray under the sink). The presence of these bugs is not due to a lack of cleanliness- just a consequence of location on a tropical island. We had 6 unwelcome guests during the 8 days, but we were able to get rid of them quickly. This is not a criticism of the apartment or cleaning- but just something to be mindful of anywhere on Oahu. 

I would absolutely stay here again if I returned to the island, and highly recommend this studio. If you have a rental car, there is nowhere on the island you would visit that would take much longer than an hour. We were able to go all over the island without any trouble, and had an amazing time. 

Many thanks to Andrei and Mariya for their help and for the opportunity.

Overall great place with great view (the profile picture were almost true from the patio!), the only thing I was surprised about the place is that it is actually more like a room with a kitchen, I would more consider this a Private room then an entire home/apt. However, with the reasonable pricing I am not really complaining, for 2 people this place work great!
Great little studio with an outstanding view from the roomy lanai. Quiet neighborhood setting was what we were looking for, so this was perfect.

We rented the studio for two weeks for our honeymoon. It is a nice and quiet neighborhood with an amazing view to the ocean. Perfect for enjoying the evenings and the cooler nights. When we arrived Mariya welcomed us and gave us an introduction of the place, she was very friendly and helpful. The studio itself is perfect for a couple. The interior is built with high quality materials and well equipped for a longer stay. There is only one thing to mention is that due to the local environment we had several cockroaches during our stay inside the house but we got rid of them. We would definitely recommend this place to anyone for a perfect vacation.
Excellent service, Mariya and Andrei were a great host, had a great time in Honolulu

Everything about our stay was wonderful. The space was the perfect size for two people and the neighborhood was very relaxing and quiet. The only thing I would say is that if you're not too keen on bugs you might want to stay in a hotel. We saw several cockroaches in the unit which just freaked me out. I guess that's what you get for living in Hawaii though.

What a beautiful place to stay! For us it was better than any hotel could have been. The description given is very accurate! Close to Honolulu, Waikiki and the beaches but not in the middle of all the busy tourist spots and hotels. The bus stops near, but a car is beter to have at hand when staying here. The place has everything you need and there's a lot of comfort. It was clean and there were towels and beach towels available. The WiFi is truly high speed. In the mountains it can rain in september but don't let it disappoint you; when you go down  to Waikiki or the beach, the sun is shining and at the beach it's hot! I can recommend this place to everybody.
The neighbourhood was quiet and friendly and the studio was stylish and very well equipped. The view from the patio was exceptional. Overall a great place to stay.
Great place, beautiful ocean view. House was very nice, clean and comfortable!
Amazing place! The view was even better than we expected and we were so so comfortable the entire time! Loved our stay here!
Andrei and Mariya kept in touch throughout and made sure our stay was pleasant.  Safe, quiet neighborhood with an amazing view from the backyard.  A perfect space for two people!

The view is more beautiful than the pictures. It was very clean and had plenty of shower accommodations and he also provided beach towels. It was conveniently located to drive to and from. We had a wonderful time.

Great view of the ocean and a quiet setting.  The air bnb sits up on a hill looking down to Diamond Head. The place is perfect for two and very clean.  The decor is tastefully done. The kitchen is well equipped for cooking or you are close to some great restaurants.  We will go back.

We had an enjoyable one-week stay at the studio. Andrei and Mariya provided us with lots of valuable information for checking in and more ahead of our arrival. The studio's lanai is super-nice and on clear days, the view towards Diamond Head is priceless! Overall, the studio was clean, is tastefully furnished and although not big, it is still a good fit for a couple.
Unfortunately, there was also some construction going on in the adjacent appartment, but we were able to clarify this with Andrei. 

Two more things just to be aware of:
