1. The windows are hawaiian-style (as you can see in the pictures), which means you can have a nice breeze (a plus!), but also do not provide a lot of noise isolation if it gets windy outside. It is a quiet neighborhood however. You can also not darken the room a lot, if it matters to you.
2. For all you coffee-lovers out there, there is no coffee maker available. Instant coffee is provided though.

Overall, we can recommend it and would come back if we were to return to the island. Mahalo!

Andrei's place is great. He was a great communicator and checkin/checkout was a breeze. Location is good if you have a car and the view from the lanai is excellent. Would stay here again on a return trip to Honolulu.

My wife and I spent 6 wonderful days at Andrei's wonderful studio. It was everything that was advertised. I have never stayed in a place where it was so hard to leave the veranda to go to the beach because of the view. Most importantly for the purpose of this review, I have truly never stayed in any B&B in the past where there was so much attention to detail for our every need. From the pre-arrival text messages, directional video, all amenities down to the most regular items you would use in your own home, He had covered everything. The only bad part was having to leave. If we come back to Oahu next year, I will be looking to book this location again, first and foremost!

We had a great time staying at Andrei's. It's very secluded yet comfortable and the patio has an incredible view. Great shower! Only small negative was that you could hear the next door neighbors kind of loudly when they were home. But we were very happy here and would stay here again.
Amazing views and lanai! Very relaxing and secluded!
Very well appointed studio with a spacious lanai overlooking Diamond Head and Waikiki.
Good communication and great view

We spent a week at this fantastic studio and really enjoyed it. Location wise it is in a quiet area, outside of the main hustle and bustle of Waikiki but you can easily reach places by car, or catch an uber into town which would cost about $18 dollars each way. It's a good location for getting around the island if you have a car as you can quickly and easily reach the main Highway to go North, East or
West. You also have a safe parking space for your car at the Studio. 

The view from the studio is fantastic, especially on an evening. We spent a lot of time at the outside area enjoying the views of Diamond Head and the Ocean. The Studio itself is well equipped; good coffee machine, oven, lots of kitchen equipment, beach towels, toiletries and a great hairdryer. If you're planning to cook any of your own meals during your stay than this Studio is perfect. The studio is quite cosy but we never felt like it was too small, it was perfect for our stay. 

The information we received about the booking was excellent, Andrei sent me a check in video so I could see how everything worked first hand, and an email with clear information. Andrei also very kindly let us drop our luggage off at the studio when we arrived as our flight got in very early, this then allowed us to go off for the day with no hassle and was very much appreciated! 

I would highly recommend the studio, I hope to be back!

Such a wonderful place. Andrei is extremely attentive and would love to thank him for the chance to stay at his amazing home. Although it is a bit further away from the hustle and bustle, it's definitely worth a stay. It'll take you about 20 minutes to walk down the hill, depending on your route and pace, however it's such a beautiful walk which will bring you to a range of restaurants. The decor is so comforting, and use of space is utilised so well. The place was kept so well, the floors were so clean and the shower spotless. I would definitely stay here again with my partner.

Very responsive host,easy self check-in. Beautiful view from the big terrace. The Studio is nice and well equipped. What bothered us was that you could overhear every word of the neighbours,if they were outside their house,as the walls od the studio are thin (no noise insulation).
Apart from that,recommended.
Great intro video before checking in. Clean airbnb. Would stay again!
Everything you need and want.

Loved our stay at Andrei's! The view from the patio is outstanding morning, day, and evening! Very clean and comfortable place to stay. The kitchen had everything we needed, the bathroom was spotless. Highly recommend this place as the location seems perfect and we suggest you rent a car :)

Perched on top of one of the hills backing Waikiki, with views of Diamond Head, this rental is a great place to kick back and enjoy some peace and quiet.  We loved waking up to bird song early in the morning (be prepared or use ear plugs), having a cup of coffee on the deck and then starting our adventures.  The suite has  a Keurig coffee machine so don't buy ground coffee like I did!  The kitchen is well equipped.  There were many freezer ice packs and snap lid food containers that we used to pack picnic lunches--bring a cooler bag.   The shower is great!  The only thing you need to understand is that the long term renters' (very nice) kitchen window faces the private lanai, so anything you say or they say can be heard.  I found this awkward for the first day, but got over it and thoroughly enjoyed the premises.  Another plus, there is a conveniently located Whole Foods located 8 minutes away.  Want take out--go eat at Diamond Head Market!
Andrei's place is amazing with exceptional views of the diamond head crater which we loved waking up to every morning!!
We had a great stay, the apartment is well appointed with everything we needed. Very comfortable and the views of diamond head are incredible! Thank you!
Lovely studio with beautiful view from lanai.  It is in residential neighborhood with homes close together.   You will hear neighbors talk/play music etc...      I would book again .
Awesome place, the view is breathe taking , at times we didn't want to leave because we wanted to just sit down and enjoy the view. It's a great place for two. Very clean.

While the location is secluded,it is  true local living. Houses are close so you will hear others. The neighbors dog woke us up several times so I would not suggest bringing a baby here. Otherwise it was a lovely studio with great amenities. The lanai is great and the view gorgeous. Make sure to open all the louvred windows, even the ones over the bed to get a great breeze. Parking was included, good Wi-Fi, and the self check-in with the coded gate and front door was handy with no need to keep track of keys. Host was prompt in contacting me as I booked. He was off island though so he had an on island counterpart who wasn't as prompt as the host but not unmanageable. I found the bed really hard and woke up sore every morning but my husband was fine for most of the trip so if you have a sensitive back maybe beware. You'll have to drive into town but it's really close to grocery stores. We enjoyed being out of the hotel zone. Aloha!

Lovely stay in a lovely studio!  This place is perfect for a quiet getaway for writing and reflection.  I stayed here for one week on my own and another week with my partner.  It was a perfect place to cook, hang out, stare at the ocean, and relax.  It's also well located for trips to Whole Foods, the local restaurants in Kaimuki (best neighborhood in Honolulu, in my opinion), and the beach (about 12 min away).  There's also a fabulous view and plenty of hiking nearby.  What more could you need?

There can be a bit of noise in the evening, given the proximity to the neighbors, but it's pretty common in Hawaii!  

Andrei was communicative and responsive to all my needs.

I would recommend this place to get away from the crowds of Waikiki and get a sense for the real Hawaii lifestyle.
Second time staying here and was just as perfect as the first! Highly recommend this place, great location and an incredible view!

This place is very cute and absolutely perfect for a solo traveler or a couple. The view from the deck is amazing and peaceful with very comfortable and inviting decor. Even though there are neighbors quite close, you really do have a significant feeling of privacy.

We stayed at Andrei's for 6 days and we felt right at home. The space was very inviting, clean, and relaxing. We had a lot of privacy despite being in close proximity with the other residents. The balcony was perfect! Especially the view when you first wake up in the morning. Location wise; a lot of places were very accessible via car, we were basically in the middle of everything. Checking in and out was a breeze, and Jhanna/Andrei were easy to reach. Staying here gave us the experience of a true local in Oahu. If we ever do visit Hawaii again, we will definitely book this place again!
Amazing stay. Close to everything, the view is breathtaking! Would definitely recommend it.

Ich und mein Mann haben zwei Wochen bei Andrei verbracht! Als wir ankamen, konnten wir nicht fassen wie wunderschön die Aussicht auf den Diamond Head war. Das Apartment ist klein aber fein und alles wichtige war vorhanden. Einige Gläser, Pfannen, Geschirr etc. Spülmittel, Zewatücher, Toilettenpapier, frische Handtücher. Es war alles wunderbar sauber.
Der Check-in war auch sehr einfach. Jhanna und Andrei sind ein super Team. Wir hatten Kontakt über eine Whatappgruppe, in der alle Fragen auch geklärt werden konnten. Bei Problemen konnte man Jahanna direkt kontaktieren und sie wäre sofort zur Stelle.
Für Sicherheit ist auch gesorgt mit Sicherheitspins am Tor und am Apartment.
Andrei macht darauf aufmerksam, dass es sich um Hawaiianische Fenster handelt, was sehr wichtig ist. Wer keine hellhörige Orte mag, sollte das Apartment meiden. Uns hat es super gefallen, da wir auf der Suche nach Ruhe waren. Es war perfekt!
Was noch wichtig zu erwähnen ist: die perfekte Aussicht hat auch ihren Preis! Es geht halt logischer Weise sehr steil hoch. Zu Fuß würde ich persönlich nicht empfehlen. Mit einem Auto ist alles kein Problem! Eine Buslinie fährt auch regelmäßig vorbei. 
Uns ist halt die Hygiene sehr wichtig und das Apartment war sehr sehr sauber! Wenn wir nach Hawaii nochmal kommen, werden wir aufjedenfall bei Andrei und Jhanna wieder buchen.
Danke für diese unvergessliche Zeit!

This is a very nicely appointed studio with a beautiful view of Diamond Head and the Pacific from the lanai. The studio is stocked with all the necessities to make for a comfortable stay. Would certainly stay here again!

Andrei's place has a fabulous view. We enjoyed waking up to it every morning! Check-in was clear and easy, and Andrei and the local manager promptly answered all our questions and made sure we felt comfortable. We recommend!
Very quaint little studio with a breathtaking view of Diamondback! So close to the city but yet very quiet and residential.

Andrei's apartment is a great way to enjoy your stay on Oahu. Living up on the hill has the advantage of nice temperatures and gorgeous views, plus you get away from the hustle and bustle of Honolulu and Waikiki. The apartment itself is small but has everything a couple needs, and it is all done in style. We absolutely loved the covered lanai to enjoy our morning coffees and evening beers. A 5 minute drive down the hill takes you to HI 1 and from there literally everywhere you want to go to discover the island. Don't forget the Diamond Head Hike which is almost right at your doorstep. It's a great way to start the day and then come back to your beautiful lanai to enjoy a healthy breakfast. We would definitely stay here again!

Very Nice Place, Clean... super helpful host, wonderful view. 
Because it is located in a lush, expect bugs (ex., American Cocroches)

My boyfriend and I spent 4 night in this place, and it is definitely enjoyable for both of us. Especially, the view from the backyard  made this trip be more memorable. The only thing really freaked me out was the cockroach, I know we cannot avoid this situation because here is Hawaii, a tropical island. So if you are afraid of them, please be aware of this situation seriously. The location is very convenience, and it only takes 15mins driving to Waikiki beach, and 10mins to the closed grocery store. Overall, this is an amazing place, everybody should love it!

Andrei's studio has been the perfect spot for our vacation.

The place is way off the noisy part of the city, inside a peaceful and colorful residential borough up in the hills. Atmosphere was quiet and calm, with a brilliant view over Diamond Head and the Pacific. Car parking available 24/7. Easy access to the house.

The patio was great. Very nice spot where to enjoy a beer looking at the sunset.

The studio itself is minimal but has everything. Space for your clothes, very nice bathroom (great shower), and really a super equipped kitchen. We had chance to cook everything we wanted and also to prepare packed lunch. Brilliant.

One small bad thing is that we have had some issues with insects unfortunately. 

In general, we had a great time at Andrei'a place and would love to come back in the future.

Amazing view.  Nice outdoor area for a quiet breakfast or dinner.  Close enough to town, but still a quiet residential feel.  So many good restaurants in Kaimuki too.  

Would highly recommend.

For our first experience with Honolulu and Airbnb Andrei's place was a great place to stay. The views are outstanding looking down to the city below and the Pacific inviting you to take in just some of the beauty of the island. This home contains everything you would want or need as a base for adventure or relaxing.

Thanks again for hosting us Andrei.

Wow. Driving up to Andre’s is pretty steep but absolutely worth it up top. The view from his lanai is beyond words. The neighborhood is incredibly nice as well.  Everything was very clean and proper. Would recommend staying here to anyone.
Great views! Very thoughtfully set up home. Big enough for a couple. The place was clean, great host.

Tolle Unterkunft in wunderschöner Lage!

Die Unterkunft ist sehr sauber und die Ausstattung hochwertig. Alles notwendige  zum kochen ist vorhanden (Gewürze, Töpfe, Pfannen, Kaffeemaschine...), ebenso Shampoo/ Duschgel. Es ist jederzeit ein Parkplatz vor dem Haus vorhanden und durch die Lage weit oben am Berg ist die Aussicht gigantisch. 
Würden jederzeit wieder kommen, haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt! Aloha!

Great place to stay! Clean and comfortable with gorgeous views! Away from the busy city but only minutes away from Honolulu and all there is to do there. Andrei was a wonderful host who responded to any questions promptly. Would definitely stay again!

It’s a great location if you are wanting to be out of the hustle and bustle of the city. Beautiful view of diamond head and chirping birds in the morning. We enjoyed the quiet space as our hub for exploring the beauty of Oahu.

Great value.  Lovely studio
  Best part was large covered lanai. With amazing view!

Andrei was an excellent host.

The location is truly excellent, close enough to the action, while still being a bit secluded.

What a lovely place. Quiet and ideal for a solo or couple travelling. The studio has the most amazing view and the place is gorgeous inside. Communication was great although we never met it didn't matter. Close to everything near Honolulu! Recommend you book to stay! I will be back :)
Great!
Wonderful stay, and a beautiful view of Diamond Head.

Andrei was out of the country at the time of our stay, but was a great host nonetheless! Jhanna was available to contact during our stay and was very responsive. The space was very clean, comfortable bed, and GORGEOUS view. The drive up to the house was very winding on our way up (per the GPS instructions) - we found the quickest and most convenient route was to the Wilhelmina Rise. 15-20 minutes to Waikiki, 15-20 minutes to Koko Head - a wonderful, central location! We ubered to Waikiki one night and it was under $20 as well. Definitely recommend!

Wow, what a place! The views are spectacular, the space is updated with top notch finishes and appliances. The outdoor space is huge! 

But once again... the VIEWS!

Would absolutely stay here again.

The apartment is ideally located in a nice and quiet neighborhood and the view is just amazing! Andrei let us check out a little later and that was very nice of him! Always answered very quickly to questions. I recommend this place! :)

Great location, prepare for some fun hill climbs in whatever car you get. Local shops and restaurants are handy. Very pretty views of diamond head. You can sleep on the patio comfortably in rain and wind because it's deeply sheltered from the weather.

Absolutely wonderful location, high above the city with great ocean and Diamond Head Crater view. Super quiet and serene. Short drive to many great places to eat and have coffee. Short drive to Waikiki and the Zoo, Ala Moana Shopping Center, Downtown Honolulu. Great kitchen space and perfect shower with great water pressure! Easy parking right in front of unit. Lovely covered patio to enjoy the view, rain or shine! Hosts communicate extremely well. Great experience!
Studio parfait pour un couple aimant les petits espaces avec toutes les commodités, pas besoin d’avoir plus grand! Le salon extérieur, terrasse, est vraiment intime et offre une vue incroyable.

Great location up in the hills with great views. Check in service very professional and communication with  host great. On reflection place was probably a little small for 11 nights with a baby in tow. Only other negative worth noting was that place needs windows open constantly otherwise a musky smell creeps in.
Loved the view. The backyard was so beautiful with view of Diamond Head. Everything we needed was available and though everything was small still enjoyable space.

Great communication with you about check-in/out. Very central in location. Just the exact space for a couple. Very neat and cute. Awesome video explaining everything about your stay and they send it prior to your arrival. That was a plus! Great place to stay in Oahu.

This unit was the perfect size for us. The view was outstanding and we loved the privacy. I really liked the stone floor shower. The place was stylish and outfitted with nice amenities. Our host went out of their way to address our needs.

Certainly we choosen the place based on the positive reviews however we had obviously a different opinion. 

Place itself:  Pictures are correct but place is smaller than one expects. Kitchen is luxerious but also small, things like a toaster are missing, everything only the minimum, 4 plates , 4 knifes, 4 forks, 4 cups some of them partly broken. The bed very small and dated. Highlight is the bathroom, very nice.
As described place has only hawain windows no curtains so if you either need a rather dark lace to sleep or if the neighbors have a party (the bed is just next to the barbeque of the other tenants) you can imagine that it is not easy to sleep.

Patio: Wunderful view. Furniture dirty and dated. Partly not cleaned. 

All of the above you may like or not however what we did not like at all was the existence of giant cockroaches  in the kitchen and the habits of the so called „host“ how just replied that cockroaches are normal and that he informed about this.

I assume he will reply to our review that everything what we say is nonsense and he is right....

We like airbnb but this place where it all about making money. That is ok but than at least the place should be clean and insect free.
Had trouble with the check in that toke additional 7 plus hours. But the place has an amazing view great location. Close to the beach and plenty of restaurants.

This space is in a beautiful location in a residential neighborhood, so it's perfect if you aren't into the touristy Waikiki scene and the big hotels. We used this as a home base from which to explore the entire island, and nothing was more than 1.5 hours away. The hosts were very communicative, though we never met in person. We appreciated having the opportunity to stay here.
great place, good price

We booked Andrei’s place for 3 nights. On the second night we discovered cockroaches throughout the unit. This was outside of our tolerance for insects so we decided to leave immediately and book a hotel for the next 2 nights.

We contacted Airbnb the next day to let them know about the issue and cancel. Unfortunately, they would only refund 1 night because we did not inform them the night we left (which was around midnight). 

Andrei’s place is small but well accommodated with high end finishes. The outside area is large and nice with an outstanding view.

Fantastic apartment! My husband and I loved the location...the balcony is very romantic and a perfect place to sit and relax at the end of the day. The bed was very comfortable, and the apartment was extremely stylish. The kitchen had everything needed to prepare our own meals. My only regret was that we had not been able to stay longer!
great location, view and super nice host, helping with everything

Bonjour,

Je recommande cet endroit sans aucun doute. Magnifique endroit en montagne et très propre. Je vous recommande de louer une voiture pour apprécier davantage la visite de l'ile.
很棒的房间,阳台风景非常好｡

Can’t wait to come back. Also, we got engaged on Waikiki Beach! I was soooooo surprised! Haha! This has been a trip we will NEVER forget and we really appreciate your opening up your home to make it all come together. Mahalo! ❤️

Very Beautiful 
Amazing view and quiet location
Stunning view and ovens I don't even know how to work. Quiet, pleasant, clean, and tastefully decorated. The tile in the bathroom was beautiful.
Perfectly beautiful. Exactly what I wanted while traveling alone for business. I would love to stay there again.

As this was my first AIRBNB experience I was a bit nervous on what to expect and didn’t know how things would be. I read every single review that people had posted and was a bit skeptical on how things would turn out to be. Most noted from what I’ve read from others but disagree with are 1) bugs: bugs were never an issue and we often left the door open. Occasionally a moth or two would show up but we never saw any ants or roaches or anything based on what I’ve read. 2) the view: the view was incredible and waking up to the ocean every morning and going out onto the patio to have a coffee was a very romantic touch for my fiancé and I.

The only thing I would say is that if you are looking at spreading out and enjoy the luxury of having a lot of added space just verify that this place suits your needs. 

Jhanna the host does a great job at communicating and is readily available for any and all needs. I felt very pampered every step of the way and truly enjoyed staying there as a result from her great hospitality. 

Thank you for having us. We truly enjoyed our stay and will definitely come stay here again next time we make it out to Hawaii.  Mahalo!
Was really happy about the stay! Andrei is a great host and appartment is enough for 2 people with a beautiful view!

Located 280m above seal level on the Wilhelmina rise, this place has spectacular views of the Pacific and Diamond Head from the spacious and private lanai, which quickly became our favourite place. We stayed a little more than 2 weeks and found the apartment to be very well suited for 2. The local contact was excellent with quick communication and generous and effective support. Very helpful video to facilitate check-in. We can fully recommend this AirBnB.

Our stay was great! Loved the close proximity to downtown without having to actually BE in downtown. The quiet neighborhood was great. The space itself was clean and neat. Loved the outdoor seating area where we could just chill and take in the views. Only “downsides” we experienced were that the room did get a little warm during mid-day but the fans provided were definitely helpful. Also, since the guest house we were in is so close to the ones around it, I did feel like we needed to be very quiet as well. I could see that being an issue for others but we really enjoyed the peace! 
All in all, great experience. I would recommend this little slice of heaven. Thanks Andrei and Jhanna!

Amazing location in the hills with great view and a great little detached studio. we had a rental car so it was easy to get in and out of town. we also ubered to Honolulu one day (~$16).

the space has pretty much everything you would need... our only small complaint was that the next door neighbor has a light on a sensor which kept going on and off throughout the night (mostly on). The bed faces the wall / window shutters that the neighbor's light is on.  So it got pretty bright in the small unit. We just suggested some curtains to put up to darken out the place for us light sensitive sleepers.  Other than that the place is quiet and wonderfully peaceful. 

Thanks Andrei, we would definitely stay again.
Great view and close to Waikiki beach with tons of shopping and restaurants.

I highly recommend this place. The studio is cozy and stylish. The view is stunning during the day and romantic at night. Everything from the kitchen utensils to the linens is of quality and the place is very clean. The neighborhood is nice and quiet and the breeze is enjoyable sitting on the lanai.

This was a great quiet, private space to relax at the end of the day. The views from the private lanai were incredible. The lanai also included a couch, two oversized chairs, a bench, and a large coffee table. Great for enjoying morning coffee and evening appetizers. The studio had top end kitchen appliances so it was a nice place to prepare and enjoy a meal. The interior space was small but met our needs. However, the lanai with ample seating more than doubled the space.

This is a really beautiful apartment with tasteful and unique decor. The bathroom and kitchen are spotlessly clean and very attractive. And the large, well appointed,  patio is priceless. Add to that an absolutely stunning view of Diamond Head and the lights of Honolulu and it’s a great package at a good price. The only downside for us was that the neighbors are very close and you hear more of their personal life than you might want.
A cozy place with a view...

Thank you Andrei for having us at your place. The checkin process was easy and the parking on premises was great. The location of the airbnb was beautiful! It was located up in the hills. Luckily we had a rental car to get around, without a car, the location can be far from the beach, food, stores, etc. The place itself was clean, slightly smaller than expected, but sufficient space for 2 guests. I was worried about insects but luckily had no encounter with bugs.  We made sure to keep the area clean and not leave any food around. The view from the patio was spectacular and we enjoyed having breakfast there every morning. The guesthouse is located beside other homes so at times it could be a little noisy, but overall not a huge concern for us. Andrei was kind enough to allow us to have a late checkout which we really appreciated as our flight was in the evening. It was very easy to get a hold of the hosts. Thank you for letting us stay at your place!

Just wonderful! Comfortable, clean and peaceful. The view from the patio is heavenly. We were excited to find a trailhead just a few minutes’ walk away with beautiful views along the hike. This was a great place to stay!
Best place for a sunset, just beautiful up there at this location.

We loved our stay at Andrei’s studio! Just as advertised, we were treated to a gorgeous view of Diamond Head Crater and the ocean every day. It was also super private and quiet— perfect for a relaxing getaway. We were forewarned about bugs and were careful to shut the door every time we went in and out (we also used bug repellant after getting a few bites). There is no air-con but that was completely fine as it was never too warm at night. The space itself is stylishly decorated, clean, and full of thoughtful touches for cooking, cleaning, and even the beach!
Studio appears exactly as described. We had a comfortable and luxurious stay. Amazing views, easy check-in, well appointed and stylish space. Would stay again!

This is a cozy and comfortable studio with everything we needed for our stay.  The part that we enjoyed the most was relaxing in the outdoor seating area.  We had a lot of rain during our visit but the area was protected and the view was amazing.  Andrei and Jhanna were great on communication - they answered our questions promptly.  We will be back!
Just awesome. Wonderful studio, fabulous porch with a fantastic ocean view, and always immediate response from Andrei whenever you need something. Go and book it!

My husband and I started our Oahu trip here and LOVED how close it was to delicious restaurants and coffee shops. The view can't be beat for that price, the bed was super cozy, and the water pressure in the spacious shower was really nice. The apartment is situated between a neighbor's home and another tenant. The tenants are quiet and neighbors came and went during our stay but note - with proximity to their place you can hear them talking pretty clearly if that bothers you. The neighbors also installed motion detector lights that are just outside the studio windows across from the bed. They were on all night (probably due to wind and trees). Andrei provides blankets to cover the windows, but it does not really block the light. If you are a light sleeper, bring a sleep mask. Be sure to clear any food and keep doors closed unless you want to see a visitor ;) We didn't see any until the last evening, but the biggest cockroach I've ever seen still startled me (I'm a spazz). The studio is treated, but the tropics can bring in some creepy crawlers. Overall we enjoyed our stay at the cozy studio. The porch is a gorgeous spot in the morning to enjoy your coffee and watch birds in the neighbors' yard.

name: Grand apartment Sagrada Familia
summary: 4 rooms apartment in the heart of the right “Eixample” broadening. Perfect location in the notorious area of Sagrada Familia that will ensure and unforgettable stay in Barcelona. HUTB-003275
space: Currently being improved. On 18th of February it will be finished. 4 room apartment in the heart of the right “Eixample” broadening. Perfect location in the notorious area of Sagrada Familia that will ensure and unforgettable stay in Barcelona. Accommodates: 8 people (MAX) Surface: 120sqm. Completely furnished, wide lounge with TV, balcony with a small table and chairs, Air Conditioning and heating. Kitchen: Fully equipped, with TV, fridge, dishwasher, oven, microwave, all tableware and cookware to enjoy homemade meals. It also has a small office area. Bathroom: 2 fully equipped bathrooms. Bedrooms: 4 big bedrooms. 2 with queensize beds, another with 2 small beds and a 4th one with a bunk bed. Services: AC, heating and Wi-Fi Appliances: washing machine, microwave, electric oven, fridge, dishwasher and TV.

notes: Please contact us to report your arrival time to Barcelona at least 24 hours before check-in, to organize your check-in correctly.   Late check-in (after 20: 00h) is an extra cost of 30 euros to pay cash during check-in. It is requested not to make noises from 22:00. Tourist tax is not included in the price (0.75 € / night / adult, up to 7 nights) which is payable upon arrival.
transit: Really close to several bus stops and metro stations.
access: Please contact us to report your arrival time to Barcelona at least 24 hours before check-in, to organize your check-in correctly.   Late check-in (after 20: 00h) is an extra cost of 30 euros to pay cash during check-in. It is prohibited to smoke in the apartment. It is requested not to make noises from 22:00. Tourist tax is not included in the price (2,25eur / night / adult, up to 7 nights) which is payable upon arrival. Check-in: from 14:00 pm.  Check-out: till 11:00 am. Charges for electricity, gas, water and community included. Any noises that could disturb the neighbors is not allowed. Certainly from the 22: 00h.  Smoking in the apartment is not allowed. Any parties are strictly prohibited.
house_rules: Check-in: from 14:00 pm.  Check-out: till 11:00 am. Charges for electricity, gas, water and community included. Any noises that could disturb the neighbors is not allowed. Certainly from the 22: 00h.  Smoking in the apartment is not allowed. Any parties are strictly prohibited.

host.host_about:
Hola, 

Somos Alexandra y Juan dos amigos que estamos enamorados de Barcelona, nuestras pasiones son viajar y conocer gente por lo que nos encantaría compartir con vosotros nuestros espacios  para que disfrutéis a vuestro gusto de toda la cultura, actualidad y diversidad de ofertas que la ciudad os ofrece.
Para nosotros lo mas importante es que nuestros huéspedes puedan aprovechar al máximo su estancia en Barcelona,  que viváis vuestra historia  reflejada en  rincones únicos de la ciudad y por supuesto nuestra mayor satisfacción es que os sintáis como en casa según lo que busquéis.

Hello, 

We are Alexandra and Juan two friends who are in love with Barcelona, our passion is to travel and meet new people so we would love to share our spaces with you and that you can enjoy the culture, the present and the diversity of offers that the city has to offer. 
For us the most important thing is that our guests can make the most of their stay in Barcelona, that you live our history full of unique places and of course our greatest satisfaction is that you feel as if you where at home according to what you are looking for.

reviews.comments:
L'accès au logement est pratique. Il y a un parking à 10 mètres (20€ par jour).
La résidence est bien tenue. Deux ascenseurs pour accéder au 6ème étage. L'appartement est parfaitement silencieux, pas de bruit sur la rue.
Le logement est idéal pour les groupes, il est propre, en très bon état. Deux jeux de clés sont à disposition. Je recommande vivement ce logement.
Pour se rendre en ville, il est situé à 15 minutes de sites à voir, les taxis passent dans la rue, tout est pratique.
Enfin la terrasse est superbe, avec vue sur la tour AGBAR.

Merci pour votre accueil, on revient bientôt!
The apartment is really amazing, in the city centre and with everything we needed. Regina was really helpful we our needs.
Great stay, very nice flat as described. Nice balcony and well located! Host was nice and easy to communicate to

Everything was fine.
Apartment was clean.
A couple useful items weren't available, like a trash can or a drying rack fro the dishes. But obviously thats an easy thing to buy.
Overall a nice place.

Nothing to do with the host, but the walls are paper thin. You can hear what the neighbours are doing on every side of the flat.
Bon accueil et appartement propre et conforme à la description
Superbe appartement! Un parking à deux pas qui nous a été d'une grande utilité. Regina est très accueillante, je recommande cet appartement.
We has a great time at Regina's place. The flat is clean and as shown on the pictures.

The apartment and the location is good, but the service is not as good as expect. 

I have booked a pick-up service from the householder, but there are some problems happened about the plane causing the flight delayed. I have informed the householder at once. When we arrived at the airport, we could not find the driver waiting for us at the arrival with our name. Then, I tried to ask for the help from the householder to meet the driver at the airport. After almost one-hour waiting, we are refused by the driver to meet at the airport and He asked us to find his car at the park. How ridiculous! This service costs 20 euro each person but we cannot even have the right to be picked up. We were so angry and chose to take the taxi. At the same time, I texted the householder that we were tired of waiting for the driver and we were on the way to ur apartment by taxi.

The householder didn't tell me that I should phone another guy to tell him that we were on the way to the apartment until We arrived. What all she talked about were the money of the pick-up service. We spent another 45 minutes to wait for the guy to send the key. Again, when he came, he talked about the money. We asked for the service, but u did not provide it with us. How dare u to ask for the payment? Besides, do u know what? We are totally seven people, so this service should cost 140 euro totally. But two taxis only cost us 70 euro. The driver knows the guy and the householder. I doubt that they are on the business to play trick with me.

Barcelona is a really nice city to travel, but this experience does make a bad impression on me.

The apartment has a good location convenient to metro and walking distance to Sagrada Familia and many good eating options. Spacious with a nice balcony. Air conditioning units are in the main hallway and the dining/living room, but the rooms are hard to cool down (it was hot when we were there).
Hola todo muy bien, excelente ubicacion y el trato my amable. El unico comentario es el de reparar la

What an amazing place to stay! It is a very roomy and comfortable place, that is in a great location. The deck area is amazing and we spent most of our time there just hanging out taking in the views. Reginan had great communication and made it very simple for us to arrive. If i ever go back to Barcelona, i would 100% stay here again!

Tutto andava molto bene ,l'appartamento corrispondeva esattamente alle foto del sito. Le stanze ed i bagni erano puliti , come pure la cucina. La terrazza era molto bella e la vista era apprezzabile. Oltre ai vari letti vi era anche la possibilità di dormire su un divano letto particolarmente comodo. L'aria condizionata funzionava e rinfrescava bene tutto l'appartamento. L'unico problemino c'è stato con la porta del bagno che è stato facile chiudere, ma non più riaprire, ma c'è stato subito un pronto intervento da parte dei responsabili dell'appartamento, che hanno aiutato ad uscire la persona che era rimasta chiusa all'interno. Salvo questo però Il quartiere era tranquillo , c'erano vari baretti attorno e anche dei piccoli centri commerciali ( di tipo alimentare ). Era in oltre possibile raggiungere a piedi vari bar dove potersi divertire. I taxi per arrivare nel centro della movida variano con i prezzi dai 5 ai 7 euro a corsa. La fermata della metro era a 5 min a piedi dall'appartamento. Dal centro partiva una navetta che portava direttamente all'aeroporto per soli 4 euro e 90.

Regina is a really nice host and the apartment is perfect for big group due to its perfect location, 5 min drive or 15 min walk for the beach and near the perfect tourist places !
I recommend 100% this clean and well decorated apartment !

Regina was a great host- first she replied very quickly to my booking inquiry, and was always very responsive with queries/ messages.
The flat is HUGE and very well located, very modern and nicely decorated. Regina had organised someone to meet us on arrival so check in was easy. Check out was easy  llew as we just had to leave the flat at the agreed time. I would only say that the check out time of 11am is a bit early, especially for a city when you can have dinner quite late... although upon our request, Regina allowed us nicely to stay until 12pm.
They were two sets of keys which was very convenient for a big group. 
I have suggested to regina that it would be great to have a few more amenities provided such as toilet paper and coffee/tea for example, but overall we were very pleased with our stay at Regina's place. Thank you Regina!
El departamento es fantástico y tiene una terraza bastante amplia para disfrutar. Tanto los anfitriones como Maks (el concierge) fueron muy amables y dispuestos a ayudar.

Very good location.

Really close to all major attractions. Plenty of shops and restaurants nearby. ( BTW you can go to the sushi bar - 5 minutes walk - Kyoka II, with unlimited food. Menu in Spanish only :) )

Apartments are comfortable and clean. I think it should be really good for a family vacations.

IMHO some minimal improvements must be made (broken shower hose support, etc) but it's truly minor. 

Overall - pleasant experience.

Regina's apartment was as listed on her profile - there was sufficient space for all 8 of us, and had all of the amenities listed on the page. It was a very good area. I would recommend anyone in a bigger group looking to stay in a central location.
Great apartment if you are a larger group and need more space. The bedrooms are all great and as described, plus having two bathrooms was good. The terrace is a fantastic bonus, with amazing views!

El apartamento es incluso mejor a como aparece en las fotos. La ubicación excelente. Queda cerca de todo y se puede ir caminando a diferentes puntos de interes como la sagrada familia y la marina o para los que prefieren el metro tiene cerca varias paradas de metro lo que resulta muy conveniente.  Lo recomendamos cien por ciento. Si volvemos a Barcelona definitivamente nos quedariamos nuevamente aqui.

We stayed here with 8 people for a fun weekend in Barcelona and this apartment was a great home base for us. The apartment is exactly what the pictures showed and Regina and Juan were great hosts. Location is a little bit out of the way if you want to be central but proximity to la Sagrada Familia was nice!

my family took a good holiday in Barcelona and took a rest at her house.
the location is good for almost famous place and can easily take a bus and taxi, too.
it is convenient to use transportation.
the house is large and comfortable for my family, 8 people.
4 rooms and two toilet and bathroom.
It was really good time for my family.
Quartier très agréable. Logement propre, agréable, mais très mal insonorisé, c'est dommage.

Regina was very hospitable. She gave us all the instructions and always helped when we needed any information. The apartments were very very cozy and comfortable. There was everything for convenient living. We had  wonderful time in Barcelona!
Good property for a larger group. Check-in and out was very easy. It was simple to get transport to explore the rest of the city. The balcony was a great bonus!
Sehr schöne und zentral gelegene Wohnung. Kommunikation mit der Gastgeberin Regina lief einwandfrei. Danke für den tollen Aufenthalt!
El apartamento es cómodo y está bien ubicado pero necesita una limpieza en profundidad.

Regina's apartment is ideal for up to 7 people, it has 4 separate bedrooms, a common place with a big dining table so that everyone can sit around, a small living room and terrace, which is again very nice to sit outside. Please note that one of the double beds is smaller than usual, so only recommended for one single person or a couple very much in love! The bathrooms were not very well equipped, there was no soap and only few toalet paper, but upon request Regina's staff brought us some. We did not use the kitchen that much. As we were a group of friends we did not like that all beds had double sheets. Unfortunately at checking in we had to wait approximately 1 hour for the lady with the keys, which was not a very good beginning. 
The location of the apartment is not very central, we did not use public transportation, so it is a 35 minutes walk from the center. The closest metro station we have used once is also 10 minutes walk away. But it was ok for us.
Todo bien salvo algunos detalles...que se irán solucionando con los demás huéspedes.gracias
Très bel appartement. Bien situé et conforme aux photos et indications. Accueil chaleureux même après 21h même si on a payé une extra taxe pour le retard. Belle adresse !!
Todo muy bien, el departamento muy confortable, buena ubicación.
Отличная квартира для большой компании!

Really nice Appartement ! The terrace is amazing and everything looks like on the pictures. Communication was no problem, check in on time & quick. The flat has everything you need (even a hairdryer, ironing board and so on). We were a group of friends with enough space and would  come back anytime.
테라스 전망이 좋습니다.
房间很大,足够7个人入住｡但是一个淋浴设施有问题｡花洒不能固定在支架上,只能用手拿着,这让我们有些困扰｡通过电话短信联系了房东,但是没有回应｡烘干机非常脏,清理了半天后也不能用｡附近就有超市可以买需要的物品｡距离圣家大教堂需要步行15分钟左右｡
Cute, clean, and pretty central. Walkable to Sagrada Familia (7 mins) and also to the beach (15 mins). We were 2 families of 4 and were very comfortable.

The apartment is lovely, in a good neighbourhood and suitable for a group of friends or family : ) It's in a good location, close to metro station and in a walkable distance to Sagrada Familia and they have some good local shops nearby on the way to Sagrada Familia and the balcony in the apartment is the best part! Also, the apartment basically have everything you needed! Me and my family enjoyed our stay!

The apartment was very clean and as described. We really enjoyed it. It's very spacious and the balcony is superb. The host was very nice and helpfull. The neighborhood is calm and there is a grocery store just in front of the apartment. A really nice place to stay in Barcelona !
Muy buena estancia para pasar unas vacaciones con los amigos
公寓的地理位置很好,有一个大露台,适合三五好友就着夜景小酌一下｡房间还算干净,但厨房及洗衣机需要好好擦洗一番｡卫生间一个淋浴头不能挂,得换新｡空调看着灰很大,也需要好好清洗一下｡入住需要另付2.25欧/人/天,这个其他家都没有过,要仔细阅读条款｡

The host had excellent communication with us and accommodated our early arrival. Very organized method of check in. The place was big and very clean. It. was accurate to the ad. Good Wi-Fi, ac, and water pressure in the apartment. The apartment is on the 6th floor of an apartment building  and has a nice view from the balcony. The unit is not central to many tourist  sights but it's about a mile from the beach and a 15 min walk to a nearby park that has some sights.

 While we were there, there was a chemical leak scare that the fire department showed up for and evacuated the building for a few hours. The host failed to reply when we contacted them about it. Nonethelss, we were allowed back in after a few hours and ended up enjoying the rest of our stay.
We had a great stay there. The apartment was clean and had a very nice balcony with enough place for 8 people to sit. The communication was fast and uncomplicated. Recommendation!

The flat is nicely decorated, very clean and with all necessary equipments.
There's a huge dining room connected to a nice balcony with a beautiful view on the Agbar Tower 
10 min walk to the Sagrada Familia, and 5 min to the Diagonal. 
Ideally located in city centre, and close to transportation.
Regina pays attention to potential remarks to improve her guests' experience and solve any issue they may encounter.
I recommand this flat and Regina without any reservation !
Great location and clean flat.

Es un excelente apartamento, limpio y decorado con buen gusto. Tiene todas las comodidades y ubicado en un excelente lugar. Hay conexiones a movilización y está cerca de lugares turísticos, muy recomendable

Nice apartment, Good location, Good Size, Very Clean Nice views of Torre Agbar. 
No hot water to shower. No response from host
Me han cobrado 32€ de tasa turística sin factura

The apartment was really nice for a group of seven - two families with teenagers. Location is perfect, not far from the Metro, right around Sagrada Familia.
Overall a good place to stay, bathrooms and sleeping rooms are fine, living room as well, kitchen equipment is a little "tired". But in the end we did not come to Barcelona to cook. We enjoyed our stay.
Conveniently located and clean. The kitchen may need to be updated but do you really need a kitchen when in Barcelona?

Great apartment. The size was perfect for a group of 8, and very clean on arrival. Ideal location for a first timer in Barcelona, with plenty of the main sights in walking distance or via local metro line. I'd highly recommend this place for anyone going with a big group to the city.
This is a great location. We would stay here again.

这是一座地理位置非常好的住处,离开圣家教堂步行只需要10分钟!离开地铁站也很近｡
入住非常简单,离开也非常方便｡住所非常干净｡

Super séjour! Je recommande vivement. L’appartement est grand, fonctionnel et il possède une terrasse incroyable! 
Les hôtes ont été très flexibles pour le check-in et check-out.

Wonderful apartment, pictures are very accurate. Very spacious with lots of seating areas. Balcony was a lovely touch. Air con and hot water worked with no problems and the flat was as clean as you could expect it to be. Hosts were lovely and quick to respond to everything. Highly recommend.

We had a great stay in Barcelona with our group of 7 (3couples+1single)
Room was perfect for us.
Very clean.
Great location.
We d definately recommend + consider same if we ever return.
A+++

We had a great stay in the apartment.  Very happy with the location, easy to walk or ride to restaurants, other neighborhoods, and attractions but (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication with hosts was quick and helpful.  Plenty of space for the seven adults in our group.  Favorite thing was the balcony adjacent to the living room.  Lots of light and air and such a fantastic place to hang out together in the morning and evening.  Would definitely recommend this place.

We enjoyed staying at Alexandra's flat! It was so spacious and it fit 10 people. We were welcomed by Anastasia who patiently waited for us to check in  at 1am due to flight delay. 

Communicating with Alexandra was great. She replied fast when I was updating her about the delay of our flight to BCN. She also helped me to book our taxi to the airport. 

Thanks for having us Alexandra! I would definitely recommend this place and would book her other properties next time we visit Barcelona. :)

We were two families of 4 traveling to Barcelona. The apartment is great.  It is very clean, with two full bathrooms and a great balcony. It is located in a safe area, a bit remote from the action (beach, gothic, etc). Living room was a bit small for a group of 8, but on the other hand, we had both the dining room and the balcony beside it, so it was fine. Overall a great experience.
Centrally located in Barcelona around 20-25 min by foot from Plaça de Catalunya. Spacious apartment ideal for 8 guests including kids. We really enjoyed our stay:-)
A very good experience. Good location. I warmly recommand
Great apartment, nice and spacious living area and the balcony is a big plus! Only an 8 min walk to the metro station

L'appartement est confortable pour 8 personnes et il est très bien situé. La clim fonctionne très bien et heureusement car il fait très chaud. Alexandra et Juan sont des hôtes réactifs ce qui est une réelle plus value.

Nous étions un groupe d'amies venues à Barcelone pour un week-end. L'appartement est vraiment agréable pour un grand groupe, il y a assez de places pour tout le monde. Et les 2 salles de bain sont vraiment utiles pour un groupe de 8 filles. Nous avons pu profiter de la terrasse. L'appartement était conforme à ce que nous attentions, nous ne sommes pas déçues du voyage. Nous recommandons sans aucune hésitation.

Appartement extrêmement bien placé, correspond entièrement à la description, la wifi et la climatisation marchent à merveille (pas de climatisation direct dans les chambres, mais facile à aérer à partir des couloirs et pièces communes qui sont bien climatisées). Propre et sécurisé.

Great place and location. 
Internet is surprisingly fast!
Alexandra is very responsive and helpful. 
Would stay again.
Wonderful stay for our group of 8 friends. Plenty of space, very clean, wonderful location. Great communication! Thank you.

A great place to spend some time in wonderful Barcelona!
Very clean place, very well organised, good location close to public transport and places of interest.  Also great value for money.
Das komplette Geschirr war dreckig, die Toilette hat permanent gestunken obwohl Mann es nicht genutz hat , Bettwäsche sollten auch nach jedem Gast gewechselt werden , es richte nach Schweiß.
Appartement agréable. Bien placé. A proximité de la Sagrada Familia.
Great hosts and communication! In the days prior to our stay, we had major problems with our air bnb in Barcelona, but Alexandra’s place was so easy to book last minute and was everything we wanted!!

The house is good and in a good position, I saw a great availability from ours host. Near there were many supermarkets and two important underground stations (of L1 and L2 lines).  Another aspect is the general kindness of the people of the area.

This appartment is very nice. It has the dish-washing maschine and the dryer,which reduces much burden of housework. The traffic condition is very convenient. You can even walk to Sagrada Familia within 20 mins. The host is very kind. She can always  reply your message very fast. We spent a good time here in Barcelona.

The flat is large and well located. Perfect for two families with 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms plus generous living areas.
The kitchen was a bit grubby though.

appartement parfaitement placé. Taxe de séjour de 5 euros par personne mais c'était bien mentionné dans l'annonce. Très jolie appartement , chambre confortable. Seul bémol le lave vaisselle de marchait pas et étant 7 dans l'appartement c'était un peu pénalisant pour manger sur place. sinon parfait

Ubcación fácil de aceder(5min de Estación de Nord) y cerca de la Sagrada Famila, un piso muy ampilo y con buena vista a Torre Glóries desde la terraza.

일단 주변부에 적절한 위치에 지하철역들이 있구요. 북역이랑 걸어서 5분 거리예요. 아파트는 굉장히 넓은 편이고 베란다에서 영광의 탑이 바로 보여서 전망도 좋습니다!

Alexandra’s apartment was lovely and clean, with enough space for the 8 of us to cook and eat. It’s a 20min walk from La Sagrada Família and close to a few metro stations. Would possibly recommend staying closer to the centre but the metro was extremely easy to use! Thank you!
Perfect !

A great location to see all of Barcelona. Metro is only a few minutes walk, Sagrada Familia is within walking distance, supermarkets over the road and a great pool and beer bar next door. Great place to stay to see an amazing city.

summary: Welcome if you want to stay at a cozy flat with local experience.:) It is in the center of Istanbul.The neighborhood is safe and close to attractions.Transportation is easy. I will help you always.

host.host_about:
I live alone in Taksim area and i work at bar.
I like meet new friends from all of the world.
I like to Travel a lot ofcourse if i have free time :) East Asia , Sun , Sea , Sand , Movie  :)

reviews.comments:
I greatly appreciated both the location of the place (very central) and the appartment per se (clean and comfortable, with a very cosy room and with Wi-Fi). 

Nihat was perfect host, quite welcoming and helpful about places to go (or avoid) and things to do in town. 

Hosça kal!
Nice room in a flat well located. Nihat is very nce and helpful. Good experience.

We had a fantastic stay in this charming apartment. The location was perfect and Nihat welcomed us even when we made a late reservation and arrived early. He works at a bar no far from there- a great place to have a drink after seeing the sites! I highly recommend this place!

The flat is clean and and very good located, 3 minutes walk to Taksim Square. The bedroom is quiet at night, even though there is a crowded area next to the flat. Nihat was always extremely quick in answering our emails and let us feel comfortable. He is really kind and discrete, we met him few times cause he works in the evening.
Nihat went out of his way to accommodate our very early arrival and some unforeseeable challenges.  A great host!
Nice place and host, very good location :)
Everything was great about the room and the location.

The stay at Nihat's place was really pleasant. The apartment is very clean and confortable, and located in a very vibrant and animated neighborhood with many restaurants, cafes, bars, shops just nearby. Just a 5 min walk to the Taksim Metro station makes it easy to access any other parts of the city pretty quickly. Nihat was also a great and welcoming host. We totally recommend this place for your stay in Istanbul, especially if you want to experience the local life to the fullest !
The host canceled this reservation 30 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I stayed at Nihat's for a week. It was exactly as the pics, very nice room. A little bit cold but he offers heating and AC. The apt is cozy and central, close to nice restaurants and bars. Have in mind is on the 4th fl no elevator. Nihat is a very easygoing guy who's open to help with any question or tip about the city. Totally recommend! thanks Nihat!
Nihat is a very nice host, he is very helpful and creates an agreeable atmosphere inside the flat. Thank you :)
Nice cozy place very close to Taksim Square. Nihat is helpful and informative.
nice apartment with good location. the room was clean and neat. Nihat was helpful and supportive. totally recommend his accommodation

Nihat is a very friendly host and makes you really feel comfortable. I have had a great stay and recommend it to anyone who wants to stay very central (Cihangir), the hip and modern part of the city with cozy venues and great cafes just a 3min walk. The place is very close to Taksim Square, etc...everything as described in the prior conments. I will definitely come again! Cheers vural

I totally recommend this place. Great experience staying at Nihat’s apartment. To start with, Nihat is a wonderful friendly person who I was happy to meet. He was very friendly at house, and we had the chance to spend time together outside. Staying with him reflects the true meaning of this website, which is living as a local with a local person. Thank you Nihat. 
Regarding the apartment, it is exactly as described. The room is nice and bed is comfortable. It was clean and well prepared for us. 
Regarding the neighborhood, it is very close to Taksim square and Istiklal Street with few minutes walk. As normal as it is in Istanbul, there is a short hill you need to walk to get to the square, which was totally fine with us. 

In general, next time I visit Istanbul I would first check the availability with Nihat before searching others.

Nihat was an amazing host. He picked me up from the bus stop, gave me some great tips on what to do in Istanbul and just an all round great guy. If you're looking for somewhere close to Taksim then Nihat's place is great. Highly recommend him! Thanks Nihat.

Nihat is so hospitable person. Me and My boyfriend stayed 6 days in Nihat's place and everything was perfect. Nihat is so tactful person despite he was working so hard, he all the time asked us 'do we need anything?' he was so clean and his house is exactly same with the pictures.
I'm highly recommend his place! 
thank you Nihat!
Very helping and welcoming host. Perfect location for a few days in Istanbul.

Nihat was very nice, polite and very helpful to us. He let us drop our baggages off in the morning and left them for a little longer when we checked out. The location is great as it is near Taksim Square. There are local grocery shops nearby if you want to buy some food or snacks.

Nihat is very nice host, and came to wait for me in the shuttle bus station near Taksim squre, His house is very convenient for travel. He is very experirenced and warm host, the room super clean and warm, and house has everything, next time i will choose his house again in istanbul. miss you nihat. see you next time.
Was great to stay in Nihat 's place.

这个住宿离Taksim广场和独立大街很近,需要走一小段路就到了｡住址在一片住宅区的三楼,楼下是一个慈善组织为那些流浪汉准备一些吃的东西｡周围的配套也很方便,有超市,小卖部和卖水果的地方,土耳其的水果很便宜,如果到了就多买一点｡住宿是一个两室一厅一卫一厨的套房,这个房间是主卧,然后还有一个小卧室｡Nihat是在附近酒店上班的,他把两间房间都出租出去,如果都住满的话,他就睡在沙发里｡房东英文沟通没问题,和Nihat聊了很多土耳其大选的事情,也很热情,用厨房也OK｡如果你有带地图,并且英文没问题的话,他会介绍你一些旅游的地方｡我们一共住了四晚,对了从IST机场到这里就直接坐地铁到Taksim,如果从亚洲机场的话,也可以坐大巴到Taksim,到了之后,按照 (Hidden by Airbnb) maps走过来就好了｡其实土耳其的住宿很多,酒店非常多,但个人觉得酒店都是千篇一律,高档或是不高档,Airbnb提供的是不那么一次性的旅游体验,酒店没啥温度｡伊斯坦布尔也挺好,建议大家来之前,多看一些当地的历史,拜占庭或者奥斯曼土耳其的书,这样的话,逛到那些教堂和清真寺大概知道咋会事｡购物的话,我推荐个商场,挺大的,当时我们正值里拉贬值和开斋节活动,所以购物还挺便宜的(Istinye Park Shopping Center)｡好像食住行游购娱都说的差不多了｡祝你们土耳其旅游愉快!
Nihat est sympa et serviable

Fabulous! La localización es extraordinaria. Más si estarás pocos días en Estambul. Nihat es un excelente host y me asistió en todo lo que necesité. Amé Estambul y amé mi estadía en su casa. La cama es cómoda, el baño un poco pequeño para gente grande, pero para mi estaba bien. Disfrute muchísimo las conversaciones con Nihat y le deseo todo lo mejor en sus proyectos futuros. El cuarto es fresco y se mantiene así todo el día. Si vuelvo a Estambul me quedaré con Nihat! Gracias mil.

Nihat is a perfect host : he makes you feel comfortable and he thinks about every detail to make you spend a good time.
He is a very nice and open minded person !
The house is cosy and perfectly clean. 
We had a really good time in Istanbul thanks to Nihat. 
We recommend him 300% !
탁심광장에서 걸어서 5~6분정도로 가깝고 방도 정말 깨끗하고 호스트도 정말 친절했습니다

Nihat was great, responding for the messages quick. He helped us to get where we needed, advised us places to go. The apartment was very nice and tidy, room had big wardrobe space, bed was very comfy. It was about 5mins walking distance from taksim square where variety of restaurants and shops were located. Will defenitely advise to stay at his place. Thank you Nihat.
Nihad, friends, family, and his place are super lovely. I felt like I had a big brother in Istanbul. Host highly recommended.

Nihat is a great host. His place is located  at a strategic location where you can walk to every hot spot in Istanbul. Nihat was extremely helpful by giving me direction and insightful tips. Nihat was always there when I asked him to provide electric plugs as most of my chargers are from North America. Will come again, I strongly recommend Nihat’s place.
The location is great. The street is pretty quiet but several minutes walk to Taksim. Nihat is really caring and he helped me call taxi super early in the morning. Thank you Nihat.
Nihat es muy atento, buen consejero, Conoce muy bien la ciudad y te guía bien para cualquier lugar. El alojamiento es ideal para quien desee ahorrar algo de dinero.

name: Serene luxury in Harlem
summary: Lovely 1500sqft gem located in Central Harlem close to Columbia University. Gorgeous Pre-war flat with 6ft ceilings, 2 fireplaces, and laundry in the unit. Located in a safe, friendly building and close to major restaurants and subway lines.
description: Lovely 1500sqft gem located in Central Harlem close to Columbia University. Gorgeous Pre-war flat with 6ft ceilings, 2 fireplaces, and laundry in the unit. Located in a safe, friendly building and close to major restaurants and subway lines. Very short walking distance to restaurants, bars, supermarket, pharmacy, cafes, and movie theaters. Only 10 minute walk to Columbia University. Just a few short blocks to the A-B-C-D-2-3 subway lines. A-D-2-3 are express trains. Lots of bus lines nearby, as well.
neighborhood_overview: Very short walking distance to restaurants, bars, supermarket, pharmacy, cafes, and movie theaters. Only 10 minute walk to Columbia University.
transit: Just a few short blocks to the A-B-C-D-2-3 subway lines. A-D-2-3 are express trains. Lots of bus lines nearby, as well.
house_rules: Quiet time after 10pm and keep common areas tidy.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments:
Erika was extremely friendly, kind, and caring while I stayed there. She made me feel at home! She knows the area very well and can provide information about things to do and places to eat in the neighborhood.

The area is also quite safe and it is not uncommon to hear kids playing outside at 9 pm or later.

The apartment is a few minutes walk from a good-sized grocery store, numerous restaurants, multiple subway stations, and Central Park, making it an ideal place to stay while visiting.

I stayed with Erica for 2 weeks and it was great! When I arrived at Erica's I was greeted by her delightful son as she was sunning it up on a beautiful beach! I was free to do what I want and when I want. The room was spotless and so comfy - I felt right at home. Amazing stay, I would definitely recommend staying here.

True to the description, Erika's place is an oasis of serenity in the city. Erika was a great host and really extended herself to make sure I was comfortable and felt welcome. Her apartment is absolutely lovely, spacious, very clean and tidy, as is the room. The apartment is just a few steps away from subway stations, restaurants and a great grocery store. Staying with Erika and her son was a wonderful experience; they are both lovely people. I had a great stay and would highly recommend.

Also, Erica makes a mean cup of Italian coffee.  If you stay with her, don't miss it!

Erika is a very good hostess, very friendly and polite.
His house is cozy and clean.
The area is quiet and close to subway.
Definitely the best choice for a nice stay in NY!

I stayed with Erika and Brandon for 5 months and I had the most amazing experience of my life. I would strongly suggest staying with them for long or short visits. The apartment was always clean and larger than the photos made it look. Erika helped me sort any problems that I had throughout my stay and with Brandon there, there was never a dull moment. I have made friends for life and hope to see them again soon.

Erika's stylish and welcoming Harlem home was the perfect place for me while I was transitioning out of New York. Erika is an awesome host (thank you again for the great conversation and the coffee), her house is a 5 minute walk to the ABCD trains, and there are so many great places to visit in her neighborhood. I stayed with Erika for 8 days, and my stay was exactly what I needed: a safe, quiet place to sleep that is not too far away from my job/school and close to public transportation. Thank you again Erika!

Words fail to adequately describe how amazing Erika is. Not only was her apartment and the room amazing, but Erika went above and beyond making me feel at ease and welcomed. She made a nice breakfast and killer coffee, and she even woke up before sunrise just to ensure I didn't sleep through my alarm for an early flight! 

Beyond being a great host,  Erika is one of the most honest and thoughtful people I've ever had the fortune of meeting. I will certainly be visiting, if not staying with, her the next time I'm in NY!

Erika's place is very well located in the vibrant Harlem, close to public transport, nice restaurants and coffee shops.
The house is actually bigger than it look in the pictures and Erika and her son Brandon made everything to make my stay pleasant. I would definitely recommend!
I had a truly wonderful stay! Erika is a great host, she was so kind and gracious and incredibly helpful. I can’t say enough good things about Erika and her home!

I had the privilege to stay with Erika for a whole semester and I can only say that this amazing experience would have never been the same without her. She is the warmest and most understanding person I know She is always there for you and really makes you feel like you're at home.
