Thank you for your understanding. House is close to literally everything, Metro stations (Green and Yellow line) and buses (night buses too). About Parking: in t
transit: House is close to literally everything, Metro stations (Green and Yellow line) and buses (night buses too). About Parking: in the centre is very expensive. There are free parking spaces further out (like near metro Bogatell area) but you park at your own risk and there is no security... Here are a few of the cheapest parkings near the flat (keeping in mind some of the more publicised Parking garages can charge up to 39 euro 24 hours).  Garaje Atarazanas   Parking Garage · 900.0 m Address: C/ Portal de Santa Madrona, (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) rcelona Phone: + (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) euro/ 24 hours Parking Agusman Parking Lot 800.0 m · Carrer de Josep Anselm Clavé, (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) euro/ 24 hours
access: Bathroom - Shower - Kitchen Smoking is NOT allowed inside the room, it's strictly forbidden. If you like, you can smoke but at the kitchen's balcony, again NOT inside the room please. Thank you for your understanding.
house_rules: - Keep noise levels down and after 21:00 there is a no noise policy - Please throw your garbage in the street after 20:00 - Smoking is allowed on the terrace but not inside - Bathroom and shower are shared with other guests in the house and the housekeeper/cleaning lady cleans both every day. - No friends or extra guests that have not been notified of can enter the flat - Late check in fee payable ONLY in cash at the check in is 20 euro from 21:00 - 23:00 and 40 euro from 23:00 till late... - It's very important to arrange your check-in time as soon as possible and to communicate the flight number/code. - Children are counted as an extra person please include them when booking - Keys : Getting keys cut in Barcelona can be expensive. We understand accidents happen, but should they get lost or you forget to give them back at the end of your stay, you will be charged 50€ to replace them.  -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

host.host_about:
I've been living here for most of my life, so I know the city very well. I'm a full time host and I enjoy giving people great experiences and helping them to make the most of this fantastic city.

I'm an actor, currently studying and working on short films and theatre productions. When I'm not working, I enjoy spending time with my amazing daughter, giving her the best and most enriching experiences possible.

I'm naturally full of energy and I love to meet new people. As your host, I will ensure you have a comfortable and pleasant stay in Barcelona, while helping you to find the best places and see the best things the city has to offer.

reviews.comments: Magnifique cadre a deux pas de la rambla
very nice room in best location

En la imagen la habitación parece bastante más espaciosa de lo que realmente es. Sin embargo Flo, al vernos llegar con niños, fue muy amable con nosotros y nos ofreció un lugar más cómodo y grande. Nos dio sugerencias sobre la ciudad y parques para llevar a los niños, ¡que fueron muy buenas! El departamento está EXCELENTEMENTE UBICADO. El baño estaba en perfectas condiciones de limpieza y mantenimiento. Considero que la habitación podría estar mucho más limpia y mejor mantenida (como sí parece en las imágenes).

Nous avons dormi 2 nuits non consécutives et avons eu 2chambres différentes,  elles sont très chouettes,  la literie est confortable,  l'appartement est très plaisant. Notre petit de 22 mois a très très apprécié,  pas facile de monter les escaliers avec lui, la poussette et2 valises mais c'est juste 10 min de sport ;-). Flo est très accueillant, très sympa et son ami également. Le quartier est très très vivant mais l'appartement est plutôt calme finalement. La pizza est une tuerie !

Suer flat! really nice and comfortable.
At the beginning of the Ramblas..position perfect!
Flo is very helpful and communicative!
Enjoy It

Nice host we didn't actually saw him only the maid, very well located. Nothing much to say, a little bit darky but it's not meant to stay inside for a long time. Nice and clean.  A bit smaller than it looks on the picture.
Thanks

Flo est très accueillant et l'appartement est très bien situé, la chambre parait plus grande en photo mais pour des vacances cela reste suffisant. 
Pour une première expérience airbnb tout s'est bien passé. 
La personne s'occupant du ménage de l'appartement est adorable.

The location was great and Flo communicated with us directly until the hour of our arrival, and we let him know the exact time we would be arriving , and we communicated along the way when our flight was delayed. But once we arrived in Barcelona, he stopped communicating and we waited for him for over 45 minutes on the street with our luggage. He stopped answering repeated messages and was not nearly as apologetic as he should have been after making us wait outside for almost an hour.

Flo was a very nice and inviting guy. We didn't get to spend much time with him, but he made sure we found the apartment and got situated in our room.

The apartment is communal, and quite bohemian. Photographs of gurus and flower child murals decorate the walls. The street seemed to be plucked right out of Amsterdam. Odors abound. 

The beds are a bit like military cots, and in the summer when we visited, we were hugging our small electric fan whenever we were in the room. If you're adventurous and planning to trek for most of your trip, this probably won't be an issue for you.

The hike up a winding staircase to the room might be an issue for some visitors--we were traveling with our three-year-old and our return to our room after long days under the summer sun made us dream of an elevator.
By the map, the apartment looked like a quick jaunt to the beach, but in reality it was more like a 20 minute walk. I was quite surprised by how expansive Barcelona is. There is plenty of life on the avenues below--a playground for children is located in the middle of a small plaza that offers a number of vegetarian restaurants and bars.

Access to La Rambla might be the biggest benefit of this location. It's about a one minute walk to the crowded thoroughfare, and that means you have immediate access to Barcelona's metro, as well as the airport shuttles.

Another minor perk worth mentioning: the communal kitchen was stocked with cereals, which I imagine would provide a quick meal to the ultra-budgeted backpacker. It helped us out when wrangling with our picky son, still hungry after a halfhearted pass at tapas and paella.

So anyway, Flo's place I think would be best suited to adventurous backpackers and young students, but the price certainly makes it worth considering for small families on a shoestring budget. If you can live without some creature comforts, you'll be happy have this as a crash and launch pad, sweating out the night to the lively ambience of bustling Barcelona below. Molt autèntic!
Great location to the main areas in the Gothic Quarter. Good location for groups of 4.

Very central located, just around the corner of the Ramblas, with plenty of things to eat and to do close by - but nevertheless quiet as the windows are to the courtyard. Great value for having a central place to sleep (and sleep only).
Good communication with the host and everything went smooth.

Overall the stay was decent minus a few things. The place is a small room located in an apartment complex on the second floor (note: 3 flights of stairs to climb). It has a great, central location, but it feels smaller than what the pictures present and can get pretty cramped with luggages on the floor. The place is mostly clean. With only one desk fan, it can get pretty hot in the summer (mid-July). One of the beds had a overly soft, spongy mattress that was kind of difficult to sleep in, but we managed okay. This is a very minimal room (especially for three people), good for travellers trying to save money without a cheaper option. The Wi-Fi didn't work very well (and often not-at-all).

Someone was waiting to let us in and show us round as soon as we turned up. The room was sweet and characterful in a fairly quiet building in a great location surrounded by bars and restaurants, making it excellent value for money!
Die Organisation der Zimmerübergabe war tipptopp, das Zimmer jedoch sehr dunkel und sehr heiss und die Gegend in der Nacht sehr unheimlich.
Great space centrally located within the city.  Flo was a great host and the overall experience will be bringing me back to Barcelona in future.
Agradable y súper céntrico

Very central room, everything you need within 10 min walk. 
A little too small for 3 persons, otherwise a really nice stay.

Flo was very proactive with messaging me before our arrival. Patrick checked us in and was great. Had a little miscommunication about how to get into the building, but we didn't have an international calling plan, so our fault. Room was cozy but cute and clean. LOVE the location!!! Close to main square, hop on hop off bus, las rambles, bus to cruise lines.
Only downfall...if you cannot walk up 68 steps with your luggage, then this is not the place for you.
l'appartement ete tres aggreable avec le ventilateur dans la cuisine. je pouvez bien faire a manger. Et le caffee espress bialetti de Flo je bien aimez.

Logement très bien situé et agréable. On partage la cuisine, les WC et la douche avec deux autres chambres. La chambre est petite, trop peu de rangement et difficulté majeure pour sécher les serviettes de bain et de plage.

Flo apartment is ideal for some young people who want to enjoy the artistic and magic atmosphere of barcelona!! Our room is very lottle but it was for three and we use it in four (and we survived!!). Flo suggested us some beautiful pleaces, also for night ;)
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

A perfect place for those who want to live in the center of the city with an easy access to everything. The room is small but clean. And if you need it only to stay there at night, that's a good place at a reasonable price. Also it is rather hot there, but show me a room in Barcelona that wouldn't be hot in the summer :) (and it has a fan by the way)

We didn't meet Flo in person as our flight was unfortunately delayed and so we arrived late at night. Nevertheless Flo organised to hand out the keys by his mother who is a really nice person. We enjoyed our stay in the quiet and charming flat in the middle of the Barri Gòtic.
Everything was fine. The bedroom was small but very silent, the cleaning lady was super nice and welcomed us on time. The apartment is super central.
El lugar no es igual a las fotos y la zona no es segura

Vi havde en fantastisk weekend i Barcelona. Værelset ligger meget centralt. Der var håndklæder og sengetøj, pænt og nydeligt. Bad og wc på gangen, pænt og rent. Flo bød os velkommen, viste rundt mm. Flo spurgte hvad vi ville se i byen, kom med forslag til andre ting, til gode billige spisesteder/bar. Der var gode enkel senge på værelset.
Perfekt måde at bo på, når man kommer for at se byen, og bare skal have er sted og sove.

GuestHouse typiquement indienne, comme à Delhi ! Dommage que ce ne soit pas des roupies.
Bon emplacement toute fois

Good location, really close to Las Ramblas and lots of restaurants and easy to get to other attractions from there. Cleaning lady was lovely, and very friendly and helpful whenever I ran into her at the apartment.

As others have mentioned, the photos are very deceptive. In reality, the room is like half the size of what the photos implies. And not nearly as light either. The room is poorly ventilated, so quickly becomes musky, when the door and window are shut. The room has a small fan to try and mitigate this, but if the fan is off for any length of time, room quickly becomes musky. Wifi doesn't really work in the room either; have to go into kitchen to get the signal.

Quite a noisy apartment too. Host's children were around, and making noise often. I.e. One night, two of them were running skateboards and scooters down the tiled corridor at 10 o'clock at night. You could hear the thunderous noise through the whole apartment (and I imagine on the floor below too). So, not ideal if you want to get an early night's sleep and hit the tourist sites very early. I think this room would be best suited to those looking to party it up in Barcelona, and spend very little time at the accommodation.
Nice room with everything we needed. Good welcome. Very nice and clean location close to the ramblas, metros and beach. Wifi connection was very poor in oud bedroom, but strong in the kitchen.
房间较小,临时住一晚尚可

Très bon séjour et super accueil :
L'appartement est très bien situé et il est silencieux. 
La chambre est petite (comme sur la photo) mais les lits sont confortables.
Et Flo s'est mis en 4 pour gérer notre arrivée malgré un net décalage dû à l'annulation de notre vol.

Grand Logement avec plusieurs chambres. La nôtre était adéquate pour 2 personnes. Les matelas  pourraient être plus confortables. Le Wi-Fi ne rentrait pas dans la chambre. Difficulté à contacter l'hôte, lors de notre arrivée. Accueil courtois mais rapide. Sinon, Flo était plutôt sympathique. Rien à critiquer sur l'emplacement de l'appartement,  c'était juste parfait! À 1 minute de La Ramblas et en plein coeur de tous les principaux attraits.

The host was very nice and checked in to make sure we settled in well. He also provided a map and showed us the best places. A big warning though, if you're looking for a quiet place to go home to after site seeing, this is not the place. Nothing against the host, it was just the area that's right in the center of everything so it's so loud. The apartment downstairs had a huge party and the whole place was shaking until almost 1 in the morning. There is a window in the room right in the courtyard so everyone talking in other apartments echoes. If noise is not a concern, then this is a great place. It's right in the heart of a crazy shopping area and a 15 minute walk to the beach. Warning wifi and cell service is patchy, the kitchen is really the only place it works in.

The location is just AWESOME ! If you are traveling with friends and want to be in the center of everything then it's the place to stay. However, we didn't have internet in the room, only in the kitchen, the toilet was smelly and the room is much smaller than looks. 
Two of us didn't have blankets but empty bed sheets and it was cold at night. The people sharing the flat were very noisy and someone was doing some reconstruction in the room at night. 
One of the beds has a very soft foam mattress which can be a big deal if you have back problems like me. 
Overall it's a cheap central place, good for low budget - youngsters' travel. 
Would not advise to take the room if you are with your family.
Great and easy place to stay, just like the advert. We didnt need anything else and didnt have any problems.

This place is good, it is exactly what you pay for. It has shared bathroom and toilet facilities but they are clean. The whole place has quite a bohemian feel to it. Probably the smallest place I have ever slept in but was perfect for what my friends and I were there for, a place to sleep and wash while in Barcelona for the weekend.  Would recommend to anyone on a budget.

Positives: fabulous location, super sweet host, wifi was ok, bathroom and shower were clean. Negatives: Room is significantly smaller than pictures let on. We had to take a heater from the hallway and put it in our room to stay warm at night. Freezer was dirty.
the house is beautiful and cute!we have a good time live here!

Abbiamo scelto questo appartamento perché l'ubicazione era ottima e in effetti si è rivelata tale ! Non si può dire lo stesso per quanto riguarda le comodità dei servizi !!!! L'annuncio descriveva bagno privato e invece ci siamo ritrovate con un bagno molto piccolo ed indico per altre 3 camere !! Il risultato è stato lunghe attese per la doccia ed acqua congelata ! Per concludere in bellezza Wi-Fi non funzionante nelle camere

The location is in the lively part of Barcelona. There are many shops and restaurants to venture to. The public transit is a 5 minute walk away making it easy to access all over the city. The apartment is a great fit for me and friend. We slept comfortably in our rooms. The room can be noisy as the window faces the courtyard and can hear the neighbors daily activities but can easily be tuned out. Access to use the kitchen which is well equipped. Overall, it was a great stay in a perfect location. Would greatly recommend!

Perfect location, close to almost every destination we planned to go, incl flamingo, marine museum, the statue, the market, several squares...

The flat is clean and cozy with everything we needed, although it is being shared. The communication was clear, when we arrived our host wasn't home, but the maid gave us very informative guidance on the apartment which is cool. Will come again if we return Barcelona.
Great room for travellers on a budget. Amazing location, close to many attractions and restaurants.
Petite chambre pour 3 qui a répondu à nos besoins pour une nuit à Barcelone où nous avons très bien dormi en toute simplicité.

I lived in several places in Barcelona, despite the small room apartment Flo is
the climate , very clean and you can fell well, don't be afraid of the Rules :) sounds very rigorously but it is not
Logement bien placė

Flo's accommodation is a basic and clean place to stay.
It's in the center of the old Barcelona, very nice restaurants and bars around the corner and even a bio breakfast place apposite of the apartment.

flo's place is located in a great busy spot of barcelona. so much life and energy just steps outside of the building. the room was smaller than expected but great value for what you pay for and also well decorated.
This place was close to everything! It is a 5 minute walk to El Born and about 90 seconds to Las Ramblas. Flo was spectacular and checked in on us through out our stay.
Very good location close to Las Ramblas. Would recommend.
Great room, really accurate to the listing. Flo is really friendly and helpful and the apartment is in a very central location! Great stay
Great place, easy to check in and out, very responsive
Flo was great and very accommodating! The place had a great location, walking distance to most everything or you can take the nearby metro to some of the further locations. We enjoyed our stay here!

Nice place in a great location! They were very gracious and accommodating for our late arrival. The room was a bit smaller than expected from the photos, but overall we had a very good experience staying here.

Great place in a perfect location, everything is near (metro, restaurant, the beach, ramblas)

Muy recomendado
Thanks Flo, Anu, and Cathy! Really enjoyed our stay. Your place was well equipped, well located and we enjoyed our stay. :)

Chouette appart chez Flo et super bien placé! Notre chambre donnait sur une cour intérieur et les bruits de la rue n'arrivaient pas jusqu'à nous. Du coup si vos voisins de chambré sont respectueux du confort de chacun vous passez des nuits super tranquilles en étant en plein quartier vivant. Notre chambre correspondait bien au descriptif et l'accueil a pu se faire tard même si notre avion est arrivé avec une heure de retard. La cuisine n'est pas très grande, il faut bien s'organiser pour s'en servir chacun son tour.

Unfortunately,  we only stayed for one night. However,  the apartment is centrally located,  check in/out was quick and easy and the room  was clean and had everything we needed. There are a few stairs to get to the apartment and no elevator so consider packing light! 
Overall,  a great place to stay!

The location was fantastic! However, you do get what you pay for - one of the beds in the triple room was significantly less comfortable than the other two, and we may have even had a few bedbug bites (still unsure if they were bedbugs or another insect, but we woke up with bites). However, it's a great value for where it is located, and Flo was great at communicating and accommodating for our late flight arrival.

The room is small but the flat is large and in an unbeatable location! 30 seconds from la Rambla and about 5-10 min walking to gotico. The place has a little kitchen and a shared bathroom/shower, which was no problem at all. The other guests were respectful and amarilini, who checked us in, was also lovely. Recomendable 100%!
Muy buen recibimiento y atención, el barrio hermoso cerca de todo! Sólo tener en cuenta que son 3 pisos por escalera pero valen la pena el lugar!

Good communication prior to arrival. Lovely, quirky place right in the heart of Barcelona. Location perfect - round the corner from La Rambla. Shared kitchen with facilities and the option to store/make food. 

Only negative - Fairly noisy from the bedroom but that can't be helped due to the central location. And 3rd bed wasn't the most comfortable so maybe best for 2 people, but for a short stay it's fine
We got to check in very early which was very nice of them ! love love love the neighbourhood !! thanks again for everything
Cozy and nice room in center od the Barcelona, just next street to Rambla. Ann and Flo were great hosts.
La ubicación es excelente pero la limpieza de la habitación y del baño deja mucho que desear.
Easy check-in, good communication and central location.  Room is a little small but as expected.  Thanks!
Accueil facilité par une très bonne communication.Appartement sympa pour visiter Barcelone et y séjourner quelques jours.

De kamer (van 3 personen) is kleiner dan ze lijkt op de foto's.
Er werd amper gekuist waardoor de vloeren vuil waren. Er was ook geen deftige verluchting mogelijk omdat ons raam uitkwam op een overdekte koer.
Lovely home in the most convenient location! Very happy with my stay and the host!

The location could not have been more perfect. Close to everything one could need. Wonderful Paella at La Fonda...really the best.  Room is very small, but all we needed were beds to sleep afterpng days of adventuring.  No air conditioning and very hot, but our room did have a fam which we were very thankful for. Great host

It's a great place to stay! Very good located, silent and clean. The room is a little bit small and quite warm, enough for a few days in Barcelona though. We are very happy about our choise. Can recommend!

Good Location. Ended up Being a nightmare. Went to Bed at 11 pm and Woke up at 2 am with my Body covered in Bug Bites. Turned the light on and found my bed infested with Bedbugs! Non of the 3 of us was able to go back to sleep or back into the room. My worst nightmare came true.
Great place to stay, well-run and professional. It gets quite hot at night, but the fan is helpful.

The location was great for what we wanted to do with our weekend, and the space was overall well-maintained. The housekeeper, Kathy, was very nice during check-in. However, I  was disappointed in the level of communication with the host during the actual stay, and as international students we were relying on wifi, which didn't work at all. I understand that technology sometimes does not work, but the host were barely reachable and did not seem to take our concern seriously. We never actually met our host.
It is central and close by shops and restaurants. We didn't have wifi until the last day. Bathroom and toilet are cleaned everyday.

Jeg vil ikke anbefale dette sted til nogen - værelset og hele lejligheden er i meget ringe forfatning. Beliggenheden er fantastisk men det opvejer ikke lugten i lejligheden og den dårlig standard værelset har desværre.

Super close walking distance to just about everything. Apartment is in a really central location. There is a lot to do and see all around you. The Old Town is two floors lower. Exit the door and stay in the Old Town - Bars, Restaurants, Stores. Metro stops are 5 minutes away, the beach is a 15-minute walk away.
Sleeping is perfect because the room is very quiet. The two beds were perfectly comfortable mattresses, but one was a little sleepy. But that did not disturb me.
The shower is perfect. Clean, neat.
The kitchen is well-equipped, everything you need to cook for dinner or breakfast.
I suggest, especially if you came to Barcelona to enjoy the city, would be in the very center.
Thank you very much, I would definitely again choose to stay here when I'm at Barcelona.
距离市中心很近｡
good location, very near to any place

Great location, right in the heart of the city! The room was smaller than in the pictures, with a weird smell, but other than that, spotless clean and extremely artistically overall! Baptiste’s greeting was very friendly and fun, Flo gave us some valuable tips & tricks for drinks and meals and Kathy the most lovely lady you can ever meet! Totally recommended, especially for young in heart people, unpretentious and unconventional! I would gladly return! :)
Great location and accessibility to great attractions.
Para descansar estuvo bien la habitación y con buena ubicación

Very well situated flat in the center of Barcelona...you can visit every thing by foot from there in the most lively aera. The flat is nice and clean and represents a very good quality price to visit Barcelona.
Nice place to stay if you are not too uptite about the place.. its quite Spanish apartment very easy and accessible to all important places and very reasonable price.

We had an issue with check-in which was resolved quickly but apart from that a lovely apartment, located in the heart of Barcelona! Perfect for those exploring the city on a budget. Would recommend and stay again if we return to Barcelona...
The location and the bedrooms layout and secure apartment.
No show by host's representative to let us in...We were left without a place to stay late at nite and had to find another place.....not a good thing.

L’appartement est parfaitement situé, à quelques mètres de la Rambla. Favorable pour un groupe d’amis, mais personnellement je déconseille aux familles. 
Le manque de propreté est le gros point noir de cet appartement, un sérieux coup de balai s’impose !

So Barcelona is an expensive city, so when you see a good deal you should know there are strings attached. This place was no exception. At one point there were 7 people sharing one bathroom and one bath, which was a little much. And the main light in our room went out halfway through our stay, leaving us to huddle around a small reading light the rest of the time. Check-in was a little hard to figure out as well, with lots of communication back and forth. The owner, Flo, apparently did not live there. When our light went out we went and knocked on her door, and also when the house ran out of TP, but she never answered. However, if money is a main concern this place fits the bill very well. Overall, we really enjoyed our stay in Barcelona.
Close to restaurants and shops and room is much smaller than picks.  Not ideal for families.  Great location!  It would have been idea for me and a friend

Super adresse, Flo est très discret
 et accueillant

Ótima localização. O checkin foi feito conforme combinado e fomos recebido por Ciro com muita gentileza. Contudo, não fica claro na descrição do site e nas fotos que trata-se de um hostel com banheiro compartilhado, e não um apartamento.  Fora esse "pequeno" detalhe, tudo foi muito bem :)
I was expecting the room to look like the picture. unfortunately, there was no light, no air, the room was dusty and the sheets smelled unfresh
nice place
Отличное расположение, интересный интерьер на кухне,  идеальный вариант для проведения времени в центре города

Die Fotos sind absolut irreal. So sieht die Wohnung nicht aus. Viel kleiner, als auf den Bildern. Die Ausstattung ist für den Arsch, darauf gehe ich auch noch genauer ein. Der Küchenschrank, war eine Glasvitrine mit paar Gläsern, Tellern und Besteck. Das ist aber gar nicht sooo schlimm, nerviger fand ich es, dass die Ausrüstung zum Kochen miserabel war. Mehr als Nudeln kochen war nicht drinnen... mussten also fast immer draussen essen, das Geld was durch das billige Appartement gespart wurde, ist für das Essen zwischen durch draufgegangen... Waschen kann man seine Kleidung gleich um die Ecke des Appartements. Unser Zimmer hat sehr muffig gestunken, wir hatten zwar einen Ventilator, der allerdings kaum etwas gebracht hat. Es war regelmäßig eine Haushälterin da, die ihren Job auch vernünftig gemacht hat, allerdings war sie nur für Oberflächen zuständig. Das Appartement ist von Grund auf dreckig. In seinem eigenen Zimmer kann man nicht ohne Schuhe oder Hausschuhen herumlaufen, ohne die Füße dreckig zu machen, dasselbe gilt gilt für das Bad. Der Kühlschrank war absolut versifft, wer dort sein Essen gelagert hat, konnte damit rechnen, dass dir Kühlschrankflüssigkeit und Fruchtfliegen darauf zu finden waren. Erst nach dem ich den Host darauf angesprochen habe, (Tag 3) unseres Aufenthalts wollte er sich darum kümmern, Tag 11 von insgesamt 13 Tagen hatte der Host einen neuen Kühlschrank besorgt. Der Haushälterin zur Folge, sei der Kühlschrank schon sehr lange in diesem Zustand gewesen. Der Host war zwar immer zu Hause, da er ein Zimmer in dem Appartement hatte, welches er vermietet hatte. Allerdings kümmert er sich viel zu schwach um die Ausstattung seines Appartements und geht auf die Wünsche der Gäste nur mit Verzögerung ein. Als Beispiel dafür: wir hatten ein Zimmer für drei Personen, welches auch wirklich nur als Schlafraum dienen sollte, dass ansonsten keinen Raum da war, wäre nicht schlimm gewesen, da wir einen Schrank für unsere Kleidung im Flur bekommen, den dann allerdings andere Gäste bekommen haben, mit der Begründung ihr Zimmer sei kleiner als unseres. Der Unterschied war, das es ein 2-Bett-Zimmer war... Nach 5 Tagen hatten wir einen anderen Schrank bekommen. Dieser war einer für die man Kleiderbügel brauchte, die natürlich gefehlt haben... unverschämt ist daran, dass für gewöhnlich dir Gäste nicht länger als 3-4 Tage ein Zimmer mieten, der Host also mit Absicht keine neuen Möbel geholt hat. Das selbe gilt für den Kühlschrank. Der Ort hat Vor- und Nachteile. Es liegt mitten im Zentrum der la rambla. Absolut toll, auch der Strand ist nicht so weit weg, mit dem Bus ist man in 10 min da zu Fuß 45min. fand ich persönlich sehr angenehm, da man bei gutem Wetter viel spaziert ist. Abends ist es allerdings nicht so schön in dem gesamten Viertel Barrio Gotico, wo sich das Appartment befindet, wird man alle 10m von einem Dealer oder einer Prostituierten angesprochen, was auf Dauer echt nervt. Nachts verwandelt sich das Gebiet also zu einem Ghetto...dafür kann der Host jedoch nichts. Leider sind wir nicht wirklich fündig geworden, was gute Restaurants angeht...falls...
Really central and super close to la rambas and other popular areas !
Buen alojamiento

Great location, right in the heart of Barcelona. Feels safe. Flo and Ciro were good hosts. Only slight complaint would be a lack of air-conditioning/more fans in our room. In the middle of summer it was very hot and on occasion difficult to sleep. Otherwise a great trip.

Séjour agréable. 
Arrivée impeccable comme prévue on nous a ouvert dès qu’on est arrivées. 
La chambre était petite mais confortable seul bémol la chaleur en plein été si vous craignez mieux vaut éviter ce lieu et privilégier un endroit plus en dehors de la ville ou avec une clim

Le concept est sympathique même s’il faut partager les sanitaires, ces derniers sont propres. L’emplacement est idéal ! Merci à l’hôte pour son accueil et sa disponibilité. Nous reviendrons sans problème dans ce logement quand il fera moins chaud et à une période sans canicule.

L’appartement de Flo m’a enchantée : il est super bien placé, à 5 min à pied des Ramblas, et a beaucoup de charme. 
J’ai par ailleurs été très bien accueillie. 
Je recommande chaudement
Chambre idéale pour un petit séjour en plein cœur de la vieille ville de Barcelone

Amazing location, lovely hosts, had all the amenities we needed. Room was smaller than in pictures, probably better for 2 people rather than 3. There was no air conditioning, just a fan so was quite warm at times.

Honestly my best Airbnb experience so far. Cathy the housekeeper checked us in and we could always contact her if we had questions. The place is wonderful and right in La Gotica, which is a nice place to be. Everything was perfect.

Nous avons passé un super week end dans cet appartement idéalement situé ! Proche du métro , du port , des restaurants , bars , super marchés et vie nocturne :) !! Nous avons tout fait à pied. Très bonne communication avec l’hôte même si notre mauvais anglais ne nous a pas permis de bien se comprendre... nous en sommes désolé. Chambre parfaite !

Good space
Very central. Flo communicates to us who will be checking you in and there is a cleaner everyday.
Great location and quiet considering in such a central location

Our stay was much appreciated. It was the perfect place to land after our long night flight. We never understood how it could be SO quiet in the middle of the city. The welcoming part was perfect : all was planned, the necessary was said (baños, ducha, wifi!!, beds, refrigerator) . Flo Ciro et Kyros were excellent at guiding us. Thank you particularly Ciro for the awesome adress of restaurant Iposa. Best night in Barcelona. Thanks thanks thanks! In fact it was perfect.

The location is perfect for who want to stay in the heart of Barcelona! 3 min walk to Rambla, very close to the metro station, restaurants, shops And the market la boqueria!
The room was like appears at the pictures, the space was clean everyday and the space was very cosy. 
Flo, Ciro And Amarilli were very attentious and kind, replying always. 
It was a very good experience And i recommend the place!

Very good location
Fast response from the host.
Clean,Nice and cosy bads
Really what you need in.
Céntrico y acogedor

The location is really great and Flo made our arrival very easy.
We even had a small problem during our stay and he was really reactive and helpful

The location is simply amazing! The flat is charming, communication was easy and arrival perfect. Cleanliness was ok, of course since it is a bit old it can not seem completely gleaming clean. Also, as others said before, the bedroom is a bit smaller than it seems on the pictures. Overall a good value, I recommend it and I would come back!

Very nice warm and stylish design flat.
Very close to Las Ramblas and the city centre.
You will have to share the bathroom and toilets with the others and it can be sometimes long.
The personal is very welcoming and I recommend this place.
As imagens do quarto oferecido não correspondem a verdade. Isto não foi legal e nunca aconteceu comigo em nenhuma outra viagem. O lugar é bem localizado, mas não indico porque me senti enganada.

Place is really well located, everything is at walking distance, and one of the cleanest airbnbs I have ever been.  There is a little bit of bad small in the entrance of the building, but I suppose that is due to the building structure and there is not much the owners can do about it. Overall, everything was great.
Muy buena unidad y casa con estilo
Great location but not good value for money. Next time you can get the same at a hostel for a much cheaper price.
Really unbeatable location in the middle of the gothic medieval city centre, lots of restaurants, pubs, shops nearby. Thanks for the accomodation!

Emplacement en plein centre ville est très pratique. L’appartement est typique et chaleureux. Un point négatif mais duquel il ne faut pas s’étonner pour un appartement dans un vieil immeuble en plein centre: le bruit. Néanmoins je recommande cet endroit pour des sejours courts.

name: well lit East Williamsburg apt.
summary: First word to describe when you walk into the space is ZEN. Spacious, peaceful, roof top, large kitchen, turntable. Has a great record shop, yoga studio, top notch cocktail bar. Close to the L,J, and M trains. Very welcoming neighborhood vibe.
description: First word to describe when you walk into the space is ZEN. Spacious, peaceful, roof top, large kitchen, turntable. Has a great record shop, yoga studio, top notch cocktail bar. Close to the L,J, and M trains. Very welcoming neighborhood vibe.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I am from LA and I moved to NYC a little over 2 years. My profession is visual merchandising. Exploring, traveling, meeting people is what I enjoy. I am very clean, neat and organized.

name: Spacious 2 Bedroom: Soho/Escalator
summary: Bright and spacious two bedroom apartment located in Soho along the famous HK escalator.  Numerous restaurants, cafes and bars (including the Lan Kwai Fong district) are only minutes away on foot. All comforts are provided including clean sheets, towels, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, hair dryer, laundry, hand soap, full kitchen amenities and wifi.
space: We will accommodate a maximum of 5 guests including kids/children (this does not include infants). Four guests fit most comfortably here so guest five will be charged $100HKD/night.  The master bedroom (2 guests) includes a queen size bed, new mattress, blackout curtains and a large closet.  The second bedroom (2-3 guests) has a double bed with a new mattress and a twin size sofa bed (also new!). We also have two travel cots available, a baby bathtub and highchair for guests with infants. Beds are super comfy and the shower is amazing.  We know you will be comfortable here. We ask that you do not use more bed linens or towels other than what has been provided for you. This may result in an extra charge for laundry. Please ask if you need more. We also have a high grade water filter installed in the kitchen. Hong Kong water is safe to drink and this water filter makes it even more so. Try to use less plastic and drink the tap water.

Numerous restaurants, cafes and bars (including the Lan Kwai Fong district) are only minutes away on foot. All comforts are provided including clean sheets, towels, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, hair dryer, laundry, hand soap, full kitchen amenities and wifi. We will accommodate a maximum of 5 guests including kids/children (this does not include infants). Four guests fit most comfortably here so guest five will be charged $100HKD/night.  The master bedroom (2 guests) includes a queen size bed, new mattress, blackout curtains and a large closet.  The second bedroom (2-3 guests) has a double bed with a new mattress and a twin size sofa bed (also new!). We also have two travel cots available, a baby bathtub and highchair for guests with infants. Beds are super comfy and the shower is amazing.  We know you will be comfortable here. We ask that you do not use more bed linens or towels other than wh
neighborhood_overview: Our Soho neighbourhood is an exciting place to be.  Be sure to check out amazing deals on lunch specials and happy hours.  We've also left you a Super Mondays card which gets you 2 for 1 dinner entrees at a number of restaurants in the neighbourhood on Monday evenings.  Details are in the information binder.
notes: Please be quiet and respect our neighbours. Particularly when you are in the hallway coming and going. This is not a hotel! This is a residential building. Please also keep the place tidy and clean up after yourself. There is a larger garbage/rubbish bin in the hallway stairwell and extra garbage bags under the sink. If you want to recycle, you can take recyclables one escalator down to the separation bins.
transit: The Airport Express direct from the airport arrives at Hong Kong Station, which is only a 15-20 minute walk along the Shelley Street escalator to our place.  This escalator goes up the hill from 10am to 12 midnight and down the hill for morning rush hour between 6am and 10am.  If you have lots of luggage you may prefer to take a taxi from Hong Kong Station, which is about $40HKD.  The Airport Express costs $100HKD/person and a taxi direct from the airport is about $350HKD.   If you are arriving by train from China you will arrive at Central Station. This is also a 15-20 minute walk along the escalator or a $40HKD taxi ride. There's also big buses and minibuses that run along our road.  Let me know if you have any questions on getting around HK.  I'm happy to help!
access: The building has a 24 hour doorman with key-less key pad entry on both the downstairs door and apartment door.  Codes are changed regularly.
interaction: Key-less key pad entry makes this place super easy to enter.  A binder with detailed instructions on wifi, TV and other important information is provided.  I am always available by message on Airbnb.
house_rules: We're sure you will have a wonderful stay in this very exciting neighbourhood.  Although our walls are pretty thick, please respect our neighbours and be quiet, particularly when you are in the hallway coming and going. Please do not use linens and towels other than what are provided for you. This may incur an additional charge for laundry services. Please also keep the place clean and tidy. There is a large garbage/rubbish bin in the stairwell. Extra garbage bags are under the sink. If you would like to recycle, you can take recyclables down one escalator to the seperation bins.

host.host_about: Living in Hong Kong for the past 10 years my husband and I love to travel in Asia any chance we get. When not travelling, we relax in our village house outside the city, garden and go to the beach. We love staying active, eating healthy and exploring all corners of Hong Kong.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: This place is a gem!  It's in the heart of everything from western restaurants to shopping to the nightlife district.  It was still very quiet though in the building.  The place looks exactly as the photos and was recently renovated completely. The concierge was helpful when we needed help. Tara was fantastic as well. She waited for us for over a 1.5 hours when we were late, gave us a thorough run down of the apartment and neighbourhood, and made some very good recommendations for places to eat around there in her welcome guide package. Would highly recommend this place and going with her suggestions.
It's good. Tara is very kind person. This bnb is located soho street. It was fantastic!!!!!!

Die Wohnung war super! Sie ist sehr zentral gelegen. Von dort aus kann man in nur 20 Minuten bis zum Hafen laufen. In der Nähe gibt es sehr viele Restaurants und Bars. Die Wohnung selbst ist sehr gut ausgestattet (es fehlte nichts) und war für 4 Personen ideal. Auch die Gastgeberin war super freundlich und war für Fragen immer da. Ich würde diese Wohnung immer wieder buchen!

Tara's Apartment ist der perfekte Ausgangspunkt um Hongkong zu entdecken. Auch für eine unkomplizierte An- und Abreise vom / zum Flughafen ist die Lage super.
Der Bezirk Soho bietet viele tolle Cafés, Bars und Restaurants die man fußläufig erreichen kann.
Die Ausstattung des Appartement lässt keine Wünsche offen. 
Alles hat prima geklappt. Wenn ich noch mal in Hongkong bin, bin ich auf jeden Fall wieder bei Tara.

stayed at Tara's place for 6 nights as 3 adults and 2 children. quiet apartment with 24hr friendly doorman, located right next to the mid-level escalators, about 15 minutes up from IFC (easy access with a stroller with only a half-flight of stairs between Hang Seng Bank and the Central Market building). two grocery stores just down the street. 2 bedrooms with good cabinet space. plenty of sheets and towels. large open-design kitchen/dining/living room with good counter space. well stocked kitchen with coffee/tea/sugar. welcomed with bottle of red wine and fresh fruit. provided with baby cot, baby tub and high chair for the the little ones. umbrellas came in handy for the 2 days of rain. overall a very nice place to stay with family in Hong Kong.

No doubt, this is THE apartment for enjoying a stay in Hong Kong:
- Prime location
- Full equipped apartment 
- All facilities around (organic shops, mini-supermarket, good restaurants, ...)
- Excellent tips from Tara on good adresses around her place
- What else? Everything was perfect and thanks to Tara who has been friendly, reactive and flexible (late check-out due to personal reason)

L’appartement est très bien situé près de l’escalator. Quartier branché plein de bars et restos mais situation très calme malgré tout car l’appartement donne sur l’arrière de l’immeuble. Entièrement refait, il est propre et moderne, très bien équipé. Une belle pièce de vie et des rangements. Je recommande fortement. Tara est très rapide à répondre également à toute question. Et en plus, nous avions une belle corbeille de fruits et une bouteille de vin qui nous attendaient à notre arrivée. Séjour parfait.
Die Wohnung ist super gelegen und Tara eine super Gastgeberin. Auch wenn wir sie nicht persönlich kennen gelernt haben, war die Organisation und Kommunikation spitze!

My brother, a friend of mine and I stayed at Tara's place for just under a week. The location of the place is spectacular, the view is amazing (nestled inbetween so many skyscrapers) and getting in and out of the place is really easy! We had a bit of trouble checking-in, since we didn't have the apartment number in the information provided to us. That was not Tara's fault though.. When you come here, just make sure you get all of the neccessary info in advance from airbnb. The aparment was clean and well-kept and communication with Tara was easy and quick. She let us check out pretty late (3pm), which we really really appreciated! The only thing we didn't love about the place was that there sometimes was a bit of an odor coming out of the bathroom.. I'm pretty sure that isn't Tara's fault either though, it must be a problem with old plumbing. But there is a window in the shower, so it's very easy to just air-out the bathroom with the door closed!
Over all we are very very happy with our stay at Tara's place and would definitely come again:)
good and valuable place with nice location

Tara’s place is absolutely fabulous. 
She also made it very easy foe us in terms of communicating super fast for any requests. 
Location is great. It’s nicely decorated with good lighting and art. 
The bathroom is modern and well kitted out. 
We cooked meals at home on the great stove. 
The apartment has everything you need, and is in one of the best locations in town. 
We highly recommend staying there (if it’s free!)

This apartment provided me the perfect balance needed for a memorable holiday weekend. It was lose enough to access the vibrant nightlife, but far enough to enjoy a quiet morning respite. The space was cozy enough to lounge amongst friends in the salon, but large enough to provide two private bedrooms for a restful slumber.  And Tara’s communiques we’re friendly and informative, but never intrusive or inflexible. I highly recommend this Cameo Court apartment as the place to stay as you enjoy all that the Midlevels has to offer.
Perfect location for discovering the city’s local hotspots and a close enough walk to the MTR. Great living space when plenty of amenities for us, couldn’t have picked a better spot in Soho!
Very convenient location.  Good size.  Quiet apartment.  Reasonable price.   All very much appreciated.

Loved the place and definitely would stay again! Great location (right in the middle of SoHo), stylish + clean place and very friendly host. It's up on the 4th floor which means it's pretty quiet from the street noise. Would highly recommend it when visiting HK!
Location right next to the escalators was perfect! And the building security guards were so nice and helpful. Tara always answered my messages right away and was very helpful!

This apartment was exactly what we were looking for in HK: a central location away from the super-touristy hubbub, and with space for those stay-at-home moments you crave when you’re travel-logged. The place has a modern feel and included all the amenities one would need for cooking and relaxing, including filtered drinking water. We felt safe and cozy, and the building was quiet at night for restful sleep. Tara was very easy to get in touch with and provided responses quickly. I loved the location—super walkable to great restaurants, the zoo, Victoria Peak, and lots of public transit—but beware, if it is your first time to HK island and you want to walk from the subway/ferry, (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps won’t show you the amazing escalators and walkways that will make getting there a breeze, and you might get stuck carting luggage up many flights of stairs (as we did). I highly recommend staying here if you want to experience HK island like a local. Just remember to research the walking path, or take an alternate form of transportation if you’ve got heavy luggage!

Tara’s place is a real gem - it is centrally located, right next to the Central Travelator, with the convenience of acesss to pretty much everything (restaurants, grocery stores and public transit etc. BTW we simply walked with our luggage to the place directly from HK Station which took <15 minutes).  It is one street up from the hustle and bustle of the Soho district, in an area that is more upscale, largely quiet and family oriented.   The place itself is very spacious and sparkly clean - we even had closet space!  It is a place that we would like to stay again next time in HK and I would highly recommend to anyone, especially families with children.  Tara is also a wonderful host who was very responsive to all of our communications.  Thanks Tara!

Tara's place is really awesome. Neighbourhood is safe and full of restaurants, coffee shops, etc. You're right in the mid levels and it's easy to walk anywhere. Tara is a great host and was there to meet us. Super great our new home away from home in HK.
Great location next to the mid-levels elevator and in front of a great French bakery. all amenities nearby. very nicely decorated. we had a great stay with our kids thank you !
It is kind and clean place, so I want to visit again next time.

Great apartment - spacious for HK and very close to the escalator so easy access to everything. New bathroom and plenty of towels and shower amenities. Definitely would stay here again and recommend for 5 people comfortably.

Tara’s apartment is excellent. Spacious by HK standards, bright and very well equipped.
The location is great right next to the escalator with lots of shops and restaurants nearby.

I wanna say it is a super nice place for you to stay, much beyond your expectation: a location 15-minute walk to MTR Central Station and to Lan Kwai Fong, two bedrooms (1 with 2 beds and the other with 1 bed) spacious enough to accommodate 5 people at most, a fashionably designed bathroom,  a roomy living room. The place is highly recommended also for some details:  it was rainy and cloudy during our stay, but with two small heaters, we were able to enjoy every single night;  umbrellas, which was  exactly what we needed during these days, were also available in the room; on the dinning table lies a guidebook, in which some restaurants with different flavors are listed. Tara is very hospitable and warm, and her response is always prompt. I'm looking forward to my next stay here lol.
非常好的地方

Well appointed 4th floor flat in a fantastic location right next to mid-levels escalator.  Communication with Tara was super easy and check-in process was smooth even though we arrived late at night.  It was very cold in HK during our visit, and since this apartment does not have central heating (similar to most HK flats that only have air conditioning but not heaters) a couple space heaters were made available to us which were a much needed addition to keep the apartment warm.  Other than that, we had a great stay and highly recommend!

Location is perfect.  To those with lots of luggage, I would suggest to use 75 Caine Road as a place to let cars stop but it is only 30 meters away.  The apartment is very clean and the shower water pressure is good.  Supermarkets and stores and restaurants and city center is very close.  Great place for a family

Tara is a great host that she is responsive, thoughtful and easy to communicate with . The listing is spacious that is hard ton find in hk. Location is good, close to restaurants and stores. Highly recommended
Great place for a family in a great location. Close to cafes restaurants.

Fantastic location you can’t beat the food choices and mid level escalator access.
Tara is extremely helpful. Having an automatic door is super helpful and easy.
위치가 매우 좋아서 센트럴 곳곳을 돌아 다니기 매우 좋습니다. 근처에 식당, 카페, 바 등등 훌륭한 상점들이 무궁무진 하구요. 홍콩 현지인처럼 살아 보기를 원한다면 강추 입니다.
My parents loved the place, very clean and comfortable, quiet! The owner was very helpful too :)

As this was our first trip to Hong Kong, we didn't know which neighborhood would be best to stay. Don't think twice, this is the perfect spot to stay. Restaurants, coffee, taxis, public transit - all easily accessible. The apartment building is a 10 second walk from the mid-levels escalators, which is a huge plus, especially if you have kids. More spacious, comfortable, affordable and homey than any hotel. Easily recommend this spot in Hong Kong! Check in a breeze and great communication from start to finish.
Tara’s place was amazingly spacious for a HK apt! The kitchen was very well equipped. The apt is located right beside the escalator which makes it extremely convenient. Highly recommended!
Great location and very spacious flat.

Stayed in April 2018 as a family of four (parents plus boys aged 11 and 13).  The apartment was PERFECT in every way.
1. Location. Steps away from the escalator. Easy walking to "Old town Central" and also to the parks, Exchange Square, Peak Tram only 15 minutes.. the area is packed with interesting alleys and streets, boutiques, restaurants, cafes etc. There are  well stocked supermarkets (all the US and Euro stuff), and even a great boulangerie across the road (pre made baguette sandwiches good for picnics) Taxis can be hailed in a couple of minutes...
2. So clean and and open. Full of light. Spacious kitchen/living room, comfy beds and pillows, great modern bathroom with very large shower area and great water supply. AC works great.
3. Well equipped: large fridge/freezer, glasses/plates/cutlery...  dishsoap, cloths.. even shampoo and shower gel, toilet paper etc.  Note, no microwave. 
4. Lovely doorman. Very polite and charming
5. Tara is super responsive and helpful. 

Such great value! We will stay here again and recommend to all friends going to HKG!
Thanks to Tara for the (Website hidden by Airbnb) house is near the mid-levels escalater.There are so many delicious food around the house.We have a wonderful trip,look forward to the next time!
Great flat in an amazing location. Strongly recommended.

Tara is an excellent host, the apartment is is exactly as described and perfectly located next the the escalator.check in was extremely easy with precise instructions to gain access to the main door and apartment door.If you want a centrally located place to stay this is the one for you! Taxi drop off within close walking distance and lift access to the apartment,although located on a busy street the apartment is quiet.
Well equipped with everything you need.
Tara replied almost instantly to any correspondence although our stay was problem free.

Clean, tidy apartment. Worked very well for a couple of guests. Location is perfect, quiet but just 30 metres from the escalators with bars and restaurants right around the corner. On a warm day it was great to be able to get from the Star Ferry and HK station to the unit via air-con malls and then up the escalators. Washer/dryer was very useful.

Large apartment right next to the escalators. Super easy access to MTR/Airport Express. Plenty of eating options in the area. Lively at night but not too noisy inside. Will definitely book again if we are back in Hong Kong. Thank you so much!

Tara est réactive et m'a tranmis des informations claires pour accèder à l'appartement.
Le logement de Tara est très bien situé et conforme aux attentes.

This a great apartment and for sure I will stay there on my next trip if available.

The place is clean, spacious and in a great location. 

The check-in process is simple and easy and the security folks were amazingly friendly.

All-in-all a great stay.
Enjoyed our stay! Nicely kept up. Great location, easy access to mid level escalators and where soho restaurants and bars are. Would stay again.

Tara was a great host, responsive making the booking, and upon move in.   They say in property Location, Location, Location, and this flat has it.  Directly on the escalator.  The  door people were  super friendly and welcoming.  Excellent idea to have an electronic lock so forgetting your key is never an issue. We were especially impressed with the size and openness of your living space, with windows on both sides.  This is a standout in HK apartments of this size, and the pictures didn't do it justice.  We were with four, a couple and two grown kids, which worked very well.    Having an apartment at this location allowed us to get fresh food in the wet markets just two blocks away and enjoy local food at home.  
This flat lets you do Hong Kong like a local.  We would definitely return :) 
Jean

Very thanks to Tara’s warm concerns! Tara is a really nice host. And It’s really a nice place for a family or even just a couple to stay. The location is really nice that it’s not far from the subway station and next to a bus stop. The fantastic thing is that you can enjoy the mid level escalator every day because the apartment is really close to it. As for the apartment inside, it’s very clean and stylish. It’s comfortable to stay that you can enjoy your music with fancy sound equipment. I also love the cafe nearby. Very recommended!!

My husband and I very much enjoyed our stay at Tara’s. The location was fantastic (after 5 days in Hong I can definitely say this is the best neighborhood to stay in) and the apartment was very comfortable, quiet, and clean - just what we needed after a long flight. There are a ton of restaurants and cafes to walk to nearby. The apartment has a nice shower, which was essential because it was SO hot that we had to shower twice per day. I would definitely stay here again and would certainly recommend it to friends.
Great place

We had the most fantastic stay. Tara's place is in a great location right on the midlevels escalators and so roomy for Hong Kong!  Her apartment had everything we needed and we loved the local knowledge folder she included.  We can't recommend Tara's place enough and look forward to staying there again!
Tara is a wonderful host and she has a lovely and cosy place located very close to the happening part of hong kong island. We had a great stay.
Nice, clean and quiet place. The shower is very nice. Kitchen clean. Beds comfortable.... can’t be closer from the restaurants, bar.... also Tara is very easy to contact.
Perfect location to explore Hong Kong. Good amenities at the flat. Aside from the slightly worn sofa, can't complain about a thing. Tara was super responsive.
Fabulous location. Lots of space by HK standards. Everything you need is supplied. Definitely would stay again!

I visited Hong Kong with my wife and two kids (12 and 8) in July.  The location is what makes this place special.  It is located 100 yards from the Central Escalators that allow you to get Central easily.  That is important in the heat when you don't want to hike up the hill. The escalators are also a great hub for small restaurants and shops.  It was easy to walk to international ex-pat cafes or local only dim sum places (helpful to have basic Chinese).   Tara's apartment was nice, clean and perfect for a family of 4, but would be tight for anymore.

It’s our second time staying at Tara’s place and we love the location (right off the central escalator), proximity to shops, restaurants, and just about everything, and the quietness of the block. The apartment is spacious and well furnished (for a family of 4).  It has been our first choice of stay in HK.  Tara is helpful and responsive.  Highly recommend.
Perfecte lokatie; bij de roltrappen in een minder drukke wijk van HKG. Bakker, koffie en restaurants om de hoek. Appartement is van alle gemakken voorzien. Prima adres

This apartment is fantastic - not only is it excellent for families (I have two small children and Tara provided not just one but two cribs, a high chair and a baby bathtub) but great for anyone traveling to HK. As someone who used to live in Hong Kong (and so happened to live in the exact building as this apartment for two years) i love the location - as do the many expats who live / work in Hong Kong. It is especially well suited to foreigners (as it is very English friendly)
wanting easy access to good western food/friendly environment but still have easy access local flavors or sights. Besides the numerous restaurants and bars in soho, if you want to cook at home there is a supermarket down the street  as well as a Starbucks and a 24 hr McDonalds. 

Tara is also a fantastic host, doing her best to accommodate our arrival times and answering questions quickly and promptly. The apartment itself is clean, well decorated and spacious for Hong Kong standards. I would recommend this place to any of my friends!

I stayed at Tara's place for a week with my three boys and it was perfect! You cannot beat the location. Literally steps from the escalators and minutes from the best restaurants in Soho. The apartment was beautifully clean, very modern and super well-equipped. If you're traveling with or without kids, it is just perfect. All beds were comfortable and the bathroom was fantastic - especially the shower!

This is a very spacious apartment for Hong Kong standards and we felt very comfortable throughout our stay. Best of all, Tara is so helpful and super responsive. Whether it's your first time in HK or you're a repeat visitor, she is happy to help you navigate the city and feel at home in the apartment. An all round fantastic stay... You will not to be disappointed! We will be back for sure. :-)

We had a very pleasant and comfortable stay in Tara's apartment during whole August! This accommodation met all our  expactations concerning design and furnishing. There is sufficient space, linen and towels and kitchen equipment and dinnerware for four. The access is more than easy as you will receive a code from Tara to open the doors. 
The location is more than perfect to discover Hongkong. Right beside the building there is the Mid-Levels-Escalator that makes it easy to get around in Soho/Central in a easy way. You will find everything in short distance (e.g. bakery, supermarket, pubs, restaurants shops). Even when it is situated in Soho it is very quiet inside.
Last but not least, Tara is highly responsive! When we had a question or needed some advice she replied to our E-Mails within minutes. We had a really good start! Thank you, Tara!
We had a beautiful time! From this trip our friends fell in love with HK. And definitely Tara place placed a big role on our trip. We thank you very much for that!

Tara’s place is exactly like described in all the other reviews and more. For me kitchen is very important and I found it very comfortable to cook our meals. 
The location is great and Tara was communicating fast and clear and try to help in accommodating our time . We will sure book her place again

Tara did a wonderful job, was very quick in answering communication, 
gave good local tips, and has a very clean apartment in a very good location. I recommend it!
소호거리, 란콰이펑과 가까이에 있어 좋았고 근처에 편의점, 마트, 술집, 음식점도 많아서 편했습니다 :) 숙소도 깔끔하고 욕실이나 주방에 필요한 물품들이 부족함 없이 있었습니다 좋았어요!
The location is very good, bed is comfortable, air con is functioning  well.

I’ll spare readers from restating what others have already written. But, I will say that this spot is so amazing all around that after one night there I couldn’t wait to write a positive review. We stayed four nights here and had a great time. Tara is a great host in every aspect. I’d recommend her place to anyone visiting Hong Kong for any purpose.

The condo was perfect. We just loved the location...walkable to most everything we wanted to do. The views are great and the condo had everything we needed. We will definitely book again next time we visit Hong Kong!
Fantastic location, very clean and every amenity you need. Great place, great host!
I highly recommend Tara’s place for family. Five of us stay very comfortably in her place. Perfect location for walking around and explore hong kong.
This is a well appointed apartment in a superb location.  We are a family of four and it worked perfectly for our stay in HK.

Couldn’t get a better location than this apartment! Everything you need is provided - the code lock is really useful when there are a few people staying - no keys worries! Great bathroom and comfortable couch. The second bed in the second bedroom is quite small - not for a tall person!

I stayed with my two kids, wife and my mother and we had a fantastic time. Its an awesome place with well kept amenities, just a stone throw from the mid level escalators and lots of eating options close by ... and of course Tara is a wonderful host.
This place was so incredible! Great apartment, great area, quiet, the beds were comfy, and the host responded so quickly and thorough!

We had a fantastic stay! The location was excellent, at the top of the escalators in soho surrounded by markets, food, and nightlife, great coffee shop next door, and an elevator with friendly doorman.

The space was very comfortable with all the fixtures and amenities you could want. Filtered drinking water, shampoo/conditioner/body wash, dining table, AC, electric kettle, comfy sofa, rain shower, great speaker system with easy instructions for plugging in your own personal device. Beds were comfortable and there were extra blankets if needed.

Highly recommended! We were a couple with a 15 year old and it was just right for us. Tara was a great communicator leading up to and during our stay. Would definitely stay again!

Roomy (for HKG) two-bedroom flat, right off the escalators, in the heart of the nightlife (but quiet as the flat is in the back of the building) with a right jolly doorman--what more could one ask for?

I highly recommend anyone visiting Hong Kong consider staying at Tara's place!! We stayed about a week here and felt homie at Tara's place. The apt is spacious, clean, quiet, bright, centrally located, has all the appliances you would need during traveling and the host is kind, easy to talk to, and fast in responding! Upon arrival, we found that the drying rack was broken so i sent Tara a message and she delivered a brand new rack from Ikea as soon as she could. We have stayed at other airbnbs in the city but Tara's was our favorite. Overall, we really enjoyed staying here for the apt, location and the great host and would love to come back next time!!

Tara's place in Soho, a stone's throw away from the Mid-Level escalator, was a perfect place to enjoy Hong Kong. Everything you could need is on your doorstep. Fresh fruit and veggies from street stalls, bars, restaurants, hole-in-the-wall eateries, shops, art galleries, museums, Hong Kong park (and zoo), are all within a 5-minute walking radius. Go up the escalator to access the Peak walk/run (the queue for the tourist cable car is pretty close too). Before 10am, take the escalator down the hill to be in the heart of Central (after 10am the escalator changes direction and runs up the hill). Hong Kong and Central MTR stations take you to anywhere you want. Another 5 minute walk and you're at the ferries. Tara's place was very comfortable for our family - 2 adults, 2 teenagers. The beds were firm and comfy, the bathroom and kitchen were great, excellent lounge for gazing out the windows at the world passing by (but quiet too). Tara thought of everything, and was very responsive to our questions. We would highly recommend this place and hope to stay there again.
Fantatsic. Tara provides a wonderful apartment with great customer service.
Tara的房子位于半山電梯旁邊,但是有一段電梯壞了,如果帶著行李的還是推薦打個的士,樓下就有一個公車站,從銅鑼灣回來有車直達｡最喜歡的是淋浴設備,好舒服｡如果有用拖鞋習慣的要自己帶上,實際上Tara這裡基本都齊全了!

This apartment is in the best location next to the mid level escalators.  So easy to explore what Hong Kong has to offer.  
So many restaurants and bars to choose from within minutes from the front door.  A very safe area.
Apartment clean and a good size for a family of 4 (teenage boys).  Good kitchen if cooking your own meal!  Comfy beds!  Good wifi.  Highly recommended!!
Lovely spacious flat in amazing location. Tara was a very responsive and helpful
地点很便利 在半山电梯附近 早晨出门可以乘坐下山的半山电梯 晚上回去 可以乘坐上山的半山电梯 很好 房间很整洁 生活设施很便利 Tara有提供很便利的服务 对我的多次咨询也都回答的很仔细 很喜欢这里 下次来香港还会考虑来这里住

My parents, husband, and I stayed in Tara’s apartment during a week long visit to HK. We found everything to be accurate according to the listing and previous reviews: easy check-in/out,  clean, spacious, great amenities, and convenient location. My only con is that it’s noisy in the second bedroom, I could hear cars and buses throughout the night but I slept with the a/c on to drown out the street noise. Otherwise, we had a comfortable stay and would re-book if we ever returned to HK and will recommend to our family/friends as well.
Very good location. Host replied very quickly when I asked some questions. Thanks very much for your arrangement.
This apartment is clean, and very comfortable to live in, the host Tara is very nice and responded quickly. Highly recommended!

这次的住宿体验可能是香港之行最棒的部分了,apartment的位置没得挑,非常适合年轻人出门逛街和吃饭,主要的港岛景点基本可以步行和地铁到达｡房间非常舒适干净,在Tara的指引下,打的士很方便就找到,即便有行李也不用走太多路｡但还是不推荐坐公共交通,香港的1km看起来很近,可因为是上下坡,走起来可能会很费力,尤其是有行李的时候｡Tips:如果是带老年人出行可能不是特别适合,因为中环电梯附近确实坡度很大,老年人反复走动会比较辛苦,此外一切都很完美!
very nice appartment at a perfect location

name: Comfort Room in Istanbul
summary: This place is near bus stop, minibus road and taxi . There is wi-fi
description: This place is near bus stop, minibus road and taxi . There is wi-fi

name: Quarto espaçoso e arejado no Rio.
summary: Meu quarto além de ser silencioso, tem uma janela que deixa bem iluminado e arejado. Por ser  no décimo andar é bem ventilado também. Possui Cama de casal, ar condicionado, espelho grande e armários. Tudo muito novo, parede recém pintada.  Uma graça.
description: Meu quarto além de ser silencioso, tem uma janela que deixa bem iluminado e arejado. Por ser  no décimo andar é bem ventilado também. Possui Cama de casal, ar condicionado, espelho grande e armários. Tudo muito novo, parede recém pintada.  Uma graça.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 23 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Room w private toilet 3 min to MTR!
summary: Our cozy double room with separate bathroom is 3 mins walk from MTR, surrounded by lots of nice restaurants, bus stops, tram station that allows you to go travel really easily. 10 min to Promenade. Feel free to use our kitchen & living room. We have two lovely cats at home. :)
space: Quarry bay is a district few stations away from many main attractions and this room is very closely located to Quarry Bay Park with awesome view!
description: Our cozy double room with separate bathroom is 3 mins walk from MTR, surrounded by lots of nice restaurants, bus stops, tram station that allows you to go travel really easily. 10 min to Promenade. Feel free to use our kitchen & living room. We have two lovely cats at home. :) Quarry bay is a district few stations away from many main attractions and this room is very closely located to Quarry Bay Park with awesome view! 民宿內的客飯廳,設備完善的廚房,雪櫃內的飲品,洗衣及乾衣服機,冷氣,電視,Wi-Fi,都是開放給大家使用的,真的不要客氣呀! I love travelling and meeting people from very different culture. Would love to share meals together or grab a drink! 鄰行緊大型太古城購物中心,康怡廣場,鰂魚涌運動埸,太古坊,海濱長廊,7人人造草足球場,觀景台,太極花園,怪獸大廈, 糖廠街綠色市集, Direct airport bus A12 to downstairs. It is right at the MTR, bus stops and tram stations. Super convenient! 當你們確認是我們民宿的住客,我們有專人與你們聯絡,確保你能擁有一個愉快的住宿體驗!
neighborhood_overview: 鄰行緊大型太古城購物中心,康怡廣場,鰂魚涌運動埸,太古坊,海濱長廊,7人人造草足球場,觀景台,太極花園,怪獸大廈, 糖廠街綠色市集,
notes: 當你們確認是我們民宿的住客,我們有專人與你們聯絡,確保你能擁有一個愉快的住宿體驗!
transit: Direct airport bus A12 to downstairs. It is right at the MTR, bus stops and tram stations. Super convenient!
access: 民宿內的客飯廳,設備完善的廚房,雪櫃內的飲品,洗衣及乾衣服機,冷氣,電視,Wi-Fi,都是開放給大家使用的,真的不要客氣呀!
interaction: I love travelling and meeting people from very different culture. Would love to share meals together or grab a drink!

host.host_about: I moved from New Zealand to Hong Kong 8 years ago, and have studied in Boston and Paris, worked in Nairobi for a bit. I am currently a post-grad law student and would love to welcome friends from all over the world to my favourite city. You will know all the secret best places to go in HK from me. Cheers! :)

address.street: Quarry Bay, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments: The room was lovely! Large comfortable bed, separate bathroom, and an array of complimentary toiletries and water. Joanna was a wonderful, and we would highly recommend this location to anyone looking for a nice and convenient area to stay in HK.
it's really wonderful place to stay for trip,comfortable .convenient .hospitable.additionally,Joanna is lovely,sweet modern girl.  you will easy to enjoy Hk
非常好的一次体验,房东一家人非常的热情｡一出地铁口就能找到很方便,楼下就有公交车和电车,方便出行｡附近有很多食肆和士多店,网推的米芝莲美食也有,相当方便｡下次如果再去香港玩,一定会再次入住｡

This place is great for Single or Couple looking to live like a local in HK, which is what I get out of this trip. I value my privacy, Joanna and the family respected that, and gave me plenty during this stay. Great Host. The place is off to the Main Street so make sure you call Joanna before arriving as you might not be able to find it immediately. Very close to all Public transport and very convenient. It is as advertised - Nice cozy room with 3 mins walk to transports.

I had a comfortable stay at Joanna's apartment. The room was nice and cozy with a private bathroom and had all the amenities I needed. Joanna and her family were very nice and helpful as well. Highly recommended!

Joanna was a great host! She always had a place in mind to recommend and she was always willing to help translate for when Cantonese was the only language around lol. She was always very fluid with keeping in contact with her guests too! The place itself is just like the ad says. Definitely rent this place if you get the chance!
Had a great time Joanna and her mother were so helpful. Even though I was so busy and never got to go out with her, I felt like I made a friend for life.

Joanna is super nice. She picked us up at the mtr station. Her place is lovely, cute decoration and the ensuite toilet is perfect . My friend and I love it so much. it is even better than hotel. it is really exceed my expectation. it is like what advertisement. Highly recommended to whoever visit hk.

Joanna was an excellent host!  Her apartment was very comfortable and clean with everything we needed to stay comfortable (towels, shampoo, conditioner, comfortable bed, air conditioning).  It is also a couple minute walk from the Northpoint MTR station which was very convenient for travel.
Joanna is a nice host. Room is clean and comfortable. We were pleased to live in her apartment.
非常棒的体验!房子交通便利,在地铁口旁边｡附近有很多很棒的餐饮｡太古城也值得一逛｡房子跟照片一模一样,很温馨,舒适｡人也非常nice,就是房子太抢手,难预约上｡可以的话下次还会过来住!

Joanna's readily available over the tel...she provided personal escort all the way to her home from the airport bus stop, even helped me with my heaviest carry on bag...I arrvd so late that her mom's already in bed and I didn't get to meet her til the next evening ..She's such a nurturing mom that she's extremely helpful in making me feel at home, showing me how to use kitchen gadget unfamiliar to me, did my laundry twice, generously showered me with gifts like Santa Claus revisiting HK in Spring...

I had a wonderful stay at Joanna's home. Lovely house and very comfortable. Joanna is an excellent host and got everything ready for the guest. Will definitely recommend to friends and stay again. Thanks a lot Joanna.

Joanna is very attenttive and responsive to all my questions.  She gave perfect advice on how to get to her place and came pick me up.
Her family was very welcoming and you will not die of hunger with her mother around  who makes you taste her favorite snack foods.
Recommended!

Joanna's place is quite cozy, and I spent nearly 2 weeks with the families. They are very nice person and gave me a lot of good recommendations. Joanna's mom even helped me doing laundry. Anyway, you won't regret to enjoy your staying in Hong Kong in such a lovely place.
Very welcoming. Convenient location.

Joanna's apartment in Hong Kong is an excellent place to call home on a trip to her fair city.  She is a consummate host and I had everything I needed for a very pleasant stay.  Her apartment is very well located near the train and the bus from the airport drops you off just across the street with no transfers or changes.  

Her place is clean and comfortable and I just can't say enough about how gracious, generous and kind she and her cousin Purdy were the entire length of my 4 day stay!
Joanna是个超级大美女,很热心,很棒｡房子就更不用说了,位置安静,房间干净整洁,东西都准备得很齐全,毛巾､浴巾､头巾､甚至还有小零食､面膜､头发夹子,入住两天的感觉很棒,下次去香港还是会选择Joanna家~么么哒

I had a wonderful two-night stay at Joanna's place. 

Lots of Airbnb listings say 'cozy' when they just mean 'small' - but this really was cozy!
The private room has an ensuite toilet and was well stocked with everything I needed to be comfortable. 

The location really is very close to the MTR (and trams!) and from there it's easy to reach lots of points of interest and the airport.
 
Finally, Joanna and her mum are warm and generous hosts, very much worthy of 'superhost' status.

The Room is big and clean and has an own bathroom. The Bed is comfortable, there is a big wardrobe and really everything what you need. The Flat is well prepared and located near a bus and the MTR-Station, in a great area of HK Island. Joanna is really friendly and easy going. During my time I felt really relaxed.

Joanna was great! Her place was very well kept and welcoming! She even invited us to have lunch with her and gave us advice on what to see/do in Hong Kong! She was also really accommodating and allowed us to book our airbnb the night before. Would highly recommend!!!

I really enjoyed my stay with Joanna and the family. Great people, super friendly and helpful and made me feel really welcome. The bed was comfy, house was clean and the area has some great places to eat and drink nearby as well as being really easy to travel to and from. I requested the room late in the afternoon of the (first) night I wanted to stay and Joanna accepted immediately and nothing seemed to difficult for her.  Highly recommend!
房子离地铁口大概5分钟步程,根据房东的地图指引很容易就找到楼下,由于我的手机没有开通漫游导致和房东联系不畅,让房东等了我们很久,实在抱歉了｡房子周围有很多茶餐厅,味道都不错,可以解决早餐和晚上的宵夜｡
The host is great. Lovely place with all everything you need. My family and I simply enjoy our stay there.
房子离地铁站很近,楼下也有机场大巴直达,非常方便!房东Joanna和她母亲Candy人都很好,招待非常热情体贴!房间里的两只喵喵也很可爱!推荐入住!
Nice location and our hosts are really friendly. Not only did they offer us an umbrella when it rained, but also give us necessary medicine when one of us coughed a lot. We had a nice stay there. ; )
房子很温馨,房东和她妈妈很nice,住的很开心!
