Joanna was away during my visit, however, her mother, Candy, was a wonderful host, always available whenever I called or got a little lost.  The listing was as described and was very convenient for traveling on the MTR. Candy was kind to give me suggestions of places to go as well as made me some food! Overall, I had a great stay!

首先,房东和我们加了 (Hidden by Airbnb) ,联系很积极顺畅,房源位置准确;其次,到港后不停指导我们乘车路线,并到公交站迎接我们;还有,房间准备就绪,干净整齐,床上不但摆放毛巾浴巾等,还有一篮子护肤､护理小包装｡房子在小区里一栋公寓楼上,有物业管理,要密码出入,非常安全｡周边是生活区,环境很好,交通非常便利,地铁口约三四百米､公交站一百米､电车二百米,大楼临街但房子朝院内,算是很安静｡周边就餐方便,地道港食,有一家海鲜酒楼不错,海鲜和内地比价格不贵｡

We had a great five night stay at Joanna's apartment. We grabbed food with Joanna the first day which we enjoyed.

Some things to note:

Comfy bed.
Fast wifi.
Access to kitchen facilities.
Free bottles of water.
Cute kitties.
Five min walk to subway.
Washing machine which we used.
Late check out (thank you for this).
A very nice stay. Very convenient location, hosts were very nice, rooms were clean, and the cats were just adorable. Thanks for everything!

We enjoyed our stay with Joanna. The place is small for 3 ppl(only 1 room, so 3rd person need to sleep on an added bed), but Joanna was very accommodating and we had no problems. Room was tidy, clean, and she and her mom prepared snacks for us, which was a nice touch. She gave us local recommendations as well, which helped us navigate quite a bit. You really feel like you're living in Hong Kong, as the apt had a cozy local feel to it, rather than an informal hotel room. Overall would recommend!

Joanna and her mother hosted me and my daughter very kindly.  The room was clean and well prepared ; free wifi, clean towels and all amenities we needed.
It is located to be close to MTR, so easy to access everywhere we wanted to go. We were  totally satisfied. Thank you!
房间很棒很温馨,房东是个美女,很热情友好,刚到的时候我们找不到还去接我们,离地铁站很近,我们三个女生住的很开心｡真得很感谢Jonana

Joanna and her mother were very helpful and accommodating to us. Joanna was working when we checked in so her mother welcomed us instead. She is such a funny and lively person! Never fail to help us on transportation guide around the area and shopping tips as well. The house is spacious and the room is sufficient for two persons. The room comes with a private toilet without shower. so we took our shower at the shared bathroom outside the room. You can tell that they are very thoughtful host by looking at how equipped is the room. They provide mineral water, boiler, instant coffee tea, snacks, facial masks, sunscreens, lotion, umbrella, various sizes of towels etc in the room. The location was perfect as it's within walking distance to Harbour Plaza (less than 10 mins) where I attended a conference. Quarry bay station and bus stops to Causeway bay etc are very near too. The bus stop for A12 bus to airport is just located opposite the building. Overall, We had a pleasant and comfortable stay.
Words can't describe how satisfied I was about the stay. So I will shut up and let the stars count.

Joanna & her mom Candy are great hosts.  They have a maid to clean up the house twice a week, the maid made our room very clean.  We found the place is homey.  Candy is very thoughtful, took care of our needs.  She suggested us how to go to her place from the airport, and even offered to wait for us at the bus stop.  She worried we got lost, and text us the bus route, detailed with pictures.  The night when we left for the airport, on the top of getting us unique souvenirs, Candy bought delicious dessert again for us to enjoy on the flight.  We enjoyed our stay with Joanna & Candy.  Thank you!
房东美女不错 交通条件便利 住宿环境独立性差一点

This room was great! Everything was exactly as described. There is airport express bus goes directly from the airport to the building. The location was nice, close to MTR, tram and bus stations, with lots of restaurants around. I had a few questions before my stay and was answered promptly. Joanna and her mom Candy were so incredibly helpful!!
交通便利到无法描述,机场大巴上车地点从楼门到站台不超100步,下车撑死翻两倍吧,300步｡
年初一出的门,交通很便利,出门就有交通工具,房东也很用心帮我们整理必须用品,反正很开心,以后去还找房东

It felt like home away from home. Joanna and her Mum were amazing hosts and apart from ensuring a sparkling environment and everything as promised they made us feel like we were part of the family. We would definitely stay there again and recommend it to our family and friends.

The room was cozy and thoughtfully supplied with extras such as kettle, cups ,tea, bottled water etc plus small fridge . Convenient location for MRT and Candy is easy going . Satisfied as other reviewers mentioned .
交通非常方便,地鉄-鰂魚涌站只要5分鐘即可走到,叮叮車及公車也都差不多距離很近｡空間比我想像中的大,特別這在地窄人稠的香港是非常珍貴的｡

The location was great, close to MRT and not far away from all the places we'd like to visit. And I think they tried very hard to provide everything they can think of. Room was small but sweet. Candy was very nice to pick us up from the metro station and introduced us some dinning and shopping places, and she is always patient and helpful and friendly, love her very much. Would consider this place again if ever visit hk again.

喜欢小动物的不错选择,家里有两只大猫,很不错｡
其他都很好的,就是网上下单明明写着有早餐,但是入住后,说没有,不是很舒服｡
Lovely apartment, fantastic hosts, very good location to go and explore the city
非常棒,空间很大!房东人很好~

I had the best experience staying with Joanna and her mother, Candy. The place is exactly how described, the room is comfortable and both hosts are the nicest most helpful people ever!!I ended my stay early in a place in Wan Chai (cockroach infested) and Joanna and Candy were quick to respond to my request to book the next day. They have all that you need: linens, water, snacks, juice etc. and someone to clean twice a week. Their two cats are friendly and cute! I really loved Quarry Bay as well, quiet with some great restaurants/bars and a gym near by. Definitely recommend this place to others and will recommend to my friends visiting Hong Kong!!!!
半夜到达香港,joanna一直等到半夜,非常感谢她的耐心等待和指引,我们顺利到达住处,非常温馨正解的房子,还有两只超可爱的喵,joanna和妈妈candy人都很好,24h热水,空调,wifi,交通便利,一切都很好｡推荐大家入住｡
房子位置在公交站旁,离地铁也不远;和房东见面次数不多但房东准备的东西很齐全很细心;房间有独立卫生间但不能洗澡,不介意的话推荐入住｡
Candy  lee  妈妈非常热情,给了好多吃的,房东小姐姐Joanna非常贴心的准备了好多东西,非常周到!下次好要住她们家

Excellent host...
Room max for two people, that is Hong Kong !!
Easy transportation to anywhere including the airport.
Prepare to share facilities with others.

It is a home! Our room is cleaned once a week with new bedsheet and tissues refilled, clothes washed. The hospitality can be felt in many aspects but to a gourmet like me the most impressive experience is about all kinds of yummy snacks Candy gave us. The room is cozy and quiet and the location is very convenient. I love the place and thank you Joanna and Candy!

Joanna was super responsive to all our upfront requests and also the check-in worked very well although she wasn't present herself. The flat is in a perfect location very close to MTR Quarry Bay which brings you in 15-30mins basically to almost all attractions. We also really enjoyed the presence of the two cats which are super cute and friendly. They were already awaiting our return every day.
像闺房一样温馨舒适的家,强烈推荐给爱美爱笑爱漂亮的女生入住!
非常棒!不会失望!

Best accommodation I’ve ever experienced in Hong Kong! Comfortable room with refrigerator and TV. A lot of snacks and drinks are prepared for us, thanks! They have all the things in case you need! The kitties are reallly cute and they are happy to play with us. Definitely will come back next time!
Very nice this family, we stayed very comfortably and Candy mama is very lovely helpful. Stayed like at home, if available will stay again.
无可挑剔!!
Joanna is super friendly and helpful. Highly recommended!

The apartment was easy to find and conveniently located near all the public transport and good restaurants . Our host Joanna was very friendly and helpful while giving us plenty of space to relax alone when we needed it. The room was spotless, very comfortable and had every amenity you could want. The room comes stocked with snacks and drinks. The cats are super friendly and make you feel at home. We will definitely stay here next time we are in HK as it really feels like a home away from home.
父母第一次去香港自助游一周,选择了Joanna的房间｡父母旅游回来后赞不绝口,首先夸奖主人的热情与周到,从第一次热情会面,到详细的旅游建议,再到下雨天的周到关怀,使得宾至如归｡第二就是房间的漂亮与干净,住起来舒适轻松,比宾馆更为温馨｡第三就是房间的位置绝佳,在港岛的核心区域,楼下就是公交站和地铁站,各类美食也都在几分钟走路半径内｡父母说,不虚此行,特别是与房东一家愉快的相处一周｡非常感谢｡
房間在香港來說算很大啦,有獨立的廁所,shared bathroom｡家裡有兩隻可愛的喵咪,joanna媽媽很熱情健談喔

My boyfriend and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Joanna's place. It was clean, comfy and cozy and the cats were so adorable and friendly. Amenities like the kitchen, washing machine and dryer were also available for guests to use. Joanna is also a friendly host and is quick to respond! Location wise, it's great as it's a 3 min walk to the MTR station and is surrounded by restaurants and supermarkets.
第一次来香港住在Joanna家,房东人很好,体贴周到,住所温馨舒服,周边交通方便,性价比很高,下次还会选择她们家

Joanna's place was wonderful. Even though we didnt get to meet her, her mom candy was there to answer questions or if we needed anything. Joanna is really quick to respond to messages if you need anything as well. our room was cleaned 1x while we stayed there, they always had water for us which was nice, you can ask for extra towels depending on how long you're staying. we stayed 11 days so it was nice that we didn't have to worry about anything that we didn't have. If you love cats or animals this is the place for you. They have 2 cats which are basically dogs they greet you at the door when you come in or leave, and in the morning if they know you're awake, they will meow at your door to let them in. This really made a great start to our day. the MRT in only a couple minute walk in either direction and it was really easy to get around. if I were to ever come back to Hong Kong I would definitly stay here again.
很周到,离地铁很近｡很容易找,洗漱用品很齐全,不过要是普通话好一点,就更好了｡

Joanna was super nice and gave great instructions for getting to the apartment from the airport and for checking in. She also let us leave our bags at the apartment for a few hours after check-out since we had a late flight. Her cats were also really friendly and the bathroom in the bedroom was nice. The fact that it's so close the the MTR was also really convenient.
房东MM和妈妈人很NICE,日用品很是丰富,交通很便利, 家里两只猫咪我儿子喜欢的不得了
离地铁站很近,房主热情好客,家里两只猫特别可爱!环境很好,正确选择
2nd time stay! Brilliant location and sweet and considerable family (including the two cats) as usual. A really home stay experience.

name: 傳統香港房间 - 干净整洁交通便利的二人房间
summary: 我的房源適合情侶和獨自旅行的冒險家｡
description: 我的房源適合情侶和獨自旅行的冒險家｡

host.host_about: 香港

name: Spacious 3bdrm. Artsy and Perfect Location!
summary: Welcome to stay in my 3bed apartment. Its a rare gem in HK,  as its Huge compared to other Hk apts! Perfect for a few friends sharing or a family. Walk everywhere in Central in  few min. Soho, Escalator, Hollywood road, MTR. It’s walk up building! please check my profile, I have many reviews :)
space: Its a classic central hong kong style building. It is an older style building and apartment, an old touch of Hong Kong history and character.  I've added all my favourite artistic touches and light fixtures  to make it more modern and cosy. The place is white and grey with light wooden floors. This place is very large for hk around 1000 sqft! Its perfect for sharing and everyone can have their own room :) The large size reflects the character of its time, spaces were large back then and now modern HK apartments are very small and cramped.  **Please note: There is NO elevator. It's a walk up building to 4th floor.** The Bathroom set up is interesting, there are 2 rooms w toilets.  I have designated one as the wet Room / shower room and the other as the toilet room. This way the toilet doesn't necessarily need to get wet. Unless you choose to use the toilet in shower room :)
description: Welcome to stay in my 3bed apartment. Its a rare gem in HK,  as its Huge compared to other Hk apts! Perfect for a few friends sharing or a family. Walk everywhere in Central in  few min. Soho, Escalator, Hollywood road, MTR. It’s walk up building! please check my profile, I have many reviews :) Its a classic central hong kong style building. It is an older style building and apartment, an old touch of Hong Kong history and character.  I've added all my favourite artistic touches and light fixtures  to make it more modern and cosy. The place is white and grey with light wooden floors. This place is very large for hk around 1000 sqft! Its perfect for sharing and everyone can have their own room :) The large size reflects the character of its time, spaces were large back then and now modern HK apartments are very small and cramped.  **Please note: There is NO elevator. It's a walk up building to 4th floor.** The Bathroom set up is interesting, there are 2 rooms w toilets.  I have designat
neighborhood_overview: Super location for tourists, you can walk to most places within minutes  5 min to Lan kwai fong  5 min to sheung wan Mtr 5 min to SOHO 5 min to Escalators 10 min to Central Mtr  15 min to IFC
notes: **Please note: There is NO elevator. It's a walk up building to 4th floor.** *** They are doing some construction in the building's stairway right now, so it may be dusty and have some stuff like ladders in the hall. sorry about the inconvenience but don't worry if the apartment is perfectly fine and ready for your arrival :) *** In Hong Kong there is always construction going on. Its hard to avoid so you most likely will  hear  construction / street noise in the apartment during the day. The heater for shower needs to be turned on to heat up about 10 min before using, and please turn it off after :) Kitchen has the basics, such as stove burner, kettle, toaster, coffee maker, fridge, pots and pans, utensils and more. Please note we don't use a microwave, so there is no microwave. No smoking-200 fine  Lost keys- 200 replacement fee
interaction: I give my guests privacy but I'm always available for any questions or if anyone needs suggestions :)
house_rules: No parties or loud music after 10 No smoking inside  Take care of my place as ur own  Be nice and respectful to the neighbours around :)

host.host_about:
Raised in the west, I decided to travel and work abroad for a few years. Working and backpacking away from home has helped me gain so much experience and insight from living away from home, I think everyone should try it! 

I love hosting! And I put my heart into it and always think about how I can make my place enjoyable and comfy.
if you have any feedback I'd love to hear and learn how to grow from it.

I can speak English and hope to make your stay as pleasant as possible :) We can definitely give you suggestions for eating, shopping, art and museums and also night life. Just ask!

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
Melanie was an amazing and friendly host! Super friendly, accommodating and quick to answer all my questions.

The location of her place is very convenient...only about a 5 min walk to the MTR, Soho and LKF. The space itself is extremely spacious for Hong Kong and not to mention super cute with a very artsy vibe. Absolutely loved the decor and you can really get a sense of who Melanie is from her lovely finishing touches.

위치는 소호에서 도보 3분거리. 숙소자체는 좋으나 동네 자체가 오래되서 밤에 귀가할 때 조금 어두웠음. 홍콩에서 보기 드물게 방3개인 집이라 가족들과 좁지 않게 지낼 수 있어 좋았음. 다만 뜨거운 물 쓰는게 조금 불편했고 건물이 오래되어서 바깥 소음이나 방음이 잘 안되는 게 단점이었으나 전반적으로 가격대비 너무 깔끔하고 좋은 숙소였음! 

We checked in late at night but Melanie gave us all the information before arrival so we could check in easily on our own. If you once find this place, you will relalise how close it is from Soho, but getting here for the first time wasn't very easy for us. I stayed here with my husband and my brother's family and the place was spacious enough (considering its hongkong) for us all to hang around. You need to walk up to the 4th floor but wasn't a problme at all to us. 
We had some issue about electricity but Melanie responded quickly and helped us sort out the problem. One thing we felt inconvenient was hot shower but we got used to it later. And, it was very considerate of Melanie to prepare three heaters for us. 
I highly recommend this place for a family or groups of 4-5 ppl and especially those who wish to enjoy the atmosphere of Soho area and lankwaifong. I and my husband went out for a drink every night and found awesome bars and restaurants. We could have done it easily as the place is so close to it.

The apartment itself is nicely decorated and in good condition, with two good sized bedrooms, one bedroom with a tatami and also a sofa bed.  It is very centrally located so you can stroll to Central and Lan Kwai Fong very easily. We would recommend it.

We had SUCH a lovely stay at Melanie's apartment! This home is so clean and kept very nicely, we particularly loved the attention to detail with umbrellas, books, candles, hairdryers, etc. to make sure we felt at home! Thank you so much for letting us enjoy your place for the weekend :]]

Mel was extremely responsive with my super late booking. 
The set of instructions she provided were more than adequate, but she even reached out on (Hidden by Airbnb) to ensure everything was understood. Would highly recommend Mel, and hope to stay in her huge place again soon

Melanie welcomed me promptly and timely providing me all the needed info to enjoy my staying at her place. She replied all of my questions and let me feel welcome.

The apartment is spacious (rare size in HK!) and really clean (not usual too), comfortable for families.
Furthermore, it's strategically located in the heart of Soho and HK.

Cleanliness of the main gate and stairs could be improved.

Great experience overall.

Melanie oli ystävällinen ja avulias majoittaja. Hän antoi kohteesta tarkan kuvauksen ja lähetti etukäteen tarkan ja äärimmäisen kattavan tietopaketin. Asunto vastasi odotuksia täydellisesti ja oli todellakin tilava Hong Kongin mittakaavassa. Sijainti oli mitä loistavin!!!!! Asunto oli siisti, miellyttävä ja hyvin varusteltu. Internet toimi moitteettomasti. Suosittelen Melanien majoitusta lämpimästi kaikille.

Melanie's home in Hong Kong is wonderful! Very convenient and accommodating - it was a great experience. Not to mention, Melanie is extremely helpful and provided some solid tips about seeing the city.  Her place is also very close to some delicious dim sum. I would recommend her place to anybody staying in the city. Thanks Melanie!

Melanie was very helpful when arriving and gave clear instructions on how to access the apartment. The apartment was clean and comfortable and as shown in the photos. The place was very spacious for four of us and the location was perfect. Would definitely consider staying here again.

Melanie's home was the nicest place we stayed in Hong Kong, she was thorough and gave us excellent directions for easy access to her apartment. Neighborhood is full of trendy and great restaurants and bars and easy access to the MTR to explore other areas of the city. Highly recommend and would stay again on my next visit.
房间离上环地铁站很近,不管是往返机场还是市内出行都很方便｡房间装修和设施虽然简陋,但需要的东西基本都有｡最大的缺点是房间位于五楼,对于我这样家庭出游不太合适,抬着几个行李箱和宝宝推车爬楼梯的经历像一场噩梦｡推荐结伴出游的年轻人居住,性价比蛮高｡

The bed caused skin itches, could hardly sleep. 

Apartment is very artistic, looks very comfortable. Good location. Toilets and showers in great condition.

I would highly recommend staying at Melanie's apartment in Sheung Wan, near the famous Lang Kwai Fong area of Hong Kong island. I've stayed in many overpriced, cramped hotels and hostels in Hong Kong over the years and this was my first time opting for AirBnB instead. I was not disappointed. Melanie's apartment is very very spacious, has a lot of character and is super comfortable. It's also fantastic value for money if a few of you are sharing. Her instructions of how to find and access the building were spot on, very helpful indeed. 

We'll be back for sure!

The check in instructions were clear and easy to get, I found my way there easily. The climb up wasn't that bad. When I checked in, the house was in a huge mess as the previous guest had trashed the listing and looked like they had a party there. Melanie was easily reachable and wasn't fazed much when I showed her pictures. Instead, she took it like a champ and pulled a miracle by getting her cleaner to come at midnight. I was calling Airbnb to move my reservation elsewhere but her ability to rectify everything in record time was all I could ask for. The apartment looked great for photos after the massive cleanup! Thank you!

Fantastic apartment decorated with taste. BUT unfortunately experience was spoilt by deafening construction noise from the apartment on 3rd floor. If you don't plan on spending time in the apartment from 8am to 5pm you'll prob love your time.
It really has a perfect location,and the rooms are very clean and tidy.Thanks,Melanie!

Melanie's place was great! The location is superb and her directions were very accurate and easy to follow. Communication was great. Construction site nearby was a bit noisy but we all slept fine. Convenience store on the corner very handy.

The place was spacious and clean. Shower had good flow and no trouble with hot water. Fridge small but all we needed. Plenty of markets and eateries around and the MTR (train) station is only a short walk and one stop to central.

We're able to drop our bags slightly earlier which was also very helpful in the heat.

I would definitely stay at Melanie's place again.

Cheers for having us.

Melanie's place was great, and as advertised. Very spacious for Hong Kong and close to everything. Had a bit of trouble getting in with the key missing from the lock box upon arrival but her assistant Elvie came to the rescue and it was a non issue. Would definitely stay there again given how convenient and spacious it was.

It was easy to find, not far from E2 exit of the MTR, but the place was on 5 floor (first floor has no room so actually didn't count but you have to gone up 5 floor by stair). The place was quite and nice, clean and comfy just like the picture. Have a bit problems with the light inside the room but she response quick and ask for the helper to come. Thanks to the place we have a nice sleep. P.S. The shop of King fish ball was right beside in front the corner of the place, not bad to have a try.
Melanie was super supporting in sharing all the needed details to make our experience just great!
Melanie is good communicator. A the space itself is sweet and cozy but dated. Didn't have hot water for 2 nights. It's in a great neighborhood with notable small eateries right on the block.

El departamento de Melanie es tal como sale en la página. Muy lindo y cómodo, todo muy limpio. Se preocupó especialmente de las instrucciones de llegada, que siguiéndolas al pie de la letra fue fácil llegar. 100% recomendable, muy bien ubicado y cerca de lugares claves de la ciudad.

Great apartment to stay: exactly as described, really nice location and great host.
would come back again

숙소가 셩완역, 란콰이펑, 소호 등 위치는 중심지와 가까웠습니다. 하지만 숙소를 처음 찾아가는데 숙소가 건물 사이 뒷골목에 위치해 있어 아주 애를 먹었어요. 올라가는 계단이 다른 곳도 그런지 모르겠지만 먼지가 수북하고 바퀴벌레 시체, 닭뼈...홍콩 사람들은 복도나 계단은 청소하지 않나 봅니다 ㅠㅠ 숙소 안도 그리 청결하지 않고 사진과 많이 달라 친구들과 어서 그곳을 벗어나기만을 바랐습니다. 후기가 다 좋아서 여기를 선택했는데 위생을 엄격하게 보신다면 여긴 아니에요.
Apartment was just as described. Great stay. All the friends enjoyed it.

Melanie was a great host. As first time AirBnB guests, we didn't know what to expect, but Melanie made sure everything went smoothly, and that we had all the info we needed to have an enjoyable stay. The location is fantastic, and very close by to anything a visitor to Hong Kong would want. The place itself is pretty big by HK standards, although the building itself is starting to show its age. Would definitely recommend.

Melanie's place was perfect for our stay, the description was spot on and she provided detailed info on how to find the apartment along with helpful tips for the local area. The location is great and the apartment is a nice size - would highly recommend.

Ms. Melanie was easy to talk to, prompts as fast as she can and answers very clearly. As for her place what you see is what you get. No issues with her unit, all are in good working condition. The only thing I want to raise is her directions by foot but warned its tricky so she said exit sheung wan E2 going then kau u fong street but kau u fong is 2 alleys away from the exit and we felt confused, so we pulled out the map on our phones. So we passed by Jenny's Bakery (which is famous) then another alley  with stairs  at the end you'll see a 711 store straight ahead that's kau u fong or the LKF Hotel stated at her directions. Now follow her given direction.   Lan Kwai Fong is minutes by foot & neighboorhood is quiet. 
Just to note again unit is on the 4th floor,no elevator,

Butnonetheless considerable unit for the next visit,two thumbs up!

Amazing location, Melanie was forthcoming with detailed information about getting there, instructions etc.
Photos of apartment perhapes elude to a more modern type dwelling when in reality it is a typical old HK apartment with some newer decorations to dress it up.
Regardless, the price and location are excellent and communication was fine! Would definately refer to friends.

위치가 진짜 좋았다 바로 옆골목을 가면 카우키국수집도 있고 소호거리도 아주가까웠다 그리고 페리탑승장도 걸어갈만한 위치에 있다 
사진이랑 숙소랑 거의 똑같았다 넓어서 좋았음요

Melanie's place was pretty much as described - a big and comfortable apartment (especially compared to normal HK standards) in a convenient location. The building itself represents typical older HK style, nothing too fancy to expect, but apartment upstairs is a good pick for a small group or a family searching good value for the money. As described, there is no elevator which of course would be nice when going up with heavy luggage or for elderly persons, but in general there's nothing really to complain. Apartment is located in a walking distance from both Sheung Wan and Central / Hong Kong stations, and frequents trams and buses go along the Des Voeux Rd as well. There are a lot of restaurants nearby, both local style (e.g. Wellington Street) as well as more international ones + bars (go uphill towards SOHO). A great stay, recommended.
Great location and great home base to explore HK. Melanie's instructions on how to find the apartment were very clear. Apartment is just as described.
Good location, easy access to subway and great resturant around.

I was blown away by Melanie's apartment. After living in HK, I was used to living in a small apartment, which was not the case this time. I was in a group of five and we fit more than comfortably in this apartment. It was nicely decorated and made us feel at home right from the start. The apartment is right in the heart of Central and walking distance to the MTR, restaurants and LKF. I had a wonderful stay and highly recommend this apartment for anyone visiting HK in a larger group.

Very accurate in the description! Highly recommend staying here if you ware wanting somewhere close to public transport and are wanting to explore the city!

Melanie's instructions are also perfect after contact is made.

Shower was a little difficult to get right, but pressure and temperature wise it was great.

This apartment was really great. Fall in love with this apartment from the first time we found out in website. All the amenities, wifi, kitchen, bedroom, etc were good. We enjoyed stay in for New Year holiday with some friends. Clear explanation made us easy to find the apartment as well.

Great location and very spacious living room. We found it easy to get to station and piers from the apartment and the mid-level elevators just up the road as well! The apartment itself fit four comfortably, and had plenty of places to sit and relax, good cold fridge and some cooking facilities. The decor made it feel more homely. It is an older style apartment though so has a few rough edges (adds character).

The location was perfect! Melanie's apartment is surrounded with a number the popular eateries that are higgly recommended by many people's travel itineraries. Lan Kwai Fong is also walking distance from the apartment.
Nice spacious apartment in the center of Hong Kong island. There are many restaurants and shops around. Easy access to public transport.
這趟旅行和朋友一起的 訂到五個人的房間很高興 交通也都方便 就是上環都是斜坡路 拉著箱子的朋友可能會不方便 房東給的路線很詳細 入住的時候剛好附近裝修 所以非常吵 公寓和照片一樣 就是熱水器會跳電的問題沒有提前和我們說 朋友還洗澡洗到一半 後來打電話解決了 有兩間房間燈壞了 wifi後來直接不能用 房間是我訂的 難得一見的朋友卻是這樣的情況有點自責 不過還是謝謝房東｡
Location is great. Comfy apt. Close to restaurants and nightlife.
The appartment is very well located but the photos looks better than the real state of the accomodation.
위치상으로는 매우 만족스러웠다. 센트럴역과 ifc몰에 가기 좋았으며 미드레벨과 소호거리가 가까웠다. 그러나 높은층에 위치하고 엘레베이터가 없어 캐리어를 끌고 숙소로 올라가기 힘들었다. 숙소는 사진과 비슷하였고 방이 여러개여서 쓰기 좋았다.

很棒的地方!我們有個愉快的香港行~
只是要爬四層樓哦｡
Nice

Very spacious place, set in a great area. 3-5 min walk to mid level escalators, restaurant and bars. 
The rooms were big and the living area was comfortable.

Check in was very easy and clear instructions were given on how to find the apartment. It is a large space and in a very good location, 5 minutes from Sheung Wan MTR. The apartment itself is showing signs of wear and tear and was a bit noisy (due to a busy road outside and an apartment being renovated downstairs). The boiler was broken when we arrived so we had no hot water but Mel was quick to respond and this was fixed on our 3rd day.

Melanie's apartment is really near to the street vendors (fruit & veg), bars, restaurants & nice cafes! Very spacious too which is great for groups. Only problem was that the power for the shower trips once in a while so if there isn't hot water just toggle it & it works!

It's a great place in terms of location! Less than  a 10mins walk to nightlife at LKF so it was very convenient. Close to a lot of famous restaurants and hip places. Pictures might be taken much earlier when it was newly renovated but definitely value for money!

The place was exactly like it was shown in the pictures. It was big for an apartment in HK and there were enough room for all 4 of us who stayed. Location was also good and everything was within walking distance.
Superb location! Good food all within walking distance. Definitely recommend this apartment to youngsters!
The host is helpful and the place is really wonderful to stay. It's also very close to the MTR station.
Great apartment, close to public transport in a very central location

Pros: Perfect location. Nice host.
Cons: Noisy area. Not as "new" as it seems on the pictures.
Stairs Stairs Stairs Building is under construction
Super localisation et appartement conformes aux photos!

위치가 매우 좋습니다. 소호는 걸어서 5분 정도 걸려요. 페리 터미널은 택시로 5분도 안걸리는 거 같구요. ifc 걸어서 십분 정도 걸리는거 같습니다. 
골목에 있어서 집 찾기는 조금 어려워요.
주변에 공사하고 있어서 시끄러워요.
그 건물도 공사하고 있어서 먼지가 많습니다. 내부는 커요. 여러명이서 사용하기 좋습니다. 뱌킈별레 아쥬 큰거슬 발견햣슴니다 지굼꺄지 샬면셔 구러케 쿤건 춈 바여 
위셍을 셍각하시면 고려혜보시유 
수건이 넉넉하지 않으니 챙겨가세요

Very central, clean and cute place and a nice surface for such location in Central! 
Melanie is a very nice and responsive host.
Definitely reco this place for a weekend in HK!

We recently stayed with 3 teens while on a family weekend trip.  The location is pitch-perfect:  central, hip, easy to find, close to public transport.    The building core is under renovation so outside you are completely surrounded by scaffolding and renovation supplies. Inside the apartment however is a pleasant oasis of calm and we would certainly return.   Enjoyed the proximity to PMQ!
Excellent central location , but stairs, stairs, stairs

Die Lage der Wohnung war großartig, inmitten von Hong Kong Island. Der Eingang ist etwas versteckt, aber dafür hatten wir eine wirklich sehr ausführliche Beschreibung bekommen, mit der wir gut zurecht gekommen sind. Die Wohnung ist schön groß und geräumig und bietet Platz für 5 Personen. Die Einrichtung ist relativ einfach, Bad und Dusche sind nicht mehr die allerneuesten aber es was das bestmögliche draus gemacht. Die Küche haben wir nicht benutzt, weil in direkter Umgebung einfach sehr gute Essensmöglichkeiten gibt. Vegetarier sollten sich vorab informieren um größere Enttäuschungen zu vermeiden.
地址太難找了,還要拿著行李走樓梯｡房間很大,很乾淨｡
Tolles Appartment, tolle zentrale Lage, eine ganz großartige Vermieterin, die jederzeit hilft. Besser geht es nicht!

We had a great time staying here. The directions are very clear and it is easy to enter by yourself. The location is just amazing...right between Soho and Sheung Wan, close to a lot of sights and restaurants in walking distance. So central and still so quite. We definitely recommend to come here. Wifi could be a bit stronger though - but instead the water pressure in the shower is strong, which is not easy to find in HGK. Contact to Mel was great! Thank you
위치가 좋고 넓어서 좋았습니다

Other than the location, this house has nothing much going for it. It is far from the picture depicted. Unfortunately I am unable to post the photos taken during my stay. The furniture are old, renovation are worn, doors are coming lose, toilet doors eroded from water damage, dirty spots around the house. Cleaning inventories and equipment placed in a messy manner. Renovation wise on the whole it looks good but can be seen it was done without much regards to quality; exposed wires and piping, holes in wall not filled. This was an apartment quickly converted to make money from Airbnb. Will not recommend unless you are just looking for good venue and a place to sleep at night.
Heel goede locatie, appartement is heel basic maar heeft alles wat je nodig hebt.
Melanie was a great host. She was very quick to respond at all times and assist us in any way possible. Her apartment was as described and in a perfect location.

Our stay at Melanie's apartment was perfect. It was spacious, stylish, and Melanie was very accommodating and helpful. The apartment is in a perfect location right in the heart of SoHo, with comfortable beds and useful directions to local amenities. Expect some quirks, like a toilet in the shower, which is part of the charm of visiting Hong Kong.

The flat is extremely well located in Central Hong Kong which is ideal to walk around. We enjoyed the fact it it is quiet and pretty spacious with two double bedrooms and one single bedroom. Kitchen and bathroom are basic but work fine. Overall great value for a fantastic location!

The house is nice and clean. It is very quiet in the night and we can easily have a good rest.

The only problem is the safebox, which is a bit difficult to open.

Everything is good.
Great location. No elevator, so be prepared to climb up 4 flights of stairs.

숙소가 있는 건물이 낡고, 주변 소음이 있으며 계단이 매우 좁고 숙소가 맨 윗층에 있어서 힘들었다.
하지만 숙소 내부는 깔끔한 편이고 5명이 묵기에도 넉넉한 편이었다. 물도 잘 나왔다.
위치는 중심지에 가까워서 매우 좋았다.
숙소 침구류는 좀 더 깨끗했으면 좋겟고, 냉장고는 매우 작아서 불편했다

Greatest place I’ve seen in HK. Not far from Sheung Wan métro, close to great restaurants (Vietnamese at the corner, another one street Wellington), laundry, groceries and great tea shop.. also easy to get to Soho, Central, Man Mon temple...

The flat is clean, peaceful, well decorated and her owner Melanie is kind and very convenient !

Really worth the value !
Great Location!! Close to Tram station. 10mins walk to Central Station. Easy to go to LKF.
The location of Melanie's place was perfect! However, it was difficult to communicate with Melanie. She would reply to my messages quite late or would not answer them.

성완역 위치 자체는 좋습니다만 주소만으로 찾기가 매우 어렵고 엘레베이터가 없이 5층까지 가는 것은 정말 어렵습니다
욕실이 일시적인 문제인지 모르겠으나 변기 하나가 고장 나 있었습니다
겨울에는 매우 춥지만 전기히터를 갖추고 있습니다
방은 사진과 같이 홍콩숙소치고는 넓습니다
只能说离地铁比较方便,在香港这种寸土寸金的地方只能说体验一般｡1､房子就在香港威灵顿街,这条街很繁华所以晚上噪音很大｡2､住房在5楼,房子很陈旧,楼道很小､卫生一般｡3､房间里就一个电加热水器,时间10分钟,冬天洗澡真悲催,全屋其他龙头没有热水,早上洗脸有难度｡4､空调只能制冷,这几天香港冷只有取暖器｡5､床上的被子很薄､很短,没有提供第二条被子可用｡

The place is huge per HK standards. I suggest getting this place instead of hotel if you are travelling as a group. It has 3 rooms with a big living and dining space. Nice location too and perfect if you plan to go to LKF for some night life
房东给的位置很详尽,挺好找的,联系也很迅速,房子适合家庭居住,很完美

Melanie’s place is in a fantastic location and near so many brilliant shops, restaurants and bars. It has a spacious kitchen as well which is really helpful if you’re cooking. Melanie was a great host, really quick with communication and very helpful - she went out of her way to help us and was really flexible when we needed slightly different check in and check out times, which was hugely appreciated. Thank you Melanie!

Great location. You will almost definitely find it hard to get a place this big. Gets a little loud as it is so close to the Soho/LKF action, but it should be what you are choosing this place for. 4F(starts from 'Ground') stairs might be demanding sometimes, but is a common thing in HK. Host was great in terms of communication etc.

We loved the location- close to all the action. The space was also good, however the steps where a bit much (Website hidden by Airbnb) up a lot of flights. And it was hard to cook a home meal as it’s not really set up for cooking for a family. We decided to eat out after the first night. 
All in all a pleasant stay in a authentic traditional Hong Kong apartment. Highly recommended.
Great stay, the location was perfect and easy access. An enjoyable stay and hope to be back!

Melanie’s place is very well located, short walk to the MTR stations and also to Central area. The lack of lift didn’t bothered us so much except for checking-in day. Other than that, truly enjoyed our stay!

Melanie’s place is really in the Central part of Hong Kong. There is a nearby train (Sheung Wan) and lots of restaurants that is within walking distance. The apartment is very huge compared to other Hong Kong standard apartments (as I have stayed in other HK airbnbs before). There are no elevators though but it was not a big deal for us. Will definitely be booking Melanie’s place next time we come back to HK!
比想像中大,香港这样的地方住算是很宽敞了,就是位置不是很好找

Melanie was a great host. Responses were quick and detailed instructions provided so we could check in easily. Big, comfy and stylish apartment and good for resting inside. Location was ace - LKF, central area are all within walking distance.

AMAZING location! Could not believe I could find a 3 bedroom apartment with a large sitting room/lounge in Sheung Wan. Copious space for me and my 3 friends ! Offered everything we needed for our stay, a place to sleep, chill in the evening after a days out exploring.
! Aircon in the flat and every bedroom saved my life in a sweltering May in Hong Kong. 

Would recommend and stay again!

It was a large apartment in a fantastic location, central to everything! Melanie was easy to contact and directions provided were helpful. Stairs were tough especially checking in and out, but they are mentioned in the description.
Great location very central

Very well located - walking distance to many restaurants, both local and more modern/western; spacious enough for three people all in seperate rooms; well worth the money when compared to hotels of similar price range.
Great place. Thank you!
Location is good, very central. Melanie is helpful and we really enjoyed our stay here.

The place is really convenient and it's comfortable. Good for a group of ppl or a family
But the only thing is the hot water for shower takes long time to wait!
Melanie! Thanks for being a great host.  The place is very convenience to go around to the famous Hong Kong places. Easily accessible to a lot of places and things.
很好
Great location, and a rare three-bedroom in central. Some aspects of the place need some care and attention. But overall it's a comfortable stay in a prime location.

The apartment is perfectly located and  quiet at night. Beds in the bigger rooms are very comfortable (we didn't try the small one), the only thing that could be better is the curtains, there is a lot of light coming into the room in the mornings. Communication with the host was perfect, we had a great time and felt like at home!
A perfect location for visiting! Melanie was very helpful and kind when stay. A good choice for middium size group.

Nice apartment in a very great location, close to everything and  a superb host! Melanie was so accurate and thorough and wonderfully kind. 

Definitely would stay here again. Cheers!
Is a really good place, but is a little bit difficult to find. However, it has a homely atmosphere that will make you feel comfortable.

Have you found yourself desperately missing living in horrible student digs? If so, this place will be perfect for you! I’m talking no hot water, putrid stairwells, blocked sinks, dust-encrusted lamps, wardrobes that don’t open, tea towels for curtains so you will always wake before 6am, exposed wiring... the list goes on. As someone who has, until recently, lived in HK my whole life, I know how expensive rents are there, but (despite the apartment’s great location), it’s utterly outrageous to pay so much for so very little. 
Oh, and to call it “huge” in the ad is a blatant lie. Hats off to whoever took the ridiculously misleading photos as well. The truth is that this is a small, scummy, dark, depressing abode with zero charm or character. Definitely stay in the area, but definitely not at this flat.

Perfect location at heart of HK island. Just right next to famous Michillin recommended Kau Kee Restaurant, which I visited many times since I first visited HK at 2009. This area is closed to famous foodie paradise SOHO-area and famous HK bar area "Lan Kwai Fong". Also perfect choice for folks attending/visiting exhibition at WanChai expo. It is a bit hard to find for first time and I am giving your instruction here: E2 exit of ShengWan MTR station, you will see a square call "Grand Millennium square/COSCO plaza", walk up and cross the XING, you will find a well decorated stair, walk up the stair(or if you have heavy luggage and hard to carry up, you may keep walking up the hill and turn right on 7-11 store, then turn right again you will see the blue logo laudry shop), on you left is a blue logo laundry shop, the entrance just right next to it, so is the keys. 地处九记牛腩和地铁“上环站E2出口”之间,第一次来的人不会很好找,从E2出来经过中远COSCO广场往上走,过了人行红绿灯就有一个扶手装有LED装饰灯的楼梯,走上去(不要怀疑)左手边有一个蓝色招牌的洗衣店,旁边那个门就是了,钥匙在门口的密码锁里｡如果行李太多不方便走楼梯,就继续往斜坡上面走,7-11便利店右拐往上再走一段右拐的后巷里就能看到洗衣店招牌｡九记牛腩就在旁边一个路口｡这个位置确实很正中,三房一厅有厨房厨具齐全,不过我们没煮吃的｡建议想深度游览港岛的游客和去参加展会的人住｡我们是来展会的,早餐在E2出口往西30米的茶餐厅解决了就出发展会,每天如此｡距离兰桂坊也不远,散步的速度10分钟可到｡

Thank you for your place! Me and my family had an awesome quiet stay at HK. Apartment was big for 4 people. Bigger than other 4 people apartment in HK that ive stayed before. Only missing thing is a lift bcus u have to take the stairs. But apart from that, no complain!!
Great location. Lots of space. Fourth floor with stairs only. Mentioned in description, but just a reminder!

We really enjoyed our time in Hong Kong and Melanie's apartment was great.  It was great to have a quiet place to go "home" to after a day of sight-seeing, walking and subways.  The apartment is clean and conveniently located.  We recommend it!

Melanie has a nice stylish apartment in an excellent location for eating and going out. Just need to be mindful that there is no lift to the 4th floor apartment and it can get a bit noisy outside, but the location and spaciousness of the apartment more than made up for that, for us.

The best part of this Airbnb is the great location, just 5 min to Mtr and sheung wan. The space is pretty big space for HK and it was nice to have a relaxing space we could all come back to after a whole day of site seeing. Melanie was very accommodating and responsive. The place is walk up so it’s good for light travelers. I would come back to stay next time again!
Great location for a group in Central.
Highly recommended - great location and very nice apartment :)

We had a great stay at Melanie’s place - amazing value for money, great location, clean & excellent communication. There are 4 flights of stairs and no lift so if you’re not good with stairs I’d avoid but other than that I’d definitely recommend to any small groups visiting Hong Kong.
Great, spacious apartment. Clean with good amenities
Great apartment, Great location, Great host. Definately stay there !!

Melanie´s place was perfectly located with all the things we were looking for within 500 meters of the appartment. The appartment was spacious, well maintained, had comfortable beds (at last we slept after a week of horrendous beds in china). The house had a great design, lots of nice feautures. We were happy to have stayed there and i can recommend it to travellers that need a good spot while staying in Hong Kong!

I was so impressed by Melanie's apartment and would highly recommend it. The pictures don't do it justice - it's way bigger than I was expecting! The apartment is also located in a cute neighborhood with lots of shopping, restaurants, and easy access to public transportation. Melanie responded to my messages instantly and was very accommodating and flexible when I made a mistake in my booking.
好近中環蘭桂坊 行過去大概幾分鐘  而且都比較容易穩到 指示得幾清晰 地方夠大 裝修都幾溫馨
Great place at a very good location.
Great location in the heart of central with easy access to the best restaurants and bars nearby!

Nice spacious location with detailed instructions on how to get there, and nearby fun spots. Simple yet completed design throughout the house, equipped with good variety of appliances - warmer, kettle, IH Cooker, mini fridge, tv, etc. It's a sweet relax spot in the middle of the busy city!
Melanie's place is much bigger than it looks in the pics. Very comfortable and great for groups. Also really easy check in and helpful info. The location can't be beat. Would stay again!
Melanie's place has a great location and is very spacious for Hong Kong. She responded rapidly to all communication and was very helpful. There was some street noise at night, but it was minimal.

地点非常好,周围很多好吃的,九记牛腩,兰芳园,聚点坊…
热水器虽然储水量不大但是快点洗没问题,洗澡时间控制在10分钟内就好了,热水器烧水也很快,基本上再等十几分钟热水又满了…
另外热水器和电磁炉一起用会跳闸,最好是分开使用,不过跳闸也没关系,门后的开关(有一个贴了白纸条的)推上去就好了…
因为这是老房子,又在繁华区,晚上确实会非常吵,都是跑车发动机的声音,建议睡眠质量不好的带耳塞和眼罩来…
总体来说房子还是不错的,在香港来说算大了,两个房间是1.4米的床,另外一个房间是单人床｡
房子在四楼,爬楼梯会比较辛苦,做好心里准备…
非常好,推荐入住~房东人很好

Appartement spacieux et bien situé. Facile à trouver avec les indications de Mélanie. On est vite à pied au terminal du ferry ou à la station de métro central ou station hong kong une fois qu'on a repéré les passerelles piétonnes (au niveau des grands escalators).

name: Big Private BR Steps to Barnard Columbia & Subways
summary: This listing is for a large, comfy private BR in a quiet, sun-filled apartment on  a high floor in a safe, friendly pre-war elevator building in the heart of Morningside Heights. You will be just steps from Columbia and Barnard Universities and a few blocks from the Manhattan School of Music, Jewish and Union Theological Seminaries, and Riverside, Morningside and Central Parks. With high-speed wifi, cable TV, printer, dishwasher, microwave, a/c, 24-hour laundry room and evening doorman
space: This is a peaceful apartment with all the comforts of home.  It is a perfect size for traveling couples or individuals, students or professionals, who are looking for a quiet and comfortable place near any of the nearby schools or a welcoming home base for their city vacation experience. There is a queen-sized bed in the private bedroom (it's not a pull out couch, despite what it looks like in the pictures; I built a frame off of the couch and put an extra comfy queen mattress on top of it). The room overlooks a quiet courtyard from a high floor. It also has a desk, air conditioner, ceiling fan, cable TV, printer and a classic New York view of building tops and water towers The kitchen is fully equipped for cooking and is sunny and bright all day long, making it very comfortable to cook, work or just hang out in. The bathroom has classic pre-war fixtures, a large tub, strong water pressure and  hot water 24/7.
description: This listing is for a large, comfy private BR in a quiet, sun-filled apartment on  a high floor in a safe, friendly pre-war elevator building in the heart of Morningside Heights. You will be just steps from Columbia and Barnard Universities and a few blocks from the Manhattan School of Music, Jewish and Union Theological Seminaries, and Riverside, Morningside and Central Parks. With high-speed wifi, cable TV, printer, dishwasher, microwave, a/c, 24-hour laundry room and evening doorman This is a peaceful apartment with all the comforts of home.  It is a perfect size for traveling couples or individuals, students or professionals, who are looking for a quiet and comfortable place near any of the nearby schools or a welcoming home base for their city vacation experience. There is a queen-sized bed in the private bedroom (it's not a pull out couch, despite what it looks like in the pictures; I built a frame off of the couch and put an extra comfy queen mattress on top of it). The room ove
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in Morningside Heights, a picturesque neighborhood just north of Manhattan's Upper West Side. It is just across the street from Columbia's historic campus and less than a block away from the beautiful and green Riverside Park, a great place for a relaxing stroll, jog or bike ride along the Hudson River. It's also walking distance from Harlem, Central Park, and the Upper West Side. The neighborhood is also home to Barnard College, Grant's Tomb, Riverside Church, The Cathedral of St. John the Divine, Morningside Park, and an assortment of great restaurants, cafes, diners, book shops, and stores and shops of every kind. Morningside Heights is simultaneously vibrant and low-key, an area that many say is one of the few remaining genuinely 'neighborly' neighborhoods in NYC - a great place to stay when visiting the city.
notes: 5% discount for stays of 1 week or more 10% discount for stays of 1 month or more 20% discount for stays of 3 months or more
transit: The 1 train is just two blocks away and the 2/3 express trains are only 2 stops away; all of them quickly connect to Times Square where almost all the other subway lines stop too. There is also frequent bus service in the neighborhood, with direct service to and from LaGuardia Airport for the same cost as a subway ride.
access: There's a brand new laundry room in the basement, and you will also have access to the building's courtyard with a sitting area and basketball hoop
interaction: I will be here sharing the apartment in another private bedroom and am happy to interact as much or as little as you like. You will have your own set of keys and  direct access to the front door of the apartment and your bedroom, so you can come and go as much as you please at any hour without disturbing me and I can do the same without disturbing you.
house_rules: Additional guest fees apply.  Minimum stay of 3 nights if booking Friday or Saturday.  Long-term stays welcome Please be respectful of my neighbors and my living space Thanks

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: Hi - I'm a freelance writer and producer for TV and film, a native New Yorker, and the proud father of an amazing teenager.

reviews.comments: Great experience staying at this beautiful apartment. Sunny all day and cozy at night.  The neighborhood, right by Columbia, was perfect—especially with all the flowers in bloom on  campus and in nearby Riverside Park. Paul was an awesome host, super-accommodating, with lots of tips about great places to eat. Can't wait to stay here again!
Paul was generous with an early check-in and helped us settle in to his cozy apartment.

We found the place serendipitously when another booking fell through and couldn't be happier. Not only was the place exactly what we needed but Paul is a genuinely nice, kind, interesting human being and it has been a pleasure to get to know him. We stayed as a couple for just over a month and miss it already. Paul showed us around the neighbourhood when we first got there and was easily contactable thereafter.

Paul's place is a unique gem decorated with his quirky eye for colour, style and collectible treasures. It has a cozy well decked out living room, a bedroom with a closet and a comfortable bed, spacious bathroom and a nice, sunny, open-plan kitchen surrounded by windows. It is neat and well organised. There is cooling and heating in every room (plus fans), and the kitchen is well stocked with pots, pans, and other requirements along with a nice big fridge and freezer.  We found the place had everything we needed for a comfortable long-term stay.

For us, the location so close to three big parks (incl. Central Park), Columbia and Harlem, was just right. There are transport options aplenty: bikes up and down Riverside Park, the 1 MTA line two blocks away and frequent Broadway buses.  Paul kindly lent us his two bikes which was a fab way to get around the city. Being located on the border of UWS is great as it is a relatively quiet area to stay but the rest of Manhattan is readily accessible through the 1 line meaning we got the best of Manhattan action combined with good sleeping! Would stay again in a flash!
I had a great stay! Paul was a great host, with helpful recommendations in the area. Definitely book with him if you can.

Classic Upper West Side apartment in a quiet residential building very close to Columbia University. Comfortable bed, well-equipped kitchen, sitting room, good water pressure. Paul was a great host with friendly and proactive communication.  We met him to receive the key and instructions, and then had the place to ourselves for the rest of the weekend. Would stay again!

A beautiful eat in kitchen which has clearly been recently upgraded.
Vistas of the church steeples was novel. The breezes from Riverside Park kept it cool as did AC units in each room.

Paul's place was perfectly located! I came into town for a conference at Columbia and was mere blocks away. Riverside park was also a nice surprise, as well as an abundance of grocery stores, restaurants, coffee shops and bookstores. The subway was one block away. 
The apartment was cozy and fully stocked. It had everything I needed and then some!
Great location and Paul is very helpful an accommodating.

I hate to start out with such a great review because I'd like to keep this hidden gem for myself!  Paul's place is awesome! Great space and great location! I was in NYC for 2 weeks at Columbia and the location was just a few blocks away. I didn't want to deal with transit in the AM, although that would not have been a big issue anyway.  Plus, it's right off broadway (the broadway that has shows) so subways access was great. Since it's a college town, I felt super safe and there were minimal tourists and minimal bums also. A couple things to note: this is actually Paul's residence so there are some personal affects to be mindful of.  I really appreciated that though because I was able to tap into the Tylenol and bandaids in the medicine cabinet over the course of 2 weeks. Hey, anything can happen!  He was totally respectful of my privacy and wasn't popping in or out during my stay.  I'm hopeful that if Teachers college has anymore trainings that I get to go to, Paul's place is available!
Very safe and close to Columbia University!

Paul is a kind, interesting man who made us feel completely welcome.  He went out of his way to be accommodating.  The apartment is large & sunny, an unexpected treat in Manhattan. The location could not be better for a Columbia U. visit.  The bed/mattress was top notch.  If you are not used to NYC apartments you might feel put off by ANY pre-war apartment, but this is among the much better ones!

My husband and I had a private room in Paul’s apartment. Paul’s place is bright, comfortable, clean, and beautifully and uniquely decorated. The apartment is quiet and is located on one of the top floors of the building, providing views and the sounds of birds chirping. It is a few steps from Columbia and to the convenient red line. 

Paul was a gracious and considerate host, greeting us on arrival with a warm welcome and snacks. We always felt comfortable and free to hang out, make meals, and talk. Hands down one of the best airBnBs I’ve ever had the pleasure to stay in. It’s a NYC gem!

This is my first time as an AirBnB guest (I hosted for over a year when AirBnB had just started and had good experiences as a host). Paul, my host, hit it out of the park. The location is outstanding. Such a lovely upper west side block, across the street and around the corner from Columbia. I was visiting my son who is a student there. Even if Columbia wasn't your destination, Paul's apartment is one block from lovely Riverside Park and the Hudson River. Morningside park is a few blocks to the east. Central Park North and Cathedral Parkway are 5-10 minutes away. The 1 train stops 2-4 blocks away. The UWS is very gracious. The pace is less frenetic which is a nice thing at the end of a day of NYC touring. Yet the nearness of Columbia gives the neighborhood a youthful hip vibe. And Columbia's campus is outstanding; lovely and compact. I felt safe coming and going from Paul's building. The building was well maintained. The hallway outside his door wasn't dark and depressing. There is a laundry in the basement and a garbage chute in the hall on his floor. Paul's apartment is decorated with an artist's eye; the furniture, art, even the plates and skillets, were beautiful, colorful, special. The kitchen/sitting room was filled with light! Everything was in its place. My bedroom had a very big, comfortable bed. The bed linens were soft; the colors were muted and restful. There was plenty of drawer and closet space. The table lighting was exceptional. I had a lovely view of a church and Columbia outside my bedroom window. Paul was so kind to welcome me very early due to my 5a arrival into JFK on a red eye from SF. He was quickly responsive when I requested my stay. He met me and welcomed me into his home. He made me tea, fruit and nuts. He gave me plenty of towels and wash clothes. He gave me a shelf in the bathroom for my toiletries. I unpacked, showered (plenty of hot water), and headed out to my first meeting. Paul was lovely to talk to, yet respectful of my privacy. He welcomed both of my young adult children into his home. My daughter (who is graduating from NYU) cooked 2 breakfasts in Paul's kitchen. She so enjoyed his window seat in his kitchen. My son lingered and did schoolwork at the kitchen table. Paul's space was so much more gracious than a dorm room! Paul even printed out my boarding pass when I was out and about. He also printed 36 pages of work that I had completed while spending the day in the libraries at Columbia and the cafes near Columbia while my son wrote a paper. Making that personal connection with Paul enhanced my stay. But he was so quiet and gracious that guests who want to keep to themselves would also be comfortable. My son has 3 more years at Columbia and...

Extremely clean, quiet and close to Barnard and Columbia campuses, transportation and places to eat.  Paul was generous with his time and his space while allowing us great privacy.   We would return without pause.

Paul's apartment is a corner apartment in one of the typical New York buildings around Colombia university. The location could not be better. You are at the doorstep of Colombia as well as on a short walking distance to St John the Divine and Central Park. The 1-line (subway) is literally around the corner so Midtown is very easy to reach. The apt is quiet and I slept really well. Paul knows the area very well and was very generous not only sharing his apt but also his inside tips & tricks about the area. Paul is a genuine person who does whatever he can to make your stay as comfortable as possible.
Paul was a fantastic host. We're grateful for his help and for allowing us to use his wonderful apartment.

Great place, exactly what I needed. 

Paul was a great host and will for sure be returning when needed. He gave me my space as needed but was always there when and if I needed him for anything.

Feel like I made a friend in NYC :) Thanks again Paul!!

Paul's place is a great place to stay. Paul was very helpful with finding out what was happening in the city, suggestions for where to go, getting to know and navigate the area, and was fun to talk with about the history and character of the neighborhood and NY. He was great about check-in and out.  He is very thoughtful and accommodating and I would definitely stay here again!

As a visiting student at Columbia University, my 3-month stay was really pleasant and comfortable. Paul is always considerate while giving me enough privacy. The apartment has everything I need, including all the facilities and a cozy bedroom, so it just feel like home. 

Columbia main campus is just cross the street. Subway is 5min walk. Plenty of food and grocery stores around. 5min walk from riverside park.

Paul's communication at every stage of the process was fabulous from our initial inquiry to our arrival time.  He met us outside his apartment, got us settled in, answered endless questions about places to eat and get coffee, and how to manage the subway and trains for our various expeditions.   He was unfailingly in good cheer.  And I would absolutely stay with him again.

Paul es un super host, es atento, amable, su departamento es hermoso, limpio, ordenado y muy muy cómodo. Esta a unos pasos del metro que corre por el centro, es fácil llegar a todos lados.

Muy muy recomendable!!!

Loved our stay! Paul is warm, responsive, full of local tips, and genuinely happy to have us guests around. And yet unobtrusive — never had to compete for the bathroom (I was worried about the shared bath beforehand), and I always felt like we had complete privacy when we needed it.

Location cannot be beat; just two minutes to Barnard and Columbia and the subway.  Easy to hop on subway to get to Broadway shows too.

Parking was free and fairly easy, and I was always able to park within a block or two. I only had to move my car once to avoid street cleaning.

On 8th floor so quiet and bed is a comfy; we slept like babies.  

We enjoyed Paul and his home so much we feel like we have a family member in the city and plan to be back!
Paul is a friendly, thoughtful and responsive host. The apartment is well kept. The location of the building is very convenient.
The host canceled this reservation 32 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This place exceeded all of my expectations. Paul made me feel right at home -- arranged keys at times good for me, helped move my stuff, made the kitchen free and available, and overall provided a warm, comfortable environment.  Highly recommended.
Great place to stay! And so close to campus!
Paul is friendly and considerate. His place is very close to the Columbia Univerisity. I was overall satisfied, but one minor issue was that the heater sometimes  made some noise that woke me up.
Great location, clean, good hospitality.

Paul is a great host! He never hesitates to spend his personal time to ensure your stay at his apartment is comfortable and great. He made me feel at home and he is extremely polite. The apartment is located in a great location and is best suited for anyone who is there for any work at Columbia University. I highly recommend Paul's apartment!

name: Apartamento para as olimpíadas
summary: Indevassável, localizado entre Laranjeiras, Aterro do Flamengo e Praia de Botafogo.  Prédio com portaria 24 h na rua do Palácio Guanabara. Próximo a praça São Salvador, que tem movimentação toda noite. A localização permite agradáveis passeios a pé.
description: Indevassável, localizado entre Laranjeiras, Aterro do Flamengo e Praia de Botafogo.  Prédio com portaria 24 h na rua do Palácio Guanabara. Próximo a praça São Salvador, que tem movimentação toda noite. A localização permite agradáveis passeios a pé.
