N.Y.でこの値段で泊まれることは無いと思うので､おすすめです!

Karen and Joushua are very nice . 
There tips for transportation and where to go are very helpful. 

The room is clean and tidy..  

They are ready to help at all times. Joushua kindly helped me to get to the taxi at 3:30 in the morning 

They made my stay at Newyork so easy amd comfortable

Hosts were thoughtful and considerate. Offered helpful tips for getting around the area and exploring parts of the city. I would say people who are more interested in theater or shows will connect with Josh and Karen more. That being said, I highly recommend staying here.

These hosts have hundreds of stellar reviews for a reason! Karen and Joshua were incredible hosts during our impromptu trip to the city for a snowy Christmas weekend. They have a natural inclination for hospitality and want to make sure you are completely comfortable, not only in their home but in the city as well. We had the opportunity to stay in their cozier listing and while it was small, my husband, myself, and our 1 year old daughter were quite content. Karen even brought out a few board books and toddler toys for her to play with, so so sweet! We WILL be returning for future visits and only hope that they have a room available.
Great place. Really close to the subway. Safe neighborhood and very clean house.

The hosts are super friendly and thoughtful! Accommodate us very nicely and provided many information!
Place is exactly like what describe. Location is great too, just one block away from subway station. You get what u paid for, even though the room is a little small (regular New York apartment size) but the value is great and it's easy to go around places if u don't mind staying further from Manhattan for the cheaper price like I did :)
I really enjoyed my stay with them!
Jeg hadde et flott opphold hos Karen og Joshua!
Great place and people. Read the rest of the reviews. 5 stars.
Great place. Close to the 2 and 5 trains. Basically direct access to both east and west side of Manhattan. Excellent hosts.

Very close to a major station on the 2 and 5 line. These two lines in NYC are the most reliable lines that go all the way up the Manhattan Island. One of which will get you to the east side and the other will get you to the west side. Quite affordable for its perfect location. I would highly recommend this place to people who would like to visit NYC.

I stayed here for a month. It was my first Airbnb experience. It was better than what I expected. The hosts are friendly and I had a great time with them! Definetly coming back here the next time I'm in Brooklyn.

Karen's place is perfect for long or short NYC trips! The place is equipped with necessary amenities. Space is close to all kinds of public transportation (bus, subway, etc.), considering we would be spending most of the time outside enjoying the city. Hosts were caring and helpful and their suggestions about various landmarks in the city helped me a lot throughout my stay. I would definitely recommend this place to the future guests!
Amazing hospitality ! Very friendly hosts, including their kids.

Karen and Joshua were so friendly and welcoming! The apartment was fun and colorful, and the room was cozy and comfortable. Just a block from the subway and very easy to get around. I'd definitely stay again!
Fue grata la hospitalidad en el hostal de karen la atención y la ubicación fue
Great place close to the subway, listing is accurate. Karen and Joshua are super friendly and welcoming.

Karen and her family are so nice!
They are very kind ,and have various information about NYC . 
Her house is only one block
from the subway station. I didn’t have any worries about coming back late at night .
And it is in a very convenient place(there are many shops around )
If you would like to stay in Brooklyn ,I highly recommend that you stay at Karen's house!!

Karen and Joshua are great hosts, very hospitable, willing to help and answer questions, and easy to communicate with. The location is minutes from the subway station; the room is clean and the bed is comfortable. would highly recommend for visiting Brooklyn and Manhattan
호스트가 굉장히 친절하고 방도 지내기 좋았습니다! 집과 지하철역이 가까워서 이동하기도 편했습니다. 다운타운까지는 지하철로 40분정도 가면 도착할 수 있습니다.

This is a wonderful place to stay! This was the first time I booked an Airbnb and Karen and Josh are great hosts! They made me feel so welcome and offered wonderful recommendations for sightseeing and food. They’re incredibly kind and accommodating. Highly recommend staying here!

We enjoyed our stay in Karen and Joshua's place!The room is very cozy. Super quiet at night. And it's very close to the metro station in walking distance. Close by also has grocery store and places to get food. It's very convenient!

Karen and her family are very nice and approachable people. If I had a question or just wanted to chat about what I visited during the day, they were happy to answer questions, and give me some local tips. I had good chats with all of them. Her children are nice kids. Will definitely recommend staying with them. Don't think that Brooklyn is to far away, just use the Subway and you'll be there super quick.
Karen is a wonderful host. She is fun, kind, very helpful. Her kids are the cutest of all! She gave me some cool suggestions for places to visit.
Very quiet and tidy place to stay. Room neat and sufficient to my needs. Both Karen and Joshua very friendly and willing to chat and their children are wonderfully behaved.

Very cool diverse neighborhood, close to subway station. Area seemed safe, building was very close to main streets, so easy to catch taxi or Uber drivers. Room was well kept, clean, I was provided with keys to the building, apartment, and room. Met all my expectations.

Awesome location near the "2" and "5" trains. Karen and Josh were very welcoming and their place was very comfy and stylish. I was hardly there since I had to work late nights but they were very understanding and attentive.

ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝ前に荷物を預かってもらうにあたり､親切に対応してもらって本当に助かりました｡

To have my luggage kept before check-in, I was really saved by being kindly responded.
There were children around elementary school students, but I was not particularly concerned. It was a lot of fun to play with origami together the last night.
Room was simple, but there was refrigerator, too and was very easy to spend.
The house was only one block away from the subway and there was nothing to worry about in security.Overall it is a recommended property!
Great place to stay at in Brooklyn. Close to public transit and hosts are very accommodating.

My stay at Karen and Joshua‘s was great. They are warm-hearted, welcoming people and super easy to communicate with. They even invited me to a private holiday celebration which was so kind and a super cool experience. The two kids are lovely and very friendly and fun. 
The location is very close to the subway which makes it easy to get to Manhattan. Sometimes it can be a bit annoying because of track maintenance etc. but that’s something you accept by deciding to stay outside of Manhattan. I didn’t particularly like the neighborhood and didn’t feel very comfortable coming home late as a girl by myself. But that’s just a feeling, nothing ever happened and there were always other people in the street.
I want to thank Karen and Joshua again for the nice time I enjoyed at their home.
Very pleasant family. Perfect oportunity how to find out interesting informations about New York. Not only places but also history. Thank you for this beautiful experience.

Karen and Joshua are great host and the place is about 30 min from Manhattan.. it has easy access to Subway and the price is reasonable... Add to that their knowledge about the places and it is a stealer
Nice family feels like homy

Our stay in the cozy room was amazing. Karen and Joshua were very nice and always helped us out with everything we needed. They were very attentive with all the details and our stay here could not have been better. Great place to stay, awesome hosts.

Karen and Joshua are excellent hosts! The room is clean and cozy and their place is close to the subway so it is very convenient. I definitely recommend this place and will come back!

Karen and Josh were amazing hosts! They were very warm and friendly and quick to give suggestions on what to see and do in Brooklyn, Manhattan and surrounding areas. They were so kind and easy going but also gave you your own space - I felt like I was part of the family! I highly recommend staying with them :)

What a great month I spent in the apartment of Karen and Joshua ! They are really helpful, nice and respectful. You are completly independant and you can share, if you want, a movie, a dinner or a glass of wine with them. It was a pleasure to meet this family ! I recommand this flat!

Karen and Joshua have mastered the art of Airbnb hosting. From the moment I arrived, I was welcomed into their home and family. Everything was exactly as expected with great amenities - the washer and dryer are especially helpful for longer stays. The room is a little small, but since this is New York, that's to be expected (and hopefully you aren't spending too much time in your room anyway). It should be mentioned you'll be living with Karen and Joshua's family; if you are someone who just wants a quiet place where you don't have to talk to anyone else, this might not be the home for you. If however, you enjoy interacting with others and having interesting conversations then this is the place for you. Overall, I thoroughly enjoyed my stay here and I give Karen and Joshua's place a hearty recommendation!
